5‘King, taim papa bilong mi i laik i dai, em i mekim mi promis bai mi mas karim bodi bilong en i go planim long matmat em yet i bin wokim long graun Kenan. Olsem na mi laik bai yu larim mi i go planim papa bilong mi pastaim na bihain bai mi kam bek gen.”
6King i harim dispela tok bilong Josep, orait em i bekim tok olsem, “Yu mas bihainim dispela promis yu bin mekim long papa bilong yu na yu bringim bodi bilong en i go planim.”

7 Orait Josep i go bilong planim papa bilong em. Olgeta ofisa na ol bikman bilong king na olgeta hetman bilong Isip, ol i go wantaim Josep.
8Ol lain bilong Josep tu wantaim ol brata bilong en na ol famili bilong papa bilong en, olgeta i go. Ol liklik pikinini tasol wantaim ol sipsip na ol meme na ol bulmakau i stap long distrik Gosen.
9Ol karis na ol man i save sindaun long ol hos, ol tu i go wantaim Josep. Bikpela lain man tru ol i go.

10 Orait ol i kamap long ples Atat, long hap sankamap bilong wara Jordan, em ples bilong rausim ol lip samting bilong wit na kisim kaikai bilong en. Na ol i mekim bikpela krai sori tru bilong planim man. Na Josep i bihainim pasin bilong sori na krai inap 7-pela de.
11Ol manmeri bilong Kenan i lukim ol dispela lain i stap long ples Atat na i wok long krai na sori, na ol i tok olsem, “Ol Isip i mekim bikpela krai sori tru.” Olsem na ol i kolim dispela ples Abel Misraim.Dispela ples i stap long hap sankamap bilong wara Jordan.

12 Ol pikinini bilong Jekop i bihainim tok na mekim olsem em i bin tokim ol.
13Ol i karim em i go long graun Kenan na ol i planim em long hul bilong ston i stap long graun Makpela, klostu long ples Mamre. Abraham i bin baim dispela graun long Efron, em wanpela man bilong lain Hit, bai dispela graun i ken kamap matmat bilong en.
14Josep i planim papa bilong en pinis, orait em i go bek long Isip wantaim ol brata bilong em na ol arapela lain i bin i go wantaim em.

Josep i lusim rong bilong ol brata #

15 Papa bilong ol i dai pinis, orait ol brata bilong Josep ol i tok olsem, “Olsem wanem nau? Nogut Josep i kros yet long yumi na em i tingting long bekim olgeta pasin nogut yumi bin mekim long em?”
16Olsem na ol i salim tok i go long Josep. Dispela tok i olsem, “Taim papa bilong yumi i no dai yet, em i bin givim wanpela tok long mipela.
17Em i tokim mipela long givim dispela tok long yu, ‘Josep, mi askim yu, plis yu mas lusim dispela bikpela rong na sin ol brata bilong yu i bin mekim long yu.’ Orait nau mipela ol wokman bilong God bilong papa bilong yumi, mipela i askim yu, plis yu lusim dispela bikpela rong mipela i bin mekim long yu.” Josep i harim dispela tok na em i krai i stap.

18 Bihain ol brata bilong Josep i go lukim em, na ol i putim pes bilong ol i go daun long graun klostu long lek bilong Josep, na ol i tokim em olsem, “Mipela i kamap long yu olsem ol wokboi nating bilong yu.”
19Tasol Josep i tokim ol olsem, “Yupela i no ken pret. Mi no God na bai mi kotim yupela.
20Tru, yupela i bin pasim tingting bilong bagarapim mi. Tasol God i bin larim yupela i mekim dispela pasin, long wanem, em i tingting long helpim planti manmeri, bai ol i no ken bagarap. Na yupela i lukim pinis dispela wok em i mekim.
21Olsem na yupela i no ken pret. Bai mi lukautim yupela wantaim ol pikinini bilong yupela.” Na Josep i mekim gutpela toktok long ol brata bilong en na em i mekim bel bilong ol i stap isi.

Josep i dai #

22 Josep i stap long Isip wantaim ol lain bilong papa bilong en. Josep i stap inap 110 krismas olgeta.
23Em i lukim ol pikinini na ol tumbuna pikinini bilong Efraim. Na taim ol pikinini bilong Makir i kamap, ol i bringim ol tu i go long Josep na em i holim ol na putim long lek bilong en. Makir em i pikinini man bilong Manase.
24Na bihain Josep i tokim ol brata bilong en olsem, “Klostu bai mi dai. Tasol God bai i lukautim yupela, na bihain em bai i bringim yupela i go lusim dispela kantri. Na bai em i bringim yupela i go long kantri bipo em i bin mekim strongpela promis long givim long Abraham na Aisak na Jekop.”

25 Bihain Josep i tokim ol pikinini man bilong Israel olsem, “Yupela i mas promis long mi olsem, long taim God i kam bilong helpim yupela, yupela bai i kisim ol bun bilong mi long dispela ples na karim i go wantaim yupela.” Na Josep i mekim ol brata i tok tru antap long ol bai i bihainim dispela tok bilong en.
26Josep i dai long taim em i gat 110 krismas. Na ol i putim olkain marasin long bodi bilong en, bai bodi i no ken bagarap. Na ol i putim bodi bilong en long wanpela bokis na putim i stap long kantri Isip.


Buk Baibel (Ukarumpa, Papua New Guinea: The Bible Society of Papua New Guinea, 1989).

Exported from Logos Bible Software, 11:02 PM August 11, 2020.

children.name: 6 .html
children.contents:
6 

Stori bilong Noa na ol lain bilong en #

Pasin nogut bilong ol manmeri #

	(Sapta 6–11)

1Bihain planti manmeri i kamap pinis long graun, na ol i gat ol pikinini meri.
2Ol pikinini man bilong Godi lukim ol dispela meri i naispela tumas. Na ol i kisim ol meri long laik bilong ol yet na maritim ol.
3Orait Bikpela i tok, “Mi bin putim spirit bilong mi long ol manmeri bilong givim laip long ol. Tasol ol i samting bilong graun tasol, olsem na mi no ken larim spirit bilong mi i staplong ol oltaim. Nau bai mi larim ol i stap laip inap 120 krismas tasol, na bai ol i dai.”
4Long dispela taim na long taim bihain tu i bin i gat ol traipela man i stap long graun. Ol dispela man i pikinini bilong ol meri i bin slip wantaim ol pikinini man bilong God. Ol i strongpela man tru bilong mekim kain kain wok, na ol i gat biknem long dispela taim.

5 Bikpela i lukim pasin bilong ol manmeri long olgeta hap i nogut tru. Ol manmeri i tingting tasol long ol samting nogut.
6Na Bikpela i ting i gutpela sapos em i no bin wokim ol manmeri. Na em i bel hevi tru.
7Orait na em i tok, “Bai mi pinisim olgeta manmeri mi bin wokim, maski ol i stap long wanem hap. Na bai mi pinisim tu olgeta pisin na olgeta animal bilong ples na olgeta animal bilong bus. Mi yet mi bin wokim ol dispela samting, tasol mi ting i gutpela sapos mi no bin wokim ol.”
8Tasol Bikpela i amamas long Noa.

9–10 Nem bilong ol lain pikinini bilong Noa i olsem. Em i gat tripela pikinini man, Siem na Ham na Jafet. Noa em i gutpela man, na wokabaut bilong en i stret long ai bilong God. Em i pren tru bilong God.
11Tasol God i lukim pasin bilong ol arapela manmeri i nogut tru. Long olgeta hap bilong graun ol i wok long pait na bikhet tasol.
12Em i lukim pasin nogut i kamap long olgeta hap bilong graun. Em i no lukim wanpela gutpela lain manmeri i stap. Nogat. Olgeta lain manmeri i wok long mekim ol pasin nogut tasol.

Noa i wokim sip #

13 Orait God i tokim Noa olsem, “Olgeta manmeri i wok long pait na bikhet tasol, olsem na mi laik bagarapim ol. Bai mi pinisim tru olgeta lain manmeri.
14Tasol yu mas kisim plang bilong gutpela diwai na wokim wanpela sip. Yu mas wokim sampela rum insait long en, na penim insait na ausait long kolta.
15Yu mas wokim dispela sip olsem, longpela bilong en inap 130 mita na bikpela bilong en inap 22 mita na antap bilong en inap 13 mita.
16Taim yu wokim rup bilong sip, yu no ken larim rup i pas olgeta long banis bilong sip. Nogat. Yu mas larim hap mita samting namel long rup na banis, bai lait i ken i go insait long sip.Yu mas wokim tripela plua o dek long dispela sip, wanpela daunbilo na wanpela namel na wanpela antap. Na yu mas wokim wanpela dua long banis.

17 “Bai mi mekim bikpela tait i kamap long graun, bilong bagarapim olgeta samting i gat laip. Na olgeta samting i stap long graun bai i dai.
18Tasol bai mi mekim kontrak wantaim yu. Yu mas i go insait long dispela sip wantaim meri bilong yu na ol pikinini bilong yu wantaim ol meri bilong ol.
19Na yu mas kisim tupela tupela bilong olgeta kain animal, wanpela man na wanpela meri. Na yu mas bringim ol i go insait long sip wantaim yupela, bai ol i no ken i dai.
20Tupela tupela bilong olgeta kain pisin na olkain bikpela na liklik animal ol i mas i go insait long sip, olsem bai ol i no ken i dai.
21Na yu mas kisim olgeta kain samting bilong kaikai na putim long sip. Bai yupela wantaim ol animal na pisin i ken kaikai long en.”
22Orait Noa i mekim olgeta samting olsem God i tokim em.

children.name: 7 .html
children.contents:
7 

Bikpela tait i kamap #

1Bihain Bikpela i tokim Noa olsem, “Mi lukim yu wanpela tasol yu stap stretpela man namel long olgeta manmeri bilong graun. Olsem na yu wantaim olgeta lain famili bilong yu i mas i go insait long sip.
2Yu mas kisim 7-pela man na 7-pela meri bilong olgeta kain animal i klin long ai bilong mi. Tasol long ol animal i no klin yu mas kisim wanpela man na wanpela meri tasol.
3Olsem tasol yu mas kisim 7-pela man na 7-pela meri bilong olgeta kain pisin. Yu mas mekim olsem bai ol i no ken i dai, na bihain bai ol pikinini bilong ol i kamap planti gen long graun.
47-pela de i go pinis, orait bai mi salim ren i kam long graun long san na long nait, inap 40 de olgeta. Long dispela ren bai mi pinisim tru olgeta samting i gat laip mi bin wokim.”
5Orait Noa i mekim olgeta samting olsem Bikpela i tok.

6 Noa i gat 600 krismas long taim dispela bikpela tait i kamap long graun.
7Noa na meri bilong en i go insait long sip wantaim ol pikinini man bilong tupela na ol meri bilong ol, olsem bai ol i no ken bagarap long taim dispela tait i kamap.
8Na wanpela man na wanpela meri long olgeta kain animal i klin long ai bilong God na bilong olgeta kain animal i no klin, na bilong ol pisin na liklik animal,
9ol i go insait long sip wantaim Noa, olsem God i tokim Noa.
10Taim 7-pela de i go pinis, orait bikpela tait i kamap na i stat long karamapim graun.

11 Long yia Noa i gat 600 krismas, na long de namba 17 bilong namba 2 mun bilong dispela yia, graun i op na bikpela wara i stap aninit long graun i sut i kam antap. Na olgeta dua long skai i op na wara i kapsait i kam daun.
12Bikpela ren moa i kam daun long san na long nait, inap long 40 de.

13 Long dispela de tasol ren i stat long pundaun, Noa na meri bilong en, wantaim 3-pela pikinini bilong en, Siem na Ham na Jafet, na ol meri bilong ol, ol i go insait long sip.
14Na olgeta kain animal bilong ples na olgeta kain bikpela na liklik animal bilong bus na olgeta kain pisin, ol i go insait long sip wantaim ol lain bilong Noa.

15–16 Wanpela man na wanpela meri bilong olgeta kain samting i gat laip, ol i go insait long sip wantaim Noa, olsem God i tok. Noa i go insait pinis, na Bikpela i pasim dua bilong sip.

17 Tait i wok long kamap yet inap long 40 de, na wara i kam antap moa na i litimapim sip. Na sip i lusim graun.
18Na wara i kamap bikpela moa, na sip i trip antap long en.
19Na wara i kam antap moa moa yet na i karamapim olgeta bikpela maunten.
20Bihain wara i winim olgeta maunten na i go antap moa inap long 7-pela mita.
21Na olgeta samting i gat laip long graun, ol i dai, em ol pisin na ol animal bilong ples na ol bikpela na liklik animal bilong bus na olgeta manmeri.
22Olgeta samting i gat laip long graun i dai.
23Bikpela i pinisim tru olgeta samting long graun, ol manmeri na ol animal bilong ples na bilong bus, na ol pisin. Wanpela lain tasol i no bagarap long dispela tait, em Noa wantaim ol lain bilong en na ol pisin na ol animal i stap wantaim ol insait long sip.
24Na wara i kamap bikpela moa yet na i karamapim graun i stap inap long 150 de.

children.name: 8 .html
children.contents:
8 

Tait i pinis #

1Bihain God i tingting long Noa na ol animal i stap wantaim em long sip. Na God i mekim win i ran antap long wara, na wara i go daun.
2Na wara aninit long graun i no kam antap moa. Na olgeta dua long skai i pas, na ren i no pundaun moa
3na wara i slek i go daun. Wara i wok long i go daun inap long 150 de olgeta.
4Na long de namba 17 bilong namba 7 mun sip i pas long wanpela maunten long ples maunten bilong Ararat.
5Wara i go daun yet na long de namba wan bilong namba 10 mun ol het bilong maunten i kamap.

6 Bihain long 40 de i go pinis, orait Noa i opim windo bilong sip,
7na em i lusim wanpela kotkot i go. Dispela pisin i flai i go na i no kam bek. Nogat. Em i raun raun inap wara i drai na graun i kamap.
8Olsem na Noa i salim wanpela pisin ol i kolim balus i go, long wanem, em i laik save, wara i go daun pinis, o nogat.
9Tasol wara i karamapim graun yet na balus i no painim wanpela ples bilong sindaun na malolo long en. Olsem na balus i kam bek, na Noa i putim han i go ausait na i kisim em i kam insait gen.
10Orait Noa i wet i stap inap 7-pela de moa na em i salim balus i go gen.
11Na long apinun tru balus i kam bek long Noa. Na long maus bilong en, em i holim wanpela nupela lip bilong diwai oliv. Olsem na Noa i save, wara i go daun pinis.
12Na em i wet 7-pela de moa na i salim balus i go gen. Na balus i no kam bek moa.

13 Long yia Noa i gat 601 krismas, na long de namba wan bilong namba wan mun bilong dispela yia, wara i stat long drai. Noa i rausim wanpela hap rup bilong sip na i lukluk nabaut. Na em i lukim graun i wok long drai.
14Long de namba 27 bilong namba 2 mun graun i drai olgeta.

15 Orait na God i tokim Noa olsem,
16“Yu lusim sip na yu go daun wantaim meri bilong yu na ol pikinini bilong yu wantaim ol meri bilong ol.
17Na bringim olgeta animal i go daun wantaim yupela, em ol pisin na olgeta animal bilong ples na bilong bus. Bai ol i ken i go nabaut na karim pikinini na bai ol i kamap planti long olgeta hap bilong graun.”
18Orait Noa i lusim sip na i go daun wantaim meri bilong en na ol pikinini bilong en wantaim ol meri bilong ol.
19Na ol kain kain animal na ol pisin i bung long lain bilong ol yet, na i lusim sip na i go daun.

Noa i mekim ofa long Bikpela #

20 Noa i wokim wanpela alta bilong lotu long Bikpela. Na em i kisim wanpela wanpela long olgeta kain animal na pisin i klin long ai bilong Bikpela, na em i kilim ol bilong mekim ofa. Na em i kukim ol antap long alta.
21Bikpela i smelim switpela smel bilong dispela ofa na em i tok, “Mi no ken bagarapim graun gen bilong bekim pasin nogut bilong ol manmeri. I tru, stat long taim ol manmeri i yangpela yet ol i save tingting long mekim ol pasin nogut. Tasol mi no ken bagarapim moa olgeta samting i gat laip, olsem mi mekim pinis.
22Bai i gat taim bilong planim kaikai na taim bilong kamautim kaikai. Bai i gat taim bilong kol na taim bilong ples i hat. Bai i gat taim bilong san na taim bilong ren. Bai i gat san na nait. Dispela olgeta kain taim bai i no ken pinis long taim graun i stap yet.”

children.name: 9 .html
children.contents:
9 

God i mekim kontrak wantaim Noa #

1God i givim blesing long Noa na ol pikinini bilong en long dispela tok, “Karim planti pikinini, bai ol lain bilong yupela i pulapim olgeta hap bilong graun.
2Olgeta animal bilong graun na ol pisin na ol pis, bai ol i pret long yupela, na yupela bai i bosim ol.
3Yupela i ken kaikai olgeta abus na ol samting i save wokabaut long graun na ol kain kain sayor. Mi givim olgeta olsem kaikai bilong yupela.
4Wanpela samting tasol yupela i no ken kaikai, em mit i gat blut i stap yet long en, long wanem, blut em i as bilong laip.
5Na sapos wanpela animal o wanpela man i pinisim laip bilong yupela, bai mi mekim save tru long em. Yes, sapos man i kilim i dai narapela man, bai mi mekim em i karim hevi bilong dispela pasin em i mekim.
6Man i kilim i dai narapela man, em yet i mas dai long han bilong ol man, long wanem, mi God mi bin wokim ol manmeri i kamap olsem mi yet.”

7 God i tok olsem, “Nau yupela i mas karim planti pikinini, bai ol lain pikinini bilong yupela i kamap planti na pulapim olgeta hap bilong graun.”

8 Na God i tokim Noa wantaim ol pikinini bilong en olsem,
9“Nau mi laik mekim kontrak wantaim yupela na wantaim ol lain pikinini bilong yupela bai i kamap bihain.
10Na mi mekim kontrak wantaim olgeta samting i gat laip tu, em ol pisin na ol animal bilong ples na bilong bus, na olgeta samting i bin i stap wantaim yupela long sip.
11Mi mekim kontrak wantaim yupela long dispela tok. Mi promis bai mi no ken salim gen bikpela tait i kam na bagarapim olgeta samting i gat laip. Na tait bai i no ken karamapim gen olgeta hap bilong dispela graun.”

12–13 Na God i tok, “Mi putim renbo bilong mi long klaut olsem mak bilong dispela kontrak bilong oltaim mi mekim pinis wantaim yupela na olgeta animal. Dispela renbo bai i stap olsem mak bilong kontrak mi mekim wantaim olgeta samting bilong graun.
14Taim mi mekim ol klaut i kamap antap long skai bai renbo tu i kamap.
15Na bai mi tingim dispela promis mi mekim pinis wantaim yupela na ol animal, olsem na bai tait i no ken bagarapim gen olgeta samting i gat laip.
16Taim mi lukim renbo i kamap long klaut, orait bai mi tingim dispela kontrak bilong oltaim, nau mi mekim wantaim olgeta samting i gat laip na i stap long dispela graun.”

17 Na God i tokim Noa olsem, “Dispela renbo em i mak bilong promis mi mekim wantaim olgeta samting i gat laip.”

Noa i kros long Ham, pikinini bilong en #

18 Em hia nem bilong tripela pikinini bilong Noa i bin stap long sip wantaim em. Nem bilong ol i olsem, Siem na Ham na Jafet. Ham em i papa bilong Kenan.
19Ol dispela pikinini bilong Noa ol i tumbuna bilong olgeta lain manmeri bilong graun.

20 Noa em i man bilong wokim gaden, na em i namba wan man long planim gaden wain.
21Orait wanpela de em i dring sampela wain na em i spak. Na ol klos bilong en i lus na em i slip nating long haus sel bilong en.
22Na Ham, papa bilong Kenan, em i lukim papa i slip nating, na em i go na i tokim tupela brata.
23Orait Siem na Jafet tupela i kisim laplap na i putim long sol bilong tupela. Na tupela i givim baksait long haus sel na tupela i wokabaut isi isi i go insait na karamapim papa bilong tupela. Tupela i no tanim pes na lukim papa i no gat klos.
24Taim Noa i kirap na tingting bilong en i klia gen, orait em i harim tok long yangpela pikinini bilong en i bin lukim em i slip nating.
25Na em i tok, “Bikpela hevi i ken i stap antap long Kenan. Bai em i kamap wokboi nating bilong ol brata bilong en.”
26Na Noa i tok tu olsem, “Yumi litimapim nem bilong God, Bikpela bilong Siem. Kenan bai i stap wokboi nating bilong Siem.
27God i ken mekim ol pikinini bilong Jafet i kamap planti, na bai ol i sindaun gut wantaim ol lain bilong Siem. Tasol Kenan bai i stap wokboi nating bilong Jafet.”
28Bikpela tait i pinis na Noa i stap 350 yia moa.
29Na em i gat 950 krismas olgeta long taim em i dai.

children.name: test.html
children.contents:
1 

God i mekim kamap olgeta samting

Stori bilong God i mekim kamap olgeta samting

(Sapta 1–2)

1Bipo bipo tru God i mekim kamap skai na graun na olgeta samting i stap long en.

6Tasol graun i no bin i stap olsem yumi save lukim nau. Nogat. Em i stap nating na i narakain tru. Tudak i karamapim bikpela wara na spirit bilong God i go i kam antap long en.
3Na God i tok olsem, “Lait i mas kamap.” Orait lait i kamap.
4God i lukim lait i gutpela, na em i amamas. Na em i brukim tudak na tulait.
5Tulait em i kolim “De,” na tudak em i kolim “Nait.” Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba wan.

6–7 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Wanpela banis i mas kamap bilong banisim wara, bai wara i stap long tupela hap.” Orait dispela banis i kamap. God i mekim dispela banis i kamap bilong banisim wara antap na wara daunbilo.
8Na dispela banis em i kolim “Skai.” Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba 2.

9 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Wara i stap aninit long skai i mas i go bung long wanpela hap tasol, bai ples drai i kamap.” Orait ples drai i kamap.
10Dispela ples drai God i kolim “Graun.” Na ol wara i bung pinis long wanpela hap em i kolim “Solwara.” God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas.
11Bihain God i tok olsem, “Graun i mas kamapim ol kain kain diwai na gras na kaikai samting.” Orait dispela samting i kamap.
12Ol kain kain diwai na gras na kaikai samting i kamap long graun. God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas.
13Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba 3.

14 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Ol lait i mas kamap long skai bilong makim tulait na nait, na bilong makim ol de na ol yia na ol kain kain taim bilong yia.
15Ol dispela lait i mas kamap long skai bilong givim lait long graun.” Orait ol lait i kamap.
16God i mekim kamap tupela bikpela lait. Bikpela em san bilong givim lait long de, na liklik em mun bilong givim lait long nait. Na God i mekim kamap ol sta tu.
17Na em i putim ol dispela lait long skai bilong givim lait long graun,
18na bilong bosim taim bilong san i mas lait na taim bilong nait i mas kamap, na bilong brukim tudak na tulait. God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas.
19Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba 4.

20 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Solwara i mas pulap long ol kain kain samting i gat laip. Na ol pisin i mas kamap na flai nabaut long skai.”
21Orait God i mekim kamap ol traipela pis na snek bilong solwara, na ol arapela kain samting bilong solwara, na ol kain kain pisin. God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas.
22Na God i mekim gutpela tok bilong givim strong long ol. Em i tokim ol olsem, “Yupela ol kain kain samting bilong solwara, yupela i mas kamap planti na pulapim olgeta hap bilong solwara. Na yupela ol pisin, yupela i mas kamap planti long graun.”
23Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba 5.

24 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Graun i mas kamapim ol kain kain samting i gat laip. Em i mas kamapim ol animal bilong ples na ol bikpela na liklik animal bilong bus.” Orait ol animal i kamap.
25God i kamapim ol kain kain animal bilong ples na ol bikpela na liklik animal bilong bus. God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas.

26 Bihain God i tok olsem, “Nau yumi wokim ol manmeri bai ol i kamap olsem yumi yet. Bai yumi putim ol i stap bos bilong ol pis na ol pisin na bilong olgeta kain animal na bilong olgeta samting bilong graun.”
27Orait God i wokim ol manmeri na ol i kamap olsem God yet. God i mekim ol i kamap man na meri.
28Na God i mekim gutpela tok bilong givim strong long ol. Em i tokim ol olsem, “Yupela i mas kamap planti na i go sindaun long olgeta hap bilong graun na bosim olgeta samting i stap long en. Mi putim ol pis na ol pisin na olkain animal bilong graun aninit long yupela.”
29Na God i tok olsem, “Mi givim yupela ol kain kain diwai na gras i karim pikinini bilong kaikai. Na yupela i ken kisim kaikai long ol dispela samting.
30Tasol mi givim ol grinpela lip na gras samting olsem kaikai bilong olgeta bikpela na liklik animal na bilong olgeta pisin.” Orait ol dispela samting i kamap olsem God i tok.
31God i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela, na em i amamas tru. Nait i go pinis na moning i kamap. Em i de namba 6.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Pre Lesele - Mepe mi, Soupaiya mile Yastuhe.html
children.name: Pre Lesele - Mepe mi, Soupaiya mile Yastuhe.html
children.contents:
Pre Lesele
Mepe mi, Soupaiya mile Yastuhe #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Maps available/hung
  • Chalk/blank Chalboard Side (not writing ‘points’ on board for this lesson)
  • Timeline Cards for Jesus, Noah, Moses, Adam and Eve,
  • Chris’s Tumbunas on Timeline (paperclips are hung already)
  • Timeline Markers for Camera, motors, Computers
  • lifetime cord

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Soupaiya
    • 1.1 Beads and Year Names
    • 1.2 Tumbunas
    • 1.3 History & Bible
  • Maps
    • 2.1 Local Map
    • 2.2 World Map

 Ya tama’i mago meheya mgo #

Flageyayo, gitile lesele yaheya, ya stuhegi mehe giyawage. Aya ya stu sahegi sahe giyawagete la wa yailami la mliya.

  • Saheyayo, soupaiya lafi halepageteli mole yastuhe go.
  • Saheyayo, mepe mile yastuhe go. Mehele ya stu mehegi yaileigo, flageya.

➊ Soupaiya #

Lgomateyayo, sopaiya lafi halepageteli mole yastuhe go. Soupaiyamole yastusahe yailami la mliya.

soupaiya liya, lofualiyamai mgo waheamowa. Lela ga stati meile, Mga alo, mga alo… LAST gaga gwa mgale, lofualiyama lo mo ta. 2020. Yahimofa 2020 mo go.

Yahimo la wa youlifa 2020 yahimo wa youlife tile tgo wesiyafo miwele heglafi miya pagute lofualiyamai yahimo la wa you miya mo ta.

Soupaiya miya, hetitalilofou aliyamai sago gaga i late, heti JANUARY 1 mofote aya sopaiya agi agisagi la lefeileigo.

1.1 Beads & Years Names #

Oke, lgote hgo! gile teime la wa heto, tigo la wa yai mi la wa yai lileigo. hao gitigo silola hetilofou aliyamai mi, heti tali lofou aliyamai miya mgo la wa yai meiliya.

Wikei miyayo, sou 7pla mgo. Heti sou miyayo, sou wikeiya 4 o 5pla mgo go. Oke, 1pla yia, 1pla heti tali lofou aliyama mowayo, 12pla o 13pla hetifo la hgolaigo.

1pla yia heti tali lofou aliyama mowa mgo, supaiya sago mo tglagete mgo wa he’amowa. Tile hewi mowa mgo galaigo. gigo la wa laili gu ila, yahe stu tetgo mehe, metate giya la hgo sapgele touleigo, hosapo gwa ila. yahe stu mehele mgo gwa ileigo.

Gile teime la wa heto, tigo la wa yai mi la wa yai lileigo. hao gitigo silola hetilofou aliyamai mi, heti tali lofou aliyamai miya mgo la wa yai meiliya.

Wikei miyayo, sou 7pla mgo. Heti sou miyayo, sou wikeiya 4 o 5pla mgo go. Oke, 1pla yia, 1pla heti tali lofou aliyama mowayo, 12pla o 13pla hetifo la hgolaigo.

1pla yia heti tali lofou aliyama mowa mgo, supaiya sago mo tglagete mgo wa he’amowa. Tile hewi mowa mgo galaigo. gigo la wa laili gu ila, yahe stu tetgo mehe, metate giya la hgo sapgele touleigo, hosapo gwa ila. yahe stu mehele mgo gwa ileigo. Sopaiya mile ya stuheya mgo, tgepu fawi mowa ga stati meile, gaga i, hapoto molama, 1000pla lofu aliyamaiya mgo wa he’amowa.

Sopaiya walege mo gaga i, la walege sagola li lateya, hetitalilofou aliyamai miyayo, 100pla mgo wa he’amowa. oke, sopaiya wapumo giyawage gaga i, mogiya hetitalilofou aliyamai miyayo, 20pla mgo wa he’amowa. mgote la titamefegi la hgefegi miya mgo wa he’amowa. Sopaiya mile ya stu meheya mehe ta.

Silole Tgomiwe Tgomise gitile wlimo #

Aya towete tgoule ya stusahe yailamigo. wlilo la hgo! silole towete tgouwayo, heti tali lofou aliyamaiya mgo 100pla mgo mliligo hata, lgo mateya. toweteyayo, 20pla mgo li late, oke, oto saho la hgo leleigo. gaga i, oke, souwa 40pla mgo gaga ile, otoule hgo mleli someheyayo, tepa’esiya. otou ai la le hata. Mgole towete tgouwayo, 60, 70 o 80pla hetitali lofou aiyamai hgole, metate hale’ileigo. 100pla mgo aumateyayo, hago li hata.

Giti tguteteyayo, gitifa 60pla heti tali lofou aliyamai mgo hgo mateyayo, gitifa yamei sete maflaiyale, ga hale’i tatwa tago. Afawesiyafo tifayo, konkone metefa haiwawe. 100pla hetitalilofou aliyamaiyayo, hago li hata. Wlilole ya stu meheya mehe ta

1.2 Tumbunas #

Aya ale auwatgei 10pla miya lelagi. Namba 10 ale tgu auwatge miwele yahimowayo, Oli Anfindsen. weya tafou hasila weya lelagi. Mgole, weya tafou tola wele yahimo hasiya. Aya mgoleyo, wele yaheyayo, wele yahimowayo, Aya lelagi. Wele tafou tola mile tlago.

Afa tgepu giyayo, ahowa. Gifa lelagi go hata. Paguwayo, gile tgu auwatgeiya tafou tole hasili femowa lelagi go hata. Mgole, giya ya sagiya ga fli’ati gu iya. Gile tgu auwatgeya mile yahi mi, mile heglafi miyayo, gifa mgole la fli’ati gu iya. Miya giya tafou hasili femo lelagi go hata, mgole. Yai tlage matili mgole, giya fa fli’ati gu fliya.

Lofu aliyamai mgali miya, I no pagu somehele lofu aliyamai yahi go hata. Lofu aliyama miya mga alo, mga alo, mga alo, giti yia 2020 gaga gwa giya.

Pagu lofualiyamai ya migo wa keyali tota mate, yahi miya, meta keya hataigo. Miya Lofualiyamai yahigo keyali, miya COUNTIya mi ta. Lofualiyami miya.

Yia 1, 2, 3… mgo tlage mga alowa, mga alowa, gitile heglafi metle gaga wi alo, mete la mga alo, mete hale’i feisgi, metego ga la kamapi, mga alo, mga alo, gitile taita maiya metele ga kamapiya, la mga alo, mga alo, miya gitile heglafi yamei go, la kamapi so mehete, lofualiyamai mitle la keyaougo mi ta. mete mile yahiya. Gitiya mile lofualiyamai yahile ga mgaliya. Mga alo, mga alo, 'u giti, lofualiyamai mgo wa yaimigo, 2020 mgote la gaga gwa giya. Flage so meheya.

Oke, lofualiyamai flage gwa gi lowa, mgole sohe lehe ta. Yia 2020. Mgole lowa lo ta. Oke, lowayo, yia 2000 mowa mo ta. Ayayo, 1985 mgote la kamapiya. Atle, Sapoksewetle, 1985 mgote la hgo mleya. Lowayo, ale titamesele so kamapili mehe. lowayo, Ale maiyasele tguwe, lofualiyama lgote kamapila. Wele tguweyayo, lofualiyama lgote kamapila. wele tguwe lofualiyama lo. mgote kamapila. wele tguwe lofualiyama lo. mgote kamapila. Mga alo, mga alo…

'U tgu, wele lelagi metego la wa laini, hoteita’e la tafou la hasili metego wa laini mi metego kali, miwefa 'owelofu aliyama lo ta.

Lgo gi lgo gi, lofualiyamai liya, weya lelagi go hata. Metele flifage tafoute hasi mile lofualiyamai yahi li ta. Mile heglafile metele make mi.

  • 1965 Mama Suti Sensen
  • 1942 ted sensen, bubu papa
  • 1907 tiyodole sensen
  • 1868 yohannes sensen
  • 1826 Pita Sensen
  • 1788 Sens Madsen
  • 1740 Mads Evensen
  • 1728 Even Olsen
  • 1696 Oli Anfindsen

1.3 History & Bible #

Lelele pagu tile auwato Atamewele lesele mehefa wele piksahe aitleigo, teimateya. Auwatge tgutete Puke Paipolemola mlili mifayo, mile yahe yai latefayo, Metele Piksa sahe wa aitleigo. Mgo, Lowawele yahe yai latefa, Lowawele Piksasahe wa aitleigo. Yesuwele yahe yai latefa, wele piksa sahe wa aitleigo.Soupaiyamole ya stuheyayo, supaiyamole femowa mo ta.

Hatge pkata! Aya Kamela piksa mehele ya stuhe yailamigo. Paguwayo, tile afa wesiyafo tile tgu auwatgeiya meteya mgole tilitaili sagi tou go hata. Kamela sagi tou go hata, piksa sagi tou go hata. lgote hgo! FIRST KAMELA GA WOKI MEILI so meheyayo, heti tali lofoualiyama lo.

Mgoleyo, Yesuwele silo ga touteli so leheyayo, heti tali lofou aliyamalo lgomateyayo, Yesuwele pagu someheteyayo, Kamela piksa mifa tilitaili sagi tou go hata.

Mgole mifayo, tgoule mile piksamehe hagi la mleigo hata, pagu so meheya. Mgoli tilitaili mifayo, Paluse sagi tou go hata, sihlepou, yapu hlau, moto sagi tou go hata, mgoli tilitaili miya hao flage lgohete la hgowa.

Miya mgole, Yesuwe, Lowa, Atamewe meteyayo, hago ta hgoleigo fe? Metele silo ga touteli someheyayo, tilitaili sagi liyayo, Piksa Kamela miya sagi tou go hata. hago ta hgoleigo fe? MEtele pksa mi? Hago li hata.

Oke, gi Lowa, Adam, Mosese metele piksa mi la hgo lateyayo, Hatge pkata! paguwa piksa kamela sagi tou go hata. piksa mile titoseti miya tetgote mi go hata. Ahowa. Someheya kamela sasgi tou go hata. Gi mgo hgo lateya, pai la hatgela, ‘Oh, tgomiwele titosetiya, pukehela kamapiya,’ Flageyayo, Yesu, Adam, Lowawego wa heto gititgote tgowesiyafo miwele titoseti mgo hgo lateyayo, pai la hatgela, “oh, tgomiwele titoseti tetgote migo hata.”

Paguwa soleheteya gitiya soupaiya ya stu mehefa yai tepa’esi mehe ta.

Flage soleheyayo, lesele saha yailami la mliya. Lesele meheya mgo, meta asapo sagilama heglafi ya, Eiwapai fawimiwele heglafi ya mehe yameili mehe yailami la mliya. Lesele flage leheya.

Gitiya mgo, heglafi ya so giti miya mgo, sagiya wiyeme. Sagiya, 'wasiya. Sagiya ya gu’le he. Flageya gitiyayo, heglafi ya wiyeme tetgo itogi miya yailami la mliya. Eiwapai fawimiwele heglafi ya wiyeme tetgo mehe yailami la mliya.

Flage heglafi ya wiyeme meheya mgo, meheyayo, heti tali lofu aliyamai miya sete gaga iya. Gitile la ya mei gu mga alo meheya. mehe sete ya meili mli gu ma mgoleyo, heti lofu aliyamai 'le’la pa’la sapifa sete gaga la gu iya.

Tile misilali tile gi mehele stu meheya mgo, gifa fe hatge swoula, Eiwapai fawimiwele ya stu mi. Tile pefiyahete lela mehele stu meheya mehe ta. Soupaiya lafi halepageteli molate hgo! Heglafile ya stu wiyeme mehele la ya mei gu mga alo meheya, soupaiya molate wa he’amo mo ta. Soupaiyamolate hgo pkata!

  • first mobile phone edge/2g rolled out 2003
  • first computer IBM PC 1981
  • first balus wright bros. 1903
  • first camera 1885
  • first car and motor the otto engine 1876
  • Bible
  • first planks, sawmill sometime before jesus
  • first writing, first metal work… these were before the flood even. we don’t have a time when we weren’t writing. Some (your) tumbunas just didn’t teach their children.

➋ Maps #

Flage aya mepehele ya mehe yailamigo. mepehele stu meheya mgo, lgo hgo! mepemeheya gitile silo wa he’amo meta la wa taita’uwa.

Ya paipolemole yaleheya yamehe stuheyayo si hapoto sagolama gi he go. Mepehete pai hgo! Mepeheya asapo yahi yahi, gu yahi yahi, mite la wa he’amo mi ta.

Tgou giti tlageteyayo, ga fafatileigo. Meheya, hai tago ta gimigo fe? yameheya hai tago ta gi he go fe? Mehele stu meheya mehe ta. Mepeheyamiya mile tlago wa he’amowa. gititle mehe le latefa hgo lelagitoulamigo. tgou giti tlageteya ga fafatileigo. giti tlagete hago la hgo hata. mepemehele mehe la ga wiyemete hgo lelagitou mgo, “oh, mowa, fiya mgo ileigo. guwa mofowa mgo iya. oke, guwa mofowa, asapomote mgo iya.” Silosi, asapo, si gu i… mifa tgou giti tlagete fafatileigo.

Amelika, Australia, China, mifa giti lelama tiseta lelamiwe lelagi tota miwefa ga fafatileigo. Wefa mgo la hgo fafatileigo. “Oh, giti haitago ta ileigo fe? Mosbimo, haila ta ila gu ileigo fe? Australiamo haila ta ila gu ileigo fe?” Mepe mehela ga wiyemete mele hgo pkatale, mefa mepemehela tlagete afgate lela meile, i gwa ile, falowaite gwa ileigo.

Tgo lelagi tota me, lelagi tota he, hefa mehela tlage afgate leleigo. Mehele tlage afgate le gu i, oh, Falowai. “Mosbimowa mo ta.” O, “Wiwekemowa mo ta.” Mepehe la ga wiyemete hgo pkatale, meya mgo hgo gu ilei me laya. Tgo giti tlage pitate ga hgo, meta ga api i late. Mefa ai la hgo pkatla miwe mgo, mefa miya haigite mgo api fafatilite gu ile, mefa hapoto sago i gu ilei me laya.

Mepehele ya mehele stu meheya mehe ta. Flagete wa ya mei sapgeya, toulageya.

2.1 Local Map #

Oke, Flageyayo, mepe sahe BLACKBOARDmehela wa hasi he’amolami la mliya. Flagete gitile gu, tapifo lofowa, le fgei ogo la sta gu i fi me la wa hasi he’amo taita’uleigo. Meheya, mlagete gu, gufole la sta, hesoso ti hesoso ti gu ga fe mi la wa hasi wa he’amo taita’uleigo.

Mgole BLACKBOARD mehela la wa hasi he’amo taita’ula mi ta, mlagete ame hatgei swa’u luwalu ogo me, o, te skafe ogo me, mile mage mgo la wa he’amo la gu fge mgole la stali mo, mepehelama la wa hasi he’amo taita’uleigo.

Oke, Mepemehe miyayo, Mepemehele gitile si tu ogo meya mehe hasi meheya miya mgo, Miya silo tu, o, silo tu tu sagole sagi la gaga le gwa gala mehele mehe la wa he’amowa. Mehe la wa hasi he’amo taita’u le.

Sime mago sagi tou go hata. miya gitile si tu lola tlage la wa he’amo taita’uleigo.

Mepetu sahele saheya tu ogo sageya mgo, asapomo,mlagete gitile pefi asapomowa mo ta. (draw pei.) Sumwali. (draw village) gufo lofo. gufo la ga fe lofo. oke, ga fe, mga fele (drawing river)…

Giti mepe sagiya, mgo hgolileigo, asapo silolowa, tgutete hgoleigo. Oke, mepe saheyayo, ahowa. Mepesaheya, amelika, Islaiyele, mi ai la hgo hata. Si tu ogo sago tlage hgoleigo. Mepe saheyayo, si tu fawi sago hgoleigo. Mifa mgote mgoleyo, Amelika mo ta, Aflika mo ta, Mi tgutete mgo hgoleigo.

Mepe saheyayo, tu tu ogo ago mgote hgoleigo.

2.2 World Map #

Flage giti piksa mehelate pai hgo. Piksa meheya mlagete mepe mehele mage mgo go. Mepe meheya miyayo, gitile magete piksahe ga fe hgolamigo. Silole piksa mehe fe hgolamigo.

Mepe mehele stu meheya mgo, mlagete gititle piksa mehe lamate la hgoli mehe ta. tgo afalge wesiyafo metewe, tilitaili mi la mleli la mle ma’eya miyayo, miya mepe meheyayo ga wa he’amoliya. Fe masi fe lgo ila, haigi mago mefayo, fe mgo ila mofa mefa mepe mehetlage afgate lele, i hgolei me laya. Fe hapoto sago meili sagofa lelagi mago tota mefa ile, mefa mepe mehe tlage wa agete ila mi ta. Mefa mepe mehe tlage hgo gu ile, hetwahe ile, ai! Asapomo i gwe i. Mepe mehe miya mile tlago wa he’amoliya. Mlagete piksahele mage mgo. Mepeheya mi piksahele mage mgo la wa he’amougo.

Tgo afalge wesiyafou to metewa mlagete, tile fe sago, fe asapo sago hapoto sago tiya ila fago fagowa hata. Tifa piksahe to. Mepehe to. Tifa mageteli hapli mehefayo, mepe haplihe mehe ta.

Tifa mehe la tlagete 'o mafgate mle swou gu meiliya. Mei gwa meiliya. Sahe ai la hali 'ateya hata. Mepe mehela afgate lele, i hgo pkatlei laya. Sete heglafi afalge wapo metewele heglafi yame mi meteweya, metayo, piksa mehete mafgate mleya. mehefa piksa mehelate hgo mafgate mlele, mete tgote wa he’amo heglafiya metele metefa femofa lelagi tou to mgole, metefa metele yame metele miwe heglafi metego wa he’amo femo tlagete mafgate mle tetgo meiliya.

Miya mgole piksa mepe tilitaili mite la wa he’amo mi ta. Mifa metele heglafi yame tgo afalge wesiyafou to metewele heglafi yame mi la wa he’amo fe mofa mo ta. Lgomateya hgoli.

Lgo mateya, mepe hapoto ogo sage to, silomole mepe mehe. Silomole mepe meheyayo, meheya ga wa he’amowa. Meheya miya teime, la hetwaheile, 4pla kona lilila le hetwaheila meheya mehe ta.

Lgomateya la mlili meheya. Meheya molate ila mgo hgo pkatla he go. Ai! Gitile Amelikate ila, o, gitile Ostleliyate ila, o, gitile Mosbite ila, Metafa gitifa mepe mehela tlage hgo afgate le alole, mefa mgo lileigo, Asapo ti asapo mi, lgo stu lgo, mife mi tlage hgo gu i alo, i alo, asapo ti asapo mi la hi la hla ila, hi la hali alo… gu fawi mofo hgole, mofo tomate la he’wa’eyale, mofo ta’ehete mago gwe ila, me ta hgoleigo. “Ai! Amelika mowa mo ta.” O, “Ai! Mosbimowa mo ta. Aya gwe ileigo.” Mepe milama hgo pkatale, ileigo. Mepe mile stu miya mehe ta. Tgo afalge wesiyafo to metewe, Metele piksa mepe mehele la lemeta mehefa gitifa, gitigofa lelagi toute tago. Aila la papgou hata. Gitifa hgo sapge tolageiya. Lgomateyayo, Ale mosbite ila flifage hatgelatefayo, ayefa, mepe mehe agetale, afa mehe tlage afgate le gu i alo, Mosbi ileigo.

Lgomatefayo, mefayo, mele Mosbite hgefete ila, o, Ostleliyate hgefete ilatefa, Mefa hale pagu mele wisi la fgeiyale, la fgei la gu i alola… Ai! Mele hgefete mgo tlagete i alo, i alo, Mele salama tgo sagi tihapouwa, mele meta tgomigote heglahatalou fgei ala, mele 'o mgo tlagete i alole, asapo ti asapo safo la hi la hla ile, la hali, la hi la hla ile, meta meyayo, Mola gu ileigo. Mepe mehe tlagete afgate swou gu i alole, gwe ileigo.

children.contents:
Lesele 48
Yesuweya Sete Hale’ile, Tisete La Gitowa. #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Pailateweya Yesugo wele tgo ami mi metetgote wa mlowa.
  • Pailatewele tgo ami mi Yesugo wi mamgetofe lama mao hetiya.
  • Yesuweya sete hale’iya.
  • Tgo Mi Yesuwele Afahe fu tle hge’ulafelama 'i’a stawa.
  • Yesuweya wele eito afastu la tisete, la gituwa.

 Lesen 47 Kwesten #

Lesen 47 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

 Buke Mak 15:4-5, 13-14

4 Pailateweya Yesugo la wa mgimatiya, “Islaiyele tgo yahito mi metgote peitate ga mapi ya meiliya. La meya metegote ya sahe ta mgi laigo fe?” 5 Miya Yesuweya hapu mgi hata. Yesuwe ya hawite giteli mateya, Pailatewe Yesuwele hisafi fli mefage hatgitgi male, mgole weya fli fage mgole hali giya. 13 Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya yahe la youwa, “Yesuwego fe hale’i la! Weya wele hge yale wi mamgetomefelama ao heti!” 14 Meteya you tepa’esile, meta Pailatewe metego mgimatiya, “Hago fe? Yesuwe ame hatge fe luwalu mo ta mlimigo fe?” Sutale mete la yahe fawite youwa, “Wego wi mamgetomefelama ao heti!”

  1. Pailateweya Yesugo mgi matiya, Metele yami me ta matimigo fe?
  2. Miya Yesuweya hapu mgi hata.
  3. Yesuweya Yesuwe ya hawite giteli mateya, Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya yahe la youwa, "Yesuwego fe hale’i la!

➊ Pailateweya Yesugo wele tgo ami mi metetgote wa mlowa. #

 Buke Mak 15:16-17, 18-20

16 Meta tgo ami mi Yesugo Pailatewele ho fawisapole fisahe to laume mgo litatiya meile, ami meteya ami satewego yaheyouliya, “Gi gaiyo.” 17 Tgo ami mi yapulge walge mehe Yesugo ga wa mle haliliya. Meteya wli hageito mi mlele, Yesuwele tifolama wa fo kaliliya. Fo kalile, mlagete kilemiwele hatefo mage mgo go.

  1. Tgo ami mi yapulge walge mehe Yesugo ga wa mle haliliya.
  2. Meteya wli hageito mi mlele, Yesuwele tifolama wa fo kaliliya. Fo kalile, mlagete kilemiwele hatefo mage mgo go.
  3. Meteya wa yami luwaluwa. Mgole Metefa Yesugo lafga fgouwa.

18 Meta tgo ami meteya Yesugo wa yai luwalu liya, “Meya Sutale towete tgou mile Kilemiwlaya! Tiya mele yahimo wahi 'e’yaliya!” 19 La meteya wlitumo mlele, Yesuwele tifolama mle maoliya. Meteya wego talgufile, meteya Yesugote hge pa’i heta’uti siya. Meteya wele yahimo aumate wai ya mi hi 'e’yaliya. 20 Meteya Yesugo ya mi luwalu tepa’esile, meteya wele yapulge walge mehe wa tu mlele, wele pagu yapulge mi afastu wa mle halile, tgo ami mi Yesugo litatiya wi mamgetofela ao heti lami meiliya.

➋ Pailatewele tgo ami mi Yesugo wi mamgetofe lama mao hetiya. #

 Buke Mak 15:25-26, 27-28, 29-30, 31-32

25 Tgo ami sateweya Yesugo 9 kilok sohite wi mamgetomefelama mao hetiya. 26 Tgo ami mile tgomi wi mamgetomefela mao heti mate, meteya witufe mlele, tgo wa maitomiwele fe luwalu mo witufelama hasiliya. Hasile, towete tgou ga tutilila mate, meteya hgo lelagi tuli laigo, wele fe luwalu mli mole tlago. Meteya witu meheya wele tifole aume mgo wa lata laigo. Yesuwele witufeya mgo wa hasiya, “Tgomiweya Sutale towete tgou mile Kilemiwlaya.”

  1. Tgo ami sateweya Yesugo wi mamgetomefelama mao hetiya.
  2. **Yapu hage. King Tefitewele ya pagu mehe. **
  3. Meteya witu meheya wele tifole aume mgo wa lata laigo. Mgole meteya wego wa yami luwalu yailamigo.

27-28 Tgo ami meteweya hemagei to tgomi mgigo wi mamgetomefegila sete mao hetiya. Tgo hemageito sagigowa Yesuwele tetgo ta’ehelama wa maitowa. Tgo hemageito sagigowa Yesuwele hi’wagi ta’ehelama wa maitowa.

  1. Hemagei to tgomi mgiya Yesuwele ta’ehe ta’ehe sete mao hetiya.
  2. Tgo hemageito sagowa Yesugo wai yami luwaluwa.
  3. Mi’a Tgo hemageito hapoto sago Yesugo hatge mleya, Weya wele hge tle laume gwoiya.

29-30 Towete tgou mi femo tutili mate, meteya metele ti mi ga maiflaiflaiya tutiliya. Meteya Yesugo ya mi luwalu tutiliya. Meteya Yesugo wa mgiya, “Yesu, meya pagu sete mgiya, ‘Aya Yawewele hoitogi sapo tgo seigi mi litatiya mlele, aya homesapo tou laigo. Toule, so safogi safo teime tepa’esile, atlagete ho agiyagi sasapo le laigo.’ Meya mgi mita, mefa metlagete loiloiyale, me wi mamgetomefelama hlaga!”

  1. Towete tgo segi mi Yesugo 'i’a hgole, meteya wego wai yami luwaluwa.

31 Islaiyele tgo yahito mi metetlagete Yesugo lai ya mi luwaluliya, “Yesu, meya towete tgou seigi mi wa loiloiya ma mgole, miya tatwa metlagete aila loiloiya hata. 32 Me wi mamgetomefelama hla ga. Tgo Klaistemi wlaya late, me hla gale, metaga tiya hatge laigo, ‘Yesuwele ya mgi meheya tetgo tago.’” Meteya Yesugo ya mi luwalule, la tgo hemageito sago Yesuwele ta’ehe ta’ehe mlili weya Yesugo haplite ya mi luwaluliya.

  1. Islaiyele tgo yahito segi mi Yesugo 'i’a hgole, meteya wego wai yami luwaluwa.
  2. Gi ta hatgeli fe? Yesuweya wiyemete ta hla galaigo fe? Wele kailifi wiyemete wego ta loiloiya maligo fe?
  3. Mi’a weya hla i hata. Weya wele hewimo tepa’esilamigo.

➌ Yesuweya sete hale’iya. #

 Buke State 15:33-4, 37, 38, 39

33 Yesuwe wi mamgeto mefela maite alowa, maite alowa, talifote 12 kilokemo gaga gwa mgale, asapomo ohi sete mliya. Talifo 'e’e tago, ohi mo tlagete mli alo, mli alo, lolgite 3 kilokemo mgale, metate hgowa. Talifo afastu hali geiya. 34 3 kilokemo gwa ga mate, Yesuwe ya fawite youwa, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sapaktani?” Yameheya stule mgo, “Ale Eiwapaifawimiwe, Ale Eiwapaifawimiwe, meya ago aile tlago ta wapatgeli fe?”

  1. Tetgo tago, Yaweweya wele tehimo Yesugo mlowa.
  2. Weya Yesugo ai loiloiya malimigo hata. Opiyai weya mgo hatge, "Yesuweya u’ulau tetgo tago. Weya tgo fe silemo mi wlaya."

37 Tgo sagiwele yamehe tepa’esile, Yesuwe mgo yaheyoule, “ale hewimo tepa’esiya” we ga hale’iya.

  1. Yesuweya yahe youliya.
  2. Wele hewimo tepa’esiya.
  3. Graun Guria.

38 Yawewele ho itogi sapolama yapulge fawi sahe maiteliya. Yapulge fawimeheya ho oilitumogile tomate maiteliya. Yesugo hale’i mate, yapulge fawimeheya ga mapgetowa. Aumate pgeto gu hlagiya.

  1. Ya folowa he mgo mliya, Yapulgehe aumate pgeto gu hlagiya.
  2. Yawewele femo matowa.
  3. Tgo plisemi meteya hewimo to hata.
  4. Yesuweya metele hewi mo sete tepa’esiya.

39 Tgo ami metele fetifo pasotelimiweya Yesugo tatwate gite hgole, Yesugo ga hale’i mate, we mgiya, “Tetgo tago. Yesuwe Eiwapaifawimiwele oto miwlaya!”

  1. Towete tgo segi mi Yesugo hale’ile, mi’a meteya lelagi go hata.
  2. Mi’a tgo Ami sago hgole, weya Yesugo hatge mleya, Weya wele hge tle laume gwoiya.

 Drama - Crucifixion #

➍ Tgo Mi Yesuwele Afahe fu tle hge’ulafelama 'i’a stawa. #

 Buke State 15:46

46 Pailatewele yamehe tepa’esile, Sosepewe yapulge itogisahe fgei mlele, Yesuwele afahomeheya wi mamgetomefelama tu mlegiya. Sosepewe Yesuwele afahomeheya yapulgemehete fokaliya. Fokalile, Sosepewe Yesuwele afahomeheya fagote meile, Sosepeweya Yesuwele afahomehe fumowa hge’ulafe mage mgo go. Wego laume mgo mle gwa meile, wego mlate wa staowa.

  1. Tgo Mi Yesuwele Afahe fu tle hge’ulafelama 'i’a stawa.
  2. So mofogiya mofo, wele afahe wa stawa.

 Drama - Empty Tomb #

➎ Yesuweya wele eito afastu la tisete, la gituwa. #

 Buke State 16:10-11, 14

10-11 Maliyase hosapowa gwoile, meteya Yesugo eiwiteiliya, wehyei fisili mate, Maliyaseya metego wa mgiya, “Gi ati fkata! Yesuwe sete tisetowa. Wele eitowa afastu giya. Aya wego hgougo!” Meteya sele yahe matile, mi’a meteya sele yamehe atile swou hata.

  1. So mofogiya mofo sete gaga iya, Yesuweya wele eito afastu la tisete, la gituwa.
  2. Yaweweya Yesugo yele maleite li totlagite, weya Yesugo afastu la tisete la gitlagigo hata. Mi’a weya wele hewimo sete hgole la weya wele eito afastu la tisete, la gituwa.

    14 Teimate, Yesuwele 11pla tisaipole metegote su’wa’ehelama si mle mali mate, Yesuwe homesapoto mgo gwa meile, 15 La Yesuwe metego la wa mgiya, “Gi asapo asapo mi tutili i. Gi towete tgou mite ale ya itogihe wai yai tuti.”

  1. Yesuweya metego ya mgiya, Gi asapo asapo mi tutili i. Gi towete tgou mite ale ya itogihe wai yai tuti.
  2. Yu mas bilip olsem Jisas tasol i bin baim pinis pe bilong sin bilong yu, na em tasol i bin opim rot bilong yu, bai yu ken go klostu long God. Sapos yu hangamap tasol long blut na dai bilong Jisas bilong baim sin bilong yu, orait nau tasol God i kisim bek yu pinis. God i lusim OLGETA sin bilong yu na long ai bilong God yu kamap stretpela man o meri pinis. God i save amamas long ol manmeri i hangamap long dai bilong Jisas bilong kisim bek ol.

 Lesen 48 Kwesten #

1q. Ol soldia i mekim wanem pasin long Yesu bilong semim em na bagarapim bodi bilong en?
1a. Ol i wipim Yesu. Ol i putim retpela klos long em olsem klos bilong king. Ol i wokim hat king long rop i gat nil na putim long het bilong en. Ol i paitim het bilong en long kanda. Ol i spet long em na tok bilas long em.

2q. Taim ol i putim rop i gat nil antap long het bilong Yesu, dispela i makim wanem samting i kamap long em?
2a. Rop i gat nil em i mak bilong sin, na taim ol soldia i putim dispela antap long Yesu, dispela i soim yumi olsem Yesu i karim sin bilong olgeta manmeri na kisim bagarap.

3q. King Devit i bin raitim sampela tok profet long sampela pasin ol bai i mekim long han na lek bilong Promis Poto. Em wanem kain tok?
3a. Em i tok olsem, ol bai i sutim han na lek bilong Promis Poto.

4q. Bilong wanem Yesu i mas dai long diwai kros?
4a. Yesu i dai bilong baim pe bilong sin bilong olgeta manmeri bilong graun.

5q. Bilong wanem tudak em i kamap long taim Yesu i hangamap long diwai kros?
5a. Yawe i laik soim ol manmeri olsem, em i givim baksait long Yesu na lusim em taim em i karim sin bilong ol manmeri. Yawe i no laikim sin liklik, olsem na em i givim baksait long Yesu.

6q. Yesu i singaut olsem, “Em i pinis nau.” Orait dispela tok i gat wanem mining?
6a. Em i gat mining olsem, wok bilong baim sin bilong ol manmeri na kisim bek ol long han bilong Satan em i pinis long taim Yesu i dai.

7q. Yesu i no bin mekim wanpela sin, olsem na bilong wanem Yesu i mas dai long diwai kros?
7a. Yesu i dai bilong baim sin bilong yumi ol sinman.

8q. Bilong wanem Yawe i brukim bikpela laplap i stap namel long Tempel? (Tingim tupela samting.)
8a. Em i soim yumi olsem, Yesu i dai na baim tru pe bilong sin na i opim nupela rot nau na yumi ken go klostu long Yawe; Na tu em i soim yumi olsem, ol pris i no gat wok moa bilong kilim animal na kapsaitim blut olsem ofa bilong karamapim sin.

9q. Yesu i stap 3-pela de long matmat, na bihain ol meri i wokabaut i kam bilong welim bodi bilong Yesu. Tasol ol i no kamap yet na wanem samting i kamap long dispela matmat?
9a. Graun i guria tru na ensel bilong Bikpela i kam daun na rausim dispela ston i pasim maus bilong matmat.

10q. Taim ol meri i go insait long matmat ol i lukim wanem 2-pela samting?
10a. Ol i lukim bodi bilong Yesu i no stap; Ol i lukim ensel bilong Yawe.

11q. Kirap bek bilong Yesu i soim wanem 2-pela samting long yumi?
11a. Em i soim yumi olsem, Yesu em i Pikinini tru bilong Yawe na Promis Poto bilong yumi olsem em i tok. Long wanem, sapos em i giaman tasol orait Yawe i no inap kirapim em long matmat; Em i soim yumi olsem, Yesu i baim tru dispela pe nogut bilong sin bilong yumi na em inapim tru laik bilong Yawe. Sapos dai bilong Yesu i no bekim tru pe bilong sin na inapim tru laik bilong Yawe, orait Yawe i no inap larim Yesu i kirap bek long dai.

12q. Sapos wanpela man i laik Yawe i lusim sin bilong en na kisim bek em long han bilong Satan, orait em i mas mekim wanem?
12a. Em i mas save olsem em i stap sinman long ai bilong Yawe. Em i no inap helpim em yet. Nogat. Em i mas bilip olsem Yesu tasol i bin baim pinis pe bilong sin bilong en, na Yesu tasol i bin opim rot bilong go klostu long Yawe.
