children.name: Lesele 47 - Yesuweya asapo Selusalememo lama ga....html
children.contents:
Lesele 47
Yesuweya asapo Selusalememo lama ga iya. Islaiyele tgo yahito Yesuwego 'eyate meiliya #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya asapo Selusalememo lama ilamigo.
  • Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa lolamigo.
  • Tgo tisaipele mi meteya ho oli tumola 'le’leyale, mgole meteya Pasova heglai alamigo.
  • Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa mlowa.
  • Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego 'wa’wasiya 'e’yate meiliya.

 Lesen 46 Kwesten #

Lesen 46 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

  1. Yesuweya asapo Selusalememo lama ilamigo.
  • Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa lolamigo.
  • Tgo tisaipele mi meteya ho oli tumola 'le’leyale, mgole meteya Pasova heglai alamigo.
  • Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa mlowa.
  • Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego 'wa’wasiya 'e’yate meiliya.

➊ Yesuweya asapo Selusalememo lama ilamigo. #

1.1 Yesuweya tgo tisaipele sgi mi metego mgi he’amotile, tokilto mapilya. #

 Buke Mak 11:2

1Yesuwe tisaipole mgigo wa mgiya, 2 “Gitile flage hgo asapomo geya mgote gwoi, geya asapomo gwoi late, geya flage tlage tolki la’imoto hgo laigo. Geya tgo mile tolki la’imotole lgu’alomowa yapu wli mote ma’otowa. Tolki la’imotole tehimowa tgo sagi si hata. Geya tolkimotole yapu wlimo hatgowa late, geya tolki la’imoto atgote wa le ga. 3 La tgo sagiwe getgote mgi ati late, 'Ge aita ta mleliya? Geya mgote mgi, ‘Tile tgo fawimiwe, Yesu weya tolki la’imotowa hewimo to. Wele hewimo tepa’esi lateya, weya flage tlage tolki la’imotowa mgi heyamoti laigo.’”

  1. Yesuweya wele tisaipele sagi mi taulemolama mgi he’amotiya.
  2. Yesuweya metego mgo mgiya, 'tolki la’imoto apilaigo.
  3. Yesuwele yahe tolaget iya.

1.2 Towete tgo mi Yesuwego hgole, meteya wego yele malei mliya. Meteya wego tgo Kingemiwe wa gitlamigo. #

 Buke Mak 11:7

    7 Metafa mgiya tolki la’imotowa Yesuwetgote litatiya giya. Mgiya mgile sakete mi tusgi mlele, mgile sakete mehegi tolki motole tehimola hali mlefeiya. Hali mlefeile, Yesuweya tolki la’imotole tehimola hali seteliya. Weya sakete mehegile aumate setowa.

  1. Yesuweya tolki la’imotole tehimolama seteliya.
  2. Weya Selusalememolama gwe iya.
  3. Towete tgo wego yele malei lilamigo.

 Buke Mak 11:9b

    9b Mete mgo youliya, “Eiwapaifawimiwele yahimo wahi 'eyaliya! Tgo miweya Eiwapaifawimiwele yahimole mage miwele giya! Eiwapaifawimiweya tgoliwe wa loiloi swou laigo! 10 Tatwa tago, Tgo miweya gitigo loiloiya lami. Mlagete pagu Tefitewe gitile aowatgeiya mi loiloi yalo mgo li laigo. Eiwapaifawimiwele yahimo wahi 'eyale, weya aumate mlili miwlaya.”

  1. Towete tgo yele malei to.
  2. Meteya Yesuwele haliliya.
  3. Meteya mgo hatge, Yesuweya Romemole tgo Kingemiwele sgomo lelaigo.
  4. Mgole meteya mgo mgiya, Yesuweya Eiwapai faimiwele Promis Poto miwlaya.

➋ Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa lolamigo. #

2.1 Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo. #

 Buke Mak 14:1-2

1-2 Teimate So mofogiyawagete Islaiyele towete tgou mi ta’owi igiyawagete li laigo. Ta’owi sagile, pesowa, pesowa someheya Islaiyele tgo miya mgo hatgeliya, pagute Eiwapaifawimiwele ei itogimoto metele aowatgeiya mile hou hou wapale, metego hlegei li hata. La Ta’owi sagiya Islaiyele tgou mile yapu pou fgo’omiya yist 'e’e tago. Soleheya Plisefawi mi, tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi metetlage mgo ya meiliya, “Giti Yesuwego 'wa’wasiyale, wego agetale (arrest), giti wego ame hatgeile tlago ta atatlaigo fe? Giti ta’owi igiyawage mi wego afla agetla, opiyai. Miya towete tgou gitigo le ao laigo.”

  1. Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.
  2. Meteya fe Yesuwego atatlami mo wa mapiliya.
  3. Meteya hatgitgiliya.
  4. Meteya Yesuwele tisaipele mi metetgo hatgeya.
  5. Ol big man i pret long ol Lain Israel na ol i no laik kilim Yesu long dispela taim. Nogut ol man meri i kirap na paitim ol yet.

Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa lolamigo.

 Buke Mak 14:10-11

10 Yesuwele 12pla tisaipole mi tgo miwetlage miwe, Sutis Iskolate, weya Yesugo Plise fawi mile yaleila lo lami gimigo. 11 Sutisewe Plise fawi mi hgole, meteya wele hatgeli fli mefage matile, Plise fawi mi lile’i mliya. Plise fawi mi Sutisewego wa mgiya, “Itogi tago. Me Yesuwe tile yaleila lo late, tiya mego wisi lo laigo.” Metele ya mi tepa’esile, Sutisewe fe sago mapiliya, Yesuwego Plise fawi mile yaleila mgi heyamo lami.

  1. Islaiyele to yahito mi meteya Sutasewele yahe hatge mleya.
  2. Meteya Yesuwego wa fgeilamigo.
  3. Sete paute Yawewele tgo plofete miwe Aisaiahweya sete tafo hasiya.
  4. Yawewele ya tetgohe tolaget iya. Islaiyele tgo yahito femo sete mapiliya.

➌ Tgo tisaipele mi meteya ho oli tumola 'le’leyale, mgole meteya Pasova heglai alamigo. #

 Buke Mak 14:12

12 Tisaipole mete Yesugo wa mgimatiya, “Tiya pesowa ta’owoile hegla hatalou pai 'e’laliya. Meya tigo hai tago ta mgiheyamoti laigo fe?”

  1. Pesowa ta’owoile hegla hatalou, ame hatgei ta makelaigo fe?
  2. Yesuwele tisaipele mi meteya wego mgo mgi matile, Giti hailama ta alaigo fe?

Yesuweya metego mgo wa mgiya.

 Buke Mak 14:12

13 Yesuwe tisaipole mgigo wa mgiya, "Geya asapo Selusalememo ile, geya hgo laigo, tgo hafu gu sesemalehe tapoto fagoteli miwe ge femolama tihapoule, geya wego afgate le. 14 Weya ame hosapowa gwoi late, gefa haplite gwoile, geya homesapole tgugo wa mgiya, "Tile tisawe mgiya, 'Ale ho oilitumo haila mago fe? Ho oilitumolama aya ale tisaipole mete litatiya sile, tiya ga pesowa hegla hami a laigo.

  1. Yesuweya metego mgo wa mgiya.
  2. Yesuwele ya tetgohe tolagete iya.
  3. Weliye weliye Yesuwele ya tetgohe tolagete gimigo.
  4. Yeuweya Yawewemi wlaya, Mgile lelagi hetwahe tago. Mgile kailifi hetwahe tago.

 Buke Mak 14:22

22 Yesuwe, 12pela tisaipole mete ga si mle mali mate, Yesuwe yapu pou fgo’o mlele, weya Eiwapaifawimiwego wa mgiya, “Falowai, hegla hatalou meya tigo mlofeiya.” Yahe tepa’esile, Yesuwe yapu pou fgo’o mlele, weya mati tgagole, weya yapu fgo’o tutu mi 12pela tisaipole metego mlofeile, weya metego wa mgiya, “Gi yapu po fgo’o tutu mi agefeile, ale afalgehe go.”

  1. Meteya mle male mate, Yesuweya metego yafolowa sahe mgiya.
  2. Yapu pou wele afalgehele mage mgo go.
  3. Tatwate wele afalgehe hoigi lelaigo.
  4. Mgole weya metele hoi gi agetlaigo.
  5. Meteya hoi fawi gi hgolagite, Mi’a weya metele hoi fawi gi fagotlagigo.

 Buke Mak 14:23-24

23 Meteya yapu pou fgo’o tutu mi mle male, meta Yesuwe kamo mlele, weya Eiwapaifawimiwego wa mgiya, “Falowai, waile gu miya meya tigo mlofeiya.” Wele yahe tepa’esile, Yesuwe 12pla tisaipole metego kamo mlole, meteya maliya. 24 Meteya mle male, Yesuwe metego wa mgiya, “Waile gu leheya ale lemasi hego. Ago hale’i lateya, ale lemasihe silomola he’atale, towete tgou mi wa itogi laigo. Ale lemasihe he’atale mate, Eiwapaifawimiwe, weya tilitaili mi gitgote ga laigo, mgole ale lemasihe he’ateliya. Ale lemasihe he’ata totalate, opiyai, tilitaili mi gitgote ai ga hata.”

  1. Waile gu leheya wele lemasile mage mgo go.
  2. Tatwate wele Lemasihe simolama he’atatlaigo.
  3. Mgole weya metele hoi gi agetlaigo.
  4. Wele lemasi ya kailifi sahe wa makiya. Towete tgo hatewe wele tle laume gwe ilate, weya metego wele si agi agi molama tapotote si mle malilaigo.

➍ Sutaseweya Yesuwego tgo Felasi mi metele yale wa mlowa. #

 Buke Mak 14:43-46

43 Flage tlagete Yesuwe yamehe mgili mate, hgowa, Sutisewe giya. Weya tgo hapli tisaipole mi 12pla mile wetlagete gimiweta. Sutisewe mgale, weya tgou seigi mi tapoto mgaliya. Meteya ita’e laflafi mi magefeile, wi hoito wi mi magefeiya. Tgo plise fawi mi, Islaiyele tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Tgo heglafi wapai mi, Sutisewe tapoto mgaliya. 44 Pagute Sutisewe tgo seigi migo mgiya, “Gi hgo. Aya tgo sagiwele talostuhe tomgo laigo. Gi ale tomgola tgo migo hgole, giya wego agetale, gi wego litatiya i.” Sutisewele ya pagu meheya meheta.

45 Sutisewe mete mgali mate, flage tlage Sutisewe Yesugo wa mgiya, “Tisa!” Mgi tepa’esile, weya Yesuwele talostuhe tomgoliya. 46 Tomgole, tgo seigi mi Yesuwego magetowa.

  1. Sutaseweya Islaiyele tgo yahito mi metego Yesuwetgote leitateiya.
  2. Weya Yesuwego metetgote wa he’amowa.
  3. Sutaseweya paguwa Yesuwego tauta’uwa, Mi’a flage tlagete wele tehimo Yesuwego lolamigo.
  4. Weya wisi ogo mi sete hatgitgiya.

➎ Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego 'wa’wasiya 'e’yate meiliya. #

 Buke Mak 14:55-57

55 Islaiyele Plise fawi mi, Islaiyele kausole meteya Yesugo atata lami meta meteya tgo satewe mapi gu meliya. Tgo satewe mete Yesuwele fe luwalu mo hgole, meteya tgo satewe mgimatiya, “Gi mgi. Gi Yesuwele fe luwalu mo gi ta hgougo fe?” Mgimati gu meile, miya opiyai. Meteya tgo sagiwetlage api hata. 56 Tgo sagiya Yesuwetgote ga mapi yaiya. Miya, metele ya mi haiwawe hata. Mete yaiya ya hapoto hapoto mite ya meiliya.     57 Tgo satowe mete tifile, Islaiyele kausole metele lgu lama meteya gai ya mi 'wasiyaliya.

  1. Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego wai yami luwaluwa.
  2. Tgo segi mi 'e’yate meili mlama ya’wasiya mlele fa’eliya. Mosesewele lomo fe hatgela. Mi’a metele yami ga ma fa’iya.
  3. Meteya Yesuwele fe luwalumo matimigo hata. Mgole weya fe luwalumo mlili to hata.

 Buke Mak 14:60-61a

60 Metele ya 'wasiya mi tepa’esile, Islaiyele Plise fawi tetgo miwe weya Islaiyele kausole metele tomate gitowa. Weya Yesuwetgote wa mgi matiya, “Meteya mego ya luwalu yaiya. Me hapu ta yai hata fe? Metele yahe tetgo tago fe?” 61a Miya Yesuwe hapuli hata. Weya ya hawite gitowa.

  1. Meteya Yesuwego mgi mati alo mgi mati alo, mi’a Yesuweya ya hawite gitowa.
  2. Yesuweya metego hapu wa yai hata igo. Opiyai.

 Buke Mak 14:61b-62

Islaiyele Plise fawi tetgo mi weya Yesuwetgote la wa mgimatiya, "Meya tgo Klaiste miwla fe? Tiya Eiwapaifawimiwele yahi wai ya mi hi’e’yaliya. Meya wele oto miwlafe? 62 Weya Yesuwego mgimatile, Yesuwe wego wa mgiya, “Yao. Atlaiya. Teimate giya hgo laigo, aya tgo tetgo Eiwapaifawimiwe waheyamotimiwlaya, wele otoho, aya Eiwapaifawimiwele yale tetgo mefelama setlaigo. Tetgo ta’emeheya kailifi tago. Metafa teimate aya Eiwapaifawimiwele asapomo hlai gi mate, aya mo plamo tapoto hla gale, giya metate hgo laigo.”

  1. Mgole Islaiyele tgo yahito miweya, Yesuwego mgo mgi matiya, Me Yawewele Promis Poto miwla fe?
  2. Yesuweya metego mgo mgiya, Atleya.
  3. Weya mgo mgiya, Teime aya Eiwapaifawimiwele asapomo hlai gi mate, aya mo plamo tapoto hla gale, giya metate hgo laigo.
  4. Ya lehele stu mehe mgo mliya, Yesuweya Yawe miwlaya.

 Buke Mak 14:64

Plise fawi tetgo miweya kausole metego wa mgiya, “Giti tgo sagigo ai api hata. Wapa. Giti Yesuwele yamehe tlage matimigo. Yesuwele mehe mgili mate, “Aya tgo tetgo Eiwapaifawimiwe waheyamoti miwlaya, aya wele otohogo.” Wele ya mgo mgi meheya Eiwapifawimiwele yahimo wai yami luwaluliya.” Plise fawi tetgo miwe kausole metego la wa mgiya, “Gi hago ta hatgeliya? Giti Yesugo hago ta li laigo fe?” Islaiyele kausole meteya fli hatgitgi swou meile, meteya mgiya, “Yao, Yesuwe fe luwalu mo mliya. Weya fe hale’ila! Giti wego pai atata!”

  1. Meteya wele ya tetgohe sete matile, mi’a meteya metele fli tlefli maflaiyalamigo hata.
  2. Opiyai, Meteya eitosei to, mgole meteya metetle wa yamiya.
  3. Meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.

 Buke Mak 14:65

65 Meta, kausole sateweya Yesuwego ta lgu file, kausole sateweya Yesuwele lgumlagi yapulgehete wa fole, kausole sateweya Yesugo mle maoliya. Tgo satewe mete Yesugo mgo mgi mle maoliya, “Me tigo wa mgi. Hagile ta mle maoli fe?” Meteya mgimatile, Islaiyele Plise fawi tetgo miwele tgo litatiya mlili meteya Yesugo tapoto mle maoliya.

  1. Meteya Yesuwele lgumlagi yapulgehete wa fole, sateweya Yesugo mle maoliya.
  2. Meteya wele yahimo wai yami luwaluwa. Meteya wego la fga fgouwa.
  3. Mi’a Yesuweya fe luwalu ogoago sagi mi ai mlemigo hata.
  4. Mgole meteya wego 'e’ete wa fgouwa.

5.1 Lomemole tgo Gavla mi Paileteweya Yesuwego 'e’yate meiliya. #

 Buke Mak 15:2-3

2 Pailatewetgote mlole, Pailatewe Yesugo wa mgimatiya, “Meya asapo Islaiyele towete tgou mile kile mi wlafe?” Yesuwe Pailotewego wa mgiya, “Yao. Mele yameheya tetgo tago.”

  1. Lomemole gavna miweya metego aumate giteliya.
  2. Mgole Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya wego mi’a hgolamigo.
  3. Meteya tgo gavana miwego wai yami ya 'wasiyalamigo.
  4. Mgole meteya ya itogihe lelamigo. Meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.
  5. Paileteweya Yesuwego mgo mati mgile, Mgole Yesuweya wego mgo mgiya, Aya Islaiyele tgo Kingemiwlaya.
  6. Yesuweya Yawewemiwlaya. Mgole, weya Islaiyele tgo kimge miwlaya.

 Buke Mak 15:2

3 Yesuwele yahe tepa’esile, Islaiyele kausole mi Yesuwetgote ga mapi ya meiliya, Pailotewele lgu mlagi lama. 4 Pailateweya Yesugo la wa mgimatiya, “Islaiyele kausole mi metgote peitate ga mapi ya meiliya. La meya metegote ya sahe ta mgi laigo fe?”

  1. Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya Yesuwego wai yami luwaluwa.
  2. Paileteweya Yesuwego mgi matiya, Sampela tok a?

 Buke Mak 15:12

12 Islaiyele towete tgou mi Pailatewego yaheyoule, Pailatewe metego la wa mgiya, “Tgo liweya gi wetgote mgi, ‘Islaiyele Kilemiwlaya’, aya wego ame hatge ta li laigo fe?”

  1. Islaiyele towete tgo mi metele fli tlefli maflaiyawa. Mgole meteya Pailatewego yaheyouliya.
  2. Pailateweya mete mgo mgo mgi matiya, 'aya wego ame hatge ta li laigo fe?"
  3. Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya towete tgo tugo mi metele fli tlefli atistilamigo.

 Buke Mak 15:13

13 Islaiyele towete tgou meteya yahe la youwa, “Yesuwego fe hale’i la! Weya wele hge yale wi mamgetomefe lama ao heti!”

  1. Islaiyele towete tgo mi meteya mgo mgiya, kilim Yesu.
  2. Meteya Yesuwele atatlamile ya itogisahe wa lelamigo.
  3. Pailateweya wiyemte ya itogihe wa lolaigo. Mgole meteya wele fli fage atistilamigo.

 Buke Mak 15:14-15

14 Meteya you tepa’esile, meta Pailatewe metego mgimatiya, “Hago fe? Yesuwe ame hatge fe luwalu mo ta mlimigo fe?” Islaiyele mete la yahe fawite youwa, “Wego wi mamgetomefelama ao heti!” 15 Pailatewe Islaiyele towete tgou metego wa lile’i lami mliya, Pailatewe wele tgo ami metele yaleila Yesugo mlowa. Weya wele tgo ami metego wa mgiya, “Giya Yesugo wlitumote le ao. Wego mle mao tepa’esi late, gi Yesugo wi mamgetofelama ao heti.” Pailatewele yahe mgo mgi.

  1. Pailateweya Yesuwego Islaiyele towete tgomi metetgote wa mlowa.
  2. Weya metele yami sete matile, mgole weya metele fli fage tauta’uwa.
  3. Yesuweya fe atatla.

 Drama #

 Lesen 47 Kwesten #

1q. Yesuwe em i salim sampela disaipel igo painim wanem samting long Jerusalem stret?
1a. Em i salim ol igo painim wanpela yanpela donki.

2q. Taim disaipel igo painim donki ol i painim o nogat?
2a. Yes oli painim stret. Tok bilong Yesu i tru na i kamap olsem em i tok.

3q. Bilong wanem Yesu i no amamas long ol dispela manmeri i laik makim em i kamap king?
3a. Long wanem, ol i no laik tanim bel na ol i no hangamap long Yesu bilong kisim bek spirit bilong ol. Nogat. Ol i ting Yesu bai i helpim bodi bilong ol tasol. Na ol i laik Yesu i rausim ol Rom.

4q. Bilong wanem ol lida i no holim Yesu hariap na kilim em?
4a. Ol i pret, long wanem, planti manmeri i laikim Jisas, na nogut ol i kirapim pait.

5q. Ating Yesu i save long tingting bilong Judas, o nogat?
5a. Yes, Yesu em i Yawe na em i save long olgeta samting Judas i laik mekim.

6q. Dispela bret Yesu i givim long ol disaipel i tok piksa long wanem samting?
6a. Yesu i tok olsem, bret em i olsem piksa bilong bodi bilong em yet. Em bai i kisim bagarap olsem bret i bruk.

7q. Na wain i tok piksa long wanem samting?
7a. Yesu i tok olsem, wain i tok piksa long blut bilong em yet. Em bai i kapsait bilong helpim ol manmeri.

8q. Husat i stiaim tingting bilong Judas na ol lida bilong Israel taim ol i holimpasim Yesu na ol i laik kilim em?
8a. Satan i stiaim tingting bilong Judas na bilong ol lida bilong Israel.

9q. Nau husat i stap aninit long laik bilong Satan?
9a. Ol manmeri i no bilip long tok bilong Yawe na long Yesu, ol i stap aninit long laik bilong Satan.

10q. Ol lida i yusim wanem kain tok bilong kotim Yesu?
10a. Ol i yusim planti tok giaman bilong kotim Yesu.

11q. Ating Yesu i bin mekim sampela rong inap long ol i ken kotim em, o nogat?
11a. Nogat tru! Yesu i no bin mekim wanpela rong.

12q. Ating Yesu i bekim ol giaman tok bilong ol?
12a. Nogat. Yesu i pasim maus tasol.

13q. Hetpris i askim Yesu olsem, “Yu dispela Helpim Yawe i salim i kam na yu Pikinini bilong Yawe, o nogat?” Na Yesu i bekim wanem tok long em?
13a. Yesu i tok, “Em mi tasol.” Na tu em i tok olsem, bihain bai ol i lukim em i sindaun wantaim Yawe olsem jas.

14q. Bilong wanem hetpris i tok Yesu i mas i dai?
14a. Long wanem, Yesu i tok olsem, em yet i Yawe.

15q. Bihain ol birua i mekim wanem samting moa long Yesu?
15a. Ol i paitim em na spetim em.

16q. Ol lida bilong Islaiyele na ol man meri bilong Islaiyele ol i tokim Pailet olsem em mas givim Yesu long han bilong ol long mekim wanem long Yesu?
16a. Ol i tok Pailet mas givim Yesu long han bilong ol long kilim em na hangamapim long diwai kros.

children.name: Lesele 46 - Nikotimasewele Yahe.html
children.contents:
Lesele 46
Nikotimasewele Yahe #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Nikotimasewe Yesuwe mgiya sete wa mgiya.
  • Towete tgo mi meteya agi agite fe lilila.
  • Towete tgo mi meteya guhele eitole agi agite fe lilila.
  • Meteya Yesuweya wa halaigo, swa’u plase mehele mage mgo halimigo.
  • Fe eito mli alo mli alo mo mgo mliya. Fe ga hale’i mo mgo mliya.

 Lesen 45 Kwesten #

Lesen 45 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

  1. Nikotimasewe Yesuwe mgiya sete wa mgiya.
  • Towete tgo mi meteya agi agite fe lilila.
  • Towete tgo mi meteya guhele eitole agi agite fe lilila.
  • Meteya Yesuweya wa halaigo, swa’u plase mehele mage mgo halimigo.
  • Fe eito mli alo mli alo mo mgo mliya. Fe ga hale’i mo mgo mliya.

➊ Nikotimasewe Yesuwe mgiya sete wa mgiya. #

 Buke Sole 3:1-2

1 Tgosagiwe, Likotimase. Likotimaseweyayo, tgo falisimola lotu mlili tgo miwe. Suta metele tgo walewale miwe. 2 Likotimasewe sosafote, ohite mgaliya. Weya mgale, Yesugote mgo mgi matiya, “Tisa! Tifa lelagi tago. Meya, Eiwapaifawimiwe metgote sala mgi he’amotimi tigo, tigo la wa yai atilami. Meya, Eiwapaifawimiwe kailifi sagi sala mlougo. Pitate fe mefa mgogi fe kailifi mi ai la wa he’amo hata. Me Eiwapaifawimiwe kailifi mi lo late, meya mgogi fe kailifi mi wa he’amo lila miwe laya.”

  1. Nikotimaseweya tgo felasi miwlaya.
  2. Weya ohimote mgaliya. Weya tgo felasi hapoto hapoto mi metego heli to.
  3. Weya mgo mgiya “tifa”. Ame stu hele tlago fe?
  4. Nikotimas lelagi tago. Yaweweya Yesuwego lelama mgi he’amotiya.

➋ Towete tgo mi meteya agi agite fe lilila. #

 Buke Sole 3:3

3 Yesuweya wele mehe la matile, mgo mati mgiya, “Ati pkata. Aya mego ya tetgo sahe wa mgilamigo. Tgo sagiwe mlagete oto agiyagite ei loto ma’oto, agiyagite hgo mle hole mage mgo li late, meta weya, meta wiyemete Yawewele si molama sete swou lila miwe laya.”

  1. Fe luwalumo gitigo wa fowa. Gitiya hatewe fe luwalumo sete lilateya, meta gitigo fe hale’i namba 2 mo hgolaigo.
  2. Tgo felasi mi meteya mgo hatge, "gitile 'au’wato miwe Islaiyewe mgole giti wego lauamate mliliya.
  3. Yesuweya mgo mgiya, “metaya ei agi agi to fe lila.”
  4. Hagile wiyemete ei agi agito ta wa he’amo tagleileigo fle?

 Buke Sole 3:4

4 Oke, Likotimosewe mehe la hatgele, la mgiya, “Ai! Piyate tgomiwe fawite lgo la mli mate, we mlagete oto agiyagite hei loto ma’oto hole mage mgo afastu mgo, ame hatgile tlago ta la lileigo fe? Afastute maiyasele tefage laume hago ta la hgo lei a la fe? Hago li hata.”

  1. Nikotimaseweya silole afalgehe hatgeliya. Mi’a Yesuweya tgomiwele eito hatgele, mgo wa mgiya.
  2. Nikotimaseweya lelagi go hata. Mi’a weya Islayele tgo lotu paso teli miwlaya. Mgole weya lelagigo hata.

➌ Towete tgo mi meteya guhele eitole agi agite fe lilila. #

 Buke Sole 3:5

5 Yesu i bekim tok olsem, “Tru tumas mi tokim yu, sapos man i no kamap nupela long wara na long Holi Spirit, em i no inap i go insait long graun bilong God."

  1. Ya lehe wara fe hatgeli itogimo mgo mliya. Yawewele ya tetgoheya gu hele mage mgo mliya. Gitiya wele ya tetgohe fe atila, mgole gitiya wele ya tetgohe fe hatge lela, gitiya wele tle laume fe lilila.
     1 Pita 1:23-25, Efesus 5:26, Jon 15:3 na Buk Song 119:9.
  2. Ya lehe wara fe hatgeli luwalumo mgo mliya, tgo miwe fe baptaisi lela. Opiyai, yamiya ai mgi hata.
  3. Gitiya gitile titamese hgo mlemate, gitiya Satalewele wage hgu wa tifiya. Mi’a gitiya afastu la hgo lelaigo.
  4. Towete tgo gitiya Yawewele Klele agiagi meheya laume fe wa gitla.
    • Yawewele wi agi ei stu towa wiyemete gitigo ei agi agi to wa taglei heamolaigo.
    • Yawewele wi agi ei stu towa gitigo Yawewele ya tetgohe wiyemete wa yami atilaigo.
  5. Towete tgo ei agi agi to fe lilila.

 Buke Sole 3:6-7

6 Samting bodi i kamapim, em i bodi. Na samting Holi Spirit i kamapim, em i spirit. 7 Yu no ken kirap nogut long dispela tok mi tokim yu, ‘Yupela i mas kamap nupela gen.

  1. Yawewele hatge mgo mliya, Klele sahegi to.
    • Long ai bilong Yawe i gat tupela kain manmeri tasol long dispela graun. Em i no tingting long blakpela na waitpela skin. Na em i no tingting long lain i gat planti mani na lain i gat liklik mani. Nogat. Dispela tupela lain i bruk olsem ol lain pikinini bilong Satan na ol pikinini bilong God. Ol lain bilong Satan i bin kamap wanpela taim tasol. Ol i kisim bodi bilong dispela graun taim mama i karim ol. Tasol ol pikinini bilong Yawe i bin kamap nupela gen long spirit bilong ol, na i no long bodi tasol. Nogat. Holi Spirit yet i bin mekim ol i kamap nupela gen long spirit bilong ol, na nau ol i ken harim tok bilong Yawe na aninit long em.

➍ Meteya Yesuweya wa halaigo, swa’u plase mehele mage mgo halimigo. #

 Buke Sole 3:14-15

14 Bipo Moses i bin litimapim snek long ples nating, na long wankain pasin ol bai i litimapim Pikinini Bilong Man. 15 Olsem bai olgeta man i bilip long em, ol i ken kisim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim.

  1. Yesuweya Nikotimasewego mgo mgiya
  • Long dispela taim ol Israel i bikhet na toktok planti na Yawe i salim ol snek nogut long kaikaim ol na ol Israel i stat long dai nabaut. Bihain ol i tingim rong bilong ol na tanim bel. Olsem na Yawe i tokim Moses long wokim snek bras na hangamapim dispela snek long pos, na sapos ol manmeri i lukluk long dispela snek bras, bai ol i kamap gutpela gen, na ol i no inap dai.
  1. Sataleweya swa’u luwalu mi Islaiyele metego hakofeili mile magemgo go.
  2. Yesuweya swa’u plasemehele aumate halili mile mage mgo halilaigo.
    • Yesu i tok, i gat wanpela rot tasol bilong helpim yumi ol manmeri i bagarap long sin na dai. Ol man i mas hangamapim Yesu wankain olsem Moses i bin hangamapim snek bras long pos. Na sapos yumi bilip long dispela Helpim, Jisas, orait bai yumi kamap nupela gen long famili bilong God, na bai yumi kisim laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim. Em i wankain olsem ol Israel i lukluk long snek bras na ol i kamap gutpela gen.

 Buke Sole 3:16

16 “Yawe i gat wanpela Pikinini tasol i stap. Tasol Yawe i laikim tumas olgeta manmeri bilong graun, olsem na em I givim dispela wanpela Pikinini long ol. Em i mekim olsem bilong olgeta manmeri i bilip long em ol i no ken lus. Nogat. Bai ol i kisim laip “stap gut oltaim oltaim.

  1. Gitiya Yesuwele hge tle laume gwe ilate, meta Yaweweya gitigo afastu lelaigo.
  2. Ol manmeri i mas bilipim tok bilong Yawe sapos ol i laik em i amamas long ol na kisim bek ol.

➎ Fe eito mli alo mli alo mo mgo mliya. Fe ga hale’i mo mgo mliya. #

 Buke Sole 3:17-18

17 Yawe i no salim Pikinini bilong en i kam long graun bilong skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun olsem jas. Nogat. Em i salim em i kam bilong kisim bek ol. 18 Man i bilip long em, em i no gat kot. Man i no bilip, em i lus pinis long kot, long wanem, em i no bin bilip long dispela wanpela Promis Poto Bilong God.

  1. Yesuweya silole towete tgo tguto mi metego wele fe hisafi loiloiyalimo wa lolamigo.
  2. Yesuweya towete tgo metele fli tle fli aflaiyalamigo. Mgole weya metego wele hge tle laume gwe ilamigo.
  3. Meteya fe mgoli mo sete lelate, meta wele wi agi ei stu towa metego ei agi agi to lolaigo.

 Buke Sole 3:19-20

19 Na as bilong kot bilong ol em i olsem. Lait i kamap pinis long graun, tasol ol man i laikim tumas tudak. Ol i no laikim lait, long wanem, ol i man bilong mekim pasin nogut. 20 Olgeta man i save mekim pasin nogut, ol i birua bilong lait. Ol i no laik bai pasin bilong ol i kamap ples klia. Olsem na ol i no save kam long lait.

  1. Towete tgo hatewe mgo hatgelaigo, Aya wiyeme tago. Aya siyasi to hata. Afa fe luwalumo sete wapatiya. Towete tgo wlepumetelaya.
  2. Satewe metele fe luwalumo wapatilamigo hata, opiyai meteya metele wi agi ei stu mile hge tle laume lililami alo lililami alo.
  3. Mgole meteya Yawewele wi agi ei stutowa metego ei agi agit lolaigo hata.

 Lesen 46 Kwesten #

1q. Bilong wanem Nikodemus i bilip olsem Yawe i bin salim Yesu i kam?
1a. Powa bilong Yesu. Yesu i bin wokim planti bikpela mirakel.

2q. Yesu i tok, ol manmeri i mas KAMAP NUPELA GEN. Ating Yesu i ting yumi mas kamap nupela long bodi gen, a?
2a. Nogat. Em i toktok long yumi mas kamap nupela insait long spirit bilong yumi.

3q. Yesu i tok, ol man i mas kamap nupela long wara na long Spirit bilong Yawe. Ating man bai i kamap nupela taim em i kisim baptais long wara, a?
3a. Nogat tru. Baptais long wara em i mak tasol bilong ol Israel i bin tanim bel. Baptais yet i no mekim ol manmeri i kamap stretpela long ai bilong Yawe.

4q. Yesu i tok, “Man i mas kamap nupela long WARA.” Mining tru bilong dispela tok em wanem?
4a. Wara i tok piksa long pasin bilong harim tok bilong Yawe. Man i mas harim tok bilong Yawe na bilipim na go ananit long lek hul bilong en sapos em i laik kamap nupela.

5q. Yesu i tok, “Man i mas kamap nupela long Spirit bilong Yawe.” Mining bilong dispela tok em wanem?
5a. Olgeta manmeri i kamap pinis long famili bilong Satan na ol yet i no inap kamap nupela long famili bilong Yawe long strong bilong ol yet. Spirit bilong Yawe tasol i gat strong bilong mekim spirit bilong ol i kamap nupela long famili bilong Yawe long taim ol i bilip long Yesu.

6q. Yesu i tok olsem ol man bai i litimapim em wankain olsem wanem samting?
6a. Ol man bai i litimapim Yesu wankain olsem Moses i bin litimapim snek bras na hangamapim long diwai.

7q. Ol man bai i litimapim Yesu wankain olsem Moses i bin litimapim snek bras i helpim ol manmeri olsem wanem?
7a. Ol manmeri i bilip long Yesu bai i kisim laip i stap gut oltaim, wankain olsem ol Israel i bin lukluk long snek bras na ol i kamap orait gen.

8q. Bilong wanem Yawe i salim Yesu i kam long graun?
8a. Yawe i salim Yesu bilong kisim bek ol manmeri, nogut ol i kisim pe nogut bilong sin na stap oltaim oltaim long ples paia.

9q. Bilong wanem planti manmeri i no laik bilip long Yesu? Spirit bilong Yawe.
9a. Ol i laikim tumas pasin bilong sin. Ol i laik bihainim laik bilong ol yet, na ol i no laik Yawe i senisim tingting bilong ol, olsem na ol i bikhet.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 45 - Felasi Lotu la mlili Tgo metele fe ....html
children.name: Lesele 45 - Felasi Lotu la mlili Tgo metele fe ....html
children.contents:
Lesele 45
Felasi Lotu la mlili Tgo metele fe mo. #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Mak 7:1-5
  • Mak 7:6-9
  • Luk 18:14-23

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Tgo falisi mile fe lomo mgo mliya
  2. Gitile Flitlefliya, 'Ulau tetgo tago
  3. Yesuweya Falisi Metetgote Yaiya

 Lesele 45 Kwesten #

Lesele 45 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya tama’i mago meheya mgo #

Hale, hao la mli mi afla la fli 'atila. Yameheya afla fli’atila. Mehefa hatge lota! Flifagela! Flageyayo, gitiya mgo lileigo:

  • Tgo falisi mile fe lomo mgo mliya
  • Yesuweya tgo falisi mile fe luwalumo wa hla iya.
  • Hegla hatalou gitile eito la gitile flifage ai aflaiyalaigo hata.
  • Tgo falisi luwalu sagi we wasiya mgi magetowa.
  • Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miwefa EWFMWego mgi magetowa.
  • Yesuweya tgo mgi wefa ame hatge ta mliya?

Lgomateyayo, fekain kain lotu mile fe mo yailami la mliya. Kain kain lotu mmile ya meheya mgo, Lotu mgo, falisi na satusi, metele ya mehe. Mehele meheya mgo, Miyayo tome malamayo, ya tetgo he, na ya 'wasiya he. Mgo gaga la mlili mehe. Mehele meheya mgo, Miyayo, lotu 'le’la seigi seigi miyayo, mgogi ya mehe aflaiya lileigo. Sahe ya wiyeme he. Saheya, ya 'wasiya he. Mehele meheya mehe ta. Mgote la wa ya mei he’amowa. Lotu seigi seigi 'le’la pa’layo, silolafa gitifa lgomatefa la hgoli mehe ta. Mehele meheya mgo, yaheya saheya aflaiya aflaiyai to.

➊ Tgo falisi mile fe lomo mgo mliya #

 Mak 7:1-5

1 Falisi tgo Mosesewele lomole mafgateli mi, Suta tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Selusalememo wapatgeyale, meteya Yesuwetgote mgali mate, 2 meteya gaga hgowa, Yesuwele tisaipole mi mle mali mate, metele yalei wa hi hata. Meteya metele yalei wa hi tota late, meteya metele auwato wele heglafi yahe mafgate mle hata. 3Falisi tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Suta tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Sutale towete tgou meteya, meteya ga i a lami mli mate, metele auwato wele heglafi yahe mafgate mleya. Metele yalei wa hi swouwa. Metele yalei ga wa hi swou tota late, mete ai a hata. Opiyai. 4 Metaga meteya maketehe meile, mete hosapo gi mate, meteya gu hi tota late, meteya ai a hata. Metele auwato wele heglafi ya siegi mi mafgate mlele, sesamalei wahila, kai wahila, pletei wahila.

5 Felisile tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Sutale Tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi Yesugo wa mgiya, “Mele tisaipole mi mete yalei 'ulau tapote maligo. Mele tisaipole mete metele auwato wele heglafi mi yamehe mafgatemli migo hata, meta hago ta mliya? Meteya metele auwato wele heglafi yamehe aile tlago ta tauta’u hata fe?”

Ya mlagete lgomateyala mlili mehe. Ya lotu seigi seigi mehele meheya sagiweya mehe gaga la yailileigo. Miya falowai tago. Miyayo, giti lomo pai afgate le ei li! Gitiyo, beiten, na lotu, mi tlage pai afgate le li! Gitile mehe tlagete li gu i li late, wele ya wiyeme tetgo mehe na wele fe wiyeme tetgo mo afgate le swou totate, ya malama, tome malama la maflai la maflaiyali mehe. Ya malama mgo maflai maflaiyali miyayo… Mele mgo li late, ya malama mgo maflaiyali mehe. “Mele mgogi femo li lateyayo, wiyemete Yawewe mego blessing sagiya mego lolaigo. tilitaili sagi mego lolaigo. o, meleyo, mele fe mgo li lateyayo, megowayo, tilitaili miya hgo lelai me laya.” Meheya saheya 'wasi yahe go. Sahe me tome malama maflaiyaliya meheya mehe ta. Lotu seigi seigi mile gaga la maflaiyali meheya. Meheya mgote mei la meitiliya. Mehele mehe afla afgate lela.

Mgogi yamehe, na mgogi femo, ino lgomate la mlimigo hata. Ahowa. Ifa pagu sete pagute malamayo, Satusi na Falisi metetgote gaga la gwagi so meheya mehe ta. Ya maflaiyali meheya. Ya maflaiyali meheya metetgote gaga gwa gi he go.

Satusi na Falisi na metetgote gaga la gwa gi so meheya mehe ta. Meheya Yesuweya mgole la gitale, weya la mgiya, “Gi ale laine meheya afla ga aflai aflaiyala.” Miyayo, Meheya miyayo, giya metego lafgo lafgoulei gi laya. Gile mgogi mehe gaga maflaiya li meheya miyayo, metele fli tle fli na metele afgate lela fe mowayo, gitle mgogi mehete gaga la afefau wi mehe ta. Gitle mgogi mehete gaga la ya mei 'wasiya mehe ta.

  • Tgo falisi mile fe lo segimo meteya tauta’uwa
  • Tgo falisi mi meteya hewi fawimo tili taili mi wa hiya. Mi’a metele fli hatge o metele fli fage fe silemo hetwahe tetgo tago.

 Mak 7:6-9

6 Yesuwe metele yami matile, we metego wa mgiya, “Giya 'wasiyei to tgou laya. Plofete Aisaiyawele pagu hasi yameheya tetgo tago, gitle mi ta. Wele yamehe mgo hasiya, 'Towete tgou mi metele talohete ale yahimo wa hi’eyaliya. Miya metele fliya ale tatwate mlili migo hata. 7 Meteya ale yahimo pitate wa hi 'eyaliya. Meteya metele auwato wele heglafi yamehe mgo ya meiliya, ‘Tile auwato wele heglafi yahe, Yawewele yahe, haiwawe tago.’ 8 Giya Eiwapaifawimiwele yahe tehimote mgo wapawa. Giya gile auwato wele heglafi yahe tlage magete swouliya.” Aisaiyawele yamehe gitgote hasimigo.

9 Yesuwe Felisile tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, Sutale tgo Mosesewele tisa mi metego la wa mgiya, “Falowai. Giya lelagi tago. Gi Eiwapaifawimiwele yaheya tehimote wapale, giya gile auwato wele heglafi yamehe tlage agete swou.”

➋ Gitile Flitlefliya, 'Ulau tetgo tago #

Hegla hatalou gitile eito la gitile flifage ai aflaiyalaigo hata. Gitiya heglahatalou amougo yaile, mgole Giti te fe silemo gilaya. Heglahatalou amougo yai lateya, meta Heglai fe silemole ho fawi mo wa lafite lele feilaigo.

Tili taili mi Gitile fli hatgela mliliya, EWFMWeya sete hgowa. Wefa gitigo fe silemo gitilaya. Fe sine seigimo gitile flifage laumate mliliya, EWFMWeya gitiya yele mali to hata.

2.1 Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miwele Fli tle fli #

Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miwefa EWFMWego mgi magetowa. Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miwefa wele fe sine mo lelagi tago, mgole wele fli hatge maflaiyaliya.

Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miweya pafe Hepelewe mage mgo go.

2.2 Gitiyayo, Sesmalehele mage #

Ya folowahe mgo mliya, towete miseya sele sesemalehe lgehe itogite wahile, mi’a sesemalehela 'ulau tetgo tago.

Yesuweya mgole metegote ya folowa sahe yaiya. Yafolowa meheya mgo yaiya: “Tgouse tgomiwe, mlagete kamole mage mgo, Mele kamolamayo, guhe to lela, o, mele ame hatgei lela, o, kamo to’usi tome malama mlili, to’usi mi ga tgogea, wa sasati totate, tgomise miwe miyayo, gitile kamole to’usi mi, silole towete tgo gitile fli tle fli mi.” Yesuwe mgi fowa. Tgouse tgomiwe kamo mlagete kamole mage mgo, kamo, ta sasati swou meili, o, itogi 'e’ete ta mlili fe? Opiyae! Miya kamole laume lamayo, 'ulau to. Meheya miya, towete tgo gitigo mgi fowa.

Mlagete silole towete tgou gitile mage mgo, kamo wa hi swoule, itogi 'e’ete fe hgola. Meheya miya mehete ya mei fowa. Gitile ya kain kain lotu metewele ya gitigo la maflaiyali mehe. Meheya miya mlagete mlate kamote la mgi fo mehe ta. Yesuwe kamote gaga la mgi fowa. Kamote hale hgo! Ka tgomise miwele mageteli mo, to’usi, 'ulau to fe? Miya itogi 'e’ete ta seteli fe? Opiyae! mowayo, laumate 'ualu to. Miya mehe miyayo, ya gu’le mehe mgi 'wasi yawa.

Tgouse tgomiwe, fe mgogi mo afgate le tota, ya mgogi he afgate le tota mise miwe, fli tle fliya mlagete kamole mage mgo. Laume mala mele to’usi, 'ulau mile mage mgo mliliya. Mele mgogi mehe ati lele ati lela, ati afgate lela, meta mele fli fage mgote mliliya. Ya sagiwele gaga la mgila, me a la 'wati lele, la afgate lela, meheya miya kamote la mgi fo mehe ta.

 Dirty Pot Demo #

Bipo profet Aisaia i bin autim sampela tok long ol Israel na nau Jisas i tingim gen dispela tok bilong en. (Aisaia 29:13) Em i tok olsem, ol manmeri i litimapim nem bilong God na mekim planti switpela na naispela toktok long maus bilong ol, tasol long bel bilong ol, ol i no bilipim tok bilong God na bihainim. Ol i no laikim God na wanbel wantaim em. Nogat. Long ai bilong God ol i stap longwe tru long em na ol i bagarap yet long sin bilong ol.

➌ Yesuweya Falisi Metetgote Yaiya #

Yesuweya tgo falisi mile fe luwalumo wa hla iya. Towete tgo segi mi meteya EWFMWele yahimo metele talohete aumate halile, mi’a metele flifage la metele fli hatge EWFMWego wa lafite mliliya.

Towete tgo seigi mi 'e’ete lotu meiliya. Towete tgo segi mi metele fli hatge yai yameiliya, mgole meteya EWFMWele ya tetgohe maflaiyaliya. Tgo falisi luwalu sagi we wasiya mgi magetowa. Tgo falisi luwalu miweya hatgeliya, “EWFMWele lgu afa itogi tetgo a laya.”

Tgo falisi luwalu miwe Poto Keilewele mage mgo go.

Hatge pkata! Giyayo, hagi wele mage mgo go fe? Tgo falisi luwalu miwele mage go fe? O, Tgo wisi teksimo mleli miwele mage go fe?

Yesuweya tgo mgi wefa ame hatge ta mliya? EWFMWeya Tgo falisi luwalumiwele fe silemo ai ga fli atiya hata. EWFMWeya tgo wisi taks mleli miwele fe silemo ga fli atiya, mgole wefa wego afastu mleya.

 Mak 7:14-23

14 Yesuwe towete tgou mi la you mleya, “Gi atgote ga!” Meteya wetgote mgale, we metego wa mgiya, “Gi ati fkata! Ale yahe hatgele swou. 15 Ale yahe mgo, tgou mile hegla hatalou mali mi Yawewele lgumlagi wego 'uloute ai hgo hata. Opiyai. Miya tgou mile fli tge fli laume mala luwalute lilila fli mefagele gwa ga lateya, Yawewele lgumlagiya wego 'uloute hgo laigo. 16 Tgo hafeitogi to sagiwe yalehe fe atila.”

17 Yesuwele yahe tepa’esile, weya towete tgou mi wapatgeyale, we hosasapote mgo gwa iya. Gwe ile, wele tisaipole mi wego wa mgiya, “Teiya mele yafo yai mehe hagile mati stu migo hata.” 18 Yesuweya metego wa mgiya, “Giya ta mati mle hata fe? Gi lelagi go hata fe? Ati. Tilitaili tgoule mali mi, miya Yawewele lgumlagi wego 'ulaute ai hgo hata. 19 Mgole hegla hatalou mi wele fli fagelama ai li hata. Opiyai. Tefagela tlage lilile, teite fu laigo.” Yesuwele yamehele stumeheya mgo, “Yawewele lgumlagiya mgo, hegla hatalou tgute mi itogi tago.”

20 Yesuwe la wa mgiya, “Tilitaili tgou mila gwa ga la miya tgomiwe 'uloute li laigo. 21 Tgoule fli tge fli laume mala luwalute lilila miya mgo, lepagile fli mefagele, hemageile fli mefagele, tgo matateli fli mefagele, 22 fli towetei to miwe tapote lepagi la fli mefagele, fli opgei to mise tapote lepagi la fli mefagele, fli hgo hamga meli fli mefagele, fli fe luwalu mo hatgeli fli mefagele , fli 'wasi yei to mefagele, fli hgo hamga meli mefagele mleski to mefage, fli luwaluto mefagele, fli ya luwalu sagi tgote mgili mefagele, fli ga mgi hi’eyali mefagele, fli ga mli mliyali mefagele, 23 Tilitaili luwalu miya tgomiwela laume mala gwa mgale, Yawewele lgumlagi wego 'uloute hgo laigo.”

 Sharpen Axe Skit #

 Lesele 45 Kwesten #

Lesele 45 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

1q. Bilong wanem ol falisi i kros long ol disaipel bilong Yesu?
1a. Long wanem, ol disaipel i no save bihainim ol lo bilong ol falisi.

2q. Aisaia i bin autim wanem tok i makim gut pasin bilong ol falisi?
2a. Aisaia i tok olsem, planti man (olsem ol falisi) i save litimapim nem bilong Yawe long maus bilong ol, tasol long bel bilong ol, ol i stap longwe long Yawe. Ol i no bilipim tok bilong Yawe na bihainim. Ol i kamapim planti lo bilong ol yet.

3q. Ating em i orait sapos yumi skruim sampela lo o tok bilong yumi yet i go antap long tok bilong Yawe o sapos yumi rausim sampela tok?
3a. Nogat tru. I tambu long skruim sampela tok moa insait long tok bilong Yawe.

4q. Sapos yumi tambuim sampela kain kaikai, ating dispela i rausim pe bilong sin na mekim yumi kamap klin o stretpela manmeri long ai bilong Yawe, a?
4a. Nogat. Dispela i no inap rausim pe bilong sin na mekim yumi kamap klin long ai bilong Yawe.

5q. Ol manmeri i save skelim ol samting i stap ausait long bodi, na pasin ol manmeri i save mekim. Tasol Yawe i save skelim wanem samting?
5a. Yawe i save skelim ol samting i stap hait insait long bel na tingting bilong man.

6q. Bilong wanem Yawe i amamas long dispela man bilong kisim takis, tasol em i no amamas long falisi?
6a. Man bilong kisim takis i daunim em yet na pilim sin bilong en, na bilipim tok bilong Yawe na hangamap long marimari bilong Yawe tasol. Olsem na Yawe i amamas long em. Tasol falisi i no pilim sin bilong em yet. Em i hangamap long strong bilong em yet na em i ting em yet i kamap gutpela man pinis long ai bilong Yawe, olsem na Yawe i no amamas long em.

children.name: Lesele 44 - Yesuweya wa mgiya, " Atlagete, yofl....html
children.contents:
Lesele 44
Yesuweya wa mgiya, " Atlagete, yoflomo kalili giteli alaya" #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya tisaipele mi metego mgo mgiya, “Aya ga hale’ilaigo.”
  • Yesuweya oto towete opgagi mi metego wele fli hatgei mlowa.
  • Yesuweya tgo Felasi miwe tgo fe silemo miwe mgile yahe wai yami matiya.
  • Yesuweya yoflomole mage mgo go.

 Lesen 43 Kwesten #

Lesen 43 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Yesuweya wele tgo Tisaipele mi metego ya folowa sahe wa mgiya. Tgo sagiweya hasisiyagi si mi mlelefa’eya. Weya wele Tisaipele mi metego mgo mgiya, “gi ale yamehe swou ati”.

➊ Yesuweya tisaipele mi metego mgo mgiya, “Aya ga hale’ilaigo.” #

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Mak 8:31

31 Yesuwe wele yami tepa’esile, weya wele tisaipole metego wai ya mi meiliya. Wele yahe mgo mgiya, “Aya Tgo tetgo Eiwapaifawimiwe wa heyamotimiwlaya, aya teimate hleige le lai alaya. Heglafi walowalei mi (elders), Plisefawi mi, Tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, meteya ago tehi lahila siya. Meteya ago atata tepa’esile, sosafogi safo tepa’esile, aya afastu tisetale, ale eito afastu la ga laigo.”

  1. **Yesuweya wele 12 pela tisaipelemi metego mgo mgiya, teime weya ga hale’ilaigo. Mi’a meteya mgo hatgeya, Yesuweya Gavman Rom wa lausilaigo.
  2. Yesuweya metego wa mgi mate, meteya hatgemle hata. Meteya ga fafatiya.
  3. Weliye weliye Yaweweya wele ya tetgo he tauta’uligo.
  4. Sete pagute tgo plofete mi meteya sete tafo hasiya.

➋ Yesuweya oto towete opgagi mi metego wele fli hatgei mlowa. #

 PIKSA 000

  1. Yesu wele lgumlagile otou tguto mi meteya wapai metelaya. Weya otou wele fli hatgei wa mlowa.
  2. *Yesuweya otou tgutomi metego wele ya tetgohe fe atila

 Buke Mak 10:14-15

14 Yesuwe wele tisaipole metele ya tosei mehe matile, weya tosei mlile, Yesuweya tisaipole metego wa mgiya, “Gi otou mi afla wa mgila mila. Otou mi atgote fe ga la. Mgole, Eiwapaifawimiwe otou mi loiloiya malile, weya metele kilemiwele mage mgo go. Towete opgagi Eiwapaifawimiwele tlelaumate lililate, meteya otoule mage mgo lili late, Eiwapaifawimiwe metego loiloiya laigo. 15 Ale yamehe tetgo tago. Tgo sagiwe otohole femo tauta’u totalate, Eiwapaifawimiwe tgo miwego ai loiloiya hata.”

  1. **Yesuweya metego mgo mgiya, silole towete tgo mi metele fli tlefli fe aflaiyala. Meteya otoule mage mgo fe lilila.
  2. Otou mi metele tgitgu mgila ma’iteligo. Meteya metetle kailifi ma’iteligo hata.

➌ Yesuweya tgo Felasi miwe tgo fe silemo miwe mgile yahe wai yami matiya. #

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Luk 18:9-14

9 Sampela man i ting ol i stretpela man na ol arapela man i no gutpela olsem ol. Yesu i givim tok piksa olsem long ol dispela kain man, 10“Tupela man i laik mekim prea, na tupela i go long tempel. Narapela em i Farisi. Na narapela em i man bilong kisim takis.

  1. Tingim gut pasin bilong Felasi.
  2. Tingim Gut pasin bilong man i kisim teks.

11 Dispela Farisi em i sanap na long bel bilong em yet em i prea olsem,“Yawe, mi no olsem ol arapela man, olsem na mi tenkyu long yu. Ol i save stil na mekim pasin i no stret na trabel long ol maritmeri. Tasol mi nogat. Na mi no olsem dispela man bilong kisim takis. 12 Long olgeta wik mi save makim tupela de bilong tambu long kaikai. Na olgeta samting mi kisim, mi save tilim long 10-pela hap na givim wanpela hap long yu.’

  1. DISPELA FARISI EM I TING EM I STAP GUTPELA MAN LONG AI BILONG Yawe.
  2. DISPELA FARISI EM I OLSEM KEIN.

13 Tasol man bilong kisim takis em i sanap longwe, na em i no laik lukluk i go antap long heven. Nogat. Em i paitim bros bilong en na i tok, ‘Yawe, mi man bilong mekim sin. Yu ken marimari long mi.’”

  1. MAN BILONG KISIM TAKIS EM I PILIM SIN BILONG EM YET NA TANIM BEL.
  2. DISPELA MAN EM I OLSEM ABEL.

14 Na Yesu i tok, “Mi tokim yupela, long taim dispela man bilong kisim takis i go bek long haus bilong en, em tasol i kamap stretpela man long ai bilong Yawe. Tasol dispela arapela man nogat. Long wanem, olgeta man i litimapim nem bilong ol yet, Yawe bai i daunim ol. Na olgeta man i daunim ol yet, Yawe bai i litimapim nem bilong ol.”

Yesu I GAT WANEM KAIN TINGTING LONG DISPELA TUPELA KAIN MAN.

  1. Yawe I NO LUSIM SIN BILONG FARISI.
  2. Yawe I KISIM BEK MAN BILONG KISIM TAKIS.
  3. ATING YUPELA I STAP OLSEM FARISI O OLSEM MAN BILONG KISIM TAKIS?

➍ Yesuweya yoflomole mage mgo go. #

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Sol 10:8-10

7 Yesuweya mgole metego la wa ya mei matiya "Aya ya tetgo sahe yailamigo. Atlageteyayo, yoflomo kalili giteli a laya. Ho sipsipe mile sapolama.

  1. Yesuweya yoflomole wita’ehele mage mgo kali giteli miwe laya.

8Tgo pagu atgote ga gwa gi tgo miyayo, meteya tgo luwalu hemagei to mete laya. Meta miya, sipesipe mi lafgou lafgou meili tgou laya. Sipesipe metewefa, tgou hemagei to metewele yami mati le hata. Opiyae. 9Yoflomo kali giteli ayayo, sipesipe metele la gwe i, la gwa ga, la mlili femowayo, atle kali giteli mo go. Metefa ame tilitaili miya, ai la api fafati hata. Meteya mgo tlagete sileigo.

  1. Tgo pagu mi meteya ya 'wasiyahe to. Meteya Yesuwele towete tgo mi metego wa folamigo. Meteya mete hemagei lelamigo.
  2. Ol giaman helpim, ol giaman helpim i save hait na giamanim ol manmeri. Ol giaman tisa i save miksim giaman tok wantaim tok tru.

10 Oke, Tgo hemagei to metewele lgo gaga gwa ga late, metele ame hatge, amei lela miyayo, piyete. Metayo, hemagei lelami mgaliya. Metefa meta miya sipesipe mi lelami mgali. Metefa ai la hgo wiyo’oi hata. Ale stu gi heya mgo, aya fe metego sago la lilami la gi liligo hata. Mifa metego la hgo wiyo’oi swou lile, swou lila mli gimi a laya. Ale gi mehele stu meheya mehe ta.

  1. Tgo sagimi meteya ohimote gaga gwa mgaligo. Meteya wele sipsipe mi metego la fga fgolamigo.

11 Ayayo sipesipe mi wiyo’oi mali a laya. Tgo sipesipe mi wiyo’oi mali miwe gayo, weya ga hale’ileigo. Meta sipesipe mi so weliyeite wiyo’oi swou lila miwe laya.

  1. Tgo plofetemiwe Aisaih sete tafo hasiya.
  2. Yesuwele yahe hatge. Wele 12 pela tisaipele mi metego sete wa mgiya. Weya teime sete hale’ilaigo.

 Lesen 44 Kwesten #

1q. Yesu i tokim ol disaipel long wanem kain pasin bai i kamap long em?
1a. Yesu i tok olsem, ol lida bilong Israel bai i givim baksait long em na kilim em i dai. Tasol em bai i kirap bek long de namba 3.

2q. Husait igo pas long tokaut long bipo, olsem promis Poto bilong Yawe bai in dai?
2a. Ol profet bilong Yawe. Yesu i tok olsem Aisaih bin.

3q. Ating ol pikinini tu i ken harim tok bilong Yawe na tanim bel na bilipim?
3a. Yes, Yesu i laik ol pikinini tu i mas harim tok bilong Yawe na bilip long em.

4q. Ating ol pikinini tu i stap long famili bilong Satan?
4a. Yes. Ol pikinini tu i stap long famili bilong Satan.

5q. Yesu i tok olsem, “Yupela i mas kamap olsem liklik pikinini sapos yu laik go insait long kingdom bilong Yawe.” As mining bilong dispela tok em wanem?
5a. Taim yumi harim tok bilong Yawe, yumi no ken tubel o tingting planti. Nogat. Yumi mas bilipim tasol olsem liklik pikinini i save bilipim tok bilong papamama.

6q. Bilong wanem Yawe i amamas long dispela man bilong kisim takis, tasol em i no amamas long Farisi?
6a. Man bilong kisim takis i daunim em yet na pilim sin bilong en, na bilipim tok bilong Yawe na hangamap long marimari bilong Yawe tasol. Olsem na Yawe i amamas long em. Tasol Farisi i no pilim sin bilong em yet. Em i hangamap long strong bilong em yet na em i ting em yet i kamap gutpela man pinis long ai bilong Yawe, olsem na Yawe i no amamas long em.

7q. Ol wasman bilong sipsip i save kamap olsem dua olsem wanem?
7a. Ol i save wokim banis bilong sipsip na dispela banis i gat wanpela rot tasol bilong go insait. Long nait dispela wasman i save slip long dispela rot na kamap olsem dua bilong dispela banis.

8q. Bilong wanem Yesu i kolim em yet olsem dua bilong sipsip?
8a. Em yet em i rot bilong man i kamap wanbel wantaim Yawe.

9q. Yesu i tok piksa long ol stilman na ol wel animal i laik bagarapim ol sipsip. Ol i makim husat tru?
9a. Dispela i makim Satan na spirit nogut na ol giaman tisa. Ol dispela lain i save autim tingting na toktok bilong ol yet na miksim wantaim tok tru bilong Yawe, na long dispela pasin ol i paulim tingting bilong ol manmeri na bagarapim ol.

10q. Yesu i tok em bai i mekim wanem samting bilong helpim sipsip bilong em?
10a. Yesu i tok, em bai i givim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim ol sipsip.

11q. Ol sipsip bilong Yesu em husat?
11a. Em i tok piksa long ol manmeri i tanim bel na bilip long Yesu olsem Promis Poto bilong ol.

12q. Ating ol pikinini tu i ken harim tok bilong Yawe na tanim bel na bilipim?
12a. Yes, Yesu i laik ol pikinini tu i mas harim tok bilong Yawe na bilip long em.

13q. Ating ol pikinini tu i stap long famili bilong Satan?
13a. Yes. Ol pikinini tu i stap long famili bilong Satan.

14q. Yesu i tok olsem, “Yupela i mas kamap olsem liklik pikinini sapos yu laik go insait long kingdom bilong Yawe.” As mining bilong dispela tok em wanem?
14a. Taim yumi harim tok bilong Yawe, yumi no ken tubel o tingting planti. Nogat. Yumi mas bilipim tasol olsem liklik pikinini i save bilipim tok bilong papamama.

children.name: Lesele 43 - Yesuwele Yafolowa Sahe.html
children.contents:
Lesele 43
Yesuwele Yafolowa Sahe #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Mak 3:1-19
  • Piksa: 154-156

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya metego ya folowa sahe wai yami matiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya femola migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silofumole aumate mlili silo mila migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya si wlitomolama migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silo itogimola mlelefa’e mgole, itogite haliya.

 Lesen 42 Kwesten #

Lesen 42 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Yesuweya towete tgo segimi metego wele kailifi wa he’amowa. Yesuweya mgahi fawihele mefiyalu fawimole wa mgi matgutowa. Yesuweya Lasalusewele eito afastu la tisetale, afastute la gituwa. Tgo Felasi mi meteya fli eitosei to. Mgole meteya Yesuwego wa atatlamigo. Hao flage sohite, gitiya Yesuwele ya kailifihe atilaigo.

  • Yesuweya metego ya folowa sahe wai yami matiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya femola migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silofumole aumate mlili silo mila migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya si wlitomolama migo hlaiya.
  • Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silo itogimola mlelefa’e mgole, itogite haliya.

➊ Yesuweya metego ya folowa sahe wai yami matiya. #

 Buke Mak 4:2-3

2 Yesuwe yapu wagehgula meigo setale, metego ya seigi mi wai ya meiliya. We metego yafo mi wa mgiya, 3 "Ati fkata! Tgo sagiwe wele hosihe meile, weya hasisiyagi fu mi mlelefa’eya.

  1. Yesuweya towete tgo segi mi metego wa yami matiya. Wefa ya folowa he wa mgiya.
  2. Towete tgo sagi mi wele yahe lelaigo. Towete tgo sagi mi wele yahe lelaigo hata.

 Buke Mak 4:4-8

4 Weya hasisiyagi fu mi mlelefa’e mate, sagiya femola migo hlaiya. Hlaile, apei mi fu sagi gaga maliya. 5 Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silofumole aumate mlili silo mila migo hlaiya. Simowa silo ogomo mliliya. Hasisiyagi fu mi hlaile, flage tlage fu mi ga mei tageya. 6 Talifo ga hali gei mate, hasisiyagi mi fgo’ouwa. Miya walei simo hlai hata, hiwalete hgowa. 7 Hasisiyagi fu sagiya si wlitomolama migo hlaiya. Hlaile, wli miya hasisiyagi mi ga fo siyapgaiya gu haliya. Hasisiyagi miya slagete hgowa. Hasisiyagi mi ga hali migo hata. Hasisiyagi mi lo li hataigo. 8 Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silo itogimola mlelefa’e mgole, itogite haliya. Sagiya 30pla siyagi mgo hgowa. Sagiya 60pla siyagi mgo hgowa. Sagiya 100pla siyagi mgo hgowa."

  1. Sagiya femola migo hlaile apei mi fu sagi gaga maliya.
  2. Sagiya silofumole aumate mlili silo mila migo hlaile, Talifo ga hali gei mate, hasisiyagi mi fgo’ouwa.
  3. Sagiya si wlitomolama migo hlaile, wli miya hasisiyagi mi ga fo siyapgaiya gu haliya. Hasisiyagi mi lo li hataigo.
  4. Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silo itogimola mlelefa’e mgole, itogite haliya.

9 Wele yafomehe tepa’esile, Yesuwe mgo mgiya, “Tgo hafeitogito sagiwe yalehe fe atila.”

  1. Yesuweya lelagi tago. Tgo sagi mi wele ya tetgohe hatge lelaigo, la meteya wele hge tle laume gwei laigo.
  2. Mi’a tgo segi mi wele ya tetgohe ai hatge lelaigo hata, mgole meteya wele tle laume gwei laigo hata.

1.1 Yesuweya wele tisaipele metego ya folowa sahe wai yami matiya. #

 Buke Mak 4:13-14

13 Yesuwe tisaipole metego wa mgiya, "Ale yafostumehe gi lelagigo hata fe? Gile ga lelagi swou totalate, teime ale yafohe yaila mehe ai atile swou hata. 14 Ale yafomehele stumeheya mgo, tgo hasisiyagi fumi mlelefa’e miweya weya mgo tgo ei wapaifawimiwele yamehe wai ya mi toutelimiwele mage mgo go.

  1. Yesuweya wele 12 pela tisaipele mi metego mgo mgiya, " tgo hasisiyagi fumi mlelefa’e miweya weya mgo tgo ei wapaifawimiwele yamehe wai ya mi toutelimiwele mage mgo go.
  2. Hasisiyagi fumiya Yawewele ya tetgohele mage mgo go.
  3. Simowa gitile fli tleflile mage mgo go.

➋ Hasisiyagi fu sagiya femola migo hlaiya. #

 Buke Mak 4:15

15 Hasisiyagi fu femola hlai mi tgo sagiya mile mage mgo li laigo. Hasisiyagi fu silofu mila hlai miya tgo sagiya mile mage mgo li laigo. Hasisiyagi fu si wlile tomate hlai miya tgo sagiya mile mage mgo li laigo. Hasisiyagi fu si itogimola hlai miya tgo sagiya mile mage mgo li laigo. Tgo sagiya yamehe matile, meteya siyagi femola migo hlaile, mage mgo go. Meteya Yawewele yamehe mati mateya, flage tlage Satalewe mgale, Yawewele yamehe mlele, gaiya.

  1. Tgo miwe sagiya femolama mle fa’eli late, apei fu sagi mi gaga alaigo.
  2. Apei Satalewele mage mgo go.
  3. Femowa kailifi to.

➌ Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silofumole aumate mlili silo mila migo hlaiya. #

 Buke Mak 4:16-17

16 Tgo sagiya yamehe matile, meteya siyagi silofu mila hlai mile mage mgo go. Mete Yawewele yamehe mati mate, flage tlage meteya lile’i mliya. 17 Miya metele walei sime mago hlei hataigo. Opiyai. Metego lile’i ogome mlile, miya meteya hoigi mle mateya, o Yawewele yamehe metego hlegei mlo mate, mete yamehele tlago tehi maflaiya siya.

  1. Miya metele walei sime mago hlei hataigo.
  2. Meteya pagu yele malei to, Mi’a meteya hoigi hgolate, meteya metele fe pagu fli tlefli mo afgatelelaigo.
  3. Metele Lgagei luwalu tago.

➍ Hasisiyagi fu sagiya si wlitomolama migo hlaiya. #

 Buke Mak 4:18-19

18-19 Tgo sagiya yamehe matile, meteya siyagi si wlile tomate migo hlaile, mage mgo go. Meteya Yawewele yamehe mati mate, opiyai. Meteya simole tilitaili mleli mitlage hatgeliya. Metele fli wisi fawi lelami hatgeliya, mgole meteya tilitaili ta’owi lamigo. Meteya fli mefagegiyawagete mliliya, fli simole mefage hatgelile, Yawewele yamehe hatgeliya. Fli mefageyawagete hatge mate, wlimole mage mgo folateya, Yawewele yamehe ai la hatge swou hata. Mgole, simole fli mefage hatge lateya, Yawele yamehe aila afgate le hata, ga wapa’lu laigo (by lusim olgeta.)

  1. Meteya tgo talo hegi mi metelaya. Metele talohe meteya mog mgi, Aya Yawewele wagehgula mliliya. Mi’a meteya Satalewele mage wa mliya.
  2. Meteya silole tili tailimi hatgitgiya. Meteya Yawele yamehe aila afgate le hata, ga wapa’lu laigo
  3. Meteya tgo ya’wasiya metelaya.

➎ Hasisiyagi fu sagiya silo itogimola mlelefa’e mgole, itogite haliya. #

 Buke Mak 4:20

20 Tgo sagiya yamehe matile, meteya siyagi siloitogimola migo hlai meile, mage mgo go. Meteya Yawewele yamehe matile, meteya wele yahe mgo hatgeya, “tetgo tago.” Meteya wele yahe tetgo hatgele, metele fe itogimo seigite mliya. Meteya hasisiyagi itogite hali mile mage mgo go. Sagiya 30pla siyagi mgo mliya. Sagiya 60pla siyagi mgo mliya. Sagiya 100pla siyagi mgo mliya.

  1. Meteya Yawewele oto tetgo mi metelaya.
  2. Meteya wele yahe tetgo hatgele, metele fe itogimo seigite mliya.
  3. Meteya Yawewele tle laume gwe iya.
  4. Meteya Yawewele wage hgula la mliliya.

 Drama #

 Lesen 43 Kwesten #

1q. Yesu i save yusim wanem kain tok piksa?
1a. Em i save tok piksa long samting i stap long dispela graun na ol manmeri i save gut long en. Tasol mining bilong ol i makim sampela pasin bilong Yawe na sampela pasin bilong man tu.

2q. Bilong wanem Yesu i skulim ol manmeri long tok piksa?
2a. Yesu i no laik ol manmeri i kisim planti save nating. Ol i mas bilipim dispela tok. Olsem na em i tok piksa bai as bilong tok i hait long ol manmeri i no laik bilip, tasol tok piksa bai i helpim tru ol bilipman.

3q. Yesu i autim wanpela tok piksa long pikinini wit. Dispela pikinini wit i makim wanem samting?
3a. Pikinini wit em i makim tok bilong Yawe.

4q. Wanem kain manmeri i olsem strongpela graun i stap long rot?
4a. Bel bilong ol dispela kain manmeri i strong na ol i no laik harim tok bilong Yawe na bilipim.

5q. Wanem kain manmeri i olsem graun i pulap long ston?
5a. Ol dispela kain manmeri i amamas long harim tok bilong Yawe pastaim. Long maus bilong ol, ol i tok olsem, “Mipela i bilipim dispela tok.” Tasol ol i giaman tasol. Ol i no bilipim tru dispela tok bilong Yawe, olsem na taim ol arapela manmeri i givim hevi long ol, o spirit nogut i pretim ol, orait kwiktaim tru ol i lusim dispela tok tru bilong Yawe.

6q. Graun i pulap long rop i gat nil i makim wanem kain manmeri?
6a. Dispela i makim ol dispela manmeri i harim tok bilong Yawe, tasol ol samting bilong graun i karamapim tok bilong Yawe na ol i no bilipim.

7q. Wanem kain man manmeri i olsem gutpela graun?
7a. Ol dispela kain manmeri i harim tok bilong Yawe na ol i bilipim. Ol i bilip ol i stap sinman, olsem na ol i tanim bel na bilip long Yesu wanpela tasol bilong ken kisim bek ol.

children.name: Lesele 42 - Yesuwele kailifi mo mgo mliya..html
children.contents:
Lesele 42
Yesuwele kailifi mo mgo mliya. #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Mak 4:35-41
  • Jon 11:1-48
  • Piksa:157-158 &168-169

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya mgahi fawihele mefiyalu fawimole wa mgi matgutowa.
  • Lasaluseweya ga hale’iya.
  • Mataseya mgo hatge mleya, Yesuweya Yawewele oto Potomi wlaya.
  • Yesuweya Lasalusewele eito afastu la mlele, afastute la gituwa.

 Lesen 41 Kwesten #

Lesen 41 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao sohite gitiya sete matiya.

  • Yesuweya mgahi fawihele mefiyalu fawimole wa mgi matgutowa.
  • Lasaluseweya ga hale’iya.
  • Mataseya mgo hatge mleya, Yesuweya Yawewele oto Potomi wlaya.
  • Yesuweya Lasalusewele eito afastu la mlele, afastute la gituwa.

➊ Yesuweya mgahi fawihele mefiyalu fawimole wa mgi matgutowa. #

Yesuweya silole tili taili mi tgu tetgo miwlaya

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Mak 4:35-41

35 Yesuwele yamehe tepa’esi mate, ohimo tatwate mgale, weya wele tisaipole metego wa mgiya, “Giti ta’ehe pai higu ei.”

  1. Yesuweya wele ya tetgo he towete tgo segi mi metego wa mgi tepa’esiya. Mgole metego wapatgeya.
  2. Galeli hawesi ga iya.
  3. Towete tgo segi mi wego mafgate mlele, mgole Yesuweya wele Tisaipele mi meteya hasifola haligituwa.

36 Meteya towete tgou mi hawesi ‘owehelama wapatgeyale, meteya wele yapu wage sete yameli mohgula meigo hali tifiya. Meteya higu meile, yapu wage sagiya metego tauta’uwa. 37-38 Yesuwe yapu wagehgula meigo gitale, weya wagestuhguto mgo meile, weya sou stawa. Wele tifolama to’uhete matlete stawa. Weya sou stali mate, mgahi fawihele, mefiyalu fawimole mgiya haplite giya. Gu yafgimo yapu wagehguto mgo meigo he’a’aowa. Yapu wagehgu guhe lelagete mlile, ga talo pa’eiya. Mgole gulou mate hlei lami mliya, Yesuwele tisaipole mete wego masasile, wego wai youwa, “Tisa! Tiya ga hale’i lami mliya. Meya tilitaili mi ta ewitei li hata fe?”

  1. Gi hatge. Andrew Jon James Saimon, meteya tgo hai mlele fa’eli metelaya. Mi’a meteya heli fawi to.
  2. Gu fawi mofo metele hasifo maspotlamigo. Mgole meteya heli to.
  3. Mgole meteya Yesuwego ga masisiya.

39 Meteya Yesuwego youle, we tisetale, weya mefiyalumo wa mgiya, “Tepa’esi!” Mgole mefiyalumofa ga tepa’esiya. Yesuweya gu yafgimo wa mgiya, “Momotaite li!” Mgole yafgimofa momotaite mliya. Tilitaili miya momotaite mliya.

  1. Yesuweya Yawewemiwlaya.
  2. Yesuweya tafoto to, weya tgo yahito. Mgole weya Yawewlaya. Weya metego wele kailifi wa he’amolamigo.

40 Yesuwe mefiyalumo, gu yafgimo yamehe tepa’esile, we tisaipole metego wa mgimatiya, “Giya ame tilitaili ta hlage li fe? Miya giya ago ta hatge leli hata fe?” 41 Yesuwe yamehe tepa’esile, wele tisaipole metele ei teiya. Metele fli hatgeli mgo, metetlagete wa mgiya, “tgo miweya, Yesu, ame tgo mi wlafe? Mgahihele, gu yafgimole, mgifa wele yamehe mafgate mleya.”

  1. Tgo Tisaipele mi meteya sete hgole, meteya metele fli tlefli hatgitgiya.
  2. Yesu, ame tgo mi wlafe?

➋ Lasaluseweya ga hale’iya. #

Yesuweya tgo eitole stumo miwlaya.

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Sole 11:6

6 Weya mgote la mati mgole, Lasalusego siyasi fawite mati mgole, weya mgole so tali mofogifa mala tlagete maleseya maliya.

  1. Yesuweya so tali mofogifa mala tlagete maleseya maliya.
  2. Yesuweya lelagi tago. Wele poroman Lasaluseweya siyasi to.

 Buke Sole 11:7-8

7 So mofogiyawage mofogi maleseya male, mgole Yesuweya wele hetetai tgomitgote wa mgiya, "Giti si Sutamote mgo pai la wiya!"8 Mgole, hetetai tgo miya mgole, Yesuwele ya mehe la mati mgiya, “Wapai! Ameile tlago afastu Asapomote mgo afastu ai ta la wileigo fe? Tgo miyayo, wego atatlalami la mliliya. So lafi sahete mgimigo hata.”

  1. Tgo Felasi Yesuwego fumote mlele fa’eli atatlamigo. Mi’a Yesuweya towete tgo mi metego mlama tili taili kailifi mi wa he’amolamigo.

 Buke Sole 11:17

17 Metefa meile, tatwate asapo Petali mole tatwa malama mei mliya. Meta mei gwa meile, meta matiya, “Lasaluseweya sete hale’iya. souwa safogi safogi hge’ulafela mgo mliya.”

  1. Yesuwele amaluwe Lasaluseweya sete hale’iya. Weya souwa safogi safogi hge’ulafela mgo mliya.
  2. Yesuweya towete tgo mlama metego mgo wa he’amolamigo. Weya EWFMWele promis poto miwlaya.

➌ Mataseya mgo hatge mleya, Yesuweya Yawewele oto Potomi wlaya. #

 Buke Sole 11:20-22

20 Meteya meta mli alo, mli alo, Mataseya matiya, Yesuweya ga mgaliya! Mataseya mgote mati mgole, sele ta’i sgo Maliyasego ga la wapatgeya. Yesugo hgo 'a lelami. 21 Seya mgole meile, hgo ma’eya, Yesuweya giya. Metaga Yesugo hgo ma’ele, seya mgi ma’eya, “Ayayo, Ale taweweyayo, mele lela tlage lili lagite fe hale’i lagigo hata. Meta wiyemete hale wiyemete lililagi miwe laya. 22 Flageyayo, Aya flage so leheya mgo hatgeliya, mele Yawegote mgi ati lateyayo, meta Yaweweya mele yahe ati lelaigo.”

  1. Lasalusewele tawese Mataseya mgo hatgeya, EWFMWeya Yesuwego wele kailifi sete mlowa.
  2. Yesuweya ame hatge tili taili mi wa lelami late, Yaweweya wego halpilaigo.

 Buke Sole 11:23-24

23 Oke, Yesuweya mgole Matasele yamehe mgi matiya, “He lelagi tago fe? Hele taweweya afastu la tisete gitla miwe laya.” 24 Seya mgole la mati mgiya, “Yao! Aya lelagi. Tgomigo ga hale’i lateyayo, towete tgo tguto la hale’i li tapoto wiyemete la tisete gitla miwe laya. Wefa hetwahete meta tisete gitla miwe laya.”

  1. Teimate Yaweweya silole towete tgo tguto mile ei mi afastu la mlele la gitlaigo. Satewe meteya fe ga hale’i namba 2 mgo mo hgolaigo. Satewe meteya Yawewele si agiagi mo mgo hgolaigo.
  2. Towete tgo hagiwe mete Yawewele wage hgula lililate, meteya wele si agi agi molama yahi to.
  3. Yesuweya sego mgo mgiya, miya tetgo tago. Teime Teime Yesuweya silole towete tgo mi metele Ei mi afastu la tifilaigo. Mi’a weya sego wa he’amolamigo. Flage tlagete Gitile ei mi fe itogi mo wiyemete hgolamigo.
  4. Mgole Yesuweya mliliya.

 Buke Sole 11:25-27

25 Yesuweya mgole sele yahe mati mgiya, “Hagiwele ta wa tisete gitlaigo fe? A tlage tago. Ayayo, kailifi fawi to. Atlagete wiyemete silole towete tgo hale’i fei sigili mi wiyemete wa ti toulei alaya. 26 Tgo ale yahe afgate le lila, ale tle laumate lilila, miweyayo, tgo mgogi migo hale’i lateya, weya wiyemete la tisete gitla miwe laya. Tgomiweya weliyeite lila miwe laya. tgo sagiwe hale’ile, we ale hge tle’wate lili lateya, mete weya hale’i 'wasiya ila miwe laya. Mata! Ale yameheya tetgo tago fe?” 27 Seya mgole la mati mgiya, “Wapai! Mele yaheya wiyeme tago. Meyayo, tgo hapli miwe, Yawewele mgi he’amotimigo. Meya wiyemete tile hoi fawimo silolama mlili hoifawi mo wiyemete wa itogi wiyo’oi lilei me laya. Meyayo, Yawewele poto tetgo wlaya.” Matasele Yesuwele yamehe mati mgi yahe mehe ta.

  1. Yesuweya sego wa mgiya, Tgo sagiwe ga hale’i late, mgole sagiweya fe hale’i limo namba 1 mo hgolate, metaga weya fe hale’ilimo namba 2mo heli ila.
  2. Mi’a sagiweya Yawewele wage hgula fe lilila.
  3. Tgo sagiweya Yesuwele ya tetgohe fe hatge lela, la wele hge tle laume fe gwe ila.
  4. Wele fli tlefli fe aflaiyala. Wefa Felasi metele femo afla tauta’ula, weya wele fe silemo mgo lelagitoula, weya siyasi tapoto. Mgole weya tgo Dokta miwele ya tetgohe fe hatge lela, mgole wele hge tle laume fe gweila.

➍ Yesuweya Lasalusewele eito afastu la mlele, afastute la gituwa. #

 PIKSA 000

 Buke Sole 11:39

39 Yesuweya metego wa mgiya, “Fu fawimo wapatiya”. Mi’a tgo wlepu miwele taweseya mgo mgiya, “Wapai, flage wele afalgehe ga sgiya, afamo luwalu tetgo lililaigo. Mgole we so mofogi mofogi sete hale’iya.”

  1. Metele hge’ulafe mgo mliya:
  2. Tgo wlepumiweya souwa safogi safogi hge’ulafela mgo mliya. Meteya Yesuwego mgo mgiya, wapa fumo fe lausila.

 Buke Sole 11:43-44

43 Yesuweya Yawego wa mgi tepa’esi mate, weya fawite mgiya, “Lasaluse lgo ga.” 44 Tgo wlepu gwa gale, mgole wele yapulgehe mlili mita. Wele yalefegi la wele hgefegi wa fomate, Yesuweya metego mgo mgiya, “wele yapu lgehe wapatiya.”

  1. Yesuweya Lasalusewele eito afastu la mlele la gituwa.
  2. Yesuwetlagete wiyemete fe mgolimo wa lelaigo. Mgole weya Yawe wlaya.
  3. Ya tetgohe buk Baibele molama mliliya. Gitile silole tgo luwalumi meteya mliliya. Meteya ya tetgohe sete matile, meteya himgi maflaiyaliya. Gitiya metele ya’wasiyahe afla ma’itla.
  • Tgo Felasi meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.

 Drama #

 Lesen 42 Kwesten #

1q. Husat i lukautim ol disaipel taim ol i stap long bot na bikpela win i kirap?
1a. Yawe yet na Yesu tu i lukautim ol.

2q. Bilong wanem Yesu i ken bosim win na bikplea wara?
2a. Long wanem, Yesu yet em i Yawe na em i bin wokim ol dispela samting.

3q. Taim Yesu i no kamap long ples bilong Lasarus yet, ating em i save olsem, Lasarus i dai pinis, o nogat?
3a. Yes. Yesu yet em i Yawe na em i save long olgeta samting.

4q. Husat bai i kirap bek na sanap long kot bilong Yawe?
4a. Olgeta manmeri bai i kirap bek na sanap long kot.

5q. Yesu i tok olsem, “Olgeta man i bilip long mi, bai ol i no i dai.” wanem mining bilong en?
5a. Dispela tok i gat Mining i olsem, spirit bilong ol bilipman i no inap stap longwe long Yawe long ples paia oltaim oltaim.

6q. Bilong wanem Yesu i laik kirapim bek Lasarus?
6a. Long wanem, em i laik ol manmeri i ken save olsem em yet i Pikinini bilong Yawe na em i gat olgeta strong bilong givim laip long man.

7q. Bilong wanem ol pris na Farisi i no amamas long dispela mirakel?
7a. Ol i no laik Yesu i kisim biknem na kamap king na bai ol Rom i kam na rausim namba bilong ol lida bilong lotu.

8q. Husat i bosim tingting bilong ol Farisi na ol dispela lida bilong lotu?
8a. Satan i bosim tingting bilong ol Farisi na lida bilong lotu.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 41 - Tgo wisi fawi miwe, Lasulesewe Mgi.html
children.name: Lesele 41 - Tgo wisi fawi miwe, Lasulesewe Mgi.html
children.contents:
Lesele 41
Tgo wisi fawi miwe, Lasulesewe Mgi #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Lazarus & Rich Man Skit
  • Piksa?
  • Mak 10:17-18, 20b-23
  • Luk 12:15
  • Luk 12:21
  • Luk 16:19-31

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Silole Tilitaili Mi Fli
  • Silole tilitaili miyayo, mego la wiyo’waleigo hata
  • Lasalusewele Yahe

 Lesele 41 Kwesten #

Lesele 41 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Mehe #

Aya ya sahe yailamigo. Ya meheya mgo, tgo mani na kago mi wa hipi mei mle halili metewe. Tgo mani na kago mepi wa hipi mei mle halili metewe, oke, metele hale’ila somofowayo, weyayo, wele tilitaili mi tapoto ta lileigo fe? O, we wele tilitaili mi, wele ho wele tilitaili mi mle halili mesapole mala tlago wapatgeyale, mifa mala tlage lafgo lafgoula ileigo. Wele tilitaili mi, wele fe la wila mo, tilitaili mi la ai la wa hetetai, ai la wa wiyo’oiti hata. Ahowa. Tilitaili mite wele wa mle halili tilitaili mepile, wego la leleigo.

➊ Silole Tilitaili Mi Fli #

'Ousalei 'le’la pa’la, na yapu yahete mgo wa youli mehe, ‘mani na kago’. Oke, gitile pefiyahe mgo, tgo tilitaili seigite tgo magise magiwe. Tilitaili seigi mle halili mise miwe, wele tilitaili mifayo, wego la hale’ilila so mofotefayo, wele tilitaili mi tapoto la lileigo hata. Tilitaili mifa silolama wapa’lutgeleigo. Tilitaili mifa wele ho tilitaili mi la wa mle halili mesapo, na masi tu wele tilitaili mi la wa mle feili tu mehela tlage, mifa mala tlage sete alole, sete fafatile, wego hale’ila somofotefa, we tilitaili mi tapoto ai la lili hata. Wefa tilitaili mifa mala tlagete wapa’lou lafo lafgoutiyale, wefa ga ila miwe laya.

Wele tilitaili mifa leleya’ite malama tlage hla ileigo. Ya flage ya mehe la yailami la mliya. Mehele yahe mehe ta.

Hatge pkata! Yawewele yameheya mgo, wefa 'owe wisi to piyo! We usalei to piyo! Wele ame tilitaili miyo, wele flifage tlage hatgela mifayo, wefa flage tlage ga hgo leleigo. Tilitaili wele flifagela hatge miya flage sete gaga gwa giya. We flage moto hlau he hatgela, “O! Aya moto hlau 'e’e tago! Aya moto sahe lelamigo!” Metaga flage ga hgoleigo! Moto meheya sete hgowa. Wele yalefela sete ga hla i. Weya mgo mlili miwe laya. Yawewele fe itogi fe swou mo, weya mgo mlili miwe laya. Wefa ame usalei tilitaili mi, mite la mlele, we mite la fgeili piyo! Wefa mite la mleli piyo! Mite la mageteli piyo! Ahowa! Wefa wele tilitaili 'le’la pa’lai, wele ame sami la souteila, somehefa wefa flifagela tlage hatgela mi ta, “O, Aya tilitaili miya 'e’e tago!” Meta fo flagetlage wele la hatgela fli mefage, wefa mala tlage hgo leleigo. “O! Tilitaili miya sete gaga li.” Yawewele femo mgo mlili mo go. Wele tilitaili hgo mleli fe mowayo, weya mgote mlili miwe laya. Wefa tgo gitile mage, ame same sagi, ame wisi, ame usalei, ame tilitaili ogo sage mi, ai 'ala sete api fafati hata. Ahowa. Olsem na tingim gut! Yawe i gat planti tingting lo said blo mani na kago, a? Nogat olgeta!

Silole tgo tetgo, gitile fli, usaleile hewi, tilitaili fgeili, mi mlili giti. Ale flage wisi usalei fawi sagi mageto mate, ale mgogi usalei mli mle mate, 500 kina make mgo mleya, o, 200 o 300 kina, o, 1000 kina, ale mgogi miwele mate mgo hatgeya, "Ai! Falowaite mi ta! Ale tilitaili, ale hgo mile makemowayo, 500kina mgo go. Metafa afa, flifagefa mefage tlage hatgelami mi aye ta. Afa wisi 'usalei ale mle mifa tgutete ale tilitaili hatge ewite meili, ale ga lelami hatge ewite mi tlagete leile, afa mi tlage fgeilei a laya. Sklim tats fone, metafa 500 kina mifa tilitaili mi tlagete leile, stua hosapola malafa tilitaili mi tlagete fgeileigo. Silole towete tgo gitile mlili femowa mo ta. Gitiya mgote mliliya. Yawewele femofa mgote la mlili sagiwe mlili go hata.

Mele usalei fawi mle mgo mle mate, 10000 kina, 15000, memfa miya flifagefa mefa hosapola tlage sta 'e’eile, mefa mele wisiwi tlagete fgei alolei me laya. Sosafo sosafofe mefa mi tlagete sta, me ame hewimo la le hata, mefa miya mi tlagete flifagefa, mele wisi fawi mi tlage hatge yelemale lile, mefa mepi tlage fgei alolei me laya. Heti tali, mele la lilila, mifa mefayo, usalei mi tlagete hatge yelemalei swou lile, mi tlage fgeiya swou lilei me laya.

1.1 Towete tgo tguto mi silole tili taili kago mitlagete hatge late, metefa teime fawite la fga fgolaigo. #

  • Towete tgo segi mi silole tili taili kago mitlagete hatgeya.
  • Yesuweya ya Tgo wisi miwele yafolowa mehe wa mgiya.
  • Tgo wisi miweya mgo hatgeya, “Aya ale eitote wiyemete loiloiyaligo”, mi’a opiyai EWFMWele towete tgo tguto mile eitote loiloiyaligo.
  • EWFMWetlagete gitigo gitile so hale’ifisgi mehe make mliya.
  • EWFMWeya tgo wisi fawi miwego mgo mgiya, tgo ga wliwliya wlaya.
  • EWFMWele ya tetgo meheya tili taili migo aumate mliliya, silole tili taili mi, la towete tgo mile hatge EWFMWele ya tetgo he tle laume mliliya.

1.2 Tgo Wisi Seigi To Miwe Yesuwego Yaiya Meligo #

 Mak 10:17-23

17 Yesuwe otou mi mapefei tepa’esile, weya asapo hapoto sago i laigo. Yesuweya femo meili mate, Tgo wisi seigi to miweya Yesuwego himgi mgale, weya hgepa’imogi simola heta’uti setowa. Heta’uti setale, weya Yesuwego mgi matiya, “Tisa, meya tgo itogi miwlaya. Aya weliyeite lili lateya, Eiwapaifawimiwele asapomo aya ame hatge ta le laigo fe?” 18 Yesuwe wele yamehe matile, wetgote wa mgiya, “Me ago mgo wa mgiya, ‘Aya tgo itogi miwlaya.’ Meya ame hatgeile tlago ta mgi migo fe? Silole tgo itogi sagi li hata. Opiyai. Eiwapaifawimiwetlagete itogi tago.”

20b"Tisa, aya otote mlili mate, hau flage soleheya aya Mosesewele lo mi mafgate mleliya." 21 Wele yahe tepa’esile, Yesuwe wego hgole, Yesuwe tgo wisi seigi tomiwego fli fage wa gwa meiliya. La Yesuwe wego wa mgiya, “Me tilitaili sagi 'e’ete lila late. Me mele hosapo i laigo. Mele tilitaili mi fgei laigo, mele tilitaili mi fgeile, tgou wisi totamiya apile, mele wisi mi metego lo laigo. La meya tilitaili mi mlole, teimate meya Eiwapaifawimiwele asapomola lili late, Eiwapaifawimiwe mego tilitaili itogi mi lo laigo. Me mele wisi mi tgo wisi totami lole, meya ago ga afgate le.” 22 Tgo wisi seigi tomiwe Yesuwele yahe matile, wele titosotile ewitei mlile, la weya ei tosei mliya. Mgole weya wele wisi tilitaili seigi mi, weya hatgitgi mliya. Weya hatgele, weya Yesuwe wapatgeya.

23 Tgo wisi seigi tomiwe wapatgeyale, Yesuwe wele tisaipole mi ta’e ta’ete hgole, Yesuweya tisaipole metego wa mgiya, “Tgo tilitaili seigito miwe Eiwapaifawimiwe wego hago ta loiloiya laigo fe? Hago li hata , weya mgo aila li hata.” 24 Yesuwele yahe tepa’esile, wele tisaipole mete eitoteiya. Meteya eitoteile, Yesuwe metego la wa mgiya, “Ale otou mi, Eiwapaifawimiwe tgo tilitaili seigito miwe ga hatge fafatiya.”

Tgo tetgo mgo mlili mise miwe, mefa miyayo, Yawewele ya mefa ga hatge fli ati tetgoulei me laya. Mefa Yawewele ya ame hatge fli atile, mefa mele wisi, usalei fawi mi tlagete hatge le lile, mefa mi tlagete hatge yelemalei swou lile, mefa Yawewele ya mehefa meya ga hatge fli 'ati wapatilei me laya. Me meheya ai la hatge pkate le hata. Ahowa. Mefa mehefa hatge fli atile, mefa 'ete flifagefa miya mele wisi fawi litlage fgeiya lila fli mefage tlage hatge yelemalei swou lilei me laya. “Ai! Aya usalei 'e’e sagiya mli go hata! Mli 'a la wa apilei go hata! Ayefa usalei fawi 'ete heglahatalou 'le’la pa’la tilitaili itogi itogi lguse mgo hgo mago hgo mepi, fgei apete gite toutelilei a laya.” Mgo lilila me, mgo lilila he, hefayo, Yawewele yamehefayo, afla ga hatge fli atila. Yawewele ya meheya ai la hatge pkatele hata. Fli tle fli, hele mefagela, ai la hatge lote 'wati tetgou hata. Mefa hefa afla fli atitila. Hefa ale tilitaili seigi 'le’la pa’la hele mleli mepi, mele usalei fawi mle magete stali, mepile fli mefage tlagete, mefa mefage tlagete hatge fawi lilei me laya.

➋ Silole tilitaili miyayo, mego la wiyo’waleigo hata #

 Luk 12:15

15 Yesuweya ya sahe wa ya meiliya. Tgoutgote wa ya meiliya, “Waiyai! Gi liplou afla lila! Gitile kailifi lifeyo, gitile tilitaili itogi itogi la wa halili mepi fa gitile kailifi life mgote mgali go hata.”

Indai, fe hale’ili miyayo, hago li hata. Gitile mgogi fe mgo lili late, meta, gitifa mlagete tgo fli fli 'ati tetgo, wele ya mehe ati tota, Yawewele ya mehe ati tota, metele femole mage mgo lilileigo. Mefa haigite mefa mele tilitaili 'le’la pa’la lepi tlagete leleite sta touteli late fli mefagefayo, tilitaili mi la tlagete hatge tetgo lilei me laya. Me sosafo sosafo, mefeyo, Yawewele ya ai la hatge pkate le hata. Opiyae! Mefa mehefa sete hatge fli ati pkatale, mefa mele tilitaili lgu seite itogi itogi, mleli lepi tlagete hatge lote, hatge wiyeme tetgo lilei me laya. Meta mefa meheyayo, ga hatge fli ati tilei me laya. Yawewele ya itogi gitile matili mehe ta.

So Yesuwele so silolama somofoteyayo, wefa mgogi mgote hgowa, fe mgogi mote. Wefa fe mgogi mote hgole, we ewite fawi mli. We mgogi fli ewite mi mgiya, “Ai! Aya tgo miweyayo, usalei walewale tilitaili 'le’la pa’la lepi wa mle hali gi, towete tgo, silole towete tgo liyayo, mete fe hago ta hwalilei la fe?” Wefa mgogi mote hgole, hgo soute meile, wefa ga hatge ewite tetgouwa. “E! Metego hago ta lilei a la fe? Metele fe la mli? Mete afla wefa taita’u metego la hwale hatge ewite meile, wefa mgole fe mowa mgole hatge ewite meitiya.”

Metefa tilitaili 'le’la pa’la usalei 'le’la pa’la tilitaili mi hgo soute meile, metefa mgole, metele fli tle fli Yawego hatgeli mefagefayo, sete hatge fli 'ati meiliya. Hatge fli 'atimi wapatiya. Towete tgo tilitaili to hata, usalei to hata, tilitaili seigi sapi wa mle halili hata, metele ho, na metele mageteli, metele 'ete toutili, lafgo lafgou meili, Yaweweyayo, em i no lust tingting lo ol, nogat! Em amamas! Kain ol lain olsem, ol i save pinis olsem, “Ai! Mipla trangu lain! Mipla hangamap lo Yawe tasol!” Yawe em amamas lo sikpen lo ol, a? Nogat… tasol sapos ol i hangamap long em tasol, ol bai ino inap lukim namba 2 indai. Em tasol! Ol lain blo lus tingting lo Yawe gen, sori tru. Ol hangamap lo ol samting blo graun.

Yawewele lgu mlagifayo, we i-no tilitaili to migo tgo usalei seigi to, na tgo tilitaili seigi tota, we taita’u mete tapoto we tapoto la mlili migo hata. Opiyae. Wefa miyayo, we ameite tapoto mliliya. Wefa tgutete, towete tgo mifa, tgutete wele flifagela tlage mli lgei. Miya wele soute meili hapli meheya mehe ta. Weya hgo soute meili meheya mgo, tgo tilitaili to miweyayo, na tgo tilitaili tota miwe. Mise miwegofayo, wefa hatge mleliya. Wefa tgomise tgomigo hatge mleliya. Atle mete ago la gi hata. Miya welel soute la mlili meheya mgo hgo soute meiliya. Me tilitaili fawi, me usalei fawi li, meyayo, mi tapoto mego hale’ila somofoteyayo, me mi tapoto ta lelei me la fe? Silola ta wapatgelei me la fe? Miya we mgogi mehe hatge ewite meiliya. Yawewefa giti tgutete hatgeliya.

Tgo usalei 'le’la pa’la miya mite hatge pkate loteliya, mgo, "Waiyai! mele tilitaili fawi, na mele tilitaili seigi 'le’la pa’la lite hatge pkate le! Me tilitaili mite hatge pkate lele, mifa taita’u Yawewetle hgo soute meiliya, mloli tilitaili go. Usalei fa hetwahe. Mifayo, wetle metgote mele flifage la hatge mle, mele hewi fawimo la mle, mile hapou miya mi ta. Wetle tilitaili mite la hi la magete mloli. Na miya wele tilitaili mi mgo la magete mloli somofofa hetwahe. Me wego afla hatge fli atila.

Oke, me wego afla lafgouwa. Tilitaili tguto miyayo, wetle magete mloligo. Miya metle hetle, me wego hatge fli 'atilayo, mele wego lefgeitila, somoheyayo, Meheya itogi mli go hata. Meheya fe luwalu mo go. Mifayo, metle mele tilitaili mgogi mi mageteli mateyayo, mefa wele yahe tlage afgate le swou. Wele ta’ete wetgolagete mele tilitaili wetle yalefegite la magete mloli, wele mego usalei la mloli, miya metle wego afla hatge fli 'atila. Mefayo, wetgolagete afgate le swoule, yahe tlage atile pkatale, afgate le swou. Meta wiyemete, me hale, so kailifi, so lafi he go. Lilei me laya.

 Luk 12:21

21 Oke, Yesuweya mgole metetgote la wa mgiya, “Fe tgo tilitaili seigi seigi ‘le’la pa’lai to miwele femowa mo ta. Eiwapaifawimiwele lgumlagi fe mgo hgolimigo hata, mgo, weya tilitaili seigi seigi ‘le’la pa’lai to miwe laya. Opiyae!”

Gitiyo, tgo tilitaili to, tgo usalei to. Mehele mehefa mgo, mite hatge pkate le! Meheya miya weya mgogi mehe hatge mgiliya. Mele tilitaili li, na wisi fawi, usalei fawi li. Mi mele lgu mga alole, mego hatge fli atila so mele tilitaili mile mego afaowila somehe, na mele hlege hlege, afa siyasi, hale’i mi gaga lela somofo. Meyo, mele tilitaili mifa lafgo lafgouleigo. Mele usalei tilitaili, mele tilitaili seigi 'le’la pa’la wa halili lepifa, Yawewe ga hatgeleigo hata. Mehele tlagote hatge pkate le swou. Yawewele mehe ga hatge fli atiti late, meta mego hago ta lilei me la fe? Mehe tlagete hatge pkate le. Mele tilitaili tguto mi mile tlago mefa Yawewele fe wiyeme itogi mo tlagete afgate le swou li.

Mele tilitaili sagi hatge, tilitaili fafati somehe. Meyo, me wetgote ta mgi ati lilei me la fe? Wetgote beitene lile, me wego ta mgi atileigo fe? Mele tilitaili 'e’ete tetgote, mele wetgote mgi ati seigi li lateya, meta meheya wiyeme. Na tgo usalei fawi to, na tilitaili seigi to wefayo, mgogi fli mefage tou go hata. Mgo, “Ai! Aya piyate tilitaili tota sagiya meili go hata. Afa tilitaili 'la’la pa’layo, usalei 'le’le pa’lale liteyo, fgei apete gite li alolei a laya.” Ai! Tgo mgogi miweyayo, weya sete hatge fli 'ati meitiya, Yawewele ya itogi mehe.

➌ Lasalusewele Yahe #

Lasalusewe, na tgo usalei to miwe. Mgile ya sahe hgoyailamigo.

 Luk 16:19-31

19 Tgo ousalei to miweyayo, weya ame yapulgei tilitaili itogi itogi mepi, fgei toute, heglahatalou itogi mi tlage mali miwe laya. Tgo ousalei fawi to tgo miwe ta. Sosafoteya tgomiweya la setale, weya wele heglahatalou mepi sete ma mli gu meiliya. Sete ma yelemalei meiliya, mgo, 'Aya heglahatalou fawi lepi to aya mgole, aya ga sete maliya.'20-21 Weya mi sete ma yelemalei meili mate, tgo ousalei fafati miweya mgole palisehele yoflomola Howale hali staliya. Lasaluseweyayo palisehele yoflomola hali sta hgoliya. Heglahatalou to’usi mle ma mlele fa’eli, miya alami staliya.
