Lasaluseweyayo, wele lgefe lafa wapu seigi setale, wapu mile lge gu lemasi mi howale he 'a’a hla meili miyayo, iteite mgale, itei ga la magle, gaga howale hi lwi ma, mliliya. Wele lge wapumola.

22 Mgote howale mli ma mgole, tgo ousalei fafati miwegowa ga hale’iya. Wegowa hale’i meile, Eiwapaifawimiwele yapu ei hewi mleli ei mifa mgale, Lasalusewele eimoto mle hgetale, wele auwato Eplahamegote mgo litatiya iya. Oke, Somofotefa, taita’u ousalei seigi to tgomiwefa ga hale’iya. Wegofa, tgo ousalei to miwefa somofotefa taita’u wegofa hale’i meile, tgoule hge’ulafe hagele, hage lotowa. Wefa mlate hale’i i lapatouwa.23 Somofoteya tgomigofa la hale’ile, wele eitofa taita’u la meile, tgo hale’i miwele aspomolama mei la mliliya. Malama mei la mlili mate, wele ei motofa hlege fawi tetgo mi mleya. Weya malama mei la mlile, heli fawite tlitile, meta hgo ma’eya. Eplahamewefa mliliya. Eplahamewefa ga la hi la hgowa, Lasalusewele eitofa Eplahamewe tapoto mliliya.24 Tgomiwefa mgole Lasalusewe Eplahamewele ta’ete mlili mate la hgo mgole, wefa taita’u Eplahamego wa you mleya. Weya mgo, Weya mgo, ‘Au! Me ago fe hgo ewiteila! Lasalusego wa mgi he’amoti! Lasalusego wa mgile, ago yalefe gufowa hale lotgote lele, ago gu ski mletete sagi talohela fe la aume hakote tgela, ale stlalo ‘a mleteteilami. Me ale hlege lite hatgele, me Lasalusegote mgogi mehete wa mgile, aya wa le hlege fawi lilatila mlelile tlago, Lasalusegote wa mgi.’

25 Ousalei to tgo miwe Eplahamegote mgogi mehe wa mgi matile, Ahowa! Eplahameweya mgole ga la mati mgiya, 'Tai! Hatge pkata! Meyayo, mele pagu simola mli alo mateya, me tilitaili itogi itogi seigi to. Lasaluseweya, Opiyae. Wele pagu simola mli alo mateya, mgo toute lafgou meilgeigo. Flageyayo, Lasaluseweya flage ta’elehete mlilile, wiyeme tetgote mliliya. Meyayo, hlege fawi mleya.26 Me hgo! (Silowayo, Eiwapaifawimiweya tomate gu lelawa fawi mo latawa, Mele ta’e mehefayo, tile ta’e lehete mgo ga ila fafatilami, o, Tifayo, mele ta’e giteli meheyo, titgote lgo ga ila fafatilami. Hago li hata.) Hago li hata."

27 Tgo ousalei to miweya Eplahamego wa mgiya, “Tai! Aya mego mgi ati! Me Lasalusego ale tguwele hosapote mgi he’amoti!28 Ale hoito meteweya titamefe to. Metewa mala mliliya. Me Lasaluse mgote ile, ale hoito metetgote fe wa yaila, ‘Waiyai!’ Lasaluseweya mgote la wa yaile, meteya lela ai la gaga gwa gala, hlegei fawi ai la li hata."

29 Ousalei to tgo miwele mehe la mgile, Ahowa. Eplahameweya la wa mgiya, 'Mosesewele lomole ya, Plofete mile heglafi ya, metele pagu hotei ta’ehela hasi mehe metele heglafi miyayo, miya mele hoiwe metefa fe atila.'30 Ousalei to tgo miweya mgo, ‘Ehe. Tai! Tgo la hale’ile la tisete gitla miwele ya mehe tlage la wa ati le afgate le swoulei mete laya. Metefayo, tgo sagi la hale’ile, wele ya mehegayo, meteya hgo lelagi toule, mete ati pkatlei laya. Mgoli lategayo, wiyemete flitle metele mi la aflaiyale, meta yamehe tlagete ati afgate le swoulei laya. Tgo la hale’ile la tisete gitla miwele ya mehe tlage la wa ati le afgate le swoulei laya.’

31 Mgole Eplahameweya ousalei fawi to tgo miwele yahe la mati mgiya, ‘Me ati! Mele hoito meteyayo, Mosesewele lomole ya, Plofete mile heglafi ya, metele pagu hotei ta’ehela hasi mehe metele heglafi ya miyayo, mele hoi mi metegote mgote ati afgate le tota lagiteyayo, meta mete Lasalusewele yamehe tlage la wa ati le afgate le swou lagigo hata. Tgo la hale’ile la tisete gitla miwele ya mehe tlage la wa ati le afgate le swou lagigo hata.’" Ya Yesuwele Falisi lotu mlili tgo metego ya meili ya meheya mehe ta.

Mgile ya meheya mgo, Tgo usalei to miwe, so Lasalusewele howale sete mlepi ma toute lafgou mei lgei, usalei to tgoliwe, tilitaili ma mle fa’eli, rais to’usi tu tu na tin pis 'asla, pipiya itemole fgeitila, wele Lasalusewele howale sete mlepi ma toute mli lgeiya mi ta. Mgote mli gu mga alo, mli gu mga alo, na so usalei to liwego hale’ile so mofo. Usalei to liwego hale’i somofo, wele eito asapo itogi Yawewele la mlili asapo itogi mgo ta i fe? Ahowa! Weya fe luwalu mo iya. Na Lasalusego hale’i late, Lasalusewe fe itogi mo meile, wefa asapo itogi molama mei mleigo.

Teimateyayo, tgo wisi fawi miweya la Lasuleseweya mgigo sete hale’ifisgiya. Tgo wisi fawi miwe wefa tili taili segi mi to, mi’a Lasuleseweya tgo wlepu miwlaya, tili taili segi mi to hata.

Tgo wisi fawi miwego ga hale’i mate, wefa tili taili sagi mi haplite 'i’a mle hata. Lasulesewego ga hale’i mate, wefa asapo tgou EWFMWele ya tetgo he hatge mleli molama ga iya. Wefa EWFMWele tle laume mliliya.

Tgo wisi fawi miweya Lasulesewego wa mgi matiya, “Me falowaite ta loiloiyalilaigo fe?”

Yesuwefa tgo wisi fawi miwe wefa lelagi tago. Tgo wisi fawi miweya ga hale’i mate, wefa asapo hatewego hale’ifisgi mlili mo ga iya. Wefa hlege fawi tleliteiya.

Towete tgo mi hale’i fisgi mate, metele ei miya silole ai toutliligo hata. Opiyai! EWFMWele ya tetgohe mgo mgiya, meteya asapo towete tgou hale’ifisgili mo ilaigo.

Tgo wisi fawi miwele ya mgi ati mehe, Eplahameweya wego la wa mgiya. Tgo wisi fawi miwe EWFMWele ya tetgo he hali siya, mgole wefa hglei fawite tlileteiya. Lasuleseweya EWFMWele ya tetgo he hatge mlele, mgole EWFMWeya wego afastu mleya. Sgo fawi mo ta’ehegiya tomate mliliya. Towete tgo sagiya asapo towete tgou hale’ifisgili mo ai wapatgela. EWFMWeya asapo sapo towete tgou hale’ifisgili mo tgowapai miwlaya.

Tgo wisifawi miweya wele tgistgo mete ewitei mliya. Tgo wisi fawi miwe wefa hlege fawi tleliteile, mgole weya wele tistgo metego ewiteiya. Soleheya tgo wisi fawi miweya wisi mi la tili taili kago hatgeigo hata.

Tgo usalei to miweyayo, Eplamegote wa mgiya, "Tai! Me ile, Lasalusegote mehete i wa mgi, Ale Lasalueweya fe ile, ale hoitgeya mi fe wa mgila. Giyo, fe ale gi lo ga afgate lelami. Gi ale fegi lo, gile ga afgate le lateyayo, meta giya ale mage mgo lileigo. Giyayo, fe Lasalusewe giteli mote hgole, mgo tlagete afgate le. Meheya miya Yawewele yalehe mgiya. Wele la mgi mehe.

Teimateyayo, tgo wisi fawi miwele ya mgi ati mehe, Eplahameweya wego la wa mgiya. EWFMWeya "Lasulesewego wiyemete afastu ta ilaigo fe?"Eplahameweya tgo wisi fawi miwego wa mgiya, “Mele tgi stgo meteya metefa tgo plofete mile ya tetgo he fe atila. Meteya EWFMWele ya tetgo mehe metele tehimo mi aflaiyalateya, mgole meteya hlege fawimi lelaigo. Eplahame mgole mati mgiya, “Metefayo, Baibel sete magefei hetwahe iya. Metefa Baibele mite fe hgole, fe hgo yai lile, fe afgate le swoula. Na metele mo tehifete le fgeitiyale, mete tehifete lata lila, metele mgole yamehe ga afgate le totate, metefa metayo, mgogi femote mgote ilei mete laya.”

Mlagete lgomateyayo, gitile silole towete tgo gitile la mageteli lo. Lgomateya gitile la mageteliya. Gitile la matiliya, la mlili mgo. Gitile la mlili mgo, la wati afgate le, na gitile tilitaili tguto 'le’la pa’la tguto mepi tlage hatge afgate leli late, meta gitifa fe mgogi mote la lilei gitigo. Gitifa fe mgogi mote gaga la gwa galaigo. Mlagete Lasalusewe tgo usalei tilitaili 'le’la pa’lei mgo halili miwe. Mi mgile mli fe mgote la lilei giti laya. Mi mgile le fe la mli mgo miya, gititle la fatile pkatale, lelami la wa he’amowa. Gitile mgo, “A! Aya usalei 'le’la pa’la fawi to ayefayo, afa miya, usalei lepi tlage leitale, mgo ilei a laya.” Ai! Mele tilitaili mepiyayo, mego le hla ila tilitaili pi wa mle haligo. Mele usalei 'la’la pa’la, mele tilitaili 'le’la pa’la, wa mle halili mepiya miyayo, mele mego ai la hla ila mepi ta. Metego wa he’amowa.

 Drama - Lazarus and Mani Man #

 Lesele 41 Kwesten #

1q. Husat i makim taim bilong dai bilong olgeta manmeri? 1a. God yet i makim taim bilong dai bilong yumi olgeta.

2q. Wanem samting i winim pasin bilong bungim planti mani samting?
2a. Pasin bilong harim na bilipim tok bilong God i winim tru pasin bilong bungim mani.

3q. Taim ol i dai pinis, yumi ol man save i go we?
3a. Ol i save pas wantaim ol klen blo ol.

4q. Sapos wanpela man i go long ples paia wantaim klen bilong en, em inap lusim dispela ples na go stap wantaim God, a?
4a. Nogat. Ol bai i stap long ples paia oltaim.

5q. Jisas i askim wanpela maniman olsem, “Bilong wanem yu kolim mi gutpela?” Bilong wanem Jisas i askim em olsem?
5a. Jisas i laik skulim em long mining bilong “gutpela.” Sapos dispela man i laik kolim Jisas “gutpela,” orait em i mas save olsem, Jisas em i God tu, long wanem, God wanpela tasol i gutpela.

6q. Dispela yangpela maniman i ting wanem samting i mekim em i kamap gutpela na stretpela long ai bilong God?
6a. Em i ting sapos em i bihainim ol gutpela pasin na ol lo bilong God em bai i kamap gutpela man long ai bilong God.

7q. Dispela man i no klia long wanpela samting. Em wanem?
7a. Em i no save gut olsem, em i wanpela sinman. Em i ting em yet i gutpela.

8q. Bilong wanem dispela yangpela maniman i bel hevi na lusim Jisas?
8a. Em i no laik senisim bikhet tingting bilong en olsem Jisas i bin tok. Na em i no laik lusim mani bilong en.

9q. Pasin bilong kisim mani, em gutpla pasin, o nogat?
9a. Em orait! Sapos yumi laikim mani moa long God tasol, em rong. Mekim olsem, em nau, mani i kamap god bilong yumi pinis.

10q. Wanem samting i winim tru pasin bilong kisim planti mani samting?
10a. Pasin bilong harim tok bilong God na bilipim em, em i winim pasin bilong kisim planti mani samting.

11q. Dispela maniman i askim Abraham long mekim wanem 2-pela samting?
11a. Em i askim Abraham long salim Lasarus i kam long em bilong givim liklik wara long em. Na tu em i askim Abraham long salim Lasarus i go long ol brata bilong en bilong tokim ol long tanim bel.

12q. Abraham i tokim maniman olsem wanem? Ol brata bilong en i mas mekim wanem?
12a. Abraham i tok, ol brata i mas harim na bilipim ol tok bilong Moses na ol arapela profet i stap long Buk Baibel.

children.name: Lesele 40 -Yesuweya kailifi to. Mgole Islaiyele....html
children.contents:
Lesele 40
Yesuweya kailifi to. Mgole Islaiyele tgo yahito mi meteya wego atalamigo. #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Tgo Felasi mi meteya Yesuwego wai yami fgouwa.
  • Yesuweya Felasi mi metego mgo mgiya, weya tgo wapai fawmi wlaya.
  • Yesuweya tgo yale hale’i to miwego sete hotage meiliya.
  • Tgo Felasi mi meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.

 Lesen 39 Kwesten #

Lesen 39 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Gitiya sete matiya. Yesuweya towete tgo segi mi metele siyasi wiyemte wa hotage meile, mi’ wele hewimole stumo to hata. Weya towete tgo mi metego wele fe hisafi loiloiyali mo wa he’amolamigo. Mgole weya metele siyasi itogite wa mliliya. Wefa metele fe luwalumi wiyemete ga fli atilaigo. Mgole, tgo felasimi meteya eitosei to. Meteya mgo hatgeya, we Yawele sgomola wa he magei lalamigo. Mgole meteya wego hgo stutiya.

➊ Tgo Felasi mi meteya Yesuwego wai yami fgouwa. #

 Buke Mak 1:27-28

27 Ei luwalu moto meile, tgo mla sili meteya hgole, meteya eite hgo iya. Metetlagete la yaiya, “Tgo liweya ame hatge tgou mi wla fe? Wele ya yamelimehe ya agiyagihe go. Weya tgo yahifawimoto miwele yahele mage mgo ya meiliya. Metafa weya ei luwalumi wa mgili mate, ei luwalumi wele yahe tauta’uwa.” 28 Meteya Yesuwele himehe hgole, meteya Galilimole asapo asapo wai ya mi tutiya. Yesuwele yahimo flage tlage fawi tago.

  1. Tgo Felasi mi la tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi Yesuwele yahimo wa luwaluwa.
  2. Yesuweya tgo ei luwalu moto miwego sete hgole, mgole ei luwalu wa lausilamigo.

 Buke Mak 3:22

22 Sofoteya Selusaleme tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi hla mgale, meteya gai ya mi tutiliya. Meteya mgo wai ya meilya, “Ei luwalu fawimotowa Yesuwele tefagele laume malama mliliya. Piyelesepapeweya ei tguto mi litatiya mlili tgo fawimiwlaya. Weya Yesugo kailifi mi mlole, Yesuweya ei luwalu ogoago mi ya mi he’amo sgitiya.” Metele ya mehe mgo ya meiliya.

  1. Tgo Felasi mi meteya yesuwego yami luwaluwa.
  2. Meteya Yesuwego tagu to.
  3. Yesuweya Felasi mi metego 'e’yate meile, mgole weya metele tguwe tolagete iya. Satalewlaya.
  4. Yesuwle tgu we tolagete iya. Yawewlaya.

 Drama #

➋ Yesuweya Felasi mi metego mgo mgiya, weya tgo wapai fawmi wlaya. #

 Buke Mak 2:24

24 Tgo Felasi mi meteya Yesuwego mgo mgiya, “Pai hgo. Meteya so Sapate mofole lo mo hali siya. Meteya fe mgoli mo ame hatgei tlago fe?”

  1. Tgo Felasi meteya Yesuwele tgo Tisaipele mi metego hgole, mgole meteya towete tgo hapoto mi metego mgo migya.
  2. Meteya Yesuwego taguto. Mgole meteya wego fe lafgafgomlelimo wa mapiliya. Meteya so Sapate mofo yai yameiliya.
  3. Meteya mgo hatgeya, Yesuweya so Sapate mofole lo mo hali silate. Mgole meteya Weya wiyemete 'e’yate ilaigo.

 Buke Mak 2:25-27

25 Yesuweya Felasi mi metego afastu la wa mgiya. “King Tefitwewele tili tiali hasili mile, gi sete ta hgo sapgeli fle?” 26 Weya wele amalu mi mete alamu mlilimate, meteya Yawewele haus sele hosapola laume gwe iya. Meteya Yawewele yapu pou mlele, meteya sete awa." 27 Yesuwe metetgote la mgiya, “Yaweweya towete tgo mi metetgote so Sapate mofo sete wa taglei he’amowa. Weya so Sapate mofotgote towete tgo mi ai taglei he’amo hata.”

  1. Yesusweya metego afastu la mgo mgiya. King Tefiteweya paguwa yapu poute wa mleya, EWFMWele haus sele hosapol.
  2. Yaweweya towete tgomi metetgote so Sapate mofo sete make iya. Weya so Sapate mofotgote towete tgo mi ai make i hata igo.
  3. Yaweweya gitgo so Sapate mofo wa mlougo. We fe hisafi loiloiyali miwlaya.

 Buke Mak 2:27

25 Yesuweya la wa mgiya, “So Sapate mofofa tgu miwe to. Aya so Sapate mofole tgu mi alaya.”

  1. Yesuweya mete mgo mgiya, weya so Sapate mofole tgu mi wlaya.

➌ Yesuweya tgo yale hale’i to miwego sete hotage meiliya. #

 Buke Mak 3:1-2

1 Sofoteya Yesuwe Sutale ta’owile hosapo la gwa meile, tgo yale hale’i to miwe mliliya. 2 Felisi tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi ga sili mate, meteya Yesugo si hgo stulile, miya meteya Yesugo wa eiyate lamigo. Metele hatgeli mgo, “Pai hgo. Yesuweya tgo yale hale’ito miwego so fawi mehete ta wa itogi li laigo fe? Meta’a mgo hgo lateya, giti wego wa eiyate laigo.”

  1. Tgo Felasi meteya Yesuwego la fgafgolamigo. Yesuweya metele fe silemo tolagete wa lemetawa, mgole meteya wego taguto.
  2. Meteya fe sago wa hgolamigo, mgole meteya Yesuwego 'e’yate eilamigo.
  3. Meteya Yawewele fe lo itogilemo to, mi’a meteya metele lo segi mi to.

 Buke Mak 3:3-5

3 Yesuwe tgo yale hale’ito miwego wa mgiya, “Me lgo ga.” 4 Meta’a Yesuwe metego wa mgiya, “Gi ame hatge ta hatgeli fe? Gitiya sofawilehe ame hatge ta le laigo fe? Giti fe itogi mo ta le laigo? Fe luwalumo ta le laigo fe? Giti tgo siyasi sagigo itogite ta li laigo fe? O siyasi to miwego wapale, we ta hale’i laigo fe?” Yesuwele mgimatile, miya mete ya sahete hata. Opiyai. 5 Yesuwe metetgote iflifage hatgele, meteya hgo stuwa. Yesuweya iflifageya hatge miya metele tiya kailifite mlile, meteya tgo yalefe hale’ito miwego hgo ewitei hata. Yesuwe weya tgo yalefe hale’i miwetgote wa mgiya, “Mele yalefe lgo ga’a sgi!” We wele yalefe ga’a sgile, wele yalefe itogite la mliya.

  1. Yesusweya tgo hale’i to miwele yalefete afastu hotage meiliya.
  2. Tgo felasi meteya Yesuwele fe kailifimo sete hgole, mi’a meteya metele fli tlefli ai afla flaiyailamigo.
  3. Paguwa Isipemole tgo Kingemiwefa wele fli tlefli maflaflaiyalimigo hata. Mgole weya 10pela hlegei sete hgowa.

➍ Tgo Felasi mi meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo. #

 Buke Mak 3:6

6 Yesuwe wele yalefe itogite mli mateya, flage tlage Felisi tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi ta’owile hosapo himgi wapatgeyale, meteya Helotele metewe mgi ta’owile, metetlagete yai ya meliya, “Gitiya Yesugo hago ta atatlaigo fe?”

  1. Tgo Felasi Meteya la King Helotewele tgo yahito mi meteya ta’wile, meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo.
  2. Meteya Yesuwego atatlamigo. Meteya wego taguto.
  3. Meteya mgo hatgeya, weya Yawewele sgomo hemagei lelamigo.

 Drama #

 Lesen 40 Kwesten #

1q. Yesuwe i bin helpim hau mas man meri long sik bilong ol?
1a. Planti. Em i soim gutpela lukautim pasin long ol.

2q. Planti manmeri i laik bihainim Yesu long lukim sampela mirakol, tasol nau taim yumi bai inap hangamap long mirakol. Bilong wanem?
2a. Yumi igat tok bilong Yawe i stap long buk Baible na tok ples Baibel.

3q. Yesu i bin helpim sampela ol lain long rausim spirit nogut, taim em i wokim dispela ol Farisi tok saspek olsem wanem?

4q. Ol farisi i tok olsem Yesu i behainim powa bilong Satan long rausim spirit nogut, tasol dispela ting ting in krangi olsem wanem?
4a. Satan em bai no inap rausim ol wok man bilong en.

5q. Yesu i bek ol Farisi olsem, sapos ol ino inap bilip long wok bilong Spirit bilong Yawe, no gat wanpela man inap long helpim ol, olsem na bihain taim spirit bilong kain man olsem bai lukim wanem samting?
5a. Spirit bilong kain man bai lukim namba 2 indai.

6q. Yesu i tok oslem De Sabat tu i gat wanem?
6a. Em i tok olsem de Sabat i gat papa tu

7q. Yesu i tok, Papa bilong de Sabat em husait?
7a. Yesu i tok olsem em yet em i papa bilong Sabat

8q. Ol Disaipel bilong Yesu i wok long painim wanem samting long fil?
8a. Ol i hangre na ol i wok long painim pikinini wit bilong wokim bret

9q. Taim ol Disaipel i wok long Painim pikinini wit, wanem kain tingting i kiskim ol Farisi?
9a. Ol i ting ting planti long sait bilong wok long de Sabat.

10q. Taim ol Farisi i askim Yesu long lain bilong em, em i bekim ol long wanem samting bilong pasim maus bilong ol?
10a. Em i bekim ol long Tok bilong Buk Baibel. Stori bilong Devit.

11q. Bihain ol i go insait long haus sel hasu lotu bilong Islaiyel, na Yesu i stretim han bilong wanpela man. Ol Farisi lukim pinis na oli laik mekim wanem long Yesu?
11a. Ol i laik painm rot bilong kilim em.

children.name: Lesele 39 - Yesuwele Hewimo go.html
children.contents:
Lesele 39
Yesuwele Hewimo go #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya Sutale ta’wile hosapola yami matile, tgo ei luwalu moto miwego hotageiya.
  • Yesuweya ya itogihe asapo taule hapoto hapoto mi wa yaiya.
  • Yesuweya tgo hge hale’ito miwego wa hotage meiliya.
  • Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mi metego wa you mleya .

 Lesen 38 Kwesten #

Lesen 38 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Flage sohite gitiya sete matiya. Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mgi sagi mgi metego wa you mleya. Yesuweya Saimolewele sotosle titamesego wa hotage iya. Yesuweya tgo wapulelage sagiwego ewitei mlilile, mgole weya wele afahe itogite wa mliya. Yesuweya Tisaipele hapoto miwego wa youwa. Tgo Felasi mi meteya tgo siyasi metelaya. Mi’a meteya Dokta miwego ai hgolaigo hata. Meteya taguto.

➊ Yesuweya Sutale ta’wile hosapola yami matile, tgo ei luwalu moto miwego hotageiya. #

Yesuwele kailifile Yawewele kailifile mage mgo go.

 Buke Mak 1:21-22

21 Tguto metefa Yesugo mafgate mlele, asaspo Kapeliyamemola gaga gwaiya. Flage so fawi lehete meteya Sutale ta’owile hosapo gwa meile, meteya mei sisile, Yesuweya metego wa ya mi matiliya. 22 Meteya Yesuwele ya mi itogite mati mgole, metele ti sge miya ga pgupguwa. Yesuweya tisa metele mage mgo yai hata. Opiyai. Weya mlagete tgo fawi miwele mage mgo yai ya.

  1. Yesuweya towete tgo mi metego ya tetgohe wa yaiya.
  • Yesuweya mgo mgiya, ya leheya itogi tetgo tago.
  • Wele ya stu mehele mgo mliya. Weya tgo swa’u luwalu mehele tifola hali giteli miwlaya.
  • Weya wele towete tgo mi afastu lelamigo.
  • Silole towete tgo segi mi meteya Satalewele wage hgula wa siliya, mi’a Yesuweya metego afastu lelamigo.
  • Meteya Satalewele kailifi laumate mliliya. Mgole Yesuweya gitigo sete wa he’amowa, Weya Satalewego sete la hila wapatgeya.

 Buke Mak 1:23-28

23 Yesuwele ya mi mgi tepa’esile, tgo ei luwalu moto miwe Sutale ta’owile hosapo gwoiya. Gwoile, weya Yesugo wa youwa, 24 “Yesu! Meya Lasaletemola miwalya. Me titgote ame hatge ta li laigo fe? Meya tigo ta lafgou lami ta gimigo fe? Aya mego lelagi tago. Meya tgo itogi eiwapaifawimiwele hgesiyafafe lemeta halgitu mlaya.” 25 Wele ya mehe matile, Yesuweya ei luwalu moto ya mei lafgole, mgiya, “Me mele ya talohe ya hawite li! Me wego wapale, me gwa ga!” 26 Ei luwalu moto mgo matile, we afahe yaputote halile, ei luwalu motowa yahefawite youle, mgo gwa giya. Ei luwalu motowa wego wapatgeyale, sete iya.

  1. Yesuweya Satalewego sete la hila wapatgeya. Yesuweya Satalewego laumate lililaigo hata.
  • Yesuwele lelagi mo fawite mliliya.
  • Yesuweya tgo miwele fli aumelama wiyemete hgolaigo.
  • Yesuweya ei luwalu sato wiyemete la fgouwa.
  • Yesuweya ei luwalu motole talohete wiyemete wa fowa.

27 Ei luwalu moto meile, tgo mla sili meteya hgole, meteya eite hgo iya. Metetlagete la yaiya, “Tgo liweya ame hatge tgou mi wla fe? Wele ya yamelimehe ya agiyagihe go. Weya tgo yahifawimoto miwele yahele mage mgo ya meiliya. Metafa weya ei luwalumi wa mgili mate, ei luwalumi wele yahe tauta’uwa.” 28 Meteya Yesuwele himehe hgole, meteya Galilimole asapo asapo wai ya mi tutiya. Yesuwele yahimo flage tlage fawi tago.

  1. Sutale ta’owile hosapole towete tgomi meteya sete hgowa.
  • Meteya fe mgoli mo hgole, meteya hatgitgiya.
  • Meteya mgo hatgeya, Yesuweya kailifi to. Weya tafoto to.
  • Towete tgo segi mi wele yahe sete hatge mleya.

 Drama - Tgo ei luwalu moto miwe #

➋ Yesuweya ya itogihe asapo taule hapoto hapoto mi wa yaiya. #

Yesuwele lelagi Yawewele lelagile mage mgo go.

 Buke Mak 1:14-15

Yesuweya asapo Galilimote mgo meile, weya eiwapaifawimiwele ya itogihe malama ya meiliya. Yesuweya ya mgoli mehe wai ya mei gu meiliya. Wele yahe mgo mgiya, 15 “Eiwapaifawimiwele silole tilitaili agetelila, somehe tatwa tago! Gi ati fkata! Giya tgo silole tatwa miwele tle laumate mliligo. Hao flage soleheya giya tlelaume wapale, gi Eiwapaifawimiwele ya itogi mehe ati lelagitule, gi eiwapaifawimiwele tlelaume fe lilila.”

  1. Yesuweya towete tgo mi metego ya tetgohe wa yaiya.
  • Yesuweya mgo mgiya, ya leheya itogi tetgo tago.
  • Wele ya stu mehele mgo mliya. Weya tgo swa’u luwalu mehele tifola hali giteli miwlaya.
  • Weya wele towete tgo mi afastu lelamigo.
  • Silole towete tgo segi mi meteya Satalewele wage hgula wa siliya, mi’a Yesuweya metego afastu lelamigo.
  • Meteya Satalewele kailifi laumate mliliya. Mgole Yesuweya gitigo sete wa he’amowa, Weya SAtalewego sete la hila wapatgeya.

➌ Yesuweya tgo hge hale’ito miwego wa hotage meiliya. #

Yesuweya silole towete tgo mi metele fe luwalu mi wiyemete hatge fli ati wapalaigo

 PIKSA

 Buke Mak 2:3-4

3 Tgo sagimgi, sagi mgi meteya tgo hge hale’ito migo swa’ehete fo fago giya. Meteya Yesugo hgo lami mgaliya. 4 Mgale, mete hgowa. Tgole ga heteteile, meteya tgo hge hale’ito miwe Yesuwele tatwate hai tago fago gwoi hata. Metafa mete holgumo halile, hofiheto to’owa tale, tgo miya swa’ehe tapoto gago mlele, mle halile, holgumole tle metele to’owate mgo magete hiyahiya gu hlagiya.

  1. Tgo sagimgi, sagi mgi meteya tgo hge hale’ito migo swa’ehete fo fago giya.
  • Meteya holgumo halile, hofiheto to’owatawa.

 Buke Mak 2:5

5 Yesuweya metele hisafi hgoli mate, weya mgo hatgeya, “tgo miya fli itogi fage ago hatgeya. Mete lelagi tago. Aye wele hgefegi wa hotage laigo, wele hgefegi itogite mliya. Weya tgo hgefegi hale’ito miwego wa mgiya, “Wafe! Aya mele fe luwalumo hgo mgole, aya mele fe luwalumo hatge fli ati wapaowa.”

  1. Tgo sagimgi, sagi mgi meteya tgo hge hale’ito migo swa’ehete fo fago giya.
  • Meteya Yesuwego hatge mleya.
  • ya 'wasiya he mgo mliya
  • Yesuweya tgo hge hale’ito miwele fli tlefli hgowa. Weya Yesuwego ma’ituwa, Mgole wele siyasi tetgo mo fe luwalumo hatge fli ati wapaowa.
  • Mgole towete tgo hapoto hapoto mi metego wa he’amolamigo, wefa wiyemete wele fe luwalumo hatge fli ati wapalaigo

 Drama - Tgo hge hale’ito miwe #

➍ Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mi metego wa you mleya. #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: 12 Tisaipele yahi mita

 Buke Mak 3:13-19

13 Yesuwe yai tepa’esile, weya asapo tifoto mgo halile, weya wele hatgeli togu mi youwa. Mete wetgote eiya. 14-15 Yesuwe 12pela metego ya mei 'e’lauwa. Weya metele yahi wai you gwiya, Apasele metelaya. Yesuwe wa mgiya, “12pela tgo giya ale ta’ete lilile, teimate aya gigo asapo asapo mgi heyamoti laigo. Gi ale yahe wai yai tuti. Gi kailifi sagi lele, tgo ei luwalu mi yai heyamo sgitiya.”
16 12pela tgo metego ya mi 'e’lau metefa mita. Saimolewe. Yesuwe wego yahi agiyagimo wai youwa. Pita wlaya. 17 Semise Sepeti, Sole Sepeti. Yesuwe tgi stgo mgigo yahi agiyagi wai youwa. Po’alekese mgilaya. Mgile yahi stumo mgo, tgo miya plamole mage mgo go. 18 Meta’a Eltru’ewe, Pilipewe, Patalemetlu’ewe, Metlu’ewe, Tomasewe, Semis Alfeyus, Tatiyasewe, Saimole Selotewe tgomiwlaya. 19 Meta’a Sutis Iskalot, tgo miweya Yesugo tgo luwalu mite mgi heyamowa. Yesuwe 12pla metego sete ya mi 'e’lauwa.

  1. Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mi metego wa you mleya .
  • Yesuweya tgo 'e’ete metego wa makei meiliya. Tgo lelagi mi mliliya, mi’a Yesuweya tgo lelagi mi metego taguto. Weya wele tgo hewi mlelimo metego wele tle laume mliliya.

 Lesen 39 Kwesten #

1q. Yesu em i lainim ol manmeri olsem ol mas i bihainim husait man?
1a. Em yet, em pikinini bilong Yawe. Promise poto stret.

2q. poto Yesu i tokim ol manmeri long mekim wanem?
2a. poto Yesu i tokim metele fli tle fli fe aflaiyala na bilip long tok em yet i autim.

3q. Bilong wanem ol manmeri i kirap nogut taim poto Yesu i skulim ol?
3a. Ol i kirap nogut, long wanem, poto Yesu i skulim ol olsem man i gat namba na gutpela save. Tasol ol saveman bilong lo i no save mekim olsem. Ol i no klia long mining bilong ol tok i stap long tok bilong Yawe, olsem na ol i save bihainim tingting bilong ol yet na ol i skulim ol manmeri.

4q. Pastaim ol spirit nogut i stap olsem wanem na ol i kam long wanem hap?
4a. Bipo tru ol i stap ensel long ples bilong Yawe, tasol ol i bikhet wantaim Satan na Yawe i rausim ol na nau ol i stap nabaut long dispela graun.

5q. Bilong wanem ol spirit nogut i pret tru long poto Yesu?
5a. Ol i save pinis poto Yesu em i Yawe na em i winim namba bilong ol na em i ken bosim ol, na ol i save olsem poto Yesu bai i salim ol i go long ples paia bihain.

6q. Bilong wanem ol lida bilong Israel i no laikim poto Yesu? (3-pela samting)
6a. poto Yesu i tok olsem, em i Pikinini bilong Yawe na em i dispela Promis poto; Oltaim poto Yesu i save putim sin bilong ol Farisi i stap ples klia long ai bilong olgeta manmeri na em i krosim ol giaman pasin bilong lotu bilong ol; Planti manmeri i bihainim poto Yesu, olsem na ol Farisi i bel nogut long em.

7q. Bilong wanem ol Farisi i was gut long pasin bilong poto Yesu?
7a. Ol i laik painim wanpela rong long pasin bilong poto Yesu na kotim em.

8q. Bilong wanem poto Yesu i tokim ol spirit nogut long pasim maus bilong ol?
8a. poto Yesu i no laik ol manmeri i bilipim maus bilong ol spirit nogut. Em i laik ol manmeri i mas bilipim tok bilong em yet na tok bilong Yawe tasol.

children.name: Lesele 38 - Yesuwele Hewimo go.html
children.contents:
Lesele 38
Yesuwele Hewimo go #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mgi sagi mgi metego wa you mleya.
  • Yesuweya Saimolewele sotosle titamesego wa hotage iya.
  • Yesuweya tgo wapulelage sagiwego ewitei mlilile, mgole weya wele afahe itogite wa mliya.
  • Yesuweya Tisaipele hapoto miwego wa youwa
  • Tgo Felasi mi meteya tgo siyasi metelaya. Mi’a meteya Dokta miwego ai hgolaigo hata. Meteya taguto.

 Lesen 37 Kwesten #

Lesen 37 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Sataleweya Yesuwego la fga fgoulamigo. Mi’a Yesuweya Eiwapai fawimiwele ya tetgohe hali site hata. Opiyai. Weya Atamewele mage mgo go hata. Yesuweya Yawewele oto Poto tetgo miwlaya. Weya Satalewele ya 'wasiyahe hlamigo hata. Opiyai weya kailifite wa gituwa.

➊ Yesuweya Tisaipele sagi mgi sagi mgi metego wa you mleya. #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Etlewe, Saimolewe, Semes, Soleweya

 Mark 1:16-18

16 Sosafoteya, Yesuwe hawesi Galili mofole ‘owehelama gite touteli mate, weya tgo sagi mgigo hgo ma’eya. Tgi stgo sagi mgiya letei mi gufolama mlelefa’eliya. Miya mgile hewimogo. Mgiya hai mleli mgilaya. Tgi stgo sagi mgile yahi mgo, Saimolewe, Eltru’ewe. 17 Yesuwe mgigo wa mgiya, “Ge gayo! Ge atgote afgate gu ga! Ge hai tlage le laigo hata. Ge tgo sagi tapoto litatiya le laigo.” 18 Tgi stgo mgifa mgote mati mgole, flage tlagete mgile letei miya mlate wapatgeya. Mgifa Yesugo mafgate mleya.

1. Yesuweya Galeli asapo asapo hapotomolama touteilya.

  • Weya towete tgo mi metego mgo mgiya, Yawewele so wele towete tgo afastu mleli mehe tatwate mliliya. Giya ya’wasiyahe fe wapatgela. Gi ago afgate gu ga. Gi Yawewele ya tetgohe hatge lela, mgole ale hge tle laume fe ila.
  • Yesuweya Etlewe wele hoitowe Saimolewe sete hgowa.
  • Weya mgigo wa youwa. Mgigya mgigle bisnesemo himgi wapatgeya.

 Mark 1:19-20

19 Meteya ga mei hiyahiya li mate, mei la hgowa. Tgi stgo sagi mgi mila hgowa. Yapu wagehgulama tifile, letei mi loiloiya maliya. Mgigo mei la hgowa. Sole Sepiti, Semise Sepiti. 20 Flage tlagete Yesuweya mgigo you mleya, “Ge gayo!” Mgifa mgole mgile tgugo Sepitigo, tguwele hewi tgo mi tapoto wagehgula wapatgeyale, mgifa Yesugo mafgate mleya.

  • Yesuweya Semes la Soleweya la hgowa.
  • Weya mgigo wa mgiya, Ge ago afgate gu ga.
  • Mgiya mgile tguwego wapatgeya.
  • Tisaipele ya stumehele mgo mliya, Yesuwele tgo hewi mleli metelaya.

➋ Yesuweya Saimolewele sotosle titamesego wa hotage iya. #

Yesuweya Eiwapai fawimi wlaya.

 Mark 1:29-31

29 Yesuwe Sutale ta’owi hosapo wapatgeya. Wapatgeyale, Yesuwe, Semisewe, Solewe meteya Saimolewe, Eltlu’ewe mgile hosapoto mgo gwoiya. 30 Gwoile, Saimolewele afitose seya siyasi to. Seya sta ma mgole, sele afahe aipao tago. Meteya Yesuwego wa mgiya, “tgo mise siyasi to.” 31 Yesuwe matile, weya sego hgo iya. We sele yalefe magetale, wa magete tisetale, sele afa aipao mi ga tepa’esiya. Sele siyasi tepa’esi mate, seya metego hegla hatalou mi mlo feiya.

1. Yesuweya Saimolewele sotosle titamesego hgowa.

  • Seya siyasi tetgo tago, afahe aipao tago. Afa lge luwalu tapoto, 'lota’luto.
  • Yesuweya sele yalefe magetemate, sele siyasi sete tepa’esiya.
  • Seya wego hatge mleya, mgole seya wele hge tle laumate gwe iya.
  • Mgole Yesuweya sele siyasi sete stletiya. Mgole sele fe fgei luwalumofa sete mageteliya.

 Drama - Saimolewele sotosle titameseya siyasi to #

➌ Yesuweya tgo wapulelage sagiwego ewitei mlilile, mgole weya wele afahe itogite wa mliya. #

 PIKSA 000

 Mark 1:40-45

40 Sosafote tgo wapulelage sagiwe mgale, Yesugo hgo lami. Mgale, wele hge pa’imogi gaga heta’u ti setale, wele tifo tamuto hlaile, weya Yesugote mgiyati tata yaowa, “Mele fli fagele. Mgo hatge late, ale afahe itogite li late, ale afahe itogite lili laigo.” 41 Yesu wele ya mehe matile, wego hgo ewiteile, Yesuwele yalefe wele afahela magetale, wa mgiya, “Aya flifage mgo hatgeliya. Mele wapulelageheya itogite li laigo!” 42 Yesuwele ya mehe tepa’esile, wele wapulelagemehe sete tepa’esiya. Wele afahe itogite mliya.

  1. Tgo wapulelage miweya Yesuwego ma’iteliya
  • Tgo wapulelage miweya lelagi tago. Yesuwele kailifimo aumate mliliya. Weya mgo hatge mleya, Yesuweya ale siyasi wiyemete wa hotage meiliya.
  • Mgole weya Yesuwego hatge mleya, weya wele hgetle laumate gwe iya.
  • Mgole Yesuweya wele siyasi sete stletiya. Mgole wele fe fgei luwalu mofa sete mageteliya.

 Drama - Tgo wapulelage miwe go #

➍ Yesuweya Tisaipele hapoto miwego wa youwa. #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Metyu

 Mark 2:13-14

13 Yesuweya hawesi Galili mofole ‘owehelama la meile, towete tgou miya wetgote gile, weya Eiwapaifawimiwele yahe metego wai ya mi matiliya. 14 Yesuweya meile, hgowa. Tgo sagiwe. Wele yahimo Lifai Elfaiyas. Lifaiwetlagete ho ogosasapola seteliya. Ho mesapowa towete tgou kiyapewele metele wisi mi lo fei li hosapo. Yesuwe wego wa mgiya, “Me ga! Me ago afgate gu ga!” Lifaiwe Yesuwele ya mehe matile, weya ga tisete gitale, weya Yesuwego mafgate mleya.

  • Lifai weya Yesuwele yahe sete matile, weya ga iya, weya Yesuwego mafgate mleya.
  • Lifaiweya wele hewi mo wele bisnese wapatgeya, Yesuwego mafgate mleya.

 Mark 2:15-16

15 Meteya Lifaiwele hosapo gwa meile, Kiyapewele wisimi fgeili metewe, tgo luwalu metewe, Yesuwele tisaipole mete tgutete haplite si mle maliya. Miya Kiyapewele wisimi fgeli metewe, tgo luwalu metewe, metefa Yesuwego mafgate mleli metelaya.
16 Felisi tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi, meteya mgo hgowa. Yesuwe Kiyapewele wisimi fgeli metewe, tgo luwalu metewe hegla hatalou mi si mle maliya. Meteya hgole, Felisi tgo Mosesewele lomole tisa mi Yesuwele tisaipole metego wa mgi matiya, “Yesuwe Kiyapewele wisimi fgeli mete, Tgo luwalu metewe tapoto aita sete mle mali fe?”

  • Yesuweya towete tgo segi mi tapoto mlilie, Felasi meteya luwalute hatgeliya.
  • Felasi meteya towete tgo segi mi metele fe luwalu mi hatgitgiya, mi’a meteya metele fe luwalumo hatgelimigo hata.

 Drama - Yesuweya Lifaiwele hosapola mliliya #

➎ Tgo Felasi mi meteya tgo siyasi metelaya. Mi’a meteya Dokta miwego ai hgolaigo hata. Meteya taguto. #

 Mark 2:17

17 Yesuwe metele ya mehe matile, we yafo sahe wa mgiya, “Tgo itogi miya toktawego ai 'i’a hgo hata. Opiyai. Tgo siyasi to mitlagete toktawego 'i’a hgo laigo. Afa haiwawe. Afa tgo hisafito metego tlagete ai youle hata. Aya tgo luwalu mi tapoto youle laigo!” Yesuwe ya mgoli mehe wa mgiya.

  • Yesuweya mgo mgiya, weya towete tgo siyasi mi metego mgaliya.
  • Felasi meteya siyasi to. Mi’a meteya tgo Dokta mi ai hgo hata, meteya taguto.
  • Waiyai gitiya mgo afla hatgela, Gitiya wiyeme gitiya tgo dokta miwego ai hgolaigo hata, gitiya taguto. Opiyai, Gitiya Felasi metele mage mgo go.

 Lesen 38 Kwesten #

1q. Yesu i go singautim 4 disaipel. Nem disaipel i get wanem kain minin?
1a. Wokman bilong Yesu. O Lain i hangamap long Yesu na bihainim em.

2q. Tambu meri bilong Saimon i gat sik, na sik em i wanem kain piksa long samting i pas long yumi ol manmeri?
2a. Em i piksa bilong sin na pe nogut.

3q. Tambu meri bilong Saimon i save hangamap long husait?
3a. Yawe na Poto Yawe ibin salim kam.

4q. Sik lepra i olsem piksa i makim wanem samting?
4a. Em i makim sin bilong yumi na pe nogut.

5q. Man i gat sik lepra i save hangamap long husait?
5a. Yawe na Poto Yawe ibin salim kam.

6q. Olsem wanem na Poto Yesu i gat namba bilong lusim sin na rausim sik bilong dispela sikman?
6a. Poto Yesu yet em i Yawe na em i gat namba bilong lusim sin na rausim sik.

7q. Matyu i mekim wanem wok taim Poto Yesu i singautim em?
7a. Matyu em i man bilong kisim takis.

8q. Poto Yesu i kam long graun bilong singautim wanem kain manmeri?
8a. Em i kam long graun bilong singautim na kisim bek ol manmeri i pilim sin bilong ol yet na tanim bel na bilip long Poto Yesu olsem Helpim bilong ol.

9q. Sapos ol manmeri i ting ol yet i gutpela na ol i bilip na hangamap long strong bilong ol yet, ating Poto Yesu bai i helpim ol, o nogat?
9a. Nogat. Poto Yesu i no inap helpim ol man husat i no bilip na hangamap long em.

10q. Poto Yesu i autim wanpela tok piksa long dokta na sikman. Ol dispela samting long tok piksa i makim wanem samting o wanem manmeri?
10a. Sik i makim sin. Sikman i makim ol man i tingim sin bilong ol na tanim bel na bilip long Poto Yesu. Dokta i makim Poto Yesu. Ol man i ting olsem ol i no gat sik i makim ol lain manmeri i ting ol i gutpela long ai bilong Yawe (olsem ol Farisi) na ol i no bilip long Poto Yesu.

11q. Ol Felasi i wanem kain lain? Lain ino sik o lain i gat sik na ol i les lo go lukim dokta?
11a. Ol lain i gat sik na ol i les lo go lukim dokta. Na ol iles tru lo harim tok bilong Yesu

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 37 - Satelewe Yesuwele fli fage gaga wa ....html
children.name: Lesele 37 - Satelewe Yesuwele fli fage gaga wa ....html
children.contents:
Lesele 37
Satelewe Yesuwele fli fage gaga wa ya mei hali geilami. #

Tisamiwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Matyu 4:1-3
  • Matyu 4:4
  • Matyu 4:5-7
  • Matyu 4:8-9
  • Matyu 4:10-11

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Tese 1 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Tese 2 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Tese 3 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Sataleweya Yesugo Wapatiya.

 Lesele 36 Kwesten #

Lesele 36 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya tama’i mago mehe #

Flageyayo, yaleheya ya stu skopi to.

  1. Tese 1 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Tese 2 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Tese 3 mehe mgo mliya.
  • Sataleweya Yesuwego Wapatiya.

➊ Tese 1 mehe mgo mliya. #

 Matyu 4:1-3

1 Oke, Yesuweya meile, Eiwapaifawimiwele ei itogi motole gu imgo fgo’o luwalu hete wego mgi he’amotiya, Yapu ei luwalu moto Yesuwele flifage gaga wa yamei hali geilami. Oke, Yesuweya mgole mgote iya. 2 Weya mala gwa meile, touti alo, touti alo, ai! Yesuweya souwa 40pla so miya weya malama heglahatalou mali hataigo. Weya mgole alamute mliya. 3 Oke, so leheyayo, Yapu ei luwalu moto Yesuwele flifage gaga wa yamei hali geila ei motofayo, wefa mgale, Yesuwele flifage la wa mgiya, “Meleyo, Eiwapaifawimiwele poto tetgo migoteyayo, me fuliya wa mgi, yapu pou fgo’oule mage mgote fe afgate la aflaiya.”

Yesuweya gitile afalgehele mage mgo go, wefa alamu to.

Yesuweyayo, Yesuwele silo fgo’o mote mgo i mate, la mli ya stu mehele meheya mgo, Yesuweya i-no pitate ga la wimigo. Meheya miya, Yawewele la wa mgi taita’u wego la wa mgi taita’u mowa mo ta. Wetle la mafgate mleya. We asapo silo fgo’omote mgote ile, we souwa 40pla de mgote lile, swa’uheya Yesuwetgote la wa mgi matiya, “Meyayo, Yawewele poto tetgo miweya, meya miwe twa fe?”

Yesuweya silo fgo’o mote mgo meile, wegofa alamule mlile, wego ame gu sahete piyo! Ame ho tilitaili ame heglahatalou og sage to piyo! Tesilo fgo’e’emo we mgo lama meile, mei gwa meile, wefa 'ete mgo tlagete 40pla de mifa mgo tlagete alamute mgo tlage mli alo mli alo, wefa mgo tlage mli mliya meile, 40pla mi mei tepa’esi. Mei tepa’esi meile, swa’uheya wego wa ga la mgi matiya, Yesuwele flifage la traim hgolami. “Me wiyemete fuli, fu silo fgo’o lolama la sili si fu liyo, me wiyemete mlagete yapu pou fgo’o mile mage mgo ta la aflaiyalei me la fe? Aflaiyale, me ayo! Me alamute mli lgei mile tlago.”

 Matyu 4:4

4 Oke Yesuweya Yapu ei luwalu motole mehe la mati mgiya, “Ahowa! Eiwapaimiwele ya hasi meheya mgo, gitile kailifi lifeyo, hegla hatalou mitlagete mgali go hata. Opiyae. Gitile kailifi lifeyo, Eiwapaifawimiwele ya tu tu mi tlagegote mgaliya. Eiwapaifawimiwele ya stu, ya tgutete mi tlagegote mgaliya.”

Yesuweya wele kailifi fawi tetgo tago, miya wele EWFMWele ya tetgohe ai hema mgetolamigo hata. EWFMWele ya tetgohe lahila aumate mliya, tgo alamu mile laume go mliya. Hegai so ilage mehe lililaigo, EWFMWele ya tetgohe teime teime, solafihe gitile ei itgoi lolaigo.

Yesuweya mgole swa’u lehele ya mehe la mati mgiya, “Yawewele ya lehefayo, ti hegla hatalou mite la hatge mle 'la pa’la meili piyo! Ti ame hatge heglahatalou itogi itogi mite la mala mleligo hata. Tifayo, hi tili li kailifi meili mehefayo, Yawewele ya hapliya mehe ta. Mehetle kailifi meili tigo wa hete meili tigo.”

➋ Tese 2 mehe mgo mliya. #

Sataleweya EWFMWele ya tetgohe maflaiyaligo, mgole wefa towete tgo tgutomile fli fage lafgoulaigo.

Oke, mgole Yesuweya Satalewele ya sahe gaga la traim mei hgowa. Ya mehe wego mehe gaga la mgi mati hgowa. Satalewe Yesugo fli fage gaga la mgi mati hgowa. Sataleweya ya tetgo na ya gu’le ya, mehegiya miksi meile… Satalewe Yesuwele flifage gaga la afe fou wilami, weya mgogi mehete gaga la mgi mati hgo mi ta. Wele fli fage la traim hgolami. Ai! Yesuweyayo, wefa Yawewele ya stu wiyeme mehefa, weya lelagi tetgo mgole, wele fli fage ga la maflaiyau meili go hata. Wefa kailifite wa tete gitowa. We Satalewele wego ga la traim mehe la ga la mati mle mliligo hata. Weya mehe mgiya, “Mefa mele he la yaili! Wefa, ya stu wiyeme meheya, wefa lelagi tetgo mgole, weya Satalewele wego la traim mehe, we ga la hatge hafefou wiligo hata. Wele flifage ga la hatge fli 'ati meili go hata.” Nogat! Wele flifage kailifite mgo tlage gite ma mgole, wefayo, wele gaga la mgi mehe, we ga la mati mleigo.

 Matyu 4:5-7

5 Metaga Yapu ei luwalu motowa Yesugote wa asapo itogi mote litatiya meile, Yelusaleme mgo meile, oke, eiwapaifawimiwele ho itogi mesapole ho lgumolama latale, 6 wa mgiya, “Meleyo, eiwapaifawimiwele poto tetgo migoteyayo, me ga go himgi setale, mego fu mole me hlegei ai lali hata, hlegei ai lali hata. eiwapaifawimiwele yaheya mgo, ‘Eiwapaifawimiweyayo, wele ei hewi mleli ei mitgo sete wa mgiya, meteyayo mego wa loiloiya lileigo. Mego hgo wiyo’oilileigo mgole, hlege sagi ai le hata. Me mgole hgefe hli fu lilama ai la tlitei hata. Eiwapaifawimiwele ei, wele ei hewi mleli ei miyayo mego fe agete loiloiyala. Eiwapaifawimiwele yapu ei itogi mi wa yamei matiya. Meteyayo, mele ta’ete lilileigo.’” 7 Yesuweya yapu ei luwalu motole yahe tuhe mgo ‘a wa mgiya, “Ahowa! Ayayo, Eiwapaifawimiwele yaheya mgo, ‘Me mele eiwapai fawi miwele flifage afla wa yei hali gala.’”

Yesuweya EWFMWele fli fage gaga waiyami ai hali geilamigo hata. Wefa EWFMWele ya tetgohe hatge mle tlage tago. Gitiya tili taili milakolemi hgole, afla aitlaila. Opiyai, Gitiya EWFMWele ya tetgo he hatge lelegio, la wele tle laume gwe ilaigo.

➌ Tese 3 mehe mgo mliya. #

Satalewe wele flifage gaga la traim mei hgowa ya sahe. Wele flifage we 'o ga fe hgite aflaiyale, wego mgogi mehe la mgi mati hgowa, “Me 'lute ale silole tilitaili itogi itogi li, mele yalefegila ta la wapaleigo fe? Aya mele yalefegila ta la wapale, mele silo falowaite ta hgo wiyo’owai lileigo fe? Me ale tle laumate gwe i latefayo, aya meta mele yalefegila wapaleigo.” Yesuweya mgogi ya mehe ga la mati mlemigo hata. Yesuweya Satalewele wego gaga la traim mehele meheya weya mehe mgiya, “Meyayo… silole taita tetgo sagiya mli go hata! Silole tilitaili tguto miyo, mele tilitaili sagi mligo hata. Mifayo, Yawewele tilitaili pi go. Mele miyayo, ago ale flifage gaga la 'wasi yawa. Mehefayo, Yawewele silo mo go. Tilitaili tguto mifayo, afa lelagi tago. Yawewele tilitaili silo taglei miwele mle fei meta la wa he’amo tilitaili miyo, aya mele mehe ai la atile hata.” Weya Satalewele yamehe la mehe mati mgiya.

 Matyu 4:8-9

8-9 Metaga pu mgole Yapu ei luwalu motowa Yesu wegote asapo tifawi mofote litatiya meile, halile, mgiya asapotifola aumala me’i hetale, oke, yapu ei motowa Yesuwegote wa he’amo yaiya. “Me mgote hgo. Asapo asapo, si mo mili li, silo fawimowa lo, silomowa lo, oke asapo lo, wa he’amo ya mei gu i. Metele tilitaili itogi itogi miya mi ta. Oke, mele ale yaheyo, afgate le swou li late, me tilitaili ‘le’la pa’lale wa he’amo lili miyayo, meta mele yalefegi la lilileigo. Me ale tle laumate lili lateya, ale yahimo aumate la mgi agete hali late, meta tilitaili mi wa he’amoli liliyayo, meta mele yalefela lilileigo.”

Sateleweya silole tili taili mi aumate hali geilamigo. Sateleweya Yesuwego wele tle laume gwe ilamigo. Yesuweya Satelewego sete himgi mafgate mleya.

➍ Sataleweya Yesuwego Wapatiya. #

 Matyu 4:10-11

10 Yesuweya Yapu ei lotote mgiya, “Ahowa! Me iyo! Eiwapaifawimiwele yaheya mgo, ‘Me, sagile ya’amago o, yapu ei hapoto hapoto sagile yami afla afgate lela. Mefayo, eiwapaifawimiwele yalehe tlagete afgatele swoule, mefa wele hge tle laumate tlagete gilami.’” 11 Mgole, meta hgowa, Yapu ei luwalu motowa Yesuwele yamehe mati mlele, weya mgole ga la hi la maflaiya gitale, wefa afastu iya. Wele afastu ilami mlili mate, meta hgowa, Eiwapaifawimiwele ei hewi mleli miya la hla mgale, Yesuwego wele ta’ete ga go la gitale, Yesuwego wa loiloiyawa.

Mgole Yesuweya gitale, ga mgiya, “Me iyo! Me afla gite yaila!” Wefa ga iya. Oke, Satalewele la wile, teimate meta, Yawewele yapu ei miyayo, Yesuwele ta’ete gaga la hetowa, wego la hete kailifi swoulami. We ga fe gite kailifi watile, we Satalewego la gaga mlo ‘temtesene mi’ ga fe win-ilami. Mifa Yesuwefayo, wefa sete win-iya.

Mgole lgo mateyayo, pai la hgo! Gitile auwa mi mgile la mlili femowa. Atamewele mlili femo. Atamewe Ifese mgile femote pai hgo! Mgiyayo, Satalewele mgigo gaga latalai meheyayo, mgiya ma hgite mati mlele, mgiya mlagete wifi tesifele mage mgo sete ali ma’eya mle hla iya. Mgiya wele ya itogi itogi mehe mati mlele, mgifa haigite mati ga la mle meile, mgiya mati mlele, mgiya mgole tilitaili miya mgole mlele, mgiya mgole auwa. Yesuwe, weya mgile mlili femo gala mle mliligo hata. Wefa giti 'wate meile, ya mehegiya mehe. Satalewele Yesugo gaga la traime mi, Satalewe wego gaga la traim mehelama we ga la mei go la hla imigo hata. Opiyae! Wefa gite meile, wefayo, swa’uhele ya mehefa wefa sete gito 'wate meile, wefa mehefa sete hali mleigo. Wefa Yawewele yamehe tlage mafgate mle swouwa.

Yesuweya EWFMWele ya tetgo hete la wa mgile, wefa Satelewele kailifi ga go hla iya. Sataleweya Yesuwego wiyemete aume ai hali hata, mgole wefa Yesuwego mlama wapatgeya.

Gitiyayo, silole towete opgagi giti, Atamewe gitile auwato, auwa mei mle la mli femo la silole towete tgo tguto giti… gitiyayo, tgutete Yawewele piksa mehe, we yalefete silomo la matetawa male, tgomigo tgomisego wa he’amowa. Gitiya wele piksa he go. Gitifa tgutete swa’uhele ya mehelama tlagete mliliya, hale. Gitiya mehe tlage mafgate mleya. Gitiya tguteteyo, pagu gitile auwa Ifese Atamewe mgile mli mgo, mgitle la wa he’amole, mgile stu mehe tlage la mafgate mleliya. Silole towete tgo tguto gitile mgogi mehele mlili mi. Ame ya ogo, ame usagu i ya ogo, ya luwalu, fli tle fli luwalu luwalu, mgo hatge afefauwi, mago hatge lafgo lafgou, mgogi mlili fli mefageyayo, gitiyo, Yawewele piksa tetgo mehe la lafgo lafgou meiliya. Gitile fli tle fli li la lafgo lafgou meiliya. Gitiyayo, swa’uhele gitile auwa Atamego wa 'wasi yau mehele mafgate mleliya. Miya mgole gitifa lgo hgoteya mgote mlili mi ta. Mgotefa gitifa mgote mli gu mgaliya. Ame ya ogo ago, ya flitle fli luwalu luwalu mgo la hatge afefao mi gu i, sahe la hatge yai gu i, sahe la hatge ya mei lafgo lafgou la yai, pitate ga mapi ya mei gu meili, mehete la wa he’amo mi ta. Gitile mehe ya mlili femowa, gitiya mgo hatgelileigo, gitile fli mefagele ta mlili fe? Opiyae! Meheya gitiya swa’uhele mehe mafgate mleliya. Swa’uhele ya, gitile auwa mi mgigo gaga la 'wasi yao mehele meheya gititle la mafgate mleli mehe ta.

Ahowa! Giti Yawewele klenehe, na giti Yawewele piksa tetgo mehe lama lililagi towete opgagi tetgo tgote fe giti mgote la lilileigo hata. Ahowa! Gitifa 'ete hatge yelemalei, na saho la hatge ewitei, saho la hgo wilepu, saho tilitaili mi ta soute fli mi lalo, magi 'lalo, mgogi flitle itogi mi tlage wa he’amo swou li lagite, Ai! Yawewele fe tetgo wiyeme mowa mo ta. Gititle mli gu mga swou meiliya. Gitiya mgo tlage afgate le swou li lagigo. Na miya gitile fli tle fli luwalu luwalu mgo hatge, mago hatge, usagu i yeleti yelete, ya luwalu ya… hemagei a la le hgo, mo la mli gu meili mepi. Mepiya gitiyayo, swa’uhele femo mafgate mleliya. Swa’uhele femowa mo ta.

Mgo la mli gu mgali giti mgo afla hatgela! Gitiyayo, Yawewele ta’ete tgo, Yawewele tle’watite laume mgo, li swou lilei giti laya. Opiyae! Gitiya meheyayo, Satalewele femo, wele wage mo hgulama hali tifilei gitile mli gu mgaliya. Gitile fe mgo mlili mowa.

Gitiya mgole lgomateyayo, pai la hgo! Gitifa, mlagete gitile auwa gimgile la mli femo. Gitile auwa gimgile la mli femo, weya paguwayo, gitile auwa tetgo silo la mle tetgo mi mgiya mi we ta. Atamewe, Ifese tetgo mgi. Na mgo la wapatiyaleyo, gitile paptaiseila mlile ya stu mehele meheya mgo, giti agi agite oto tutu agi agi hole mage mgo la ml mateyayo, meta gitiyayo, gitile auwa miweyayo, Yesuwe laya. Gitile namba 1, gitile auwa, klene agi agi, Yawewele klene mehele auwa tetgo miweyayo, Yesuwe miwe ta. Yesuwele fe wiyeme mo tlagete atile pkatale, gitifa hetwahete wele mage hetwahete mgo tlagete, pai hete swou. Gitifa mgo tlage pai hete swoule, na wele fe la mli, wele olgeta temtesin wetgote gaga la wa he’amo Satalewego wele flifagelama maflaiyao maflaiyao, wele flifage la magefe magete maflaiya maflaiyao, mehefa gitifa hetwahete, wele fli fagele mage mgote pai le swoule, gitifa mgo tlagete pai hete kailifi 'watile, pai hete kailifi swou 'wati.

Meheya miyayo, stu meheyayo, gitigo paptaisei late la wa he’amo mehe ta. Hele mele paptaiseilami somofowa miyayo, he Yesuwele mage mgo fe lagite kailifi 'wati tetgoulamigo. Kailifi wele Yawewele wego la mlo mile mage mgo fe afgate le swoula, mehele meheya mehe ta. Paptaiseite la wa he’amowa.

Mehefa mehe ta. Ale yahefa mgote ya wiyeme stu Yawewele Yesugo la mlo kailifi, na la mlo ya, wele swa’uhele wego gaga la, wele flifage gaga la mli, mehele ya meheya mehe ta. Mgote eila tepa’esi tile magete la mliya. Atamewe Ifese mgile mlagete wifi tesifele mage mgo a la magwe tle lotale, mgile mei la hali ma’e hla i, mehele ya stu wiyeme paptaiseile meheya, mgote gaga la tepa’esi mehe ta. Gitile auwa Yesuwele la gu i na gite puwate meile, wele kain kain traim meile, wego gaga la traim mate, swa’uhele wele fli fage gaga la maflaiyao mehe, ya meheya mehe ta.

 Lesele 37 Kwesten #

1q. Satan i laik bagarapim promis blo yawe, na em i laik traim Yesu… Em traim husat lo bipo bipo tru?
1a. Adam na If

2q. Sinek i amamas lo Yesu, o nogat? Blo wanem?
2a. No gut Yesu em poto blo smesim het blong en!

3q. Satan i kilim adam na If, a?
3a. Nogat… em i laik kisim spes blo 2pla, na trikim 2pla.

4q. Satan i laikim olsem, Yesu i mas stap aninit long em, a?
4a. YES! Satan i laik winim Jisas bai Satan i kamap olsem God yet.

5q. Jisas i hangre nogut tru, tasol bilong wanem em i no laik senisim ston i kamap bret na kaikai?
5a. God yet i no bin tokim Jisas long mekim olsem. Jisas i laik bihainim tok bilong God wanpela tasol… Yesu em i save… #1 indai em samting nating. Save na Holim pas lo tok blo Yawe em bikpla samting.

6q. Ating Satan tu i save yusim tok bilong God, o nogat?
6a. Yes! em save miksim miksim! Em i save paulim het blo ol man.

7q. Satan i bin kisim namba olsem bos bilong dispela graun long wanem taim stret?
7a. Satan i kisim dispela namba long taim Adam na Iv i harim tok bilong en na aninit long laik bilong en. Long dispela taim Satan i kamap bos bilong dispela graun na bilong ol manmeri wantaim.

8q. Jisas i yusim tok bilong husat bilong winim Satan?
8a. Jisas i yusim tok bilong God bilong winim Satan.

children.name: Lesele 36 - Yesuwe Paptais.html
children.contents:
Lesele 36
Yesuwe Paptais #

Tisamiwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Luk 2:39-40
  • Luk 4:41-42
  • Luk 4:43-45
  • Luk 4:46-47
  • Luk 4:48-51
  • Luk 4:52
  • Matt 3:1-3
  • Matt 3:7-9
  • Matt 3:11
  • Matt 3:13-15
  • Matt 3:16-17
  • John 1:29-34

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yesuweya oto opgagi mlili so mehele yahe.
  • Paptaiseile ya stu mehe
  • Yesuwele Paptaise Ya Mehe

 Lesele 35 Kwesten #

Lesele 36 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya tama’i mago mehe #

Flage lesele meheyayo, ya stu sahegi sahe to.

  • Yesuweya oto opgagi mlili so mehele yahe.
  • Paptaiseile ya stu mehe
  • Yesuwele Paptaise Ya Mehe

➊ Yesuweya oto opgagi mlili so mehele yahe. #

Yesuweya Oto Opgagi mli mate, wefa wele tgitgu meteya asapo Selusalememola iya.

1.1 Yesuweya Asapo Nasalete oto opgagi miwe laya #

 Luk 2:39-40

39 Oke, meteya metele kastamei tepa’esi meile, eiwapaifawimiwele lomo mafgate mle tepa’esile, oke, Yosepewe, Maliyase, Yesuwe meteya si Kalili mote mgo iya. Meteya si Kalili mote mgo meile, meta asapo Lasalete mote mgo afastu la giya. 40 Yesuwe Lasalete molama mlatlagete la mli ma mgole, fawi meile, wefa mlatlagete hgite gitale, wefa mlatlage fli itogi mi la, kailifi miya mlatlage hgite mleya. Eiwpaifawimiweya Yesuwego yelemalei mi swou meiliya.

Yesuweya oto opgagile mage mgo tifiya, mgole Yaweweya wetgote wa loiloiyawa. Yesuweya EWFMWele yatetgohe, mgole wefa fesilemo to hata. Yawewe Yesuwele fli hatgeili wiyemete wai yami matiya.

1.2 Yesuweya asapo Selusalememote ga iya #

 Luk 4:41-42

41 Oke, Yesuwele titamese tguwe mgile kastame mowa mgo, Pesowa tatwa so fawi mehete, meteya asapo Selusaleme mote mgo meiligo. Mgile kastamemowa mo ta, titamese tguwe mgile kastamemowa motlage motlage mifa mgotlage li alo leigo. 42 Oke, Yesuweyayo, hetilofoualiyamai 12pla mgo mlile, Yesuwe meteya somofoteya so fawimeheteya weya Selusaleme mote mgo gaga la wiya, Pesowamole so mehete.

*Sosepewe la Mariyase mgiya asapo Selusalememola ilamigo, mgiya fe ofamo lilamigo. *

Asapo Nasaletemole towete tgo tguto mi metele haus lotu sapola weliye weliye Yawewele lotu meiiliya. Mete haus lotusapo to. Mi’a so SELUSALEM eile mofowa gaga meiliya. Mgole towete tgo segi mi metele tili taili mi sete 'le’leyale, mgole meta ga iya. Selusalem wa lafite mliliya. Tatwatago hata. Femole lafimole mage mgo pefiasapomo la pagwi. Mgole Sosepewe la Maliyase mgiya Mosesewle yahe tauta’uwa. Mgole mgiya Selesalemmolama So lotufawi mofogiya mgiya Seluselamemolama fe ila, ofa itgogi mo fe lola. Mgole meteya metele 'au’wa to metego hatgela. Meteya Islaiyale towete tgou mteya paguwa Isipeile towte tgo laumate mlililgeigo. Mgole meteya Selusalemmolama ga iya.

Sosepewe la Mariyase mgiya asapo Nasaletemolama afastu gwa giya, mi’a Yesuweya metego haplite mlili hata.

Meteya metele fe lotumowa tepa’esiya, mgole meteya Nasalaete. Mgiya Yesuwego apilami, mi’a mgiya gafafatiya. Towete tgo haplite mlilie, metefa wego hgolimigo hata. Mgiya lelagi, afastu Selusalamemo la iya. Wele tguwe mgo hatgeya, oto opgagimiwe wele titamese tapoto miliya, mgo wele titamese mgo hatgyea oto opgagimiwe wele tguweya tapoto mliliya. Mgiya asapo Nasaletemolama gwa giyamate, opiyaiy, mgiya oto opgsgimiweya mliligo hata.

1.3 Yesuweya Haus Tempele sapola mlili ya mehe. #

 Luk 4:43-45

43 Oke, so fawi he, so Pesowa meheya tepa’esi mateyayo, oke, towete tgo seigi mi metefa tgutete asapo Lasalete mgo afastu la giya. Yosepewe Maliyase mgiya mete tapoto meile, ai! Yesuwe hetwahete i hata. Weya malama la mliliya, Selusaleme mala mliliya. Tguwe titamese mgifa lelagi go hata. 44 Ahowa. Tguwe titamese mgiya mgo la hatgeya, “Yesuwe ti tapoto sala ta mlili fe?” Mgote la hatge mli alo, mli alo, metefa Lasalete mgo ilami meile, la hgowa, “Ai! Yesuweya ti tapoto mlili hata!” 45 Mgiya mgote la mlili mate, wego la mapi touteliya. Wego la mapi touti alo, touti alo, Opiyae! Lgo mateyayo, mgiya Selusalememote mgo la wiya, mala 'i’a la apitgelami.

Teime sofogiya sofo, Sosepewe la maliyase mgiya Seleusalememolama gagagwa giya, mgole migya haus TEMPELEsapo gwe iya. Mgi gweile, la hgowa. Yesuwlaya, otopgagiya tgou Tisa segi mi metego wai yai matiliya. Mosesewele Lomole stumiya metego wi yai matiliya. TGOU Tisa mi Meteya Yesuwego mgi mati alo mgi mati alo mgi mati alole, mgole Yesuweya metego Yaweele ya tetgohe wai yai matimigo. Yesuweya EWFMW tetgo tago. Yawelwe ya tetgohele stumeya tolagete mliya, Yesuwele lgulamgila. Yesuweya metego mgi mati alo, mi’a tgo segi hgo fafati hata. Hgoligo hata. Wle lelagi aumate mliliya. Meteya lelagi go hata, wefa EWFMWele Tgo fe loiloiyalimo miwe go.

 Luk 4:46-47

46 Mgiya mgote la mli alo, mli alo, mapi touti alo, sou mehegiya mehe teimeyayo meta mei la hgowa, Yesuweyayo, Yawewele ho itogi mesapole ho’owe mehelama mliliya. “Weya mlate mlili magi we ta.” Tetgo mgiya, mgole ga meile, mei hgowa, Yesuweya tome, tisa metewele tome mala setale, mati ma mgole, wefa ya miya la mgi matiliya. 47 Tgo ta ta’e ta ta’e meteya Yesuwele ya mati mgi mehe la si mati ma mgole, meteya mgo eitote iya, “Ai! Yesuwe lelagi fawi to!” Meteya mgo ‘a si hgo hatgitgi meiliya.

1.4 Mariyaseya Yesu wele fe mite hgo sapgeya. #

 Luk 4:48-51

48 Titamese tguwe mgiya Yesuwego mala mgote mei hgo mateyayo, mgiya ei touteiya! Mgiya mgo yaiya, “Poto! Tagefa mego mapi touti ma mgole, me mgo aita la mliliya? Mgogi femowa aita la mliliya? Tageya mego mapi touti ma mgole, metlago hatge seigi seigi meiliya.” 49 Mgole Yesuweya pu titamese tguwe mgile yahe la mati mgiya, "Aya mgo hatgeya, ‘Yao, mgiya lelagi. Aya ale tgu tetgo miwele hosapola fe lilila.’” 50 Yesuweya ya mehe mgitgote mgi ya meile, miya mgiya ya stuhe ati pkate le hata. Wele mgi mehele ya stu mehe hatge pkate itogi hata.

51 Maliyaseyayo, Yesuwele la lila femowa, tilitaili miyayo, Maliyaseya ga la hatge itogi mle gu mei alo, meta ga hatge fli 'atilage mi.

Yesuweya oto opgagi mlimate, meta wefa lelagi tago. Mgole weya lelagi, wele tguwe Yawewe go. Weya wele hewimo lelagi tago. We wele tguwele yahe, wele tguwele lelagi, wele tguwele fli hatgei , mgole wefa tauta’ulamigo. Yaweweya Yesuwego ame hewimo we fe lelaigo, mgole weya wego ya wa mg mehe, mgole Yesuwe tauta’uligo. Wleiye weliye mgiya tapotote mliliya. Yesuweya fe luwalumo to hata, O fe silemo to hata. Wefa femo fli hatgeili luwalu mo to hata, Opiyai, wefa wele tgu wele femo wiyeme itogite tauta’uligo. Yesuweya wele femo tetgo tago, wefa holi tetgo tago. Yesuweya ame hewimo Yawe wego mlole, mgole wefa Yawewele tle laumate gwe iya.

Mi’a Sosepewe la Maliyase mgiya lelagi go hata. Mgiya EWFMWele lelagi mo lelagi go hata. Yesuweya EWFMW tetgo tago. Mgole wefa tafoto to, wefa yahi to. Wele yahi wele tafoto mgile lahila wapatgeya, Mgiy lelagi go hata. Mi’a Yesu mgigo haliseito hata, wefa mgile yahe halisimigo hata, wefa mgile fli hatgei ai haliligo hata. Opiyai, wefa mgile yahe wiyemete tauta’uwa. Yesuwetle wele fli fagele simate lemetawa, mgole weya mgigo tauta’ule, asapo Nasaletemolama afastu iya.

1.5 Yesuweya tgo opgagile mage mgo tifiya. #

 Luk 4:52

52 Oke, Yesuwe meteya Lasalete afastu la meile, Yesuweya tguwe titamese mgile yahe hali si meili piyo, wefa tguwe titamese mgile yamehe tlage mafgate mle swou meili mgole, wefa titamese tguwe mgile hosapote mgo iya. Yesuwefa fawite mlile, wele titamese tguwe mgitgote mala mafgate mleli, fe itogi mola mafgate mle swou meiliya. Weya molama mlatlagete la mli ma mgole, fawi meile, wefa mlatlagete hgite gitale, wefa fli itogi mi la, kailifi miya mlatlage hgite mleya. Eiwapaifawimiwefa Yesuwele fe mgogi mgo la hgo mgole, wefa yelemalei fawi mliliya. Towete tgou hapoto hapoto mete haiwawe.

Yesuweya wele ta’ehete Eiwapai fawimiwe tetgo tago, ta’ehete tgo liwe tetgo. mgole wele afalge kailifite wa gituwa, gitile mage mgo go. Yawewefa Yesuwego fli fagele itogite sete mlowa. Mgole Yawewe wele oto itogi mo yele malei to. Mgole towete tgo mile Yesuwego yele malei to. mgole we fe silemo o fe luwalumo me sagi tu go hata. Bipo profet Aisaia i bin raitim sampela tok bilong God olsem, man blo smesim het blo sinek bai i gat gutpela save tru na olkain gutpela tingting na pasin. (Aisaia 11:2) Na tru tumas, dispela tok profet i kamap tru long Jisas.

Weliye weliye Yawewele ya tetgo he tolagete hgoligo

➋ Paptaiseile ya stu mehe #

Mehele meheya mgo, tgo yahi klene hetwahe mgo, mla’e klene, na, silomo simi la mli gu gi mgo, meteya mowayo, mla’e klene metewele silo tu mo. Oke, meheya miya mgo, mehele ya stu meheya mehe ta, paptaiseite la wa he’amowa. Paptaisei mgo la wa he’amowa mate. Paptaisei mile tlago mlili go hata. Miya meheleyo, meleyo, paptaisei li lateyayo, heyayo, tgo Yawewele klene mehelama sete lemetawa. Mele yahimowa. O, mefa mala sete mei gwe iya, hetwahete.

Miya paptaiseile stu meheya mehe ta, mlagete Yawewele klene mehele lapumole mage mgo go.

 Matt 3:1-3

1 Soleweyayo, weya tgo paptaisi meili miwe laya. Soleweya sosafoteya, asapo luwalu fgo’o sago la meile, si Suta metele simo la meile, towete tgo metegofa Solego mafgate mleya. Wego mafgate mlele, Soleweya malama metetgote la wa ya meiliya. 2 Weya mgo, “Gi ati! Eiwapaifawimiwele someheyayo wele wapaimiwele sgomo lela someheyayo, tatwa tago. Miya mgole giya Eiwapaifawimiwele tle’watite gwa iyo! Gile fe luwalu mi wapatiyale, Eiwapaifawimiwele tle’watite gwe ileigo!”

3 Oke,tilitaili tguto miyayo, miya mgole meta plofete Aisaiyaweya Eiwapaifawimiwele ya mehete hotei ta’ehe hasi wa he’amowa. Aisaiyawe Solewele ya meheya hasi sete gaga gwa giya. Sete pagute, Solewetgote mgo wa hasiya mgo, “Ai! Tgo sagiweyayo, teime la gaga gwa gileigo. Liweyayo, asapo luwalu fgo’o sago malama (mlile) la mgileigo. Tgo liwele ya meheya mgo lileigo, mgo ‘Giti femo pai wiyo’oiyo! Tgo wapai sagiweya ga la miwe laya. Tgo miwele gala femo pai wa hete ta i wiyo’oi swou.’”

2.1 Klenehe Selisileigo #

Yaweweyayo, weya silole taita tetgo tgu tetgo miwe laya. Wefa silomole miwe laya. Miya wetle la wa ya mei mle fei gu iya. O, yahimowa, sitotumo, mgi he’amo. Yahimowa sitotumo mgi he’amo. Yahi metewa klene meheya, silotumo mgi he’amo. Mgo mli gu iya. Mgo mli gu mehele meheya mehe ta.

Klene hetwahe miya mgole wa he’amowa. Meteya mehe mgileigo, “Wiyeme tago! Metayo, Yawewele klene yahi mete mo laya.”

Mele yahi, Yawewele klene mehela mle gali totate, meya meta yahi sagote mlili go hata. Meta mele yahimofa lilatila ho pa’ilamigo. Ho pa’i 'eskesile, silo tapoto lafgo lafgoulei me laya. Me ga silo tapoto ho pa’i tesi ho 'apu sete lafgo lafgoulei me laya. Mele Yawewele hge tle’wate ga li totatefayo, megofayo, me hale’ili femola mgo ya meili mgo, mogiya mo. Teime, yapu yahe mgo mgili mehe, ‘namba 2 indai’. Mehele meheya ya stu meheya mehe ta. Mgote la wa ya mei he’amowa.

Mele Yawewele hge tle’wate, mele Yawewele yahimolama lili lategayo, meta meyayo, wiyemete teime la hale’ila femowayo, mele la hgolei me laya.

Paptaiseile ya stu meheyayo, mgote la wa ya mei he’amowa. Mego gufolama la mati la ma gu la hla meile, la magete afastu la magete mlele, mego site hetgo hi lawa hasiteti mehele ya stu meheya mehe ta. Meheya mgo, Meheya miyayo, me mlagete oto agi agite hgo mleli hole mage mgo mego la hgo mlele, agi agite la hgo mlele, meyayo, Yawewele klene Yahi mgo la hasitowa. Mli la mgi hasite mi ta. Paptaiseile ya stu meheya mehe ta.

2.2 Yawewele Klenehe #

Gitiyayo, silole towete opgagi giti, Atamewe gitile auwato, auwa mei mle la mli femo la silole towete tgo tguto giti… gitiyayo, tgutete Yawewele piksa mehe, we yalefete silomo la matetawa male, tgomigo tgomisego wa he’amowa. Gitiya wele piksa he go. Gitifa tgutete swa’uhele ya mehelama tlagete mliliya, hale. Gitiya mehe tlage mafgate mleya. Gitiya tguteteyo, pagu gitile auwa Ifese Atamewe mgile mli mgo, mgitle la wa he’amole, mgile stu mehe tlage la mafgate mleliya. Silole towete tgo tguto gitile mgogi mehele mlili mi. Ame ya ogo, ame usagu i ya ogo, ya luwalu, fli tle fli luwalu luwalu, mgo hatge afefauwi, mago hatge lafgo lafgou, mgogi mlili fli mefageyayo, gitiyo, Yawewele piksa tetgo mehe la lafgo lafgou meiliya. Gitile fli tle fli li la lafgo lafgou meiliya. Gitiyayo, swa’uhele gitile auwa Atamego wa 'wasi yau mehele mafgate mleliya. Miya mgole gitifa lgo hgoteya mgote mlili mi ta. Mgotefa gitifa mgote mli gu mgaliya. Ame ya ogo ago, ya flitle fli luwalu luwalu mgo la hatge afefao mi gu i, sahe la hatge yai gu i, sahe la hatge ya mei lafgo lafgou la yai, pitate ga mapi ya mei gu meili, mehete la wa he’amo mi ta. Gitile mehe ya mlili femowa, gitiya mgo hatgelileigo, gitile fli mefagele ta mlili fe? Opiyae! Meheya gitiya swa’uhele mehe mafgate mleliya. Swa’uhele ya, gitile auwa mi mgigo gaga la 'wasi yao mehele meheya gititle la mafgate mleli mehe ta.

Ahowa! Giti Yawewele klenehe, na giti Yawewele piksa tetgo mehe lama lililagi towete opgagi tetgo tgote fe giti mgote la lilileigo hata. Ahowa! Gitifa 'ete hatge yelemalei, na saho la hatge ewitei, saho la hgo wilepu, saho tilitaili mi ta soute fli mi lalo, magi 'lalo, mgogi flitle itogi mi tlage wa he’amo swou li lagite, Ai! Yawewele fe tetgo wiyeme mowa mo ta. Gititle mli gu mga swou meiliya. Gitiya mgo tlage afgate le swou li lagigo. Na miya gitile fli tle fli luwalu luwalu mgo hatge, mago hatge, usagu i yeleti yelete, ya luwalu ya… hemagei a la le hgo, mo la mli gu meili mepi. Mepiya gitiyayo, swa’uhele femo mafgate mleliya. Swa’uhele femowa mo ta.

Mgo la mli gu mgali giti mgo afla hatgela! Gitiyayo, Yawewele ta’ete tgo, Yawewele tle’watite laume mgo, li swou lilei giti laya. Opiyae! Gitiya meheyayo, Satalewele femo, wele wage mo hgulama hali tifilei gitile mli gu mgaliya. Gitile fe mgo mlili mowa.

Gitiya mgole lgomateyayo, pai la hgo! Gitifa, mlagete gitile auwa gimgile la mli femo. Gitile auwa gimgile la mli femo, weya paguwayo, gitile auwa tetgo silo la mle tetgo mi mgiya mi we ta. Atamewe, Ifese tetgo mgi. Na mgo la wapatiyaleyo, gitile paptaiseila mlile ya stu mehele meheya mgo, giti agi agite oto tutu agi agi hole mage mgo la ml mateyayo, meta gitiyayo, gitile auwa miweyayo, Yesuwe laya. Gitile namba 1, gitile auwa, klene agi agi, Yawewele klene mehele auwa tetgo miweyayo, Yesuwe miwe ta. Yesuwele fe wiyeme mo tlagete atile pkatale, gitifa hetwahete wele mage hetwahete mgo tlagete, pai hete swou. Gitifa mgo tlage pai hete swoule, na wele fe la mli, wele olgeta temtesin wetgote gaga la wa he’amo Satalewego wele flifagelama maflaiyao maflaiyao, wele flifage la magefe magete maflaiya maflaiyao, mehefa gitifa hetwahete, wele fli fagele mage mgote pai le swoule, gitifa mgo tlagete pai hete kailifi 'watile, pai hete kailifi swou 'wati.

Meheya miyayo, stu meheyayo, gitigo paptaisei late la wa he’amo mehe ta. Hele mele paptaiseilami somofowa miyayo, he Yesuwele mage mgo fe lagite kailifi 'wati tetgoulamigo. Kailifi wele Yawewele wego la mlo mile mage mgo fe afgate le swoula, mehele meheya mehe ta. Paptaiseite la wa he’amowa.

2.3 Farisi, Satyusi… #

Ol ting olsem, “Mipla em ol tumbuna blo Eplaham! Mipla em ol lain blo Yawe pinis!”

 Matt 3:7-9

7 Soleweya mgole ya mei alo ya mei alo, weya meta la hgowa, Falisimola lotu mlili tgou metewe, Satusimola lotu mlili tgou metewe, metefa giya. Metefa Solegote giya, Solego mete ga fe wa paptaisilami. Soleweya metego paptaisei hataigo. Ahowa. Soleweya metego la hi la mgiya, “Giyayo swa’u luwalu hele otou go! Gi hago ta hatgeya? Aya piyate gigo wa paptaisi tepa’esi lateyayo, gifa wiyemete ta lilileigo fe? Ahowa! Lgomateyayo, Eiwapaifawimiweya hlege sagi gitgote lolami tatwa tago.8 Miya mgoleyo, Giya fe luwalu luwalu mi sete wapa’lutiyale, eiwapaifawimiwele tle’watite gwe ile, fe itogi mo tlagete afgate lela. Ayefa gigo mgo hgo mgole, mgo hatgeleigo, “Falowai tago. Meteya metele fe luwalu luwalu mi sete wapa’lutiyale, Eiwapaifawimiwele tle’watite gwe iya.” Ayefa mgole mgo hatgeleigo. 9Giyayo, mgo afla hatgela, mgo, ‘Ai, tiyayo, Eplahamewele lemasi tu he ti laya. Tigofa hlegei hago lolaigo hata.’ Ai! Mgote afla hatgela. Ahowa. Gifa hlegei lelaigo. Eiwapaifawimiweya gigo lafgou tepa’esile, weya meta fu mi la hi la Eplahamewele oto auwatgeile mage mgo aflaiyale, meta la hgoleigo, fuliyayo gile sgomo la lelaigo.

➌ Yesuwele Paptaise Ya Mehe #

 Matt 3:11

11Soleweya mgogi mehe yaiya, "Ayayo! tgo fe luwalu luwalu mi gaga wapati miwegayo, weyayo, aya gufola paptaisilei a laya. Metagayo, tgo ale teime ga la miwefayo, we gufola paptaisileigo hata. Wele paptaisiyayo, weya lilatila paptaisilila miwe laya. Eiwapaifawimiwele ei itogi motote lola miwe laya. Tgo ale teime gala miwefayo, wele kailifi miya hapoto tago. Wele kailifi miya aume tetgote malama mliliya. Ayayo, Wele hewi tu ogo sage ai la wa le hata. Wele hgelge mehegi mle halila miya ai le hata. Weya aume tetgo tago. Tgo ale teime gala miwele kailifi miya mgo go.

Hale pa la hatge pkatla he go! Giti Yesugote pai hgo! Ya stu he 'lute, weya yahi luwalu sago ta la stale, we fe yeleti yelete sagi ta la mli mile tlago ta la paptaiseimigo fe? Ahowa! Wefa itogi 'e’ete mli ma mgole, wefa mgole la paptaiseimigo! Miya, wefayo, wele yahimo, Yawegote fe la stala mehele tlago mgole, weya mgole la paptaiseiya. We 'o ame fe yeleti yelete hilawa hilawa ogo sage to piyo! Miya wego wele yahi mole tlago la paptaisei miwe laya.

 Matt 3:13-15

13 Oke, Yesuweya sosafoteya si Kalili mola wapatgeyale, weya gu Sotale mofote mgo la wiya, Solewe wego fe wa paptaisilami. 14 Soleweya mgole Yesugo la hgo ma’ele, la wa mgiya, “Meyayo, tgo fawi me laya. Aya mego aila wa paptaisei hata. Me 'ete hapou ago wa paptaisileigo. Meya aume malama la giteliya. Meyayo, ago ameile tlago ta la hgo fe?” 15 Opiyae! Yesuweya mgole la mati mgiya, “Getage pai i. Eiwapaifawimiwele yahe afgate le swoulami.” Soleweya mgole mgo wa mgiya, “Falowai.”

Hale pai la hatge! Mele paptaiseile ya stu meheya mgo, mego hagile ta wa paptaiseimigo fe? Meta meyayo, Yawewele klene lainemehele yahimo molama gitlei me laya. Mele taita miweya miwe ta. Mele taita miweya mego mehe wa he’amo swou lilei me laya. Me Yawewele lailehe, Yawewele klene mehe lama fe gite swoula mitlage wa yai ati swou lilei me laya. Mele taita mego la wa gito miweya, mego mehe tlagete la wa yai ati swou lileigo. Mlage mele fe yeleti yelete luwalu luwalu mgoli mago li, mepi li late, miya mile tlago wa yai ati lileigo. Me fe itogi mo tlage afgate lele, me Yawewele klenehele mala tlagete li swou.

 Matt 3:16-17

16 Mgole Soleweya Yesugo la wa paptaisi meile, meteya meta la hgowa, asagiheya mlagete yoflomole mage mgo la tasgotiya. Yoflomole mage mgo la tasgotiyale, Eiwapaifawimiwele ei itogi motowa sapuwatole mage toute hla giya. Sapuwatole mage mgo la toute hla mgale, Yesuwele ta’ete ga go mapete setowa. Meteya meta la hgo sapgeya. 17 Meteya mi la hgole, meteya ya talo sahe la matiya. Ya saheya aume asagihete mgo hla giya. Meheya mgo, “Ale oto poto mohowayo, ale fli wa gwa iya. Aya we tapoto yelemalei fawi lililei we laya.” Yameheya aume asagihete mgo la hla giya.

Yesuwele paptaisei mehele ya stu mehete pai la hgo! Soleweyayo, weya 'lute Yesuwele tguwe sagi we ta la mlimigo fe? Ahowa! Miyayo, Yaweweya mgo wa mgiya, “Yesuweyayo, ale poto itogi miwe laya!”

Meheya miya, Yesuwele paptaisi mli mehele ya stu meheya mehe ta. Mgote ati pkata! Yesuwele paptaisei mli mehele yahimowa mo ta. Meheyayo, wetle Yawewe la hgowa, “Yesuweya ale oto itogi itogi wiyeme ho, ale poto tetgo itogi miwe laya. We ale yahimo, ale tle laumate, ale hge tle’watitlage fe swou lila mile tlagote, wego mile tlago la wa mgi paptaiseiya.” Yawewele fli itogi mefage mefage ta. Ya meheya, Yesuwele paptaisei mli ya mehele mgote mei la tepa’esi meiti mehe ta.

Yesuweyayo, swa’u hele tifo hali asite la hla ila wiyeme, weya miwe ta.

 John 1:29-34

29 Sohe teimeyayo, Soleweya la hgo ma’eya, Yesuwe giya. Soleweya towete opgagi tguto mgote wa he’amo yaiya, “Mgote hgo! Eiwapaifawimiwele sipesipe otomohowayo, gi mago ta! Gitile hoi fawi mo fagotlamigo, wlimo atkatlamigo. Weyayo, silole towete tgou tguto gitile hoi fawi mo fagotla miwe ta. Mgole weyayo, Eiwapaifawimiwele yapu tgi sipesipe mo go. 30 Tgoliweyayo, tgo ale teimate ga miweyayo, tgo fawi miwe laya. Aya wele tle laumate mlili a laya. We ago la hi la hali ‘atge ‘atgeya. Weya sete sete pagute mli alougo mile tlago, weya sete sete pagute mli alo miwe laya. 31 Afayo tgoliwego hgole, Ai! afa pagute wego lelagi go hata. Miya wefa yamehe tlagete mlele, silole towete tgou tguto gititgote wa ya mei matili mehe ta. Miya, wetgo ya meili mgi miya flage mgote hgowa. Afayo pagu wego lelagi go hata. ‘Ehe. Ale gi stumehele meheya mgo, ale gigo wa paptaisi meili miya mgo, Yesuwele ga la femole tlago wa wiyo’oilamigo. Islaiyelemole towete tgo mi ga fe hgo lelagi toulami.

32 Oke, Soleweya towete tguto mile lgule tome malama mgo yaiya, “Ayayo, Aya pagute mgo hgowa, Yawewele ei itogi motowa mlagete ape sapuwa motole mage mgo aume asagihete mgo toute hla mgale, Yesuwetgote gaga hali setowa. Wetgote gaga hali seto magi ta. 33 Ai! Aya pagu mgo hgole, mgo hatgeya, “Tgo liwe hagi we la fe?” Aya we lelagi go hata. Ahowa. Yawewe pagute ago wa mgiya, ‘Sole! Hale ati! Me iyo! Hale, towete tgou gufolate paptaisiyo! Me paptaisile, oke, me mgo hgolileigo, ale ei itogi motowayo, tgo sagigote gaga hali setleigo. Tilitaili miyayo, tgomigote gago hali seto mateyayo, miya mgote mgo hatge ‘Tgo liweya liwe ta. Yawewele ei itogi moto silole towete opgagi mi lola miwe laya. Yawewele ei itogi moto lola miwe ta.’ Oke, Yawewe pagu ago mehe wa mgiya. 34 Aya sete hgowa! Aya mgote hgo mgole, flage aya mgote la wa yeitgeya. Tetgo tago. Tgo liweyayo, Yawewele poto miwe laya. Yawewele poto tetgo, weya miwe ta.

 Lesele 36 Kwesten #

1q. Jisas i bin mekim wanem samting long tempel taim Josep na Maria i painim em?
1a. Jisas i askim ol kwesten long ol tisa na bekim kwesten bilong ol tu.

2q. Maria i askim Jisas olsem, “Bilong wanem yu stap hia?” Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem wanem?
2a. Jisas i tok, “Bilong wanem yutupela i painim mi? Ating yutupela i no save, mi mas i stap long haus bilong Papa bilong mi, a?”

3q. Jisas i gat bikpela save tru i winim Josep na Maria, tasol ating dispela i mekim Jisas i bikhet na sakim tok bilong tupela?
3a. Nogat tru. Em i daunim em yet na em i aninit long tupela na em i bihainim olgeta tok bilong tupela.

4q. Jon i tokim ol Israel long mekim wanem?
4a. Jon i tokim ol manmeri long tanim bel.

5q. Paptais, em piksa blo wanem kain samting?
5a. Senisim klen

6q. Jon i redim ol manmeri bai ol i mas igo ananit long wanem man?
6a. Ol i mas bilip long Yesu, man blo smesim het blo sinek… niupla #1 tumbuna blo klen blo yawe.

7q. Bilong wanem Jon i krosim ol lida bilong lotu bilong Israel?
7a. Ol i bikhet na ting olsem ol yet i gutpela man. Ol i ting pasin bilong bihainim ol lo na pasin bilong lotu i mekim ol i kamap gutpela long ai bilong God. Ol i ting olsem “Mipla ol lain tumbuna pikinini bilong Abraham! Mipla stap pinis long klen blo Yawe!”

8q. Sapos yumi kisim baptais long wara, ating dispela i rausim sin bilong yumi na mekim yumi kamap stretpela long ai bilong God?
8a. Nogat tru. Paptais em mak tasol. Mak bilong soim ol arapela manmeri olsem, ol i go ananit lo Yawe, bihainim tok blong en, na senisim klen. Ol i save olsem, ol i sinman na God i mas salim poto bilong smesim het blo sinek.

9q. Sapos ol lain i laik sanap long graun blo yawe, ol i mas i stap lo wanem klen stret?
9a. Ol i mas i stap lo klen blo Yawe.

10q. Sapos yu stap lo klen blo wanpla giyaman spirit… tru tru yu gat nem blo displa graun, a?
10a. Nogat… Bai yu go lo paia wantaim stilman.

11q. Taim Jisas i kisim baptais pinis na em i kam antap long wara, John em i kamap papa blong en, a?
11a. Nogat, God i tok olsem, “Em poto blo mi stret, na mi laikim em tumas.”

12q. Bilong wanem God i amamas olgeta long Jisas?
12a. Jisas i makim stret piksa blo Yawe, na em mekim stret, na bai smesim het blo sinek.

13q. Bilong wanem Jon i kolim Jisas “Pikinini Sipsip Bilong God?”
13a. Long wanem, Jisas i kam bilong stretim hevi blo graun, olsem pik blo stretim hevi blo graun, o, ofa blo givim Yawe.

children.name: Lesele 35 - Maliyaseya Yesuwego Hgo Mleya.html
children.contents:
Lesele 35
Maliyaseya Yesuwego Hgo Mleya #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Sosepe La Maliya mgigo asapo Petlahamemolama ga iya
  • Yawewele ei itogi hewi mleli segi mi meteya tgo sipsipe loiloiya mali mi metego wa mgiya.
  • Tgo Plofete miweya paguwa hotita’ehela hasile, tolagete iya
  • Tgo lelagi to mete Yesuwago wa hgolami iya
  • Islaiyele Kingemiweya Yesuwego wa atatlamigo

 Lesen 34 Kwesten #

Lesen 34 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Yaweweya wele ei itogi hewi mleli sato Sakalaiyawego mgi he’amotiya. Yawewele ei itogi hewi mleli moto Maliyasego ya kailifi sahe wa mgiya. Sosepeweya Yawewele ei itogi hewimleli moto tetahete mgo hgowa. Yaweweya wele tgo Poto miwego mgi he’amotilamigo, wefa sete 'le’leyawa.

➊ Sosepe La Maliya mgigo asapo Petlahamemolama ga iya #

  • Asapo Rome mole Kingemiwa Cesar Islaiyele towete tgo mi metego wa keylamigo.
  • Mgole Sosepewe la Maliyase mgigo wele au’wa’tole tu molama ga iya.
  • Asapomole yahimo Petlahamemo.
  • Mgiya ho sasapo mapile, mgole taulemolama towete tgo segi mi metele hosapo hetwahe tago. Mgole, mgi tgi apei e ho ta’ehelama sou mouliya.
  • Seya Yesuwego tgi apeile ho ta’ehelama sete hgo mleya.

➋ Yawewele ei itogi hewi mleli segi mi meteya tgo sipsipe loiloiya mali mi metego wa mgiya. #

➌ Tgo Plofete miweya paguwa hotita’ehela hasile, tolagete iya. #

  • Sete Pagute Tgo plofetemiwe Maikaweya mgo mgiya, Yawewele Poto miweya taulemolama Petlamhamemolama wa hgo lelaigo.
  • Mgole Yesuwele titameseya wego Petlahamemolama hgo mleya.
  • Eiwapai fawimiwele kailfe la wele lelagi aumate mliliya.

➍ Tgo lelagi to mete Yesuwago wa hgolami iya. #

 Mat. 2:1-2

1 So leheyayo, Yesuwele titamese wego hgo mleli so meheyayo, Si Suta mole Asapo Petliheme molama hgo mleli so meheyayo, oke, lgo mateya Heloteweya si Sutamole wapai miwe laya. Oke, Helotewe mgote mlili mateyayo, oke, tgou lelagi to metewe, si talifole hali mgali mola wapatgeyale, Asapo Selusalememote gaga gwa giya. 2 Meteya meta mgole gaga mgi matiya, “Opgagi oto mohowayo, opgagi oto wapai miwele sgo lelai, Suta metele wapai agiyagi mohowayo, lohowa haila ta hgo mleigo fe? Asapo hago lama ta hgo mleigo fe? Tiya otomohole yahimo mgi agetelilamigo. Otomohole asagi pu motowa asagihela hgo ma’ele, mafgate gu mgale, otomohole yahimo mgi agetelilami.”

  • Tgo Lelagi mete asapo Babiloniya, mgaliya.
  • Tgo Plofete miwe Daniel metego pagute sete hasiya. Yawewele Potomiwe wa galaigo.
  • Meteya Yesuwego wa lotulamigo. Mgole Damiel sete hale’iya, mi’a weya tili taili mi wetgote sete 'le’leyawa.
  • Meteya Islaiyele Kingemiwego mgo mgiya, Tgo agi agi kingemiwe hailama ta mlili fe?
  • Meteya Yesuwego wa lotu meiliya.

 Mat. 2:7-11

7 Oke, Kile Heloteweya, metele yamehe mati tepa’esile, tgo lelagi fawi mle metegofa papgote mgi mleya. Metego hgolami. Metego papgote mgi mleya. Mete papgote mgale, weya metego mgi matiya, “Asagipu fawimotowayo, gile asagipu moto hgo mateyayo, ame sohete ta hgougo fe?” Oke, meteya mehe matimgile, meta 8 Heloteweya mgole metego la mgiya, “Giyayo, oto migo ‘'i’a api swou, Petlihememolama! Otomigo apile, ga hgo late, ago ga’a la hgotgeya. Afa galaigo, oto mohole yahimo mgi agete lilami.” Ai! Weya ‘wasi yeigo. 9 Metaga tgo lelagi to meteya mehe matile, meteya ga iya. Mete mei alo, mei alo, mei hgowa, asagiputo mliliya. Asagipu metele pagu hgoli motowa toute iya. Asagipu fawi motote mafgate mle gu meile, ai! Ho sasapola aumate hosapola aume hali seteliya, otomohole ho mesapolama. 10-11 Meteya mgo hgo mateyayo, meteya yelemalei fawi swou meile, ho mesapote mgo gwa meile, hgowa. Otomohowayo, titamese ta’ete mliliya, Maliyasele ta’ete mliliya. Meteya mgole, meteya yelemalei swa mei tepa’esile, meteya tamutale, otomohole yahimo mgi magetowa. Meteya otomohole yahimo mgi magetale, meta tilitaili itogi itogi luhgula lota fi mlele, Yesugote mi mlowa, tilitaili mgogi mi mlowa. Fasi fu wisi mi tilitaili, amei ye giyawa afahei to mi, amei gahalu afahei to mi wetgote mlougo.

  • Meteya metele asapomo afastu iya.

➎ Islaiyele Kingemiweya Yesuwego wa atatlamigo. #

  • Heloteweya matile, weya hli to. Yawewele oto Potomiwe wele sgomo lelagite, mgole we wele tgo plise mete mgi matiya.

 Mat. 2:3-4

3 Kile Helotewefa tgou lelagi to tgou metele ya mehe matile, fliya seigite hatgeya. Selusaleme mete tapoto hatgitgiya. Haiwawete seigite hatgeya. 4 Kile Heloteweya fliya seigite hatgele, weya tgou plise fawi tgou tisa tgou Mosesewele Lo mole tisa mi metego mgi mleya. Mete tgutete ta’wile, Kile Heloteweya metego mgi matiya, “Gile Plofete miyayo, Plofete mile ya miya hago ta matili fe? Hale ago wa mgi! Klaiseweyayo, opgagi otomohowa hailama ta hgo lelaigo fe?”

  • Yaweweya Yesuwego wa loiloiya maligo. Heloteweya Islaiyele oto opgagi segi mie metego wa ata’olamigo.

 Mat. 2:16-18

16 Kile Heloteweya tgo lelagi to metewele ya ‘'wasiya mi mgote hgo mateya, Heloteweya toseite mliya. Weya mgole toseite mlile, weya tgo sagi mgi he’amotiya, opgagi otou metego fe ‘ata’olami. Weya mgi he’amotiyale mgo, “Ame opgagi otou tatwate Petliheme molama mlili metego, Hetilofoualiyamai mogiyawagete mgo mlili mi, oke laume mgo mlili mi, ogo ago ogo ago miyayo, metego ga fe ‘ata’o hasitlami.” Tgo sagiya mgote mgo 'ata’o hasitlami iya. Oke, Helotewefayo, sete pagute tgo lelagi to metegote asagiputole so mehe mgi matile, Heloteweya mgote mgo hatgele, mgole tgo sagigo mgote mgi he’amotiya, opgagi otou ogo ago metego fe 'ata’o hasitlami. Oto mi mata’o hasi mgole titame tguwe ewitei fawi to. 17 Ai! Tilitaili tguto miya gaga gwa mga tepa’esile, mgole mgo wa he’amowa, mgo, yao, Plofetewe wele ya pagu mgo mgi mehe tetgote wiyemete mgote la wa he’amowa. Plofete Selemaiyawele ya pagu mgo mgi mehe tetgote wiyemete mgote la wa he’amowa. Sete pagute, Plofete Selemaiyaweya mgo hasiya, mgo 18 “Hale ati! Weheyei fawi fale, ewitei sagiya asaposagote mgo mga hawa. O, Asapo Lema mote mgo mga hawa. Lesele sele wehe yahe go. Sele otou ewite fa hamouliya. Sele otou ga hale’i mgole. Leselesele otou ga hale’i fiski mgole, satewa sele flifage hago wa hatge swou hata.” Plofete wele yaleheya lehe ta.

  • Yaweweya Tgo lelagi mi metego mgo mgiya, Heloteweya afast afla hgola.
  • Sataleweya Eiwapai fawimiwego ai hila wapatgelaigo hata.
  • Sosepeweya Maliyasego la Yesuwego mgigo mlele, Meteya asapo Isipemolama ga iya.

 Mat. 2:19-23

19 Heloteweya mli alo mli alo, ga hale’iya. Helotewele ga hale’i mateyayo, Sosepewefa Isipemola sou ‘ati stale, teta sahe hgowa.
