children.name: Lesele 26 - Yaweweya Islaiyeleile metego mala p....html
children.contents:
Lesele 26
Yaweweya Islaiyeleile metego mala pou ho gu wagege sete mlowa. #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Islaiyele meteya eitosei to la meteya ya tosei ya meliya.
  • EWFMWeya Islaiyele ya mala pou ho la hegla mloli mehe mgiya
  • Islaiyele meteya la ya tosei ya meliya
  • EWFMWeya Mosesewego ya fe loiloiyali mo mehe wa mgiya

 Lesen 25 Kwesten #

Lesen 25 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite, gitiya sete matiya. Gitiya matile mgo, Yaweweya Isipemole ami mi metego wa fowa. Isipemole tog Kingemiweya EWFMWele kailifi hgowa. Mgole Yaweweya ami tguto mi lafgafgouwa. Mi’a weya Islaiyeleile metego hotage mleya. Mgole Yaweweya wele ya kailifi mehe tauta’uwa. Mgole weya Eplahamewele otoauwatgei mi metego wele fe hisafi loiloiyalimo wa lolamigo. Wefa metego si Kelalemo wo lolamigo.

➊ Islaiyele meteya eitosei to la meteya ya tosei ya meliya. #

Silole towete tgo tguto mi meteya fe luwalumo la fe silemote la fga fgouwa. Fe silemo silole towete tgo tguto mi metego sete wa fowa.

 PIKSA 88

1.1 Islaiyele meteya hosihamlagi la heglahai to hata, mgole meteya eitosei to. #

 Kisim Bek 16:1-3

1 Islaiyele towete opgagi tguto mi Asapo Elime mo wapatgeyale, meteya asapo fgo’o mo Sile molama gaga gwa giya. Mi’a asapo si fgo’olama asapomo Elime mola la asapo Silaile mola tomate mliya. Mlama meteya sofomofotlage mliya. So 15 pela sou mi hetimofogiyawage, meteya Asapomo Isipemola wapatgeya. So 15 pela sou mi hetimofogiyawage, Meteya asapo fgo’o mo Sile molama gaga gwa giya.

2 Meta Islaiyele towete opgagi tguto mi metefa Mosesewego Elolewego alamute yai toseite wa mgimateya, meta meteya asapo fgo’omo mliya. 3 Mete mgigo wa mgiya, “Yawewe tigo asapomo Isipemola wai ata’olagigo. Pagu ti asapo Isipemola mlimate, ti litalehela simateya, meta ti hegla ha pou mi ti hetwahete mliliya, tile su hetwahe tago. Mgole flage lelama fgo’o lama ti hegla hai ai hgoligo hata. Mgole flage geya tigo asapo fgo’omo sete leitatiya mile, tigo wai ata’olamigo fe? Tigo alamu tapoto ga hale’ilaigo. Ti towete opgagi tguto mi alamu tapoto ga hale’ilaigo.”

  • Islaiyele towete tgo mi meteya asapo fgo’omilama mliliya, mgole meteya alamu tapoto. Mi’a meteya Yawewele kailifi m’aitelimigo hata. Meteya Yawewe wele fe hisafi loiloiyalimo wa mgi matimigo hata. Opiyai. Meteya Elolewe Mosese mgigo yami luwaluwa tlage tago.
  • Meteya Yawewele fe mgoli mo ai hatge hata. Opiyai meteya ga fli atiya.

1.2 Moseseweya metego hegla hai hosihamlagi wiyemete ai lo hata #

Meteya metetle wiyemete loiloiyala hata. Mgole Moseseweya metego wiyemete loiloiyala hata. EWFMWetlagete metego wiyemte loiloiyala.

Meteya metetle Isipemolama afastu mlelimigo hata, Yawetlagete metgo Isipemolama afastu mleya.

➋ EWFMWeya Islaiyele ya mala pou ho la hegla mloli mehe mgiya #

Weliye weliye Yaweweya wele ya tetgohe tauta’uligo.

2.1 EWFMW Islaiyele metego wiyemete lolaigo #

 Kisim Bek 16:11-12

11 Yawewe Mosesewego wa mgiya, 12 “Islaile towete opgagi mile yai tosei mehe aya matiya. Me metego ‘i’a wa mgi, ‘Giya lolgi ohite hgomate, aya gigo heglai lolaigo, teime gi fe ala. Giya sohite hgomate, aya gigo yapu pou fgo’o gigo mgi he’amotiya, gi malematewaye, gile su mi hetwahe tago. Gile sete awa, teime giya lelagi toulaigo, Aya Yawewe gile Eiwapai fawi mi alaya.’”

 PIKSA 89

EWFMWeya pagute hosi hamlagi segi mi sete wa he’amowa. Mgole wefa hosi ha sagi wa taglei he’amo late, meta weya ga fafati hata ilaigo. Mi’a weya meteya hosi hamlagi lo totalagite, meta meteya la fga fgoulagigo, meteya mlama hale’ifisgilagigo.

2.2 Islaiyele meteya towete tgou itogi mi te hata #

Meteya towete tgo itogite hata, mi’a EWFWM metego loiloiyawa. Sete pagut metele 'au’to wego ya kailifi ma mgiya. Wefa mgo mgi, weya Eplahamewetl 'oto’auwatgeimi metego wa loiloiyalilaigo.

2.3 EWFMWeya metego Mala pou ho mlowa #

 Kisim Bek 16:13-16

13 Lolgi ohi mlimateya, Yawewa metego ape si meti ogo ago seigi mi mgi he’amotiya. Apei si fgo’omola hetwahete tago. So meheya mi’a apei mi’a mlele, mete apei sesemalehela wa ta’u setowa, sesemalehelama. Talifo ga hlai setowa. La sohite sohe wisapu guski lagete asapofgo’omo mafwituwa. 14 La sohite sohe wisapu guski lagete asapofgo’omo mafwitale, wisapu guski ga fgo’omateya, yapu pou fgo’o hali mgaliya. Meteya yapu pou fgo’o mi meteya hgowa. Yapu pou fgo’o mi si fgo’omola hetwahe tago. Meteya yapu pou fgo’o fo hgole, lgelge tago, ustagi to wapa. Mlagete yapu pou fgo’o fo ga lgawelgawe sili mgo go. So meheya meteya pou fgo’o mi mlele, sesemalehela wa ta’u setowa, sesemalehelama.

15 Islaiyale towewtei tgou tguto mi yapu pou fgo’o agi agi mi hgomate, meta meteya metetle tgote mgi matiya, “Mi’a ame igo fe?” Mgole meteya mi’a lelagigo hata Moesewaya metego wa mgiya, “Mi’a Yawewele yapu pou fgo’o, Yawewe gigo mlougo. Gi ga fe alami.”

16 Yaweweya gigo wa mgiya, “Yawewe ya gigo lehya mgo mliya, Giya gile otou tgitai ta’uwi ta’uwile, tgou tgou sesemale ogo ago mehe mlele, gi pou fgo’o moho tgou tgou sesemale mehtlage wa lota. Gile hou hou sapola hatewele ouligo mi tgou tgou mi sesemale ogo ago mi fe wa lotla. Gitle ga fe lele ala."

 PIKSA 000

2.4 EWFMWeya gitigo wiymete loiloiyalimi wlaya #

2.5 EWFMWele ya kailifimehe wefa ai fli ati hata igo #

 Kisim Bek 16:35

➌ Islaiyele meteya la ya tosei ya meliya #

Silole towete tgo tguto mi meteya fe luwalumo la fe silemote la fga fgouwa. Fe silemo silole towete tgo tguto mi metego sete wa fowa.

3.1 Islaiyeile meteya EWFMWele kailifimo ga fli atiya #

 Kisim Bek 17:1-4

1 Islaiyle towete opgagi oto tguto mi asapo fgo’omola mlilimateya, meteya asapo Repeitme moto mgo eiya. Satewa pagu momotaite meili alo, satewefa teime taita’u momotaite meili alo, satewefa teime taita’u momotaite meili alo, asapo Repeitme moto mgo meiliya. Yawewe ya mehe metele mafgatete mle meiliya. Meteya asapo Silemolama wapatgemate, meteya tguto mi asapo Repeitme molama gaga gwa gimate, asapomowafa gu’o’gu wagege sagito hata mofa ete asapo fgo’o 'e’e mogo.

2 Metefa Mosesewetgote (Moses) yami himafiliya, “Me tigo gu sagi wa le gaiyo.” La Mosesewe (Moses) metetgote wa mgiya, “Giyayo atgote amile tlago ta yami hima fili fe? Giyaiyo gi Yawewego (the LORD) ta hatgeli hata fe? Gi wele flifage aita wa yami hoi gimigo fle?

3 Meteya mgole gu alami ga hatge faftiya, mgole meteya Mosesewetgote (Moses) yami himafiliya, "Mgole meya tigo Isipemolama aita la leitatiya gimigo fle? Tiyayo gu fli gu alami lei faftiya, me towete opgagi ototgu mile tile tgi hewimo mleli mi tigo gu flile hale’i fisgilaigo. Meya tigo lelama leitatiyale, ti tgutete tgi tgutete lelama ta atatlamigo fe?”

4 Mgole Moseseweya (Moses) Yawewego (the LORD) mgi mleya, “Ayaiyo metego hago ta lilaigo fle? Meteya ago fumote atatlami mliliya."

3.2 Islaiyele meteya gu wagege to hata #

Gu wagege he tatwate ai li hata. Meteya Yawewele fe mgoli mo hatge hata. Opiyai, meteya metele lelagi metele kailifi m’aiteliya.

➍ EWFMWeya Mosesewego ya fe loiloiyali mo mehe wa mgiya #

4.1 EWFMWeya Islaiyele metego gu wagege lolamigo #

 Kisim Bek 17:5-6a

5 Yawewe (the LORD) Mosesewele yahe matile, we Mosesewego (moses) wa mgiya, “Meyiayo mele hetgoli witu mo gu Laiyle mofolama maowa witumo ageta, agetale Islayele tgo yahito mi tgo mi leitatiyale mete haplite me pagu giyayo pagu eiyo. 6 Ati pkataiyo! Asapo Holepe molama, Ayayo pagu fu sagola aumate wa gitlaigo.

Yaweweya Mosesewego mgo mgiya. Weya metego gu wagege lolaigo, mi’a Moseseweya wele femotlagete fe tauta’ula.

4.2 Moseseweya fu fawi sagola fe aola #

  • Yaweweya Mosesewego mgo mgiya, fumola ao. Islaiyele yahito meteya tapoto mlilie, meta Mosesewego hgole, meteya
  • Moseseweya EWFMWele fe gu wagege mleli mo fe tauta’ula
  • Gitifa EWFMWele fe mo fe tauta’ula.

 PIKSA 90

4.3 EWFMW Islaiyele metego gu wagege mlowa #

Moseseweya fu fawi sago maole, la gu wagege himgi gwa ga #

 Kisim Bek 17:6b

Gi gaga gwa mgale, meyaiyo fu lolama aoleyo, me meta hgolaigo gu fawihe toutowa. Islaiyele towete tgo mi miyaiyo guwa wiyemete mlama alilaigo." Moseseweya (Moses) Islaiyele tgo yahito metele lgulama Yawewele (the LORD) ya mehe mafgate mleya.

EWFMWeya metego guwagege ‘e’ete mlowa. Weya metego tili taili sagi wa mgi matimigo, hata. Weya mete hapoto lolamigo. Opiyai, weya metego gu wagege e’e’te mlowa.

EWFMWele ya kailifimehe wefa ai fli ati hata igo. Sete pagute EWFMWeya Ifesele oto poto miwego ya kailifi mehe wa mgiya, we ga fli matimigo hata. Poto Islaiyele mete gaga galaigo.

Islaiyele meteya metetle wiyemete loiloiya maligo hata, opiyai. Yawewe gu wagege metego lo totalagite, mgole meteya la fga fgolagigo. Gitifa Gitile fe luwalumo gitiya femo ai loiloiyalaigo hata. Yawewe gitigo fe loiloiya malila.

 PIKSA 91

 Lesen 26 Kwesten #

1q. God i yusim wanem samting bilong stiaim ol Israel long ples drai?
1a. God i stap insait long wanpela klaut na i go paslain long ol, na long nait dispela klaut i senis na i kamap olsem bikpela paia i lait.

2q. God i laik kisim ol Israel i go long wanem hap graun?
2a. Em i laik kisim ol i go long Kenan.

3q. Bilong wanem God i lukautim ol lain Israel?
3a. God i laikim tru ol Israel na em i marimari long ol. Helpim i mas kamap long lain bilong Israel. God i tok promis long lukautim ol.

4q. Bilong wanem God i bin bringim ol Israel i kamap long solwara Retsi?
4a. God i save olsem king bilong Isip bai i ranim ol Israel, olsem na God i laik soim bikpela namba na strong bilong en long ol Isip wantaim Israel.

5q. Ol lain Israel i bin mekim wanem samting taim ol i lukim ami bilong Isip i kam klostu long ol?
5a. Ol i pret na ol i tok nogut long Moses.

6q. Ating ol Israel i gat rot bilong helpim ol yet na ranawe?
6a. Nogat. Ol i no inap helpim ol yet.

7q. Taim ol Israel i pret, Moses i laik ol i mas mekim wanem samting?
7a. Em i laik ol i mas bilip long God. Ol i no ken pret. Ol i mas stap isi tasol na lukim ol samting God i laik mekim bilong helpim ol.

8q. Olsem wanem na God i gat strong bilong brukim solwara Retsi?
8a. God i gat olgeta strong na em yet i bin wokim solwara.

9q. Taim ol Israel i wokabaut i go long dispela rot God i opim long Retsi, orait God i mekim wanem bilong lukautim ol, nogut ol Isip i kam klostu long ol?
9a. God i bin putim klaut bilong en i stap namel long lain Israel na ami bilong Isip. Dispela klaut i bin givim lait long Israel tasol long sait bilong Isip, em i tudak olgeta.

10q. Bilong wanem ol Isip i no inap abrusim bagarap long han bilong God?
10a. Ol i no inap pait na winim God. God i gat olgeta strong.

11q. Ating long strong bilong yumi yet, yumi inap kamap gutpela long ai bilong God na abrusim pe nogut bilong sin?
11a. Nogat tru. Yumi no inap kamap gutpela long ai bilong God long strong bilong yumi yet.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 25 - Yaweweya Islaiyele metego gu Ret Si....html
children.name: Lesele 25 - Yaweweya Islaiyele metego gu Ret Si....html
children.contents:
Lesele 25
Yaweweya Islaiyele metego gu Ret Sifo lama wa loiloiyawa. #

 Lesele Outline #

  1. EWFMWeya Sapu fawi mo laumate mlilile, la weya Islaiyele metego femo sete wa he’amowa.
  • Isipeile tgo fawi miwe Islaiyeile metetgote mafgate mleya. Wefa metego wa la fga fgolamigo.
  • EWFMW sol wala gu walge fage hegwaiyale, wefa fe fgo’omo tomate wa he’amowa.
  • EWFMWeya Isipeile tgo ami mi wa fowa.

 Lesen 24 Kwesten #

Lesen 24 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Gitiya sete matiya. Gitiya mgo mgile, Yaweweya Isipemole towete tgo hlegei fawi mi sete mlowa. Weya metele wi agi ei stu mi metego sete 'e’yate meiliya. Weya wele kailifi tgo Kingemiwego wa he’amowa. Yaweweya, Isipemole oto poto tguto mi sete lafga fgowa, meteya hale’ifisgiya.

➊ EWFMWeya Sapu fawi mo laumate mlilile, la weya Islaiyele metego femo sete wa he’amowa. #

Yaweweya towete tgo gitigo yai yailamigo.

1.1 EWFMW wele ya kailifi mehe tauta’ule, la weya Islaiyele metego asapo Kelalemolama leitati eiya. #

Yaweweya Isipemole Tgo Kingemiwe la Isipeile wi agi ei stu mi metego la hila wapatgeya. Mgole weliye weliye Eiwapai fawimiweya wele ya tetgo he tauta’ulaigo. Islaiyele towete tgo heti tali lofu aliyamai 400 mgo Isipeile tle laume mlilile, mi’a flage EWFMWeya metego afastu la mleya.

 Kisim Bek 12:37-38

    37 Islaiyele towete tgo miya ga iya. Meteya taule Lamesesemola wapatgeya. Wapatgeyale, meteya taule Sukotemolama gaga gwa giya. Mete segi tago, mgole tgo opgagi mile 600,000 mgo hgo mliliya. Mgole towete mile otou miya metefa segi tago, metele tafoto ga fafatiya. 38 Asapo hapoto hapoto mole towete tgo metefa tapoto ga iya. Meteya tili taili itogi mile wisi fawi mile, gol fasi fu segi mi magefeiya. Meteya sipsipe segi mi la pulamakau segi mi haplite ga iya.

1.2 Sekopewele oto au’watgei mi fawite hgowa. #

Paugte Sekopeweya la wele femili, asapo Isipemolama gwe imate, meta 70 pela. Mi’a meteya 600,000 mgo mliya. Mgole meteya towete tgo otou hailens, la meteya towete otou Sepik tafo to mage mgo go.

1.3 EWFMWeya Sapu fawi mo laumate mlilile, la weya Islaiyele metego femo sete wa he’amowa. #

 PIKSA 82

 Kisim Bek 13:21-22

21 So talifo meheya, Eiwapai fawimiweya liwapu fawimola laumate mliliya. Weya laumate mlilile, mgole weya metego pagute femolama meile, wefa metego femo wa he’amoligo. So ohimo meheya, Eiwapai fawimiweya li fawi latila laumate mliliya. Weya mlilile, mgole weya metego pagute femolama meile, wefa metego li itogimlate, meteya wiyemete femolama hgoligo. 22 Weliye Weliye so talifo mehe liwapu fawimowa towete tgo oto metego pagute meiligo. Weliye weliye so ohimo mehe lifawi lati towete tgo oto metego pagute meiligo.

Islaiyele Isipemolama wapatimate, meteya asapo fgo’o fawi mo iya. Fe mowa fafaitya. Meteya femo lelagi go hata. pagu meteya Isipemolama mliliya, mgole meteya femo lelagi go hata.

Mgole Yaweweya sapu fawi mo wa taglei he’amotle, mgole wey alaumate gwe iya. Weya gweimate, weya metego femote wa he’amowa. Talifote sapumole mage mgo mliya, Ohimote lilati fawi hele mage mgo mliya.

1.4 Islaiyele meteya Sol wala gu walge lama gaga gwagiya. #

EWFMWeya wele kailifi la wele hisafile Islaiyele towete tgo mi wa he’amolamigo #

 Kisim Bek 14:1-4

1 Moseseweya Islaiyele towete tgo oto tguto miya haplite meile, meta Eiwapai fawimiweya Mosesewego wa mgiya, 2 “Me Islaiyele metego 'i’a wa mgi, 'Giya afastu asapo Pihahilotemola tatwate i. Giya gile haus sele hosapo mi mlama wa fo. Asapo Miketolemola la gu fawi Palesefalefola tomate wa fo. Giya gile haus sele hosapo mile ti pa’omote gufawifote fe hgola. 3 Mgole Isipemole tgo Kilemiweya wa mgilaigo,'O Islaiyele meteya ga mlimliyawa. Meteya mlama lelagi go hata. Meteya ‘e’ete ga toutiligo. Asapo fgo’omowa metego wa fowa. Meteya ga mlimliyawa.’”

4 Eiwapai fawimiweya Mosesewego la wa mgiya, “Weya mgilaigo, mgole Aya wele flifagele kailifite lililaigo. Mgole wele fli fage kailifi mate, weya metego afgate lelaigo. Teime aya metego wa he’amolaigo, mgole aya wego la hila halilaigo, aya wele tgo ami mi la hila halilaigo, mgole aya metego la fga fgolaigo. Teime ale yahimole la ale yami aumate halilaigo. Aya fe mgoli mlile, teime Isipemole towete tgo tgu mi meteya ago lelagi, atle Yawewe alaya.” Weya Mosesewego wa mgile, Islaiyele towete tgomi meteya wele wa mgi mehe meteya tauta’uwa.

Isipeile tgo fawi miwele fli tlefli, EWFMW lelagi tago. #

Mgole Yaweweya Isipemole Tgi Kinge miwele fli tle fli lelagi tago. Weya heli to hata. Weya hatgitgi to hata. Weya ewiteite hata. EWFMWele lelagi la wele kailifi aumate mliliya.

➋ Isipeile tgo fawi miwe Islaiyeile metetgote mafgate mleya. Wefa metego wa la fga fgolamigo. #

Sataleweya EWFMWele eimo to. Weya EWFMWele femo wa folamigo.

 Kisim Bek 14:5-9

5 Tgo sateweya Isipemole tgo Kilemiwego ya Islaiyele metetgote yami wa mgimateya, meta wele fli fagele la wele tgo hewi mlelimi metele fli hatgei Islaiyele metetgote maflaiyawa. Tgo kilemiweya la wele tgo hewi mleli mi metego fli eitoseite yai yameiliya, “Gitiya gitile towete tgo hewi mlelimigo wapatiyale, ame stu hele tlago fe? Gitiya Islaiyele towete tgo tguto mile wapatiyale, ame stu hele tlago fe?”. 6 Mgole tgo Kilemiweya wele hosetole kalehgu segi mi 'le’leyawa. La wele tgo ami mi 'le’leyawa. 7 Weya wele hosetole kale kailifihgu 600 mgo mi mlele, la Isipeile hosetole kale hgu tguto mi mlele, wefa tgo ami ofisa mitgote kale hetwahete mlo fei gwiya.

8 Mgole Eiwapai fawimiweya Isipemole tgo Kilemiwele fli hatgele la wele fli fagele kailifite wa mliya. Mgole, Islaiyele towete tgo oto tgutomi haliseite la wa toutilimate, tgo Kilemiweya la wele tgo ami mi meteya Islaiyele metego himgi mafgate mleliya. 9 Meteya meile, Islaiyele towete tgo oto tguto mi meteya sol gu Let Si 'wehelama mlile, asaspomogi tatwate mliliya. Asapomogile yahimgi mgo, asapo Pitahilotemola la asapo Palesefalefola. Meteya Let Si 'wehelama mlilimate, Isipemole tgo Kilemiweya la wele tgo hosetole mi la wele ami mi la wele hosetole kalehgu tguto miya meteya himgi Islaiyele tumola tatwate gaga gwa giya.

 PIKSA 83

Weliye weliye Sataleweya EWFMWele femo wa folamigo. Mi’a weya wiyemete hata. Weya Tgo Kingemiwele fli hatgei atisti lelaigo. Sateleweya EWFMWele eimo mi towlaya.

Mgole Tgo kingemiweya Satalewe femo tauta’uwa. Mgole weya Islaiyele metego mafgate mleliya. Wefa meteya la fga fgolamigo. Mi’a Yaweweya hlei to hata. Weya ewiteite hata. Opiyai, weya Isipemole tgo Kingemiwego la hila wapatgelamigo. Mgole weya Isipemole wi agi ei stu mi metego mleskite wa lilamigo.

2.1 Islaiyele meteya heli to. La Meteya Mosesewego ya tosei mehe wa mgiya. #

Islaiyeile meteya wiyeme heli ei hata, mete heli to. #

 Kisim Bek 14:10-12.

Isipemole Ami fawi miya Ilsaiyele metego mafgate mlele, mgole Islaiyele heli to. Meteya heli ilami late, meta opiyai mete fe mgolimo to hata. Ga fafatiya. Metele ta’ehela asapo lafi mo tifile, metele ta’e hapoto helama asapo lafi mo tifiya. Metele tehimola, gu sol wala fawi fo, Ret si fawi fo mliliya. Meteya ga fafatiya. Meteya fe sago hgolimigo hatya.

Islaiyeile meteya EWFMWele kailifi he ga fli atiya, mgole meteya Mosesewego ya tosei mehe wa mgiya #

Islaiyele meteya EWFMWele kailifi ga fli ati hata igo, mgole meteya Mosesewego yami luwaluwa. Meteya wego yami la fgowa. Meteya EWFMWele kailifi mo hatge hata. Opiyai. Meteya metele fli tlefli ma’iteliya.

Moseseweya heli to hata, wefa EWFMWele fe hisafi loiloiyali mo la wele kailifi hatge mleya. #

 Kisim Bek 14:13-14.

Islaiyele meteya heli to, mi’a Moseseweya heli to hata. Weya EWFMWele kailifi la wele ya tetgohe ma’iteliya

  • EWFMWeya Isipeile tgou ami mi tepa’esilaigo, mgole Islaiyeile itogite fe lilila.
  • Giya EWFMWego hatge ta lelaigo fe?
  • EWFMW Islaiyele metego wele fe hisafi loiloiyali mo mlowa, metego itogite loiloiyawa.
  • EWFMWetle gitigo wiyemete loiloiyalaigo.

➌ EWFMW sol wala gu walge fage hegwaiyale, wefa fe fgo’omo tomate wa he’amowa. #

Eiwapai fawimiwele kailifi aumate mliliya.

 Kisim Bek 14:15-16, 21

15 Yaweweya Mosesewego wa mgiya, “Gi ago we hyei ta faligo fe? Ame stu hele tlago fe? Me Islaiyele towete tgo tgumi metego wa mgiya, ‘Giya gu fawi foto mgote i.’” 16 Yaweweya Mosesewego la wa mgiya, "Me mele yalefeya wi tumo ageta. Witumo gufawi fola aumate magetelimateya, me gufawi mofowa tomate lgawetilaigo. Mgole Islaiyele towete tgo oto tguto mi meteya gu fawifolama tomate si fgo’omote fe ila.

21 Teime Moseseweya wele yalefe gu fawi folama aumate halile, mgole Yaweweya gu fawi fole tomate heflkiliya. Weya mefiyalu fawimole ista’ehelama mgihemotile, gu fawifogo tomate lgawetiya. Ohimotlagete mefiyalu fawimote gu fawi fogo tomate lgawetiya, mgole fe fgo’o mote tomate gwa mgale, hgoliya.

Gi afastu la hatge. Pagute EWFMWeya Gu sol wala fawimfo mi wa taglei he’amowa. Si fgo’o gitile simo wefa wa taglei he’amowa. Wele kailifi wele lelagi ga maflaiyaumigo hata. Opiyai. Miya itogi tetgo tago. Weya gu Ret Si fogo hegwailami late, mgole weya wiyemete tago.

 PIKSA 84 &85

➍ EWFMWeya Isipeile tgo ami mi wa fowa. #

Yaweweya wele ya tetgohe weliye weliye tauta’uligo

4.1 EWFMWeya Isipeile tgo ami metego ohimote wa fowa. #

EWFMWeya Isipeile tgo ami mi wa fowa, mgole meteya Islaiyele towete tgou mi tatwate lililaigo hata

 Kisim Bek 14:19-20

19 Isipemole tgo Kilemiweya wele ami miya Islaiyele metego mafgate mlemate, mgole Eiwapai fawimiwele ei hewi mleli motowa Islaiyele towete tgo segi mile tehimola mei gwa iya. 20 Eiwapai fawimiwele ei hewi mleli motowa la sapu fawi mowa mgiya Islaiyele metele titoseilama meile, mgiya metele tehimolama tifiya. Mgiya Islaiyelemole towete tgo tguto mile tumolama la Isipemole ami mile tumolama mgiya tomate wa tifiya. Mgiya tomate tifi alo, tifi alo, mgole ohimo sete gwa giya. Ohimo mlilimate, mgole tgo sagiwele ta’ehete tgo hapoto ta’ehela miwe tatwate gaga gwa gimigo hata.

4.2 Simo fgo’o mlilile, Islaiyele meteya ta’ehete femo ga iya. #

 Kisim Bek 14:21-22

21 Teime Moseseweya wele yalefe gu fawi folama aumate halile, mgole Yaweweya gu fawi fole tomate heflkiliya. Weya mefiyalu fawimole ista’ehelama mgihemotile, gu fawifogo tomate lgawetiya. Ohimotlagete mefiyalu fawimote gu fawi fogo tomate lgawetiya, mgole fe fgo’o mote tomate gwa mgale, hgoliya. 22 Mgole Islaiyele towete tgo oto tguto mi meteya gu fawi fole fe fgo’o molama gwe iya. Gu fawi fowa metele ta’ehela gituwa, metele ta’ehe hapoto la wa gituwa, meta meteya tomate fe fgo’olama meiliya.

4.3 Asapomole Isipeile Ami miya Sol Wala Ret Si folama Ga Hale’iya. #

EWFMW Isipeile tgo ami mi ewiteite hata #

 Kisim Bek 14:17-18

Isipeile tgo ami mi Islaiyele metetgote fe fgo’omote mafgate mleya. #

 Kisim Bek 14:23-29

 PIKSA 86

EWFMWeya Islaiyele metego loiloiyawa, mi’a weya Isipemole ami metego la fga fgowa. #

  • EWFMWeya Islaiyele metego loiloiyale, mgole meta la fgowa hata igo.
  • Weya wele ya kailifi mehe hatgeya.

 PIKSA 87

Gitiya EWFMWele Milakole afla aitla #

Gitiya Yawewele milokole afla 'aitla. Wele ya tetgo he gitigo sete mlowa. Mgole wele fe milokolemo pagu wa mlele, metele fli tlefli kailifite wa haliya.

 Lesen 25 Kwesten #

1q. God i yusim wanem samting bilong stiaim ol Israel long ples drai?
1a. God i stap insait long wanpela klaut na i go paslain long ol, na long nait dispela klaut i senis na i kamap olsem bikpela paia i lait.

2q. God i laik kisim ol Israel i go long wanem hap graun?
2a. Em i laik kisim ol i go long Kenan.

3q. Bilong wanem God i lukautim ol lain Israel?
3a. God i laikim tru ol Israel na em i marimari long ol. Helpim i mas kamap long lain bilong Israel. God i tok promis long lukautim ol.

4q. Bilong wanem God i bin bringim ol Israel i kamap long solwara Retsi?
4a. God i save olsem king bilong Isip bai i ranim ol Israel, olsem na God i laik soim bikpela namba na strong bilong en long ol Isip wantaim Israel.

5q. Ol lain Israel i bin mekim wanem samting taim ol i lukim ami bilong Isip i kam klostu long ol?
5a. Ol i pret na ol i tok nogut long Moses.

6q. Ating ol Israel i gat rot bilong helpim ol yet na ranawe?
6a. Nogat. Ol i no inap helpim ol yet.

7q. Taim ol Israel i pret, Moses i laik ol i mas mekim wanem samting?
7a. Em i laik ol i mas bilip long God. Ol i no ken pret. Ol i mas stap isi tasol na lukim ol samting God i laik mekim bilong helpim ol.

8q. Olsem wanem na God i gat strong bilong brukim solwara Retsi?
8a. God i gat olgeta strong na em yet i bin wokim solwara.

9q. Taim ol Israel i wokabaut i go long dispela rot God i opim long Retsi, orait God i mekim wanem bilong lukautim ol, nogut ol Isip i kam klostu long ol?
9a. God i bin putim klaut bilong en i stap namel long lain Israel na ami bilong Isip. Dispela klaut i bin givim lait long Israel tasol long sait bilong Isip, em i tudak olgeta.

10q. Bilong wanem ol Isip i no inap abrusim bagarap long han bilong God?
10a. Ol i no inap pait na winim God. God i gat olgeta strong.

11q. Ating long strong bilong yumi yet, yumi inap kamap gutpela long ai bilong God na abrusim pe nogut bilong sin?
11a. Nogat tru. Yumi no inap kamap gutpela long ai bilong God long strong bilong yumi yet.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 24 - Isipe Metele Poto Mi Ga Hale'iya..html
children.name: Lesele 24 - Isipe Metele Poto Mi Ga Hale'iya..html
children.contents:
Lesele 24
Isipe Metele Poto Mi Ga Hale’iya. #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Piksa 079, 080, 081, 082
  • Skit props: Lamb, blood (water/red), doorposts (2-3), angel of death identifier (spooky mask, maybe a weapon?), participants to go into the houses, a poto to die, ‘egyptian/pharaoh’ identifiers.
  • kisim bek11:1
  • kisim bek11:4-5
  • kisim bek11:6
  • kisim bek11:7
  • kisim bek11:8
  • kisim bek12:1-2
  • kisim bek12:3-5
  • kisim bek12:6
  • kisim bek12:7
  • kisim bek12:31
  • kisim bek12:32-33
  • kisim bek12:51

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yawewe Hlege Fawi Sago Isipe Metego Lolami La Mliya
  • Yaweweya Isipe Metego Hlege Fawimo Lolaigo
  • Yawewele Afatu Tetgo Meheyayo, Hlegei Ai La Le Hata
  • Islaiyele Meteya Ga Iya

 Lesele 23 Kwesten #

Lesele 23 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Flageyayo, Aya ya sahe yailamigo. Ya meheya mgo, namba 10 hoimo, Isipe metele hoi fawi metele fagote mgo, Hoi fawi metele fagote mgole yamehe yailamigo.

Fliya miya afla fli 'atila. Yamehele fli flage ya meili ya mehele hoimowa mgo, namba 10 hoimowa mo ta. Mowa hoimote la hi la mlowa, Isipe metego.

Ya stu miya mgo:

  • Yawewe hlege fawi sago Isipe metego lolami la mliya.
  • Yaweweya Isipe Metego Hlege fawi mo lolaigo.
  • Yawewele afatu tetgo meheyayo, hlegei ai la le hata.
  • Islaiyele Meteya Ga Iya

➊ Yawewe hlege fawi sago Isipe metego lolami la mliya. #

Isipe metewele Islayele metego la mle mao, afgate mle lgei, metele hewi mi tlage fe wa lilami, Metele sosafo ga le totateya, meta Isipe meteya titoule, Islaiyele metego la wa mgila, “Tile hewimo ga wa lete pkateyayo, gigofa tiya ga le ao, afgate le wapatileigo.”

Yawewe mgote hgo ma mgole, Isipe metego hoi sagi mlowa. Metego hoi fawi 9pla sagi mlole, Ilayele mete Yawewele laumate mliliya mile tlago. Islaiyele mete Yawewele afatu tetgo mehe mlili mete laya. Lgomateyayo, Yaweweya hoi fawi namba 10emo la lolami la mliliya.

Islaiyele Mete Isipe metewele fe luwalu mi hgole, Yaweweya mgole, mehe mgiya, Metaga ale otou gote. Islaiyele metegowa ale otou go. Ale tle laumate mlili mete laya. Mgole metewa hoimo mgole mlougo. Oke, Fli ya miya afla fli 'atila. Yamehele fli flage ya meili ya mehele hoimomwa mgo, namba 10 hoimowa mo ta. Mowa hoimote la hi la mlowa, Isipe metego.

Oke, Moseseweya mgo gwa meile, Weya asapo Isipemole tgo wapaimiwele hosapote mgo gwa meile, weya mehe wa mgiya, Isipemole wapai miwetgote. "Ai! Me ati! Gigowayo, Yaweweya hoifawi sago lolaigo. Yaweweya pagu oto poto metego tota’o hasitleigo. Metego tota’o hasite siyaliya 'lapalaigo. Isipe metele poto miya ga hale’i siyaliya 'lapalaigo. Ame oto heglafi, ogo ago yamei, ite tgi metele wale wale mifa hetwahete ta’uwa 'laslasiyalaigo.

Giti pai hgo yai!

 Kisim Bek 11:1

1 Yawewe Mosesewego wa mgiya, “Asapo Isipemole Tgo fawi miwe towete opgagi miya, ayayo hlegei fawi sagi hapli sagi teime tetgomile metetgote mgi he’amotilaigo, asapo Isipemola. Isipemole Tgo fawi miwe wele kailifi gigo tgutete hlite wapatgelaigo. Wele gigo wapatgelateya, giya afastu ai ga hata."

➋ Yaweweya Isipe Metego Hlege fawi mo lolaigo. #

Yawewe Islaiyele metego afastu la lele, Metele asapo stu mote mgo 'i’a la wapatgeleigo. Metele asapo stu Islaiyelemote mgo 'i’a la wapatgeleigo, metego.

Oke, Flageyayo, yamehete yaileigo. Hlege fawi Isipe metele lela hlege mile yamehe yaileigo. Yawe bai givim wanem kain bikpla pen lo ol Isip a? Bai yumi ritim buk pastaim. Mosese bai autim tok lo bosman blo isip:

Giti pai hgoyai!

 Kisim Bek 11:4-8

4-5 Moseseweya Isipemole tgo yahi mote migote wa mgiya, "Yawewe ago sete wa mgiya, 'Aya ohito fli fote asapo Isipemole tome mala ei setlai alaya. Aya ohite setelimate, Metaiyo Potowe meteyayo ga hale’i siyaliya laigo. Pagu Isipemole tgo fawi miwele Potowego, wele oto poto ga maflaiyale mlili miwe wefa ga hale’ilaigo, Isipemole tgo fawi miwele Potoweya we tgote hale’i stule, Isipeile tgu hewi mleli mi sagi sele oto poto wefa ga hale’ileigo. Isipeile towete tguto mole oto Potewe metegofa sete hale’i siya liya hlai 'lapalaigo. Tgo yahi to tguto mi towete yahi sa to hata mlili mi, wa ahowa, metele oto Potewe metegofa sete hale’i siya liya hlai ‘lapalaigo. Isipeile ame kauto mifa metele potowe metego tgutete hale’ifisgilaigo.’”

6 Moseseweya Isipemole tgo yahi mote migote wa mgiya, "Yawewe ago sete wa mgiya, 'Asapo Isipemo lama weheya walowale mgoli sagi ati hata igo. Mgole weheya mila tlagete tepa’esilaigo. Teime mgoli sagi aila ati hata. 7 Asapo Isipemolama hoigite hgole, mi’a teime Isalayele towete opgagi mi Asapo Goselemo hafklai to hata. Femgoli Metego weheya walowale sagitou go hata. Ite sago yaheu youlilai 'e’ete sagi tou go hata. Mgole teime Isalayele towete opgagi milama hlege sagi metetgote aila gaga gwa galaigo hata, metele kau mi lama aila gaga gwa galaigo hata.”

8 Moseseweya Isipemole tgo fawi miwego wa mgiya, “Teime me Yawewego lelagitolaigo, mgole weya femgoli Islaiyele metetgote aila wa mgi he’amo hata. Weya pagu Islaiyele mete hgo lelagitoulaigo, teimateya Yawewe gitigo femgoli haiwawete ai hgo lelagitou hata. Wefa gigo aiyo teimate hapotote hgolelagitoulai a laya”

 Drama 1 #

➌ Yawewele afatu tetgo meheyayo, hlegei ai la le hata. #

Moseseweya tgo fawimiwele hosapote mei gwa meile, weya wa mgiya, “Waiyai! Mele metego wapati totate, meta me hoifawimo me tapoto ta’uwa lelaigo.” Yaweweya mgote hgole, weymgole Islaiyele metego makesahe wa he’amowa. Weya wele afatu mehe flage hlege sagi lelagemi. Hlege sagi lelage mgole, weya fe sago la wa he’amowa.

Islaiyele metele fe tetgo mo tlage ati afgate le lile, mete wele hge tle 'wati laumate swou li late, meta meteya itogi 'e’ete lili lgei mete laya.

Giti pai hgo yai!

 Kisim Bek 12:1-5

1 Mosesewe la Elolewe asapo Isipemolama mlili mateya, Yaweweya mgigo wa mgiya, 2 “Flage tlagete hetifowa pagute hetifo lilaigo. Heti lofowa gile heti pagu mago fo go.”

3 Mosesewe la Elolewe asapo Isipemolama mlilimateya, Yaweweya mgigo wa mgiya, “Geya Islaiyele towete opgagi mgote wa mgi, “Giya hetimofole so 10 mehete, ‘Giya hewimo fe lela.’ Hewimowa mgo, ‘Tgou tgouwa taitawele afa tu ta’ehe hou hou sipsipe mototlage mototlage fe le gala. 4 Towete opgagi seigite li tota late, homesapole tguwe tgo wele ta’ete mlili mifa you lele metefa age feile fe ala. Sipsipe otosaho ho sasapola mlili mi fe hetwaheila. 5 Sipsipe otoho mgo tlage fe lilila, meya sipsipe oto saho lelaigo fe o meme otosaho lelaigo fe. Sipsipe oto sahe tamo fe lila. Sipesipe oto mohowa heti tali lofu aliyamai motlage fe lila. Motowa afahe sgo sagite afla hgola o hifo wa’eau’ mate afla hgola.’”

Yaweweya mgole Mosesegote yamehe wa ya meiliya. Metayo, hlegei mete ai la le hata, Yawewele yahe ati afgate le lateya.

Oke, fe Yawewele wa he’amola mowa mgo, Mete sip sipe ta sato agi agi sato la lele, to’tatale, oke, motole lemasi mehe lele, yoflostula fe ati stata. yoflostula ta’ehe ta’ehe to lati statale, aume mgo tifo wesi he to stla mgo fe ati statale, oke, fe metele hlege mi ablusila so meheya mehe ta.

Mehe wa mati state he’amo lemasi mehe wa mati state he’amo mehele ya stu meheya mgo, meheyayo, lapumo Yawewele lapumo wa setowa. mete ga fe hgo lelagi toulami. Yawewele lapumo mgo wa setowa. Meta, “ho ale sapowayo, ale afatu he, ale hge tle’wate laumate mlili metewele hosapo go.” go fe hgo sapgelami lapomowa mgole wa hali hemgitowa. O, mgole wa lemetawa. Mgole wa lemeta he’amowa. Lemasi sipsipe motole lemasi meheya mgo la wa he’amowa. mlagete tgo gitile lapumo ame hatgei suli, mele hosiho mi, sagi la hemagei lela le mile tlago suwa gigi meili mgo wa su he’amowa. lapumowa mile tlago wa lemeta he’amowa.

 PIKSA 079

Ya stu saheya mgo, Ohiso lehe, flage soleheyo, Yawewele yapu ei sato mgihe’amoti late, weya yapu ei motowa lemasi mehete hgo afgate lelaigo. Wa hgo lateya mgo, “O, ho mesapole yoflostumowayo, sipsipemotole lemasi meheya la mati statowa.” Meta yapu ei motowa mgo hgo hatgeleigo, “Ho me sapowayo, Yawewele sapo go.” Mgole lapumowa mgole la lemeta he’amowa.

Giti pai hgo yai!

 Kisim Bek 12:6-7

6 Mosesewe la Elolewe asapo Isipemolama mlilimateya, Yaweweya mgigo wa mgiya, “Sipesipe oto mohowa sete mlele, gi mohowa fe loiloiya malila. Heti mofole so 14 mehete gaga gwa mgale, Sipesipe oto mohowa fe agetla. Talifole ga hlai mate, Islaiyele mole tgo opgagi somofote Sipesipe oto mi ata’olaigo. 7Teime ame hosapole a’tatlate, otosahole lemasi lele, lemasi yoflo mola atistata, ta’ehela atistata ta’ehela ati stata yoflo wi aume mefela ati stata.”

Ohi sohe Yawewe yapu ei sato mgi he’amotiyale, yapu ei motowayo, tgutete tgo tguto oto poto tguto mi tota’o hasitale, miya mete aila hgoleigo, ahowa. ho ale sapowayo, lemasihe ale sapola mati statougo. Meta hgo sapgela miwe laya. "Ai! homesapowayo, Yawewe afastu lehe mliliya.

Oke, Mehele meheya mgo, ya tu saheya mgo, gitile mgo mlili femo. Giti lotula meiliya, gitile fe hilawa hilawa ya, hesoso ti, mepila mlili so mehe, meheya, mele wetgo la wego afgate le swou tota late, metafa mefa hetwahete lafoulei me laya. .mele mgo la wa 'wasiya lila someheya. mele mgo la lilila someheya, metafa, mefa hetwahete ta’uwa laslasiyalei me laya.

Yawewefa, tgo hisafi itogi fage itogi miwe laya. Tgo hatge soute meili miwe laya. Mele fe yeleti yelete, mele wego ga afgate le swou totate, mefa hlegei fa ta’uwa leleigo. Hago li hata. Mefa metafa, weya mgo la hgolaigo, "Ai! Wefa ago la mafgate mle swou mli lgei sagiwele hata. Wefa piyate mgole wa 'wasiya ma lgei awa. Mefa la mgilei me la fe? Mefa mgo mgileigo, “E! Yawe! Aya 'o mego mafgate mle swou mli lgei a laya. Aya 'o mego hatge pkate mleli a laya.” Opiyae! Yawewefa weya sete hgo sapgeya.

 Drama 2 #

➍ Islaiyele Meteya Ga Iya #

Yapu ei moto mgole metewa mei hgowa, Meta 'o itogite mafgate mle swou mlili mi we laya. Metego ga, weya wapa. Mehe hgo wapawa.

Metayo, fe itogi mo mafgate mle swou mlili laya. Meta 'owe, hago li hata. Sohiteyayo, Isipe tgou mile poto metegofa tgutete ga hale’i siyaliya, 'lapawa.

 PIKSA 080

Oke, Giti hale pai hgo yai!

 Kisim Bek 12:31-33, 51

31 Isipemole tgo fawi miweya So faifai yete we Mosesewego la Elolewego lele, wa mgiya, “Gi eile, ale towete tgo tguto mi tigo wapatgeya, tile asapomo wapatgeya. Asapo Islaiyelemo towete opgagi tgu to Giya mi ta 'wile asapo fgo’o lama litatiya ei, Gi Yaweweya wele yahe aumate fe halila.”

32 Isipemole tgo fawi miweya Mosesewego la Elolewego wa mgiya, “Gile sipsipe mile Gile kau mile haplite litatiya ei. Hale, Teime mele Eiwapai fawi miwe mgi ati, We agowa Yawewele hisafi wa he’amo!” Teime Islaiyele towete opgagi mi tgi apei mi sete iya.
33 Asapo Isipemole towete opgagi tguto miya Islaiyele towete tgo tguto mi silolama hlite himgi mgi he’amotiya. Meteya hatgeya, “asapo Islaiyele mole towetei tgo tguto mi lelama lili lagite, meta ti lelama ga hale’i feisgi lagigo.”

51 Somofo tlagete Yaweweya Islaiyele towete opgagi tguto mi Isipemolama afastu la mgi mlele, metele asapomola la hila litatiya eiya.

Mgole, Isipe metele tgo wapai miweya mgole mgote hgo mgole, weya tisetale, Islaiyele metego wa mgiya, “Gi fiyaliyo! Tigo wapatiyo!” Asapomole lgage meheya, metego mgi he’amotiya. Isipemole poto mi ga 'lasiyalami hgo mgole. Ya stu wiyeme Isipe metego hlege fawi mlo mehele yastu meheya mehe ta.

Meheya mgo, Islaiyele metewele oto pagu poto sagi metego ga 'lasiya meili go hata. Metefa tgutete itogi 'e’ete mli swou meiliy. Meteyayo, fe yeleti yelete me sagi to meili go hata. Meta 'owe Yawewele hge tle 'wati itogi mi tlage mli swou mli lgei mgole, metegowa mgole wapa swou meile, metefa itogi 'e’ete itogi magete swou meiliya. Isipe metego ga tgutete metele poto oto pagu wa heto gu i, poto meteweya tgutete ga hale’i hla i tetgouwa. Metele fe yeleti yelete mile hale’i siyaliya 'lapawa.

Ya stu wiyeme asapo Sotome Gomola mogi lafgou so mehele ya stu meheya mehe ta.

Yawewele femowa mo ta. Tgouse tgomiwe wele he mafgate mle swou meili mise miwegayo, Wega wiyemete i swoula. Ahowa. Tgomigo wele he mati mafgate mle tota mise miwe, Mefefa hlegei lela. Yawewele fe mlili mowa mo ta. Weya mgote mlili miwe laya. Weya mgo, Mlagete pagu Keilewe Epelewe mgigo mli mo. Epeleweya Yawewele he mafgate mle swou meili miwe laya. Keileweya, Yawewele helama ga halisi mei lgei miwe laya. mgigote wa he’amo femofa, wele femofa mgo tlage mlili lapato meiliya.

Lgomateyayo, mgo tlage mliliya. Femofa, Pagu Atamewe Ifese mgitgotefa mgote la wa he’amowa. Mgigofa, mgifa Yawewele yamehe ga la mati mafgate mle swou meili go hata. mgiya mgo mliya.

Yawewele yahe ga matile, ga mati 'wasiya male, Yawewe mgigo silo itogi mola la litatiya meile, la wapale, ha mlagi itogi itogi, tilitaili mgile ga le ale lila, tilitaili itogi itogi i la wa he’amo swou meile, Teimeya mgiya wele he ga la halisiya.

Teime, mgiya wele he la halisi meile, wisi mla wa amou wisi mo mgiya sala la hage mlele, ga la au mgole, o, mgifa taita’u yahe ga halisi mgole, mgigofa wele yahe ga halisi mgole, lgote gitifa la hgoli mi ta. Yawewele femowa mgo mliliya. Wele fe wa he’amo miya mi ta. Pagu Atamewe Ifese mgitgote la wa he’amowa. Ga mgale, meta mosesegote gaga la wa he’amowa. Mosesegote ga wa he’amole, asapo Isispemo la lafgo lafgouwa. Mgole oto poto metego la hale’i siyaliya 'lapawa. meta la mgale, meta Eplahamewele afatu mehe, Eplahamewele oto auwato metegote la wahe’amo mo ta. Wele fe lapu la halepagete la wa amou mo gitile la halisi li lateya, metafa fe mo tlage wa he’amo lileigo. Wele fe la lemeta, wele fe la wa he’amo mo ga la wapatilami la mlilimigo hata. Mofa mgo tlage wa he’amo lileigo.

Lgomateyayo, so gitile la mlili mehefa mgo tlage. Lgomateyayo, gitile lgomate so lehefa taita’u mgo tlage. tgouse tgomiwe wele heyati afgate le swou ila mise miwegayo, Seya fe itogi mo ileigo. weya fe itogi mo ileigo. Ahowa. Tgomiwe wele he halisi meili miwe mise mi, metafa so atamewele halisila gitigo hlege fawi la mlo, gitile la hewi fawimo la mleli lgote la lileigo.

Oke, Mosesewele afatumehela mli flage la ya meili lgo mehefa mgote la wa he’aomwa. Tgomise tgomiwe ga mati mleli Yawewele hge tle’wati meili mise miwegayo, mifayo, itogi 'e’ete lilila. Fe itogi mo afgate le swouleigo. ahowa. tgouse tgomiwe Yawewele he halisi meili magise magiwe. Sefa hetwahete mgote ta’wa 'lasiyalaigo. Mlagete Ifese Atamewe mgile somehe, Keilewe Epelewe mgile somehe, Lotewele somehe, Lowawele, Isipemola mli lgei somehe Yawewele Mosesegote la wa ya meile, la mli lgei femo, mgogi solehefa hao flage lgotefayo, lgomatefayo, gitifa la wa he’amoli meheya mehe ta. Mehe tlage ati afgate le swou. Hele Mele mehe ga ati afgate le swou totate, metafa gitifa fe hapli mote la wa he’amoleigo. Teime safote, Yawewele la gale, silo afastu wele si mgole wa he’amo silolo afastu la lela somehetefa, metafa gitifa mgote la wa heamolei giti laya. so teime sahete.

Lgomateyayo, mgote la wa he’amoleigo. Mehefa gitifayo, mehe late pai ati pkata! wele somehele tilitaili tguto pagu gitile auwa atamewe ifese mgigo la wa he’amo, lowawele Mosesewele metego la wa he’amo so mehete la wa he’amo mo, hatge le pkate swoule, lgomateyayo, wele he tlage pai ati afgate le swou lile, pai si itogi swoula. so mehe gala 'wasiyalami la mlimigo hata. somehefayo, gitifa teime so Yawewele silo afastu la lela somehete la lila femofa mo ta. Metetgote la wa he’amo gu i miya. Bosman blo isip, em i no bihainim tok blo yawe, na planti ol lain Isip, ol i kisim bikpla pen wantaim.

 Lesele 24 Kwesten #

1q. God i tok long givim wanpela les hevi long ol Isip olsem las hevi i bikpela tru. Em wanem kain hevi?
1a. Em i tok olsem ol Poto bilong ol Isip bai i dai.

2q. Sapos ol i laik abrusim dispela bikpela hevi, ol i mas mekim wanem kain pasin?
2a. Ol i mas kilim wanpela gutpela sipsip man na penim blut blong en long antap na tupela sait bilong dua. Pinis nau, ol i mas go insait long dispela dua na stap aninit long blut long dispela haus inap long moning.

3q. Sapos man i no bihainim dispela tok bilong God, wanem samting bai i kamap long ol?
3a. Poto bilong haus bai indai.

4q. God i bin bihainim tok bilong em yet na kilim i dai ol Poto bilong Isip, o nogat?
4a. God i bihainim tok bilong en stret na kilim ol Poto i dai. God i no save tok win nating.

5q. Bilong wanem ol Poto bilong Israel i stap laip? (2-pela samting)
5a. Ol Israel i bihainim tok bilong God na putim blut long dua. God i bihainim tok promis bilong em yet na em i no kilim ol.

6q. Taim ol Poto bilong Isip i dai nau, king bilong Isip i tok wanem long Moses?
6a. Em i tokim ol lain Israel long lusim Isip hariap.
