children.name: Lesele 23 - Yaweweya Mosesewego Isipemole Tgo K....html
children.contents:
Lesele 23
Yaweweya Mosesewego Isipemole Tgo Kingemiwetgote mgi he’amotiya. #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Skit props
  • Piksa 66-78
  • Timlain Nem: Elolewe
  • Scripture Kad

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yaweweya Mosesewe tapoto yai ya meiliya.
  • Yaweweya wele ya kailifi mehe sete hatgeya.
  • Isipemole towete tgo meteya metele wi agi ei stu mile yahi halile, mgole Yaweweya metego hlegei mgi he’amotilaigo.
  • 9 pela hlegei fawi mi mgo mliya.

 Lesen 22 Kwesten #

Lesen 22 Kwetenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Gitiya matile mgo mliya, Sosepeweya Islaiyele metego hotage mleya. Mgole teime Yaweweya Mosesewego hotage mleya. Gitiya sete hgowa, Moseseweya fawite wa gituwa, mgole we tgo sagiwe sete mata lemetawa. Mi’a Yaweweya wego hewi fawimo to.

➊ Yaweweya Mosesewe tapoto yai ya meiliya. #

Yaweweya towete tgo gitigo yai yailamigo.

 PIKSA 66

1.1 Yaweweya Islaiyele youli yami sete matiya #

 Kisim Bek 2:22-25

Yaweweya wele towete tgo tguto mi metego ai fli matimigo hata. Opiyai. Sete pagute weya Eplahamewego wa mgi mehe mgo, wele otoauwatgei meteya heti tali lofu aliyamai 400 mgo Isipemole tle laume lililaigo.

Flage meteya wego wa youliya, Mgole wefa sete matimigo. La weya 'le’leyale, weya metego 'afastu lelaigo. We metego hotage lele eilaigo,

1.2 Moseseweya Sipsipemi loiloiya malimate, Yaweweya wisoufelama laumeta mliliya. #

 Kisim Bek 3:1-3

Moseseweya malama sete siya. Mgole wele Laiseywele sip sipemi wa loiloiyawa. Meteya asapomolama Holepemole tifola haliya. Mgole weya wi sou ogo fela hgowa.

 Drama - Moses and Bush #

1.3 Yaweweya Mosesewego Islaiyele towete tgo metetgote Isipemolama mgi he’amotilaigo. #

Moseseweya Isipemole tgo kinge miwego fe hgola. Mgole weya wego fe mgi atila, me falowaite Islaiyele towete tgo ta wapatilaigo fe?

Moseweya hlei to, mi’a Yaweweya wa mgiya, Afa me tapoto mliliya.

 Kisim Bek 3:9-10

1.4 Yaweweya Mosesewego wele yahimo tetgomo sete wa mgiya. #

EWFMWeya wele yahimo sete mgiya, Yawewlaya. EWFMWeya silole ei mile mage mgo mliligo hata. Weya wele yahiumo gitigo wa mgiya. Weya gitigo fe lelagi toula.

 Kisim Bek 3:14

➋ Yaweweya wele ya kailifi mehe sete hatgeya. #

Yaweweya wele ya tetgoha tauta’uligo, wefa ga fli atilaigo hata. Weliye weliye, wele ya tetgohe tauta’uwa.

 PIKSA 000

 Kisim Bek 3:18-

2.1 Yaweweya wele ya kailifi mehe sete hatgeya #

 Kisim Bek 3:5-6

2.2 Yaweweya pagu so leheya sete makeiya #

 Kisim Bek 3:7-9a

2.3 Yaweweya Islaiyele metele si tumo ilamigo. #

➌ Isipemole towete tgo meteya metele wi agi ei stu mile yahi halile, mgole Yaweweya metego hlegei mgi he’amotilaigo. #

3.1 Yaweweya aumate mliliya. Mgole weya tgo Kingemiwego hlegeite 'e’yate eilamigo. #

 Buke Kisim Bek 5:1-2

Yaweweya Isipemole Tgo Kingemiwegote wele kailifi wa he’amolaigo. Weya Kinge miwego ei hapoto hapoto mi weya metego la hila wapatgeya. Wefa oli tetgo tago.

Yaweweya tgo kige miwe mgo wa he’amolamigo, Islaiyele towete tgo mteteya wele towete tgo mete wlaya.

3.2 Yaweweya Isipeile wi ag ei stu mi metego hlegeite 'e’yate meiliya. #

 Kisim Bek 3:20

Yaweweya wele towete tgo afastu la hotage lelaigo, metego afastu lelamigo.

Weya metego metele si tu mo lolaigo.

3.3 Yaweweya tafoto to, weya Isipeile towete tgo metego wiyemete 'e’yate meiliya. #

Yaweweya towete tgo tguto mi tgu wlaya. Weya sate lafga fgolamilate, wefa wiyemete, mgole meteya wele tili taili mi ta.

Yaweweya satewetgote 'e’yate eilami late, wefa wiyemete lililaigo, mgole meteya wele femo tauta’uligo hata. Mgole mete hlegei fawi mi fe hgola.

3.4 Isipeile towete tgo meteya hlegei 10pela mgo hgowa, mi’a gitiya flage tlagete 9 pela mgo pai atilai. #

➍ 9 pela hlegei fawi mi mgo mliya. #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Elolewe

 PIKSA 70-78

 Buke State 21:1-3

1 Yawewe Selasgote hgole, mage mgo wa mgiya. La Yawewele ya wa mgi lemetawa mehe Selasgote mlemigo. 2 Somehe Eiwapai fawimiwe Eplahemewetgote yailemehe Selase afaito mlile, se wego oto opgomi hgo mle mate weya yamei tago. 3 Sohe Eiwapai fawimiwele itogi mehe Selasele oto opgagi moho Eplahemewego hgo mlele mi, wefa yahimo Aisake mlougo.

 Drama - Plagues #

4.1 Hlegei 1 Mehe Mgo: Moseseweya Gu Mi Lemasite mage mgo Maflaiyaliya #

 Kisim Bek 7:20-

Wele witumowa guhe maomateya, gu fawihe himgi maflaiyale, mofowa lemasite mage mgo maflaiyawa.

Gu Laiyael fole ha mi hale’ifisgiya, gulofole afaheya walgete maflaiyawa. La asapo Isipemole towetei tgou tguto mi guheya aila a hata. Asapo Isipemo tgutete lemasite mlama hali mgaliya.

Gu Laiyelefole ei sato wiyemete hata. Yawewele kailifimo satole la hila wapatgeya.

4.2 Hlegei 2 Mehe Mgo: Soumato Segi Miya Asapo Isipemole Silolama Haliya #

 Kisim Bek 8:5-6

Mgole Elolewe wele yalefe hamo tguto mi aumate halile, Sou mato tguto mi segite asapo Isipemolama himgi hali mgaliya. Asapo Isipemo aiyo soumato segi mi miltage mlili mo go.

Sou mato tguto miya metele ei luwalu mi wiyemete hata. Yaweweya metego la fgafgouwa.

4.3 Hlegei 3 Mehe Mgo: Silole To’usiya Tilou Mage Mgo Maflaiyaliya #

 Kisim Bek 8:5-6

Elolewe wele yalefe witumo halile, magetelimateya, la silole to’usi maomateya, meta silole to’usiya maflaiyawa. Tou’siya maflaiyale, tilo miya mago mgo hgowa. Tilo miya Isipemole towete tgo miya la tgi apei tguto mi afalge lehela gaga lufuliya . Asapo Isipemole silole to’usi tguto mi tilou miya segite maflaiyale, tilo miya Isipeile afalge lehela gaga lufuliya.

Metele wi agi ei stu mi mete itogi tetgo hata. Yaweweya metego la fgafgowa. Mgole Tgo kingemiweya Islaiyele metego hale wapati hata igo.

4.4 Hlegei 4 Mehe Mgo: Hgi Mo’u Tgutete Ta’wiya Mile Gwa Mgaliya #

 Kisim Bek 8:5-6

Asapo Isipemole Tgo fawimi wele hosapola hgi mo’u segi mi tgutete ta’wiya, laumate gwe iya. Wele towetei tgo hewimo mile ho mila hgi mo’u segi tgutete ta’wile, laumate gwe iya. Hgi mo’u segi mi mgale, Asapo Isipemole silo tguto mi la fgo fgouwa.

4.5 Hlegei 5 Mehe Mgo: Yawewe Tgi Apei Hewi mi Siyasi Mgi He’amotiya #

 Kisim Bek 9:6

Yaweweya siyasi fawi malama mgi he’amotiya. Isipemole towetei tgoule tgi apei hewi tguto mi ga hale’i fisgiya. Mi’a Islaiyele towetei tgoule tgi apei mi falowaite mlilile, sagowa ga hale’i migo hata. Isipeile tgo fawi miwe fli hatge luwalu mlili mi hali mgale, la hatgitgitiya.

Meteya Tgiapei metele wi agi ei stu mi metego lotumeile, mgole wiyemete hata, Yaweweya metego mata’o lemetawa.

4.6 Hlegei 6 Mehe Mgo: Yawewe Isipeile Towete Opgagi Tgutete Wapu mi Mgi He’amotiya #

 Kisim Bek 9:10

Moseseweya lisisiya aumate a mle fa’etimateya, miya lisisiya mile maflaiyawa. Mgole lisisya mi aumate mle fa’ele, wapou mole mage mgo hgowa. Wapou miya metego tgi apei towete opgagi tguto mi metele afalgei metele miya wapouwa mgole hgo gwe iya.

4.7 Hlegei 7 Mehe Mgo: Yawewe Sapumlagile Mgahi Moplehe Magete Hile Lgu La Mage Pla Lilati Asapo Isipemolama Mgi He’amotiya #

 Kisim Bek 9:23

Teime Mosesewe wele witumo aumate halile, la Yawewe Sapumlagile plamo mgahi moplehe magete hile lgu la mage asapo Isipemoto mgo mgi he’amotiya, mga hi he. Teimate weya pla lilati mgi he’amotiya asagihe aume malama pla lilati mgi he’amotiya.

Mgole pagu Isipemole towete tgou heglafi mi pagu mgoli sagi hgo alo hata. Eiwapai fawi miwe asagihe aume asagihela mgahi mople fawimehe mgi he’amotiya. Teime plamo mgi he’amotiya

Sapumlagile mgahi fawi moplehe la pla lilatimo mgi he’amotimateya, asapo Isipemole towete opgagi metele afa lgei la mamgo tleliteiya. Lilati ho mei tage tili le mage, metele afa lgei malama mi ho ma tlitiliya, mgo tleliteiya. Hosi hamlagi tgou mgahi moplemehele mifa ga la fgafgouwa. Asapo Isipemole towet opgagi tguto mi metego la fgafgouwa. Metele hosi mile hou hamlagi la tgei apei yalema mi asapo Isipemole hosi mi lama tili taili hosi sgomo mie lama mlilimi, mgahi moplemehele mifa ga la fgafgouwa.

4.8 Hlegei 8 Mehe Mgo: Yawewe Ho’a mi Mgi He’amotiya #

 Kisim Bek 10:14

Asapo Isipmolama ho’a segisegite mi asapomle sgo sgomo mapeteli wa mliliya. Asapo Isipemole simofaiyo ohite hgowa ohite hgoliya, Ho’a hapli sagi go hata, segi tago.

Sete pagute ho’a tili taili mgo gi sagi hgo hata igo. Teime safote mgo gi ho’a tau’wile matgetelimi mi aila hgo hata.

Ho’a mile mgale, simofa Isipemole simola la slasiyau wisapu wisiwi tiltaili mi ma 'lapa 'e’e la slasiya, ho’amile. Silomofa tgepute maflaiyawa, mi’a ho’ami mgo go. Ame wisapu wiwliwi wisiwi wiyei mgahi moplehe hile lgu mage mehe afastute mlili tili tailimi ho’a mi la slasiyau, ame wiyeiwi wisapu wiyei ‘au’au wisapu ‘au’au wi agi agi mi masasatiya, ho’a mile.

4.9 Hlegei 9 Mehe Mgo: Yawewe Ohimo Mgi He’amotiya #

 Kisim Bek 10:14

  • mgole asapo Isipemola ohimo gaga gwa galaigo, ohimowa ustagi fawi tetgo, meteya ohimowa hoite metele flifageya tlelitei mage mgo mliliya
  • Meteya ohimole hlite la fgafgolaigo.
  • Moseseweya wele yalefe asagihela aume halimateya, ohimo gaga himgi gwa giya. Somofogiya mofowa asapo Ispemolama ohimo mliliya.

 Lesen 23 Kwesten #

1q. Bilong wanem Yawe i laik helpim ol Israel i lusim Isip?
1a. Yawe i no inap lusim tok promis bilong em yet. Em i laik salim Poto i kamap long lain bilong Israel olsem em i bin tokaut bipo long Abraham. Na tu, Yawe i bin lukim hevi bilong ol na em i harim krai bilong ol, olsem na em i sori long ol.

2q. Moses i lukim paia i lait long wanpela liklik diwai, tasol bilong wanem dispela diwai i no paia olgeta?
2a. Diwai i no paia olgeta, long wanem, Yawe i gat olgeta strong na em yet i stap long diwai na mekim olsem.

3q. Yawe i tokaut long wanpela nem bilong em yet olsem, “Mi Yet Mi Stap Olsem.” Dispela nem i gat wanem mining bilong en?
3a. Yawe i bin stap oltaim oltaim na nau tu em i stap yet. Yawe i stap gut long strong bilong em yet. Em i no sot long wanpela samting. Em i bin mekim kamap olgeta samting, olsem na em i stap antap long olgeta samting.

4q. Yawe i laik yusim dispela bikhet king bilong Isip long soim wanem samting long olgeta manmeri?
4a. Yawe i laik yusim king bilong soim bikpela strong bilong en long olgeta manmeri na bai ol i save olsem, Yawe bilong Israel tasol i Yawe tru. Ol arapela i giaman Yawe tasol.

5q. Sapos yumi no mekim wanpela samting yet o autim tok yet, ating Yawe i save pinis long dispela samting yumi i laik tok o mekim?
5a. Yes, Yawe i save long olgeta samting yumi bai i mekim. Maski yumi no mekim dispela samting yet o yumi no tingim yet, Yawe i save pinis.

6q. Long wanem kain rot Yawe i bin soim strong bilong en long Isip na Israel?
6a. Yawe i salim ol bikpela hevi i kamap long ol Isip.

7q. Husait inap long tok aut ol wan wan hevi i bin kamap long Isip?
7a. Wara Nail i kamap blut, rokrok, natnat, flies, ol animal i dai, buk i kamap long skin, ren ais, grasopa, bikpela tudak.

8q. Bilong wanem ol Israel i no kisim ol hevi wantaim Isip?
8a. Yawe i laikim ol na em i marimari long ol; Yawe i no inap lusim tingting long tok promis bilong em yet; King bilong Isip i mas save olsem, Yawe bilong Israel em tasol i Yawe tru.

9q. Ating Israel i gutpela stretpela lain tasol, na long dispela as tasol ol hevi i no kamap long ol, a?
9a. Nogat. Ol Israel tu i sinman na ol inap kisim bagarap wantaim Isip, tasol long marimari bilong Yawe tasol ol i abrusim bagarap.

10q. Taim wan wan hevi i kamap long Isip, orait King i tok wanem?
10a. Em i save tok orait long Israel i ken i go, na em i askim Moses long rausim dispela hevi.

11q. Tasol bihain, taim Yawe i rausim hevi gen, king i save mekim wanem?
11a. Em i save pasim tingting bilong en na senisim tok gen na em i no larim ol Israel i go.

12q. Ating Yawe i kirap nogut, taim king i senisim tok bilong en?
12a. Nogat. Yawe i save pinis olsem king bai i mekim olsem.

children.name: Lesele 22 - Islaiyele meteya asapo Isipemolama ....html
children.contents:
#Lesele 22
Islaiyele meteya asapo Isipemolama segite wa gituwa.

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Skit props: King Hat, Whip
  • Piksa 57,58, 59, 60, 62, 65
  • Timlain Nem: Mosesewe
  • Scripture Kad:

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Isipeile Tgo fawimiweya Sosepewego tgo yahito miwe mliya.
  • Sospeweya asapo Isipemo wa hotage mleya.
  • Islaiyele towete tgo segite wa gitale, mgole Isipemole Tgo agi agi Kingemiweya haliya.
  • Moseseweya fawite wa gituwa.

 Lesen 21 Kwesten #

Lesen 21 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitiya sete matiya. Gitiya matile mgo mliya, Yawewele towete tgo meteya segite hale wa tifimigo hata. Mi’a Aisakewele Oto pafe miwe Sekopeweya Yawewele ya kailifi mehe sete hatge mleya. Mgole Yaweweya wele yahimo maflaiyawa. Wefa wego 12 pela otou opgagi mi sete mlowa. Mi’a wele otou fe luwalu luwalu mo mgo mliya. Meteya metele hoitowe Sosepewego atatlamigo, mi’a hale meteya wego wisi silfa mi sete salileiya.

➊ Isipeile Tgo fawimiweya Sosepewego tgo yahito miwe mliya. #

Fe mgoli mgo hgolate, Gitiya lelagitoulaigo, Yawewele lelagi la wele kailifi aumate mliliya.

 PIKSA 57&58

Buk State 41:14-16

Tgo Isipe fawi miwele tetahe go. Asapo Isipemole Tgo fawimiwele tetahe go. Mi’a weya tgo sagiwe to hata. Tgo sagi weya wego tetahele stu mehe wa mgi mehe to hata. Wefa hgoligo hata, ga fafati hata.

Gitiya gitile tetai afla aitla. Paguwa EWFMWeya tetai mite towete tgo wa mgilaigo. Mi’a meteya buk baibele mo so pagumehe to hata. Gitiya buk baibele mo to go. Mgole gitiya buk baibelemola fe aitla. Buk baibelemowa ya mehele mahele maflaiyaligo hata.

Sosepeweya tgo Isipe fawi miwele tetahele stuhe wa yaiya. Sosepewetle tgo Isipe fawi miwele tetahele stuhe wiyemete ai yai hata, Wefa EWFMWele ya tetgohe hatge mleya. EWFMW Sosepewego loiloiyawa.

➋ Sospeweya asapo Isipemo wa hotage mleya. #

Fe mgoli mgo hgolate, Gitiya lelagitoulaigo, mgole weliye weliye Yaweweya wele ya tetgohete tauta’uligo.

 PIKSA 59

 Buk State 41:39-40, 48-49

  • Tgo Isipe fawi miwe Sosepewego yahito mlowa

 Buk State 43:1-2

  • Sosepewele tgistgo mete Asapo Isipemolama mgale, hosi hamlagi fgeilamigo.
  • Sosepewe wele tgi stgo metego wa mgiya, “Aya gile wafe alaya”

 Buk State 45:26

 Buk State 46:5-7

  • Islaiyele towete tgo tguto mete asapo Isipemolama ‘i’a fowa.
  • Sosepeweya wele lailemehe sete hale’ifisgiya.
  • Sosepeweya wele tgi stgo mete pagu asapo Isipemolama sete hale’ifisgiya.

➌ Islaiyele towete tgo segite wa gitale, mgole Isipemole Tgo agi agi Kingemiweya haliya. #

Sateleweya Yawewele femo la fgafgolami, mgole Sateleweya EWFMWele eimo to.

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Mosesewe

 PIKSA 60 & 62

 Kisim Bek 1:8-11

  • Islaiyele towete tgou segi mi fawite gwa mga tifiya.

 Kisim Bek 1:15-22

  • Asapo Isipeile tgo fawi agi agi miwe islaiyele towete tgou wefa metetgote hatge luwalu to wlaya.
  • Satalewe Isipeile tgo fawi agiagi miwele fli hatge ga pauli eiya.
  • Satalewe giti tgutete la fgolamigo.
  • EWFMWeya Islaiyele towete tgo tguto mi loiloiyawa.
  • EWFMWeya wele ya kailifi pagu Islaiyele metego mgi mehe wefa ai fli ati hata.
  • EWFMWeya Islaiyele towete tgo tguto mi metele asapomolama wefa metego leitatiyalamigo.

 Kisim Bek 2:1-4

  • Mosesewele Maiyase wego hgo mlele, la se wego loiloiyawa.

 Kisim Bek 2:5-10

  • Isipeile tgo fawimi wele Otomiseya Mosesewego mapile, la mleya.

 PIKSA 63

  • EWFMW Mosesewele hewi fawi sagole hatgeya.
  • Satalewe EWFMWele fe itogi mo ai folaigo hata.
  • Gitiya EWFMWele kailifi la wele lelagi mo giti pai ‘aitala.

➍ Moseseweya fawite wa gituwa. #

Sataleweya Yawewego wiyemete wa folaigo hata. Yaweweya Satalewego la hila wapatgeya.

 PIKSA 65

 Kisim Bek 2:11

  • Moseseweya fawite wa gituwa
  • Islaiyele towete tgo tguto miya Isipeile towete opgagi mile tle laume mlilie, EWFMW Islaiyele tgou loiloiyalamigo.

 Kisim Bek 2:12-14

  • Sataleweya silole towete tgo tguto mi wele tle laume metetgote wa lotowa.
  • Gitiya fe luwalumo o fe silemole tle laume lililateya, meta giti tle ai ga gwa hata. Opiyai gitiya wiyemete hata.

 Kisim Bek 2:15

  • Moseseweya asapo Mitiyalemo himgi heli iya.

 Drama #

 Lesen 22 Kwesten #

1q. Husat i givim save long Josep na em i autim as mining bilong driman?
1a. Yawe yet i bin givim save long Josep.

2q. As mining bilong driman bilong King em wanem?
2a. Long 7-pela yia bai i gat planti kaikai, na bihain, long narapela 7-pela yia bai bikpela hangre i kamap.

3q. Yawe i tok promis long Josep olsem, em bai i kamap lida bilong famili bilong en. Orait Yawe i mekim wanem na dispela tok i kamap tru long Josep?
3a. Yawe i helpim Josep i autim as mining bilong driman bilong king, olsem na king i givim bikpela namba long Josep.

4q. Bilong wanem Jekop i kisim ol lain bilong en i go long Isip (3-pela samting)?
4a. Jekop i harim olsem, Josep i stap long Isip na em i laik lukim em; Ol i sot long kaikai na Isip i gat planti kaikai; King bilong Isip i askim Jekop long kam na stap long Isip.

5q. Nau ol i save kolim wanem nem long ol lain tumbuna bilong Abraham?
5a. Israel

6q. Bilong wanem ol lain Isip i kalabusim ol lain Israel na mekim ol i kamap wokboi nating?
6a. Ol Israel i bin kamap bikpela lain tru na ol Isip i pret long ol. Long wanem, ol Isip i ting olsem nogut ol lain Israel i bung wantaim ol birua na winim ol long pait.

7q. Husat i stiaim tingting nogut bilong king bilong Isip?
7a. Satan i stiaim tingting bilong en.

8q. Bilong wanem Satan i laik pinisim ol lain Israel?
8a. Satan i no laik Poto i kamap long lain bilong Israel.

9q. Bilong wanem Yawe i bin lukautim gut ol lain Israel?
9a. Yawe i save bihainim olgeta tok promis bilong em yet.

10q. Bilong wanem Yawe i bin larim pikinini meri bilong king i kisim Moses?
10a. Yawe i laik Moses i mas stap gut, bai em i ken helpim ol Israel i lusim kalabus bilong Isip.

11q. Ating Satan inap pasim Yawe long bihainim laik bilong en?
11a. Nogat tru! Yawe inap mekim olgeta samting em yet i laik mekim.

12q. Ating ol lain Israel inap helpim ol yet, o nogat?
12a. Nogat. Ol i no inap helpim ol yet.

13q. Ating yumi yet inap helpim yumi yet long lusim kalabus bilong Satan, o nogat?
13a. Nogat. Yumi tu i no inap helpim yumi yet.

14q. Husat wanpela inap long helpim yumi?
14a. Yawe wanpela tasol inap long helpim yumi.

children.path: static/read/lessons/Kos 1/Lesele 21 - Yawewele towete tgo wa gituwa..html
children.name: Lesele 21 - Yawewele towete tgo wa gituwa..html
children.contents:
Lesele 21
Yawewele towete tgo wa gituwa. #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Skit props: Coat, 10 brothers
  • Piksa 51-54
  • Timlain Nem: Lepekase, Isowe , Sekopewe
  • Scripture Kad: Buk State 25:20a-26a; Buk State 28:10-15; Buk State 32:28a; Buk State 37:5,9,11; 37:25-28; 39:20-21

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Lepekaseya oto mohogigo hgo mleya.
  • Yaweweya Sekopewego ya kailifi sahe wa mgiya.
  • Sekopeweya otou 12 pela mgo wa gituwa.
  • Sosepewele tgi stgo meteya wego atata lemetalamigo.
  • Meteya Sosepewego asapo Isipemole ho kalemesgolama wapatgeya.

 Lesen 20 Kwesten #

Lesen 20 Kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Hao lolgite gitie sete matiya. Gitiya matile mgo mliya, Yaweweya Eplahamewele fli hatgei hgolamigo. Mgole weya Eplahamewego wa mgiya, "Me mele oto poto miwego atgote lo. Mgole Eplahameweya gitigo wa he’amo mgo mliya, weya Yawewele wage hgu wa gituwa. Weya Yawewele kailifi maite mleliya, weya EWFMWele ya tetgohe hatgel mlele, la weya wele tle laume gwe iya.

➊ Lepekaseya oto mohogigo hgo mleya. #

Gitiya fe mgoli hgolate, gitiya lelagi toulaigo, Yaweweya wele yatetgo he tauta’uligo.

1.1 Aisekewe Lepekase mgiya sete siya. #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Lepekase

 State 25:20a

20 Isakeweya heti tali lofu aliyamai 40 mgo hgomate, Weya la Lepkaseya migya sete siya.

1 - Aisakeweya Lepekaseya mgigo sete siya.

Selaseya sete hale’iya. Seya hale’imate, sele oto poto miwe Aisakeweya ewitei mliliya. Teime Eplehamewe tgo sagise hgole, la weya sego wele potomiwetgote silamigo. Sele yahimo Lepekase. Lepekaseya pagu Eplahamewle asapo stumola mlilile, teime seya Eplahamewele asapo Kelalemolama gwa giya. Teime Lepekaseya la Aisakeweya mgiya siya.

 State 25:21

2 - Aisakeweya Yawewele tle laume mlilile, mgole weya Yaweweya wele fe loiloiya malimo wa mgi matiya.

21 Isakeweya Yawewego mi’a mgi matiya, “Ale soteseya otou ai hgo le hata, mgole me sego falowaite ta loiloiyalaigo fe?” Yaweweya matiya, Aisakewele mgi mati mehe, Yaweweya wego hgo sapgeya. Teime Isakewe weleise afei to.

  • Yaweweya Aisakewego wele fli hatgei wa lolamigo.
  • Aisekeweya Yawewele tle laume mlilile, mgole weya wego ofa mi mloligo.

1.2 Lepekaseya oto 'e’la mali hogigo hgo mleya #

PUTIM LONG TAIM LAIN: Isowe, Sekopewe

 State 25:23-26a

23Yaweweya sego mgo mgiya, “He hele afa eite mlilimate, yahimogi hele sufole laumate mliliya. Yahimogi teimate usagu hiyafilaigo, mgiya tomate hoigi lilaigo. Mgole Sago mgo eilai, sagowa lgo eilaigo, mgiya hefkli eilaigo. Ya sagiwele kailifi miya hapoto sagiwetegote la hila ilaigo, Potoweya Pafewele tle laumate fe lilila."

  1. Lepekaseya otoho hgo mle hata, mi’a EWFMW wefa lelagi tago teime seya otomohogi hgo lelaigo, mi’a mgile hoigi lililaigo.
    • Lepeka seya afa eito mlimate, sele sufole laume mala ga tafiyati toutiliya. Mgole laumate oto ‘e’la mali hogi mliliya, Eiwapai fawimiweya lelagi tago, mgi femgoli mo mgigo afgate lelaigo.
    • Hale, ame tili tailmi tolagete gaga gwa gi hata pi’o Eiwapai fawimiweya sete hgowa. Weya lelagi tago. Wele lelagi la wele kailifi aumate tetgo tago. Ame tili taili mi Eiwapai fawimiwele Igu mla gila ai papgo hata igo. Opiyai, Wefa lelagi tago.
  2. Lepeka seya Poto Isowe la Pafe Sekopewe Mgigo hgo mleya.
    • Mgole Eiwapai fawimiwele yahe tolagete giya. Seya otomohogiya hgo mleya. Oto ‘e’la mali hogi laya. Ei wapai fawimiweya ame wa mgi mehe, meheya tolagete galaigo.
  3. Potoweya Pafewele tle laume lililaigo, pafeweya potowego la hila wapatgeya.

➋ Yaweweya Sekopewego ya kailifi sahe wa mgiya. #

Yaweweya silole towete tgo gitigo yai yailamigo.

 PIKSA 51

 Buke State 21:1-3

2.1 Sekopewele tetahe go. #

Sekopeweya sou stalimate, weya teta’sahe hgowa. Asapo Halelemowa wa lafite mlilile, mgole ohimowa Sekopeweya femolama sou stawa. Sekopeweya sou stalimate, Eiwapai fawimiweya wego teta’sahele mgi he’amowa.

Giya yastu lehe hatge swou: Eiwapai fawimiweya towete tgo metego Yailigo.

Pagute Eiwapai fawimiweya tgo sagigo teta’sahete mlowa, mi’a lgomate gitigo wele ya tetgo he sete mlowa. Paguwa Eiwapai fawimiweya wele ya tetgohe tgo sago lo late, Weya tgo sago tetahete mloligo. Mi’a weya wele ya tetgohe gitigo lolamigo, meta Weya gitigo Puk Paipelemo sete mlolgeigo.

2.2 Sekopewele tetahele stumeheya mgo mliya. #

Eiwapai fawimweya Sekopewego pli sago wa he’amowa. Pli stumo silomolama heteliya. La pli leska asagihela ga gei mliliya. Mgole EWFMwele yapu ei wiyeme itogi mi meteya la hali la hla ga la hali la hla ga.

Tgo fe loiloiyalimo miweya Sekopewele oto’au’watgei mile ga gwa galaigo

Giti Lelagi tago. Plimowa fe hali mo go. Meya mele hosapo lafite lelateya, meya ge halilami late, meta meya plimo fe lela. Mgole Eiwapai fawimiwele asapomowa aumate mliliya. Gitiya mamala ilami late, mgole gitiya plimo fe lila. Mgole plisago tgo e’ete wa lelaigo hata. Opiyai Eiwapai fawimiwetlageya fe lela. Mgole wele tgo fe loiloiyalimo miwele mage mgo plimo go.

Weya Sekopewego wa he’amolamigo, Silole towete tgo hagile Eiwapai fawimiwele asapomolama ilaigo late, meta Eiwapai fawimiwele tgo fe loiloiyalimo miwetgote fe halila, mage mgo plimo go.

2.3 Eiwapai fawimiweya Sekopewego ya kailifi sahe mlowa, mage mgo Eplahamewe mlowa. #

Sekopeweya tetahe hgomate, Weya pli leskamola Eiwapai fawimiwego hgowa. Eiwapai fawimi wele Eplahamewego ya kailifi wa mgi mehe Sekopewego hetwahete wa mgiya. Eiwapai fawimiweya wele ya kailifi mehe ga aila fli ati hata. Opiyai, Eplahameweya ga hale’iya, Aisakewefa ga hale’iya, mgole Eiwapai fawimiwele ya kailifimehe tolagete gimigo hata. Mi’a Igomate wele ya kailifimehe Sekopewego lolamigo.

Weliye Weliye Eiwapai fawimi wetlageya wele yahe tauta’uligo. Mgole Sekopeweya wele ya kailifi mehe hatge mlele, le weya wele 'uwauwele asapomola meile, mgole weya heti tali lofu aliyamai segi mi mliya.

2.4 Sekopeweya yahi agi agimo sete mleya. #

 Buk State 28:16-17

16 Sekopewe sou stale, wele lgumlagi sete hgowa. Weya wa mgiya, “Wiyeme tago Yawewe lelama mliliya. Pagu Aya lelagigo hata, mi’a flage aya lelagi tago. Yawewe lelama mliliya.” 17 Wefa hlite mlile, la wa mgiya, “Lelama miliya, Itogi tago! Miya Ei wapai fawimiwele asapomo go, mgole lelama wele asapomole yoflomo go.”

 Buk State 32:28a

Eiwapai fawimiweya Sekopewego sete wa mgile, mgole Sekopeweya hatge mlele, Orait Eiwapai fawimiwetlageya Sekepewego yahi agi agi mo mgo mlowa, Islaiyelewlaya.

➌ Sekopeweya otou 12 pela mgo wa gituwa. #

Weliye Weliye EWFMWele fe mgoli mo itogi tetgo tago.

 PIKSA 53

3.1 Sekopewele 12 pela otou opgagi mi ta #

  • Islaiyeleweya asapo Kelalemolama itogite staliya.
  • Islaiyeleweya Eiwapai fawimiwele yahe tauta’uwa, mgole weya wele tgita mete, meteya asapo Kelalemolama afasta iya. Malama meteya wiyemete mliliya.
  • Islaiyeleweya Sosepewego fli fawi fage hatgeliya.
  • Sosepewele tgistgo mete fe luwalumo mlemate, weya metele tguwego wa mgiligo. Mgole meteya Sosepewele femo tagu to. Mgole meteya Sosepewego eitoseite mliya.
  • Sosepewele tgi stgo meteya Sosepewego fli luwalu fage fawite hatgeya.

 PIKSA 54

  • Meteya Sosepewego tagu to. Meteya wego eitoseite mlilile, metele fli fage mi luwalutlage tago.
  • Fe fli luwalu fage mo gitigo gwa galaigo. Ame stu hele tlago fe? Giti Eiwapai fawimiwele fe itogi mola wapatiya. Gitiya towete tgo fe silemo mleli gitilaya. Fe silemo gitile fli fagele la gitile hatge sete la fga fgowa.
  • Giya ya stuleheya hatge swou: Giti towete tgou fe silemo to. Fe silemo gitigo sete la fga fgouwa. Maski giya lotu lililate, mi’a fe silemo mliligo. Maski giya Gotewego wisi ofa mi lolami late, meta fe silemo mliligo. Maski giya Gotewego Petele yailami late, mi’a fe silemo mliligo. Fe lotumo gile fe silemo ga lausilaigo hata. Tgo Pasta segimeteya gigo wai ya mi ‘wasiyaliya. Meteya gigo mgo mgi, “giya fe lotumo lilate, meta Eiwapai fawimiweya yele malei lilaigo.” Mgole weya gile fe silemo la lausilaigo, mi’a opiyai. Gile fe silemo lililaigo. Teime gitiya femotlagete fe silemo lausilimehe atilaigo, mi’a lgomate giya gile fli luwalu fage fe hatgela. Mgole fe mgolimo fe silemo go.

➍ Sosepewele tgi stgo meteya wego atata lemetalamigo. #

Gitiya fe mgoli mgo hgo late, gitiya lelagi toulaigo, fe sile mo towete tgo tgutete gitiya sete fga fgowa.

4.1 Sosepewele teta he go #

 Buke State 37:5,9,11

 PIKSA 55

Tili taili tguto mile Eiwapai fawimiweya lelagi tago. Wele lelagimo aumate tetgo tago, mgole weya Sosepewego teta sahe mlowa. Wele teta hele stu mehe mgo, teime Sosepeweya tgo yahito gwa galaigo. Eiwapai fawimiwetlageya lelagi fawi tetgo tago. Wele lelagi aumate mliliya, mgole weya Sosepewe la wele tgi stgo metego wele lelagi la wele kailifi wa he’amolamigo. EWFMWeya wiyemete metego wa he’amolaigo. Wele kailifi la wele lelagi mi fawi tago.

4.2 Sosepewele tgi stgo meteya wego atatalamigo #

 Buke State 37:25-28

Sosepewele tgi stgo meteya Sosepewego hamga meile, mgole meteya wego asapo Isipemola mgi he’amotilami. Mgole weya tgo hewimo 'e’ete mlelimo miwe fe lila.

 Drama - Brothers want to kill Sosepewe #

➎ Meteya Sosepewego asapo Isipemole ho kalemesgolama wapatgeya. #

Gitiya fe mgoli hgolate, gitiya lelagitoulaigo, Sataleweya EWFMWele eimo, mgole weya Yawewele towete tgo la fga fgolamigo.

5.1 Meteya Sosepewego ho kalemesgolama wapatgeya. #

 Buke State 39:20-21

 PIKSA 56

Sosepeweya ho kalemesgo mlimate, weya Eiwapai fawimiwele ya tetgohe hatge mlele, maite mleliya.

Fe luwalumo Sosepewetgote gwa gimate, mi’a weya Eiwapai fawimiwele ya kailifimehe ga fli matimigo hata. Maski wele tgistgo meteya wego fe luwalumo mlele, maski Potifalewele sotoseya wegote ya ‘wasiyale, maski meteya wego peitate ga 'e’yatei migo, meta hale weya Eiwapai fawimiwele yahe hatge mleya. Eplahamewele, Aisekewele, Sekopewele fe hatge mlelimo weya tauta’uwa. Mgole Eiwapai fawimiwefa Sosepewego ga fli matimigo hata. Eiwapai fawimiweya Sosepewego wele hisafi loiloyalimo mlowa.

Giya ya stumehe hatge swou: Towete tgo mi Eiwapai fawimiwego yele maleite lami late, mgole mete wele ya tetgohe hatge lelaigo. Wele ya tetgohe fe aite lila.

Eiwapai fawimiweya Sosepewego ai wapati hata. Giya mgo afla hatgela. Sosepeweya hokalemesgola mliliya. Eiwapai fawimweya wego sete wapatiya. Ahowa, Eiwapai fawimiweya paguwa wego tetahe mlowa. Weya wele ya kailifimehe ai ga fli’atilaigo hata. Hale teime Sosepeweya tgo yahito ga gwa galaigo. Weliye weliye EWFMWele ya tetgohe tauta’uligo. Wefa wele fli fage aflaflaiyalaigo hata. Opiyai wele yahe aflaiyalaigo hata.

 Lesen 21 Kwesten #

1q. Taim mama i no karim Iso na Jekop yet, olsem wanem na Yawe i save long ol pasin na tingting bilong tupela pikinini?
1a. Yawe i save long olgeta samting bai i kamap bihain.

2q. Olsem wanem na Yawe i bin makim Jekop bilong kisim ol tok promis? Ating Jekop i no gat sin, a?
2a. Nogat. Jekop tu em i wanpela sinman, tasol em i bilip long marimari bilong Yawe na Tok promis long Poto.

3q. Jekop i bin lukim wanem samting long dispela driman Yawe i givim em?
3a. Em i lukim wanpela lata i go antap long Heven na ol ensel i go antap na i kam daun long em.

4q. Dispela driman i gat wanem kain mining?
4a. Poto bai i kamap long lain bilong Jekop, na dispela man bai i kamap olsem lata bilong wokim rot i go long Heven. Em bai i bringim ol manmeri bilong graun i go klostu long Yawe.

5q. Long taim bilong Jekop ating Yawe i bin lusim tingting long salim Poto i kam?
5a. Nogat. Yawe i no inap lusim tingting. Sapos em i tok long mekim wanpela samting, em bai i mekim. Em i no save senis.

6q. Jekop i gat hamas pikinini man?
6a. Jekop i gat 12-pela pikinini man.

7q. Yawe i givim wanem nupela nem long Jekop?
7a. Nupela nem bilong Jekop em Israel.

8q. Husat i bin lukautim Jekop na bringim em i kam bek long Kenan?
8a. Yawe yet i lukautim Jekop.

9q. Jekop i laikim wanem pikinini man moa long ol arapela?
9a. Jekop em i laikim Josep moa.

10q. Taim Jekop i mekim dispela kain pasin long Josep, ol arapela brata i ting wanem long Josep?
10a. Ol i jelas na bel nogut long Josep.

11q. Wanpela driman bilong Josep i olsem wanem?
11a. Ol sta na mun na sun, Josepewe tabuta.

12q. Dispela driman bilong Josep i gat wanem kain mining?
12a. Josep bai i kamap lida bilong famili bilong en.

13q. Ating Yawe i gat save long ol samting bai i kamap long yumi tu?
13a. Yes. Yawe i save long olgeta samting bai i kamap long yumi bihain.

14q. Ol brata bilong Josep i mekim wanem long Josep?
14a. Ol i salim Josep na em i kamap wokboi nating long Isip.

15q. Wanem samting nogut i kamap long Josep long Isip?
15a. Em i kalabus.

16q. Bilong wanem Yawe i lukautim Josep long kalabus?
16a. Josep i bilipim tok bilong Yawe; Yawe i tok promis long mekim gut long Josep na Yawe i no inap giaman.

children.name: Lesele 20 - Eplahamewe, Selase, Aisakewe Metele....html
children.contents:
Lesele 20
Eplahamewe, Selase, Aisakewe Metele Yahe #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Skit props
  • Piksa 047, 048, 049, 050,
  • Aisak Timlain Nem
  • 2 men, 1 boy, ram, red food coloring, knife, firewood, a burning stick (perhaps one out of the people’s houses from their morning fires), rope, altar stones or drums, maybe God’s bluetooth spika/megaphone
  • stat21:1
  • stat21:2
  • stat21:3
  • stat22:1
  • stat22:2
  • stat22:3
  • stat22:4
  • stat22:5
  • stat22:6
  • stat22:7
  • stat22:8

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Yawewele Pagu La Mgi Ya Sahe La Hatgela Yahe
  • Eplahamewe, Selase Mgiya Oto Poto Sago Hgo Mleya
  • Eplahameweyayo, Yawewele Tle’watite Ta Lili Swouleigo Fe?
  • Eplahamewele Femole Yahe Yaileigo
  • Yawewele Gitigo La Hgo Wiyo’owa Meili Miwe Laya

 Lesele 19 Kwesten #

Lesele 19 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya Tama’i Mago Meheya Mgo: #

Yai afla fli 'atila. Yaweweya wa mgiya, Yaleheya afla fli 'atila. Atamewe Ifese mgiya, potosagigo la wa gitleigo… Metaga swa’u lehele tifo asagileigo.

Metaga Potowe swa’umehe tifo asagile, Potoweyayo, Eplahamewele otoauwato weya mgo gitleigo. Meta weya silole hoimo li tepa’esileigo. Silole wlimole atkatelileigo.

Eplahamewe tlageyayo, silole hoimo ai la tepa’esi leigo hata. Wele oto auwato sagiwe tlageyayo, metaga silole wlimo atkatelileigo. Oke, Eplahamewe Selase mgiyayo, Mgiya yamei tago. Yaweweya mgigo wa mgiya, “Oto saho wa gitleigo.”

Ai! Mgiya mgo hatgeya, “Ai?! Tage yamei tago. Otou wa tifiligo hata. Hago ta lileigo fe? Ya ilesi sagi ta ya meili fe?”

Ahowa. Yaweweyayo, kailifi tago. Yawewele flifage mgo hatgeya. Miyayo, Yawewele yahe tetgo tago. Weya mgoe wa mgiya, “Ge otosaho wa gitleigo.” Miya mgile fliya mgo hatgeya, “opiyae, Tageya hago li hata.” Miya mgole, Ai, Yawewele yahe tetgo tago. Mgiya meile, Teimateyayo, Selaseya Oto poto sagigo la hgo mleya. Mgiya mgoleyo, Oto poto miwele yahimo wa youwa, Aisake.

Flageyayo, Aya Selase, Eplahamewe, Aisakewe metele yahe yaileigo. Flage soleheya metele yahe yaileigo. Ya leheyayo, ya stu he 5pla ya stu miya mgo go.

  • Ya stu saheya mgo, Yaweweyayo, wele pagu la mgi ya sahe la hatgeya. Fli 'atilimigo hata, Wele ya pagu wa mgi mehe.
  • Ya stu saheya mgo, Tetgo yamei mi mgiya, oto ho to.
  • Ya stu saheya mgo, Eplahameweya Yawewetgote lelagi touwa.
  • Ya stu saheya mgo, Eplahamewele femole yahe.
  • Ya teime stu saheya mgo, Yawewe gitigo wiyo’oila mali femole yahe.

Flageyayo, giti pai i!

➊ Yawewele pagu la mgi ya sahe la hatgela yahe. #

Oke, Lgomateyayo, Yawewele flifage mgo hatgeliya. Swa’u meheya fe hale’ila. Silole wlimo atkatelilamigo. Wele ya pagu mgi loto mehele tlago.

Yawewele ya pagu mehe sete yaiya, “Eplahame!”

O, Yawewele yameheyayo, mgote gaga gwa gi mehe ta. Wele ya wa mgi mehe tlago.

Keileweyayo, Poto swa’umehele tifo asagila poto miwe, opiyae. Lowawefayo, weya opiyae. Poto swa’umehele tifo asagila poto miwe, opiyae. Eplahamewefayo, Poto swa’umehele tifo asagila poto miwe, opiyae.

Yaweweya mgo wa mgiya, “Aisakewele oto auwato sagiwe laya.”

PUTIM DISPELA NEM LONG TAIM LAIN: Aisak

Hatge swou! Yawewe ilage safage tou go hata. Weya fli lafi tgou miwe laya. Yawewefa, Weya tgo hisafi tgo miwe laya. weya silole gitile mage go hata. Gitiya 'wasi yei to. Hale pai la hatge! Silole tgou gitiyayo, 'wasi yei tgou giti laya.

Fe luwalu liyayo, Taita maiya mile wa he’amo go hata. Fe gitile flile, silole gitile flile, swa’umehele femo go. Swa’umehele femo mafgate mleligo, gitiya. Yaweweyayo, swa’umehele eito afgate le hata. Ahowa. Wefayo, wele hisafi eimoto mgo tlage mliliya.

Tgo silole gitigofayo, Ai! swa’u mehela eito afgate mleya. Gitifa ga luwaluwa. Flageyayo, Aya Eplahamewe Selase mgile yameheya ya ilamigo. Selase oto poto moho hgo mleli yahe.

➋ Eplahamewe, Selase Mgiya oto poto sago hgo mleya. #

Pai hgo yai!

 PIKSA 047

 Buke State 21:1-3

1 Yawewe Selasgote hgole, mage mgo wa mgiya. La Yawewele ya wa mgi lemetawa mehe Selasgote mlemigo.

2 Somehe Eiwapai fawimiwe Eplahemewetgote yailemehe Selase afaito mlile, se wego oto opgomi hgo mle mate weya yamei tago.

3 Sohe Eiwapai fawimiwele itogi mehe Selasele oto opgagi moho Eplahemewego hgo mlele mi, wefa yahimo Aisake mlougo.

Oke, Hale pai ati! Pefi asapo gitifayo, Eplahame mliliya, Selase mliliya, Mgifa teime otosaho ta hgo leleigo fe? o, ai la hgo le hata? Opiyae. Femo sete kali matuwa. Mlagete, Selase Eplahamewe mgifa mgote yamei tago. mgiya otou wa hetla miya lgoteya, mgile yameite sete hgowa. Miyayo, Yawewe mgigo wa mgi ya mehefa, mgiya oto sagigo wa gitleigo. Yawewele ya meheya ai la fli 'ati hata.

Metaga, Teimeyayo, Yawewele yameheya sete wa he’amowa. Mgole, mgiya mgote oto poto saho hgo mleya. Oke, Selase otoho mlele, mgole Yahimowa la wa you ‘Aisake.’ Yahimo ‘Aisake’ mowayo, yahi stumowa mgo, “sgogi”, Tok Ples Hiplu metele ya mehele yahi stumowa mo ta. ‘Aisake’ mgo, ‘sgogi’.

Oke, Flageyayo, Giti pai hgo yai!

➌ Eplahameweyayo, Yawewele tle’watite ta lili swou leigo fe? #

Giti pai hgo yai!

 Buke State 22:1-2

1 Teime Eiwapai fawimiwe Eplahamewele fli fage ga hgolami, weya wetgote wa mgiya, “Eplahame! Wefa wego la mgiya, “Aya li ta!”

2 Weya wetgote wa mgiya, “Me mele otomiwe tlage le. Aisakewe lele, mele oto miwe tlage tago. Me oto moho yele malei tetgo tago. Asapomo Molaiya mote mgo eile, me wego a’tatale, weya ago lo. Aya mego asapo sago wa mgilaigo.”

Oke, Selase otoho hgo mle tepa’esile, Oke, Yawewe Eplahamego wa mgiya, “Yawewe aita loleigo fe?”

Eplahameweya mgole mgo ga hatgeya, Aya otoho pai la lata. Wego ofa mi lolami. Yawewe Yawewe ga mgi hgowa, afla a’ta’tla, oto moho. Yawewe lgo flifage hatgeya, Eplahamego hgolami, We ale ya lehe, we ta afgate lelaigo fe? We ago lelagi tago fe?

Giti pai ya miya pai hatge swou! 'Lute ameile tlago Yawewe tetgo mgi Aisakego mlo mi? 'Lute ameile tlago ta mlowa? Eplahamewele sgomo fe lela ta mlougo fe? Eplahamewele fli itogi ga hgo ilamigo mehele tlago ta mlo fe? Opiyae! Yaweweya mlo feile, mgo hatgeya, “Aya otomoho Eplahamewetle lole, Otomiwele auwato sagiwe swa’u mehele tifo fe asagi lela.”

Miya, Eplahamewe mgo hatgelamigo, “O, ale oto ho go.” Ahowa. Oto mohowayo, Aisakeweyayo, Yawewele ho go. 'Lute Eplahameweya mgo hatge late mgo, “O! Ale oto ho go!” Miya tetgo tago fe? Miya 'wasi yei go fe? Ai! Ahowa… Yawewele oto ho go. Mgole, Yaweweya mgo hatgeya, otomohowayo, wetle la wa he’amo ho go. teimeyayo, otomohole auwato sagiweyayo, swa’umehele tifo hali asagila ho go. Tetgote, Aisakeweyayo, Eplahamewele oto ho go. Miya, Eplahamewele mgo hatge late, "Tetgo tago? Otomoho tapule, atilaigo.

 PIKSA 048

Oto mohowa, wefa Eplahamewele flifagela tlage mliliya. wele mgo hatge lategayo, meta mgote lileigo. Yaweweya mgole Eplahamewele flifage mgi matiya, Tetgote, wiyemete Eplahamewe wele ale femo hgo late, we meta fe hgo tetgoula.

➍ Eplahamewele femole yahe yaileigo. #

Wele fe la mli lgei mo la yailami giti laya. Hatge pkata!

Oto lohowayo, Aisakeweyayo, Hagile ta mlougo fe? Eplahamego? Ai! Yawewe tlage Eplahamego mlougo. Aisakeweyayo, Yawewele mlo ho go.

Yawe mgogi mefage hatgeya, tetgote Eplahamewe ale tle laumate ta mli tetgo meili mli me la fe? Miya mile tlago la mlo ho go. Eplahamewele fli tle fli mi hgolami. Eplahamewele femo hgo sapgela femowa mo ta. Yawewe mgote wele flifage la traim mi hgowa. we ago ta hatge afgate le swou lila miwe la fe?

 Buke State 22:3-8

3 Metaga, sohi pa’lai Eplahamewe wele tolgito 'le’leyale, wele opgagi mgi mlele, wele otoho Aisakewe ga ma sasita hgo mgole, weya yeli tofatale, mgole wele otomiwego magulamigo. Weya asapomowa Eiwapai fawimiwe wego mgile, meteya tisete iya.

4 So safogi safote Eplahamewe wele lgumlagi gei hgole, weya asapomo lafite hgowa.

5 Eplahamewele tgomgi tgote wa mgiya, “Ge ale tolgito lelama lili. Ale Otoloho tageya Eiwapai fawimiwetle yahimo yele malileigo. Teime tageya gego afastu la galaigo.”

6 Eplahamewe yeli mi mlele, wele otoho Aisakewe fagote wa lemetawa. Wefa ita’ehe lilati 'a mati ha mlele, meta mgiya haplite ga haliya.

7 Aisakewefa wele tguwetgote wa mgiya, “Taita.” Wele tguwe wa mgiya, “Tai, aya lita.” Weya la mgiya “Pai hgo, yelile lilatile mliliya, miya sipsipe matato motowa hailama ta mlilife?”

8 Eplahamewe wa mgiya, “Tai, Eiwapai fawimiwetle sipsipe matato motowa apilaigo.” Meta mgitlagete haplite haliliya.

Eplahamewe Aisakewe mgiya yeli li leli, wa mle hali 'le’leya male, Yawego ofa mi wa lola tilitaili mi 'le’leya male, Yawego wa lola femom wa 'le’leya setowa. Yeli li leli wa 'le’leya ma seteliya. Mgiya wa 'le’leya setale, Eplahameweya wele hewi wa mleli mi tgo to mitgote wa mgiya, “Teimeyayo, Tageya afastu la galaigo! Tageya afastu galai tage laya.”

Ai! Hatge pkata! Miyayo, Eplahamewe mgogi mehe la hatgeya, Hale pai hatge pkata… Hale, Eplahamewele flifage mgo hatgeya, "'Lute, ale Aisakego la to’tatla lateyayo, Yawewe afastu tala tisetleigo fe? Yawewe mgo hago ta lileigo fe? We Aisakego ta tisetleigo fe? O, we fe hapoto sago ta la wa lileigo fe? Eplahamewele flifage mgo hatge mle fei gu iya. Ai! Eplahamewele flifageyayo, wele hewi oto mi tgote wa mgi mefage mefage ta.

Oke, mgiya halile, asapotifo halile, me’i hetale, Eplahameweya Aisakewegote mgiya, “Me fu suwa’e mehe tilitaili mi 'le’leya liyo! Yawego ofa mi lolami!”

Oke, Aisakeweya fu suwa’ehe tilitaili mi 'le’leya male, meta Aisakewe tgugo mgi matiya, “Tai! Tageya hago ta lileigo fe? Fu suwa’ehe 'le’leya li, tage ame hatgei ta la lele feileigo fe, Yawego ofa mi lolami?”

Tguwe Eplahameweya mehe la mati mgiya, Aisakewele yamehela. “Yaweweyayo, Yawewele tilitaili go. Yawewe tagogo tilitaili sagi 'a wa he’amole, ame sagi lele mlate tapule, tapuwa ti lele feileigo.”

Oke, Hatge pkata. Mlagete lgomateyayo, gitile mage mgo go. Gitifayo, Yawewele ame same ya, ame same mehele mgi mati latefayo, gitifa wele ya mehele tlage pai afgate le!

Miyayo, Ai! Yawewefayo, tgo itogi tetgo miwe mgole, wefa mehe tlagete mgi mehe ta. Wele fe wiyeme mofa mgo mlili mo go. Wele fe tgo gitile mage mgo la yai gu i, mago la yai gu i, ya mei hapoto hapoto, gu meili mgogi sa fage to meili go hata. We tgo itogi miwe mgole, wefa mehe tlage he mgi mehe ta. Mehe tlagete afgate le swou.

Flageyayo, Eplahamewe Aisakewe mgile drama mehete pai hgo!

 Drama #

➎ Yawewele gitigo la hgo wiyo’owa meili miwe laya. #

 PIKSA 049

 PIKSA 050

Sete sete pagute, Yawewe wele la promisei mehe. Wele Ifese Atamewele mgitgote wa promisei meheya mgo, “Teimeyayo, oto poto saho, swa’u mehele tifolama hali asagi le hlai la ho go.” Yaweweya sete pagute Atamewe Ifese mgitgote la wa ya mei mehe. Mehele meheya mehe ta. Teimeya mgota la mgitgote la wa yai ya mehe. ai la 'wasi ya hata. mehela gaga gwa gala he go.

Yaweweya mgote yamei mgote mgi mgoleyo, Eplahameweya Yawego lelagi touwa. Teimateyayo, otomohotle, Eplahamewele oto auwato mohotle gitale, mohotle swa’uhele timofo hali asagileigo. Swa’u mehele timofo hali asagileile, meta silole hoi fawimowa tepa’esileigo.

Eplahameweyayo, weya mgole, Yawewele promisei mgo hatgitgile, Yawewele yamehe mafgate mleya. Mgole Eplahameweya Aisakego litatiyale, asapotifola litatiya halile, Aisakego tapu atilami, Yawego lolami.

Eplahameweya Yawewele promise pagu gu i plomise mehe la hatgitgiya. Mgole, Eplahameweya mgote lila miwe laya. Eplahameweya Yawego lelagitouwa.

Oke, Eplahamewe Aisakewe mgiya meile, tetgote, mgote lilami mlile, Eplahamewe Aisakewele hgefegi fokaliya. Yalefegi fokaliya. O! Ga to’tate tetgolami. Yawewe mgo hgo mgole, Eplahamegote wa mgiya, “Mgo afla lila! Mgote hgo! Sipsipe sato moto ta! motote ta’ta!”

Yaweweya Eplahamewele flitle fli mi mgo hgo mgole, “me ale yahe mati mafgate mle swou meili me laya! Ale tle laumate mlili mi me laya!” Oke, Tetgoute, Miya wiyemete tetgo tago. Eplahameweya 'owe Yawewele flitle fli miya Eplahamewefa lelagi mgole, wefa mgole femowa mgole wapatiya. Weya mgo lila femowa piyete. Wele fli mefage tlage hgo mle swou meile, mgole, wefa mgole la mliya.

Ya Eplahamewele Aisakewele yamehefa mehe ta. Flageyayo ya sahe la yailami la mliya. Ya teime mehe la wilei a laya. Tetgoute, 'owe mele ya mehe tlagete sete ati swoule, afgate le late, mlagete ame hatge wisi ousalei tilitaili mile mage mgo ai la le hata. Mehele mage mgo la lileigo.

Mlagete, ameile yahele mage mgo, Tifi mehele stu meheya ame lelagi go hata. mlagete ya stu wiyeme mehe. tetgoute, Nazarene mile mage mgo ta la lileigo fe? Wele la mgile yameheya hagile ta ati lele, ta afgate le swouleigo fe?

Yamehefa mlagete ame hatge yahele mage mgo, "O! Tigo ousalei wisiwi mi ta lolaigo fe? Ame tilitaili ta loleigo fe? Tifa ya mgogi mehe la mafgate mlelimigo hata. Mehefa Yawewele mgi he go. Ya meheya. Gitiyo, Ame hatge ousalei tilitaili to, wisi la mlo feili, ousalei la mloli, mgogi fe sago lo. La wa he’amolamigo hata.

 Lesele 20 Kwesten #

1q. Eiwapai fawimiwe inap givim pikinini long tupela Lapun Abraham na Sara, a?
1a. Ai! Samting Nating! Eiwapai fawimiwe em i as bilong olgeta laip na em i gat olgeta strong.

2q. Blo wanem na God i tokim Abraham long givim Aisak olsem ofa?
2a. Aisak, em i samting blo Eiwapai fawimiwe, Eiwapai fawimiwe i givim Eplam lo lukautim tasol. Sapos em tokim Eplam lo mekim samting lo aisak… Mekim tasol.

3q. Olsem wanem? Ating Abraham i ting olsem God i bin senisim tingting long makim Aisak bilong kamap papa bilong bikpela lain manmeri? Ating Abraham i ting olsem Godi lusim tingting long salim Helpim i kam long lain bilong en?
3a. Nogat. Abraham i bilip yet long ol dispela tok promis bilong God.

4q. Abraham ting wanem? God bai i mekim wanem samting, sapos em i kilim Aisak na givim em olsem ofa?
4a. Abraham i ting olsem, sapos em i kilim Aisak bilong givim ofa long God, ating God bai i kirapim bek Aisak gen.

5q. Taim Abraham i pasim pinis han lek bilong Aisak na putim em antap long ston tebol, husat i helpim em?
5a. Aisak i no inap abrus. Em i kalabus pinis. Eiwapai fawimiwe wan tasol inap helpim em.

6q. Husat i pasim Abraham bilong kilim Aisak?
6a. God i yusim wanpela ensel bilong pasim Abraham.

7q. Husat i givim narapela ofa bilong senisim na kisim ples bilong Aisak?
7a. God yet i givim sipsip bilong senisim Aisak.

children.name: Lesele 19 - Sotome, Gomola.html
children.contents:
Lesele 19
Sotome, Gomola #

Tisa miwe fe hatge swoula:

  • Piksa 043, 044, 045, 046
  • stat18:1-5
  • stat18:16
  • stat18:20-21
  • stat19:1-3
  • stat19:4-5
  • stat19:6-8
  • stat19:9
  • stat19:10-11
  • stat19:13
  • stat19:17
  • stat19:24-26

 Lesele Outline #

  1. Eplahamewele Fe Hisafi Mli Lgei Mo
  • Asapomole Fe La Mlili Mole Ya Mehe
  • Yaweweyayo, Lotewe Metego Wiyo’oila
  • Yawewele Tgo Luwalu Metego Lafgoula Ya Mehe

 Lesele 18 Kwesten #

Lesele 18 kwestenei, hale la mgi ati!

 Ya tama’i meheya mgo #

Fli afla hatge fli 'atila. Lesele flage ya tama’i mago meheya mgo, Flageyayo, Ya Eplahamewele ya sahe. Ofaite wele ta’e, Lote wele sahe.

Eplahamewele ofaitoweyayo, Loteweyayo, Eplahamewe wapatgeyale, weya Asapo hapoto sagote la wile, Asapomole yahimowa Sotome. Asapo Sotome mote mgo iya.

Sotomemowayo, Asapo fawi mo go. Asapo Sotomemowayo, Asapo hapoto sagowa tatwate mliliya. Asapomole yahimowayo, Gomola.

Gomolamowa Sotomemole tatwate mliliya. Mgole mogile yahimowa Sotome na Gomola. Mogiya mgole wa youwa.

Flageyayo, Lesele flage leheya mgo, Eplahame, Ofai Lotewele, Yawewele, Asapo mogile, metele meheya la wa yailami la mliya, Flageya.

Flage lesele mehete ilei giti laya. Lesele flage lehele yastu sahegi sahegi.

  • Saheyayo, Eplahameweya tgo hisafi tgo miwe laya. Weya Yawe metego wiyo’oi ma lgei miwe laya.
  • saheyayo, Asapo Sotom na gomola meteya fe luwalu mo go. Mli lgei mgole, Yawe metegote mli lgei mgole.
  • saheya mgo, Yaweweya hagi ta wiyo’oi lile, wele hge tle laume fe gi he lotlami.
  • saheyayo, Yawewe metego lafgo lafgouleigo, [who won’t go under him, who makes bad behaviors]

Flageya giti Eplahamewele yamehe yaileigo.

➊ Eplahamewele fe hisafi mli lgei mo. #

Mehe yaileigo.

Oke, Yaweweyayo, wele afa mehe la mafaiya male, weya Eplahamegote ilami. wele Yapu ei motogifa taita’u tgutete Eplahamego hgolami hetwahete Yawewe tapoto iya. Oke, Meteya meile, Eplahamewefa mgo hatgeya, mgo, “Hagi la fe?” Mgole Eplahameweyayo, weya fe hisafi tetgo miwe mgole, miya mgole metego heglahatalou mi wa mle mati ho, mle au wiyo’oiya.

 PIKSA 043

Oke, Flageyayo, Giti pai hgo yai!

 Buke State 18:1-5

Oke, Mete heglahatalou wa mle lowa male, meta mgole ga go hgowa. Ga go hgowa. Asapo Sotome mgo hgowa,

Giti pai hgo yai!

 Buke State 18:16

Pagute, Loteweya Asapo Sotomemolama mei gwa meile, weya mlate mei setale, weya hgowa, asapomole fe luwalu mlili mowa weya sete hgo sapgeya. Weya malama mlilile, so safote yoflomola setale, mei hgowa.

Meta mgole, heglahatalou i mle male, mgole, Yaweweya Eplahamegote mgiya, “Ai! Ayayo, aya ya sahe mgo matimigo. Asapo Sotomemowayo, Asapo itogi asapo go hata. Asapo luwalu mo fe yeleti yelete mi tlage mliligo. Ale lgu mlagi i hgolami, afa hale mgole mgote mgo ilei a laya.”

O! Asapo sotome mowayo, Lotewele mo go. Eplahamewele ofaito wele asapo mo go, Sotome mowayo.

Flage gitiya asapomole yamehe yaileigo.

➋ Asapomole fe la mlili mole ya mehe. #

Ya meheya mgo,

Em nau, Yumi ritim stori pastaim

 Buke State 18:20-21

20 Yawewe Eplahamegote mgote la wa mgiya, “Paguwa aya matimigo, Asapo Sotomemole, Asapo Gomolamole, meteya fe luwalu luwalu mi mlili mete laya. 21 Mgole flage aya hla ile, lgu ale mlagite 'i’a hgoleigo. Mete fe luwalu mi tetgote ta mlili fe? Metele ga li latefa, afa lgumlagite ga i hgo stula.

Oke, ati pkata! Yaweweyayo, fe gitigo mala lafgoulamigo hata. Miyayo, Yaweweya wele fe itogi mo tlage fe afgate le swoulami, weya hlegei mgole, hlegei 'e’ete piyate ai lo hata. Ahowa. Weyayo, tigo hlegei mlola miyayo, wele fe mo tlage afgate le swoulami gitile fe luwalu fe, fli tle fli luwalu luwalu mi afa wapatilami, hlegei gitigo mgole mloliya. Yawewele femowa mo ta.

Oke, Miyayo, Simowayo, tomate sgo mo to. miyayo, Yawewe tgo gitigo piyate la lafgoulamigo hata. Yawewe pitate gitigo ai la lafgou hata. Mifa gitigo ga tepa’esi 'e’e ileigo. Ga hale’i feiski siyaliya ileigo. Mehele tlagowa Simowayo, Simowa pitate, silomo tomate fgei mo to, wa he’amo mo ta.

Piyate lafgou hata. Miyayo, wele yahe halisi lila, miyayo, metaga la fgou 'e’e ilei metego. Metegofa ga hale’i siyaliya 'e’e lileigo.

Simowa fgei mo to. Mlagete pagu Lowawele laile mehe la mli mgo go. Metego wele yahe afgate le tota, metegofa tgutete mlagete gufagele hali maspoto metego mli lgei, Lowawele laine mehe mli lgei mgo lileigo. Metegofa tgutete le fa’ete ga lafgo lafgoule, metegofa gufagele hali mgi mgo la 'ifgete mlate hai fgeile mage mgo toute halilileigo, metefa tgutete hale’i siyaliya 'le’la pa’laigo.

Mgole silowa mgole, fe mgo mgole wa he’amo mo ta. Tgouse tgomiwe wele fe ya mi tlage ati afgate le lila mise miwegayo, Yawewele tle laumate li swou 'e’e lileigo. We ga wiyemete itogiteyo, wele tle laumate lili swou weliyei weliyei aloleigo. Yawewele femowa mo ta.

Yaweweya mgole hale wele lgu mlagite hale asapomogi hgolami mgole mgi he’amotiya, wele yapu ei hewi mleli motogi. Hale ga hgo pkatlamigo.

“Aikeya! Wiyeme tago! fe luwalu mo tlage hi la wa ma heteligo.” Mgole hale lgumlagite hgo pkatlami mgole, mgi he’amotiya. Asapomogi hgo stu tetgolami.

Yapu ei hewimleli motogifa motogile lgumlagi. Weya mgole mgo i hgo late mgo, Asapomowayo, 'o wiyeme tago. fe itogi mo tlage mliliya. Meta ai la lafgo lafgou hata. Ahowa. Mgile mgo i hgo late, Asapomowayo, fe luwalu luwalu mepi tlage hi la wa maliya. Metaga mofa tgutete lafgo lafgou tetgoleigo.

 Buke State 19:1-3

1 Yawewele yapu ei sato gi. Yapu ei satogiya lolgi ohite meile, Asapo Sotome mote mgo la meile, mei hgowa, Loteweya Asapo Sotomemole festumolama seteliya. Oke, Loteweya mgitgote mgo hgo ma’ele, mgo hatgeya, “Ai! Tgosagi mgiya mgaliya.” Oke, mgiya mgale, Loteweya mgole tisetale, mgigo mei tihapou meile, he’tite hla meile, 2 mgigo mgo wa mgiya, “Geyayo! Tgo fawi ge laya. Ale hosapote mgote gayo! Ge gele hgefegile, sisi mi wa hi swoule, ale hosapote mgote gale, ge ale hosapolama stalaigo! Geya hao sohitega gele flifage tlage mgote hete toutelilei ge laya.” Oke, Yapu ei motogiya Lotewele yahe la mati mgiya, “Opiyae! Tagefa ‘ete ipou sagola tlagete oulei tage laya. Asapomole ipou sagola tlage oulei tage laya.” 3 Mgole Lotewe la wa mgiya, “Ai! Ahowa! Miya mgo afla lila! Geya ale hosapote lgote gayo!” Oke, yapu ei motogi mgole la matile, wele yahe la matile, mgole weya mgiya hetwahete we tapoto wele hosapote mgo iya. Lotewele hosapote litatiya meile, Lotewe pagu gwa meile, mgile heglahatalo sagi wa 'le’leyawa. Yapu pou fgo’o sagi heglahatalo sagi mi wa ‘le’leya male, mete hetwahete sile, si mle maliya.

Oke, Yawewele yapu ei hewi mleli motogi. Motogiyayo, mgole mgo pagu iya. Mgiya pagu mei gwe iya. Mgiya meile, mgole Loteweya hgo ma’eya. “Mgiya giya.” Mgole Yapu ei motogi hale pagu mgole iya. Mgi hale pagu ga i hgolami.

Mgo, Asapomogi 'lute Eplahamewele mgi ma’e mgo ta lileigo fe? Metego ta hgo ya swou wa le lowa, ma’e mgo la mli mgo hgolami, Yapu ei motogiya mgole pagu mgole iya. Mgole mgiya meile, Lotego hgowa. Lotego hgole, Mgiya mgo, “Loteweyayo, hisafi tetgo miwe laya.”

Loteweya mgigote wa mgiya, “Miyayo! Ale hosapote mgote gayo!” Miya hale Yapu eimotogi hale mgifa mgile lgumlagite hgo stu pkatlami, mgole hale mgifa hale asapomola tlage hgo toutiliya. Miyayo, Lotewe mgole mgigo ga mgi mleya, mgo, “Ge gayo! Ge ale hosapote mgote gayo!” Mgote eitogi mgi mlele, wele hosapote mgo iya, Yapu ei moto giya. Wele hosapote mgo litatiya gwe iya.

Oke, Mgiya gwe ile, Hago ta lileigo fe? Giti pai hgo yai!

 Buke State 19:4-9

4 Mgole Lotewe meteya si mle male, meta ohito flifote, ohimote meta Asapo Sotomemole opgagi oto tguto mi, opgagi yame 'wale mi, meteya ohite hosapote mgo gaga hetowa. Mgole meta ga hete hilafi meile, hete hilafi tepa’esi meile, 5 yaiya fawite ya mei yaiya. Lotegote mgiya, “Lote! Me tgo mgi tigo mgihe’amoti! Tiya mgigo wa pleleilami!” 6 Lotewe mgole meile, hosapo yoflomo matule, 7 metego wa yaiya, “Ai! Giyayo ale tgo ale hoi gi laya! Ale hoi gi! Ahowa! Mowa fe luwalu mo go! Li mgigo mgo afla lila! Fe luwalu mo afla lila! 8 Ayayo, ale oto towete sagi mgiya mliliya. Aya mgigo wapati lateyayo, meta ‘ete ale oto towete sagi mgigotlagete fe luwalu mo wa li latefa, mgigo tlagete liyo! Tgo mgigo atle ga ale yalefelate loiloiya maliya."

9 Meta mgole Asapo Sotomemo meteya mehe la mgiya, “Lote! Meyayo, asapo stu tetgo mago sagiwele hata. Mgole tile fe luwalu la mlili lo, mile tlago hgo yai tolageleigo fe? Me asapomole tgo wapai sagiwe hata! Waiyai! Me femo wapatiya! Tiya ga gwa ila! Mele tigo ga wapati totate, meta hlegei metle lelaigo!"

Oke, mgole, mgiya sou 'ouli hata. Mgile ga sili mate, asapomole tgo tguto 'le’la pa’la, Oto agi oto, tgo heglafi metefa tgutete ma wasi meile, tgo tguto mifa. Metefa mgale, Lotewele hosapola gaga hetale, Mete ge mgi mleya, “Ai! Lotegote ge giya! Tgomgigo mgi he’amotiya! Ti, tgomi mgigo fe luwalu sago lilamigo!”

Meta mgole, Sotomemole fe luwalu mowa mo ta. Metefa hisafi fli itogi safage to mli, metego mgi la loiloiya hata. Miya mgoleyo, Metefa mgigo lafgo lafgoula fli 'e’e mefage tlagete hatge lgei. Metele fe luwalu mo tlage.

Piyate mgole, meteya fe mgogi mo mgo ai ta la mliya? miyayo, femowayo, mleski lileigo. Ai! Femowayo, miya swa’u mehele femo asapomogiya, swa’u mehele femowa mgole mageteliya. Meteya swa’uhele femo tlagete afgate le lilami. Mgole mgo lafgo lafgou lilami.

Metefa mgole swa’uhele femo tlage mgole, asapomogile fe luwalu luwalu miya mgole, mli lgeigo. Hale teime pai la hgo yai! Yamehe teime hgoyai pkatla he go.

➌ Yaweweyayo, Lotewe metego wiyo’oila. #

Yaweweya sete hgowa. Metele Asapomo mepile fe luwalu mowa sete hgowa. Metele femo fe itogi sago go hata.

Yapu ei motogiya ga gwa gala meile, giya mgole ta mliya? Fe asapo logile femowayo, fe itogi sago go hata. Fe luwalu mogo. Giti pai hgo yai!

 PIKSA 044

 Buke State 19:10-13

10 Asapo Sotomemo meteya ga gwa gala mlimigo. Miya mete yoflomotla hali masgutale, hosapo yoflomo wa tasgo gwa ga la mlili mateyayo, oke, tgo yapu ei motogiya ti toule, Lotewele yalefe meisi magetowa. Magete mlele, yoflomo ‘a himgi matutiya. 11 Yapu ei motogiya yoflomo ‘a himgi matule, oke, mgiya mgole tgo Asapo Sotomemole tgo mile lgu lafgou gu iya. Yapu ei motogiya metele lgu lafgou gu meile, Asapo Sotome metefa hgou mapi mati tali touti, haitago hgo stu hata. Lgu meteleifa sete spo fge. Hosapole yoflomo metele lgu ga la hgo pkatelimigo hata. Mifa ga heti mapi he to.

12 Oke, yapu ei motogi mgote mlile, Asapo Sotomemole tgo mile lgu lafgou gu meile, mgiya Lotego wa mgiya, “Lote! Meyo, mele sotose, oto towete oto sagi, lela ta mlili fe? Mele oto towete mgi si la mlilami tatwa meili, o, satego tatwate ta mlili fe? Metle la lili late, pagu metego youleyo, mete asapolo fe wapatgeya! Ga fe ilami. 13 Tagefa Asapo lo tatwate lafgoula mile tlago. Yaweweya asapolole fe luwalu mote hgo sapge mile tlago. Yaweweya asapolole fe yeleti yelete, fe luwalu mifa weya lelagi mgole, Yaweweya tagego mgi he’amotimigo. Mgote hgo lgei mgole. Tage asapo lole fe yeleti yelete, fe luwalu luwalu mile tlagote asapo lo lafgoulami.”

O! Yaweweya sete hgowa! Asapo mogile fe luwalu luwalu miya sete hgo mgole, Yaweweya mgole mehe mgiya, "Ai! Asapo logile femowayo, sete hgo sapgeya. Miya Yaweweya mgo lileigo, fu lilati to mi la go mgi he’amotiyale, metego fe lafgou tetgoulami.

Mgole Yapu ei motogi mgihe’amotiyale, asapomogi fe lafgou tetgoulami. Miyayo, Yaweweya Lotego sete hgowa. Mgole Yapu ei motogi wiyo’owa mile tlago sete hgole, mgiya mgole Lotego hgo wiyo’oiya. Weya mete tapoto hetwahete lafgou lagemi.

Oke, Yaweweya mgole asapomogi lafgolami hale mgole, Lotego wa ya mei hetetaiya, Yapu ei motogiya. “Me lela afla lila! Me asaposagote ile, asapologiya wa lafgoulami mliya. Gile ga i late, teime, afla la hi la hgola! Asapologite mgo afla la hi la hgola. Gile ga la hi la hgo late, gifayo, meta hetwahete ta’u lafgouleigo.”

Yawewe mlagete Atamewe Ifese mgigo la wa mgi mgo la wa mgiya, Lotewe mgole mgote wa mgi amou mi ta. “Gi ga i lateyayo, teime afla la hi la hgola. Amou.”

Giti pai hgo yai.

 PIKSA 045

 Buke State 19:17

➍ Yawewele tgo luwalu metego lafgoula ya mehe. #

Oke, Yaweweya mgole asapomogi lafgoulami mliya. Asapomogi tgutete mgogi lafgoulami mgole, weya mgole mgiya.

Mgole Yawe hale metego maleseyawa. Yawewele femowa mo ta. Mgo, Hale mete sagi hago ta afgate leleigo fe? Metele afgate le totate, meta tgutete lafgouleigo.

Mgole hale metego sohe hale mgole, lafite mlowa. Mgote satewe hale tigo ta afgete leleigo fe? Hale mile tlago hale gi agete himgi lafgou hata.

Yawewefa sete wele yahefa mgi hapli mehe ta. weya hgole, mgo, “Ahowa. Satewe ale hge tle laumate gaga gwa li hata. Metafa ga lafgouleigo.”

Giti pai hgo yai!

 PIKSA 046

 Buke State 19:24-26

24 Oke, Mgole Lotewe meteya mei alo, mei alo, talifo hali gei mateya, Loteweya asapo Sowa molama mei gwa meile, meta Yaweweya fu hleito fawi mi mgihe’amotiyale, asapo Sotomemole, Gomolamole mogi fe lafgoulami. Fu fawi mi fu mi hlei lelage. Fu miya lilati tapoto asapo mogi fe lafgoulami. 25 Mgole Yawewele li wele lati mgihe’amotiyale, mgo mliya, towete tgo tguto, tilitaili ogo ago, si molama, la mlili gei mi, mifa tgutete mifa lilatile ga ho mei sete lafgouwa. 26 Mgole Lotewe asapomola mei gwa meile, asapo Sowa mola mei gwa meile, wele sotoseya la hi la hgowa, asapo Sotomemo la hi la hgowa. Mgole Lotewele sotoseya la hi la hgole, meta seya fu yapu ‘ose fumole mage mgo maflaiyale, femola mlate setowa.

Femo yamehe afla fli atila. fe luwalu asapo mogile mli femowa, femowa meteya hatge femo ta mli fe? Yamehe afla fli 'atila. Hale pai hatge pkata! Mete feluwalu mo Yapu ei motogite ta wa he’amo fe? Opiyae! Asapomole mete Yapu ei moto mgigo fe luwalu sago li hata. Mgigo mgole femo tlage wa he’amowa.

Mete fe luwalu sago li hataigo. Miyayo, Metele fli luwalu hatge mefagele femowa mo ta. Yaweweya mgogi fe fli luwalu miyayo, weya mgogi mite la hatge itogi meili migo hata. Mete swa’u mehele femo tlage afgate lelile, Metele swa’uhele tle laumate lili lateyayo, meta mgole, Yaweweya mgole lafgo lafgouleigo, Asapomogiya.

Yaweweya tgoule eksen sagi go hata. We eksene sagi hgo hata. Miya weya flifagelama, tgo fli tle fli mite sete hgowa. Metele fe luwalu hatgeli mowa. Yaweweya mgole, metele femowa sete hgo sapgeya. Metele flitle fli miya sete hgo sapgeya. Yaweweya mgole metego mile tlago lafgoulaigo.

Yawewele lgu mlagiya, gitiya mgo pai hgoliya, fe ogo ago fe yeleti yelete miya, itogi tago. Ahowa. Yawewele lgumlagi mgo hgowa, Miyayo, fawi tago. Fe ogo ago, yeleti yelete, fli tle fli ame hatge luwalu mili miyayo, fawi tago. Yawewele lgumlagiya mgo hgoli mgole, Mifa mgole, Asapomowa mgole lafgouleigo.

Yaweweya mgole hgowa. Lotewe ototgita sotose mete, Mete fe ogomo mli mate miya sotose ga halisiya. Yawewele mgogi mehe, atile hata. Lotewele sotoseya mgole, metele femo i mate, seya teime la hi la hgowa. Seya teime la hi la hgo mgole, O! sefa fumote maflaiyale setowa. Yaweweya wele lgumlagiya mgo, gitiya mgote pai wileigo. O! Silole towete tgou giti. "Ai! Me hale tilitaili ogo mego. Wele mgi meheyo, ai afgate le hata. Ala tlagete fe ogo sage hale a tlagete pai li. Ai! Yawewefa sete hgo sapgeya. Wele mgo la mli fli mefagefa, weya hgo sapgeya. Metafa weya mgote lileigo. Mlagete, Lotewele soto miseyayo, wele la wa mgi amou mehe afgate le hata. Seyayo, teime la hi la hgo mgole, wele yahe halisiya. Seya teime la hi la hgo mgole, segofa mgole fumote maflaiya male setowa. Ya giti yamehe pai hatge lote swou. Lotewe wele sotosele mli ya mehe pai hatge lote swou.

Yawewele la mgi yasahe, ai la 'wasiya hata. Mifa tetgote mgi hapli mehe ta.

Gitifa sete hgowa! Yawewele make wa lemeta mo. Swa’u mlagu mehete wa he’amo mo ta. Swa’u mlagu mole mage wa he’amowa. Mowayo, makemo wa lemetawa. wa lata wa he’amowa. Gititle ga fe hgolami. Teimateyayo, mgogi fe sago tou go hata. Gufagete halile, tgou hali maspotale, gu hale touti halila fe me sago tou go hata. Mofayo, Weya makemote wa mamgete mo ta. Lowawele laine mehete mli mate, wa he’amo mo ta. Mlagete swa’u mlagu mole mage gito, Lowa makemo wa he’amowa.

Teimeya mgole fe sago ai li hata. Gu safagete hali ai hali hata. Silowayo, meta lilati tlage holaigo. lilati tlage hole, tgo swa’uhele tlelaumate mlili meteweyayo, tgutete lafgouleigo. simo tapoto ta’uwa ho lafgo lafgouleigo. Mlagete, asapo sotome gomola mli mgo, mgogi mli mgo lileigo. Yaweweya mgo lileigo. Lilatile, fumole, silo tapoto hole, ho pa’i sasati lafgouleigo.

Towete tgou swa’uhele tle laumate mlili meteweya tgutete mlatlagete ta’uwa hopa’i lafgo lafgou tetgoleigo. towete tgou Yawewele hge tle laumate mlili metewegayo, Metega wiyemete agete itogi lilei mete laya. Mlagete Sotome la Gomola mogi mli mgo ileigo. Mogifa Yaweweya mgote mlimigo. Lilati mgi he’amotiya, fumote mgi he’amotiya. Metefa tgutete lilatite howa.

Mile stu mehele tlagote Misilali meta mgole mgaliya. Meta mgole giya. Teime someheyayo, mgote lileigo. Silo lafgoula someheya. Silo lafgoula so meheya mgo, mgote lile yahe go. Mehele stu meheya mehe ta. Tile Misilali mgale, gigote la wa hge ta swoula mehe.

Mgole tile Misilali stu mi meheya mehe ta. Flageyayo, gitile silole ei yapu ei mi tapoto mile hetwahete lilila, Metewefa hetwahete ta’uwa lafgou tetgoleigo. Silo tapoto lafgouleigo. Miya mgole, Tile Misilali miya mgole giya. Gigo ya stu mehe la wa yai atilami la mliya. Gitile silolama mageteli towete tgo, tgo walewale miwe, wesiyafou to metewe, giti tgutete gitigofayo, mgo mliliya. I no gitile taita maiya metewele la wa yai atila, opiyae! Gitifa tgutete gitifa lelagi tago, fe luwalu luwalu mi. Giti swa’umehele femo afgate lela metewe, mete ai la li hata, silolama.

Gitigo taita maiya metewele la wa yai atila, la wa he’amola opiyae! Gitile fe yeleti yelete mgo hemagei ogo ago, la fli luwalu fli sagi, sagigo la yafila, fe luwalu luwalu mgo mlili mgo, giti silole fe luwalu mo go. Silole fe hilawa miyayo, Gitifa silo tapoto lafgoula flitle fli, fe luwalu luwalu miya mi ta. Miya swa’uhele femo afgate lelami. Metafa gitifa silo tapoto ta’u lafgoulei giti laya.

Gitile tilitaili itogi itogi la magefei mlefeili, moto hlau, tilitaili mgo hgo mago hgo, itogi itogi la wa halili lepiyo, lepifayo, simo tapoto ta’uwa lafgouleigo. Ame 'usalei tilitaili, moli 'le’la pa’la, gitile silolama la taglei mepi. mifayo, simo tapoto laslasiyaleigo.

Tile Misilali ya stu wiyeme meheya mehe ta. Giyayo, ga hgo stupkatale, hagi se hagi wele, Yawewele tle laumate ta li swou lileigo fe? Teime, silo lilatile ho pa’i late, la lila femole tlago mgole, tiya mile tlago lela mgaliya.

Mehe wa yai pkate swou hetetai.

 Lesele 19 Kwesten #

2q. Bilong wanem God i no kotim hariap ol sin bilong ol lain bilong Sodom na Gomora na yumi tu?
2a. God i laikim tru ol manmeri na em i laik marimari long ol. God i wetim ol manmeri na givim taim long ol bai ol i mas senisim bikhet tingting blong ol.

4q. Bilong wanem God i senisim meri bilong Lot i kamap ston?
4a. Meri bilong Lot i no go ananit lo God na behainim tok bilong en. Em i sakim tok bilong God, na em i lukluk i go bek long Sodom na Gomora.

5q. Ating God i save pretim nating ol manmeri, a?
5a. Nogat. Em i no olsem yumi ol man blo graun, i pretim nating ol pikinini. Nogat. God i bihainim stret tok bilong en.

6q. Bilong wanem God i salim tupela ensel bilong helpim Lot?
6a. Lot i stap ananit lo Eiwapai fawimiwe, na Eiwapai fawimiwe i lukautim em na stap.

7q. Sampla taim, Eiwapai fawimiwe i save stikim yumi ol manmeri blo stretim pasin blo yumi. Oke, taim em bagarapim ol lain nogut, Eiwapai fawimiwe em pasin man o nogat?
7a. Yes, Eiwapai fawimiwe em pasin man. Eiwapai fawimiwe em laikim tumas yumi ol piksa blong en. Em les lo bagarapim yumi.
